author: {'steamid': '76561198077644574', 'num_games_owned': 1351, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 1132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1132, 'last_played': 1665650232}
review:
RiME is a fun 3D adventure puzzle game.
You take on the role of a kid washed up to shore on a strange island after an apparent ship wreck, and have the piece together the mystery of what happened and solve puzzles to get through each area of this strange new world. 

This game is really fun, and has a fantastic soundtrack. It plays like a 3D Zelda game as far as the puzzle solving goes, and that's the majority of the game play along with exploration elements. There is no real combat per say in this game, as you don't really fight any enemies. Aside from running away from and avoiding a giant bird that wants to eat you, or getting around ghosts that literally suck your life energy or soul out of you. You have no conventional weapons, you have no portable tools. Have to use your head and the items around you to figure out each puzzle, how to deal with the giant bird, or how to avoid the deadly soul sucking ghosts.

There is a twist at the end of the game that can make it a  real emotional gut punch, and I think it's really well done. I just find myself wishing the game was a little longer.

Over all, I would highly recommend playing this, especially if you're a fan of the puzzle solving aspects of the more 3D Zelda games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198175718965', 'num_games_owned': 808, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 89, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 89, 'last_played': 1668277408}
review: Call me old fashioned but I like my games to be fun not just look nice.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015863142', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 147, 'playtime_forever': 211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1666891024}
review:
Rime è un indie molto sottovalutato, un gioco con una bella narrativa silenziosa, poetico e visivamente ispirato. Il gameplay è basato principalmente sulla risoluzione di enigmi, semplici e intuitivi ma mai banali ne' tanto meno frustranti come in altri giochi. Il tutto accompagnato da una colonna sonora eccezionale.
Assolutamente consigliato

author: {'steamid': '76561198115787693', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3038, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1575, 'last_played': 1702823519}
review:
This is a beautiful and carefully made game to the last detail of it. It is a work of love as much as it is a game .
The visuals are fantastic, specially in the first and fourth levels. It is easier to solve the puzzles than to find all  the objects . Many of them are off the beaten track and well hidden . The "bird" in the second level is quite irritating but yes, the game is relaxing. It is the ending that puts RIME above most games. I must confess it hit me hard. Find the white ghost in each of the 4 levels  and you will fully understand the meaning of the ending.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072094217', 'num_games_owned': 707, 'num_reviews': 617, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1667497069}
review:
I wouldn't have owned and played this game if i didn't get it from a humble bundle pack back in the day.

This game is so trash, the animations are so bad that when the character runs it feels like i'm watching a paraplegic run for the first time.

For a game that is not graphically pleasing to look at this game really love to hog the frames. Would go down from 144 to 70+ randomly in the same spot.

Really love that the main mechanic of the game is a yell at thing. UGGGGHHH, really hated this and the annoying sounds the character makes.

Please stay away from this pile of garbage.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994658017', 'num_games_owned': 729, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 773, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 723, 'last_played': 1675543993}
review:
Aunque esté mal hacerlo, voy a empezar por lo malo del juego... y lo peor que tiene el juego es su optimización.

Lo jugué en un Ryzen 3 1200 con una 1050ti y sufrí tremendas caídas de FPS en zonas con muchas partículas (como la parte final con la lluvia o las zonas con caídas de agua) hasta tal punto que se hacía injugable e incluso me daban náuseas de los movimientos de cámara tan bruscos. Sin embargo ni el uso de CPU ni el uso de GPU llegaban al 100%, pocas veces subían por encima del 90%. Era como si no hubiera ni cuello de botella de CPU ni GPU, pero el juego "no iba fino".

Pude disfrutar y completar el juego con un portátil con una 1060m de 6 GB y un i7-7700HQ.

Ahora (al escribir esta reseña) he cambiado el R3 1200 por un Ryzen 5 5600G y el juego se comporta de manera estable prácticamente como una roca a 60 fps con exactamente la misma gráfica (la 1050ti), memoria, etc. Eso significa que de alguna manera el cuello de CPU era el procesador, pero me sigue pareciendo extrañísimo que no se pusiera al 100% para indicarlo. ¿Quizá no era capaz de aprovechar el paralelismo de los cuatro núcleos y su rendimiento estaba fijado por lo que era capaz de dar un único núcleo en particular?

Bueno, ahora la reseña "buena" del juego:

El juego no tiene una elevada dificultad, ni falta que le hace para poder ser disfrutable. Los puzzles se dejan resolver con sencillez y muy pocas veces nos veremos perdidos en el mundo buscando cómo resolverlos.

Para mí eso es un punto muy positivo.

He jugado a juegos en los que me he quedado atascado en algún puzzle durante más tiempo del deseado no porque no fuera capaz de resolverlo por mí mismo, si no porque no estaba bien diseñado el juego para "mostrar" las pistas necesarias para que lo resuelvas, y en algunas ocasiones la resolución parecía que tenías que saberla de antemano sin que recibieras pistas de ninguna manera.

En ese aspecto este juego me parece fantástico. Un equilibrio muy bueno que, además, suma el hecho de que tras finalizarlo (y soltar unas lágrimas por la empatía que te genera el juego) quieras jugar un poco más para encontrar los juguetes perdidos.

Al final no he completado esa tarea, pero fue en lo primero en lo que pensé cuando lo terminé, pero sugerí a mi hija que lo jugara y eso terminó haciéndome olvidar ese impulso de buscar yo mismo los objetos coleccionables que dejé atrás.

Como mi hija solo pudo jugar en el PC con el Ryzen 3 1200, lo dejó abandonado cuando llegó a la zona de la lluvia (casi al final del juego). No me dijo directamente el motivo por el que lo abandonó, pero imagino que (al igual que yo) se debió sentir mal tras jugar un rato con tan mal rendimiento.

Ahora que he ampliado el PC doméstico espero que se anime a retomar el juego y que disfrute de esta inolvidable aventura tanto como la disfruté yo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198166086948', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2028, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2026, 'last_played': 1694240623}
review: I love this game so much that I played completely through it twice; once on PS4 when it first released, and then again on Steam. author: {'steamid': '76561197992475773', 'num_games_owned': 974, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1666263659}
review:
Bueno, otro terminado... Un walking simulator con puzzles y una historia abierta en sus detalles a interpretaciones personales, pero con un final que depende de cada uno igual te suelta una lagrimita. Corto pero muy disfrutable :)

Juego sencillo de jugar con puzzles no muy complicados, bastante lineal hasta el punto de que no me empujo mucho a la exploración, así que los coleccionables prácticamente me los perdi todos, excepto los mas obvios, el camino a seguir para avanzar es bastante obvio. 

Gráficamente y artísticamente es muy bonito y atractivo a la vista. La música acompaña muy bien y tiene un aire a El viaje de Chihiro (spirited away), una de mis películas favoritas de Studio Ghibli. El rendimiento fue un poco malo creo que en el tercer acto cuando entras en las zonas de cuevas, pero el resto del juego funciona de maravilla. Y bueno no hay mucho mas que decir, muy recomendado

author: {'steamid': '76561198086305856', 'num_games_owned': 1292, 'num_reviews': 148, 'playtime_forever': 679, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 679, 'last_played': 1662576266}
review:
Интересное и красивое приключение, к тому же и со смыслом.
Графика хорошая, подошла к сюжету и атмосфере очень удачно.
Музыка приятная, не мешает, некоторые композиции вообще отличные.
Сюжет интересный, трогательный, передается визуально локациями и через найденные собирательные предметы.
Управление простое, трудностей не доставит.
Сама игра тоже простая, проходится легко и не принужденно.
Полное прохождение со сбором всего занимает примерно 11 часов.
Ачивки получаются все за одно прохождение, сложностей в их получение тоже нет.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111692826', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 524, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 524, 'last_played': 1662126770}
review:
Rime is a well-constructed game with a beautiful environment and choice of color palette but lacks to get any real involvement at times. It ticks a lot of boxes for a beautiful indie game but overall it lost me. It could be due to being unnecessarily too long for an atmospheric game, or the abundant amount of time spent on collectables present in the game, and the player can't do much other than run. There weren't many noteworthy puzzles to talk about and the collectables were alright which I thought was helping me understand the story better but I was way off at the end with a mixed feeling.
Not something to recommend at full price, but it is definitely worth the time at a discount.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022236568', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1164, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1164, 'last_played': 1662106789}
review:
RiME - одна из немногих действительно красивых игр (причём делающих это своей яркой фишкой). Дизайн относительно минималистичен, представляет смесь сказки и средиземноморских мотивов, используются яркие цвета, ничего лишнего, цветофильтр и тени такие, как надо, особенно красиво выглядит локация из первой главы - хотелось бы в игре такого побольше. Пожалуй, необычно красивая картинка - главное увлекающее достоинство.

Но это не делает остальные аспекты посредственными, ведь геймдизайн этой игры почти не репитативен, каждая ситуация и головоломка (есть как простые, так и немного более сложные, на внимательность) новая. Локации исследовать интересно, как из-за эстетики, так и благодаря компактности мира и его устройства. Музыка приятна, но большинство мелодий не запоминаются, разве что кроме темы Колыбельной. Игра уважает время игрока, она не растянута для галочки. Поскольку мир в этой игре то ли игра сознания, то ли загробный - здесь много символов. Проблема в том, что до части из них можно найти толкование и выстроить догадки, но остальные не находят правдоподобных версий, оставляя место СПГСу. В связи с этим игра оставляет больше вопросов, чем ответов (при том, что продолжения не будет). Сюжет не сразу даёт понять, что это история утраты, с соответствующим настроением она и оставляет после финала, а ведь поначалу казалось, что игра более весёлая. 

Коллектиблы немногочисленны, но найти их бывало не просто - кстати, могли бы быть поинтереснее. Ачивки позволяют выбить идеалку, некоторые условия креативны. Игра удобна для геймпада - вибрации от перетаскивания предмета по шероховатому пола хороши. Взаимодействие с головоломками и миром в половине случаев связаны с голосом (ГГ не говорит, но поёт, смеётся, плачет, в общем, выражает чувства, которые понятны на всех языках мира без использования языка), в остальном надо что-то двигать, взбираться, соотносить предметы. Необычная игра, рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198099903933', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1660837599}
review:
前几天清灰的时候看到这个游戏一直没怎么玩，于是下下来准备通关。
玩了十几分钟，我退出了游戏。游戏的美术以及音乐的氛围做的挺棒，手感也还行。但是，游戏的摄像头距离人物太近，摄像头的移动也不舒服，实在是晕3D玩不下去了。
退出游戏的那一刻，我好想记起来上一次卸载这游戏是为啥了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198162264772', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 620, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 620, 'last_played': 1660839045}
review: I really liked to play RiME. It was a beautifula and calm experience to solve RiME easy going puzzles while enjoying a calm melody. It had a certain mysery behind the story, being that I imagined different endings. I though the end was going to be different however I am not disappointed. I believe the game is supposed to let us wonder about it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198858955754', 'num_games_owned': 53, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 1398, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1398, 'last_played': 1660454466}
review: 时隔三年终于把当初通关的rime来了个二周目全收集全成就，也补个评测吧。这游戏的收集要素实在是太多了，我一个路痴为了收集晕头转向。但是风景真的太美了，音乐也是我的最爱，这几年里一直在时不时地把ost翻出来听。加上我当初看实况以及初次游玩，已经是第三次品味这个游戏，打到结局的时候还是感触颇深，怪我泪点太低。总之是一款有缺点但是我个人非常喜欢的游戏，尤其是艺术风格和营造的情绪氛围我非常非常喜欢。

author: {'steamid': '76561198117797243', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1660383681}
review: 다이렉트 게임즈에서 3300원에 구매하여 5.4시간에 엔딩봤습니다. 정가에 구입하시면 게임의 기본 스토리 볼륨에 있어서 조금 아쉽고, 캐릭터의 이동속도가 맵의 전체적인 크기에 비해 "상당히" 느리기 때문에 꽤나 많은 숨겨진 수집요소와 매력적인 도전과제가 존재함에도 불구하고 매우 아쉬운 게임입니다. 수집요소와 도전과제를 위해 이곳저곳 돌아다녀야 하는데, 저 멀리 있는 곳까지 갈 생각만 하면 있던 호기심도 쏙 들어갈 정도로 답답합니다. 다만, 전체적인 퍼즐의 구성과 그래픽, 음악과 분위기에 있어서는 꽤나 매력적인 게임이라고 생각합니다. 한국어를 지원하지 않지만, 게임 내에서 언어 자체가 등장하지 않기 때문에 설정 시에 나오는 영어(밝기, 해상도 등) 정도만 아셔도 게임 플레이에는 전혀 지장이 없습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015856658', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 377, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 377, 'last_played': 1657419831}
review:
I had RiME in my library for years as, at first glance, I thought Rime was a small and simple puzzle game. 
Boy lands on an island, works his way to the tower in the distance, the end. 

Boy was I wrong. It goes beyond that and it has a suprisingly moving story. I won't spoil it but it actually got me in "the feels". And of course it's beautiful. It did run a bit hot with my  GTX 1660 Ti, so optimization could've been better but it didn't really have any other issues.

I loved it! Definitely reccomended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198349254036', 'num_games_owned': 222, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 37, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1658335258}
review: the only positive I have in my short time of playing is the graphics. Controls are miserable, the puzzles were underwhelming, story is good according to others, but there's no story at all at the start so there wasn't anything to keep me playing, idk there's a lot of other people who have really enjoyed the game, but the 40 or so minutes I played felt like a boring tech demo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041468860', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 751, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 751, 'last_played': 1658220125}
review:
I was always really excited for RiME, following it closely before it's release, and when it finally did come out I bought it in the first week. It is an absolutely beautiful game, the environments and visual style are charming, and it really delivers the aesthetic experience that it promised in it's marketing. 
That is, unfortunately, where the praise ends, as aesthetic alone is not enough to drive progression of this particular experience, and both the puzzle design and the story are in need of improvement. Despite owning this game since release, it has taken me 5 years to make any significant progress on it.
The story isn't bad, it's just not particularly compelling, falling prey to the phenomenon of feeling primarily driven by plot rather than by the motivations of the character.
The puzzle design was where I encountered the most frustration, often not knowing what my goal was, I spent most of the game just doing whatever was available to me at the time, hoping that it would lead to progression. A number of times I got completely stuck, not because the puzzle was difficult, but because the goal was completely unclear. 

I would love to see more from this developer in future if their puzzle design and storytelling was improved upon, but I can't recommend RiME as a worthwhile experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198389406084', 'num_games_owned': 42, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1049, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1042, 'last_played': 1696390688}
review: As someone whose played well over 15 hours of this game. I must say that Rime has become one of my favorite games. The art style, music, simple puzzles and a moving story. This game was definitely worth my time and I believe that it is worth your time as well. The game isn't long and is great if you just want to kickback and relax. I highly recommend this game and hope that you'll enjoy it as much as I did.

author: {'steamid': '76561198843871934', 'num_games_owned': 269, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 569, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 569, 'last_played': 1657524131}
review:
This game is beautiful and emotional, and normally this is the type of game I'd love, but it has a number of issues that make me hesitant to recommend it.

First, the gameplay. Your player character moves rather slowly, and feels very stiff and heavy to move. It felt really cumbersome playing as him, especially since the game features lots of platforming and exploration. The camera is awkward as hell, and will fix angles for you whether you want it to or not.

Second, the collectables. There are so many freaking collectables in this game, and most of them feel pointless. The toy collectables contribute to the game's ending, one outfit helps with an achievement and the shells unlock a nice lullaby, but beyond that, none of the collectables unlock any special features. Combined with the awkward game mechanics above, they feel more like a chore to collect after awhile.

Third (and probably most relevant to a lot of people), the price. Forty freaking dollars??? For an indie game that you can beat in under 10 hours? This isn't something like, say, Hellblade or A Plague Tale, which weren't triple A games but still clearly had a sizeable budget and a lot of work put into the graphics, voice acting, etc. This game feels massively overpriced for what it is, especially when similar games like Journey, ABZU, or even Gris each cost $20 or less.

Honestly tho I think the MAIN reason I don't fully recommend this game is the attitude of the developers. For the last Steam Awards they tried to encourage their fans to help make it a candidate for the Labor of Love award...even tho the last update for the game was four years ago. Either the devs genuinely didn't understand what the award was for, or their sense of ego was so inflated they thought they could get away with getting an undeserved nomination. I'm hoping it's the former, but either way it leaves a bad taste in my mouth.

This is not a bad game by any means, and I did find parts of it enjoyable, but there are better games out there, including but also ESPECIALLY Journey, ABZU, and Gris mentioned above. If you are still interested wait until the game goes on sale, and be sure the play the aforementioned games to experience this type of game done right.

review: O inicio é um pouco difícil de entender a história, mas depois que você começa a juntar as peças fica envolvente de jogar. Muito emocionante. História linda. Quase chorei no final ;-;.

author: {'steamid': '76561198255656700', 'num_games_owned': 2114, 'num_reviews': 252, 'playtime_forever': 593, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 593, 'last_played': 1652937411}
review:
오픈월드 어드벤처 힐링 퍼즐게임으로

스토리를 간단히 보면 조력자 여우를 따라 수수께끼의 섬을 탐험하고, 
탑의 가장 꼭대기에 도달해 단단히 봉인된 비밀을 파헤쳐 가는 내용으로

게임 진행은 챕터별로 진행되며 각 챕터를 클리어하면 점차 알 수 없던 배경 스토리와 사건의 전말에 대한 기억들이 재구성됩니다.

장난감, 의상, 열쇠구멍, 엠블럼 조각 등 다양한 수집 요소가 있고

소리, 빛, 그림자 투사, 원근법, 장애물 피하기, 시간 조작 등 
지형지물을 이용한 참신한 퍼즐 구성과 어렵지 않은 난이도로 가볍게 즐기기 좋고 
전체적인 그래픽과 상황에 맞는 BGM이 상당히 좋은 게임입니다.

* 각 수집 요소들을 다 모으는 걸 추천드립니다.(스토리 이해와 엔딩에 도움 됨)

[spoiler]각 챕터 이름이 부정, 분노, 협상, 우울, 수용으로 죽음을 받아들이는 다섯 단계와 같으며
아버지가 아들의 사후를 상상하며 아들의 죽음을 받아들이는 순간을 표현한 게임입니다.
[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198123299123', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1657037241}
review:
О боже, как же скучно. Бесконечная беготня по относительно большим пространствам для того, что бы решить очередную головоломку для дошколят, а после, посмотреть душераздирающую катсцену про дружбу и любовь.
Никакой интересной геймплейной механики, никаких новшеств или увлекательных идей, ты просто бегаешь под релаксирующую музыку и "решаешь" "головоломки".
Хотя, чего я хочу от игры для детей(?).

author: {'steamid': '76561198051337120', 'num_games_owned': 3837, 'num_reviews': 1214, 'playtime_forever': 258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 258, 'last_played': 1657028156}
review:
如果我走了
我愿意是你身下的海水
你可以依托我
如果我走了
我愿意是你脸边的微风
你可以感受我
如果我走了
我愿意是你肩上的披风

review: 雖然是解謎，但是有著壯闊的古蹟，美麗的風景，光是看到這些製作組的用心，就已經覺得很值回票價，裡面還有著很多可以讓您自己去發想的故事背景。值得推薦。

author: {'steamid': '76561197996254981', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 1670, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1670, 'last_played': 1656534021}
review: Una maravillosa aventura llena de emociones, momentos inolvidables y mensajes para el recuerdo. Gráficamente es precioso, con un diseño artístico sobresaliente y una BSO muy emotiva. El tema cantado es para quitarse el sombrero. La guinda la pone una sobrecogedora historia, bella como pocas que recuerde. Sin duda, uno de los mejores indies que he jugado.

author: {'steamid': '76561199012388059', 'num_games_owned': 136, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 389, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 389, 'last_played': 1656091195}
review: This game will always hold a special place in my heart and gaming history. The gameplay is so fun if you love exploring & some puzzles, the soundtrack is beautiful, and the story is so emotional. You HAVE to play this game. It will change you forever.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026728234', 'num_games_owned': 3424, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 967, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 871, 'last_played': 1656264371}
review: I don't often do reviews but I thought I'd give a warning if you're looking at this game and you're an achievement hunter. For the record, I enjoyed the game. But if you're interested in 100%-ing this game and want to save some time, ABSOLUTELY follow a guide on your FIRST playthrough.  Most of the guides state that there are no missable achievements because there's a chapter select at the end of the game.  But if you're like me and did a blind first playthrough to simply enjoy the game and casually found collectibles here and there, then you might as well replay the whole game a second time if you want to get the rest of them. The reason is that chapter select obviously starts you a the beginning of each chapter, so if for example the collectible you missed was the last one in that chapter, you have to play through all of it, since the last collectible is usually right before the end.

author: {'steamid': '76561198143702787', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 806, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 795, 'last_played': 1656580056}
review:
Mah...mio malgrado mi ritrovo a bocciare questo titolo.

Un compito discretamente ben fatto sotto il lato artistico ma dal gameplay lento, quasi inesistente e, almeno per me, molto noioso.

Giocandolo verrebbe da fare paragoni con ICO come struttura, ma l'opera di Ueda era molto più ispirata, nelle musiche e nelle atmosfere..e poi c'era Yorda.

Questo titolo non è assolutamente un gioco mal riuscito ma per apprezzarlo dovete andare in cerca di un gioco dal significato nascosto, da gustare in modo rilassato, volenti rallentare per alcune ore i vostri ritmi di vita.

E questo non fa per me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013252178', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 461, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 461, 'last_played': 1654792652}
review: un bellissimo gioco, sia per la storia che per le musiche, il gameplay non è niente di particolarmente innovativo, ma il senso di immersione è totale, vorrei altri giochi come questo o come "The Vanishing di Ethan Carter", lo consiglio assoulutamente per gli amanti del genere

author: {'steamid': '76561198029208692', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 637, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 637, 'last_played': 1654785077}
review: This is an impressive puzzle-platforming adventure game. Rime plays similarly to games like ICO and Journey wherein the player must explore environments and solve mostly intuitive puzzles. The game largely succeeds with its' aims to tell a story that is conveyed visually, but it is also supported by a moving score. Some of the set pieces may feel a little drawn out, but none of them truly take away from the altogether immersive experience. What does hitch the experience up on occasion are frame drops and performance issues. The game is beautiful and has a strong artistic style but performance issues seem unjustified. And though they are rare, they do mar slightly the otherwise smooth and mostly unbroken gameplay. It is a simple game that does not overbear the player or overstay its' course. There are also numerous optional items and secrets to collect and so, depending on player investment, it could provide a bit of replay value.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198880264399', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 273, 'playtime_forever': 196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 196, 'last_played': 1652649153}
review:
Rime es un videojuego de aventuras en tercera persona del 26 de Mayo del 2017.
El diseño artístico de tipo sombreado plano hizo que se le comparara con Sojourn, aunque ese tiene otro tema y es en primera persona.
El escenario del juego es una isla a la que llegamos aparentemente tras un naufragio, y de la que debemos escapar para evitar una maldición. El diseño tiene un ciclo día-noche, haciendo que la luz tenga mucha importancia, tanto en la jugabilidad como en el aspecto visual del juego.
Lo malo realmente, es la dificultad de los puzles, muchos ‘a contra reloj’.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008062708', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 509, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 509, 'last_played': 1652499321}

author: {'steamid': '76561197981747125', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 432, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 432, 'last_played': 1578339891}
review:
I voti vanno da 1 a 10, dove più il voto è alto più è positivo e sono dati a gioco completato.  Nel voto viene tenuto conto il periodo in cui il gioco è stato lanciato sul mercato.

-	Grafica 8
-	Sonoro 8
-	Storia 6
-	Giocabilità 9
-	Longevità 5

Giudizio finale:
Un Indie Game davvero molto carino. Graficamente simile a Zelda: Breath of the Wild, il gioco in realtà si differenzia molto visto che non ci sono combattimenti, ma solo Puzzle da risolvere per proseguire nella vostra avventura. Nessuna mappa e nessun dialogo, solo qualche piccolo indizio per aiutarvi a risolvere i vostri enigmi che qualche volta risultano un pò troppo semplici. Peccato per la longevità, alla fine il gioco risulta essere così piacevole che vorreste continuasse ancora!

Ricordo a tutti che il giudizio, come il gusto è sempre molto personale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010853113', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 757, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 617, 'last_played': 1651614702}
review:
I got this game a few days ago as a recommendation and I must say it's an amazing little game.
The puzzles weren't too hard, but the atmosphere was so engaging.
The soundtrack is wonderful too, so much so that I am still listening to it after completing the game twice.
The games story plays perfectly on your emotions, from happiness meeting a friend or completing a puzzle to sadness as you learn more or things happen out of your control. (no spoilers though xd)
It is an amazing game and totally worth your time to play and complete! 10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198138252144', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 521, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 521, 'last_played': 1636897199}
review: This game is incredible! It simultaneously broke my heart and blew my mind. I've never played anything like it and the graphics/animation of the sky both day and night in the first stage is just breathtaking, I could have (probably did) just spend hours looking up at the sky. Highly recommend but also be prepared for an emotional ending, it will stay with me forever and I cannot say that about too many games. Outstanding work!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198051020329', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 480, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 480, 'last_played': 1651131885}
review:
A wonderful, touching, melancholy game. This game doesn't do any one truly novel thing, but creates something that itself is quite an enjoyable journey unlike any other individual game. It does not fit neatly into a genre. While it has puzzles, don't expect to be challenged, and while it has platforming, the controls are extremely forgiving. It has a story but that's not the focus either. 


It's hard to give comparison, but it lies somewhere on the spectrum of The Witness, Outer Wilds, Talos Principle Superliminal, and even a bit of Firewatch. If you like all or most of those, you might enjoy flowing through this.

review: 17年我上高二，放月假在家看游戏风云，那天播出的就是Rime，那时候哪见过这游戏啊？从此便成了我心中的白月光，老是念念不忘。后来上大学补票了，趁毕业前通关了，说真的最后一章差点没把我哭死。难得一件的精品独立游戏，我给十分！这他妈的才是第九艺术！顺便吐槽一下，收集物多少有点阴间。除此之外别无缺点。bgm也是恰到好处。

author: {'steamid': '76561197975223746', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 680, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 680, 'last_played': 1648384512}
review:
Lo recomiendo porque se ve que hay mucho sentimiento detrás del juego y la historia está curiosa, además, el apartado gráfico y sonoro es bastante bonito, ahora, como juego juego, vale más bien poco.. Es un poco rollo todo: ve allí, coge esto, llévalo allí y repite proceso. Algún puzzle curioso, pero en general todo es para niños. Los escenarios son preciosos y los logros fácilmente conseguibles aunque hay que repetir el juego para ello y la verdad es que da un poco de pereza. 

Lo siento, pero el juego no vale 35€ ni por asomo. Debería haber una muy buena rebaja de por medio.

Vale la pena leer los créditos, los agradecimientos que ponen los trabajadores son muy bonitos y se nota que la historia cobra aún más sentido.

author: {'steamid': '76561199095495736', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 539, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 539, 'last_played': 1646517333}

review: Rime is a puzzle game that has an intriguing theme.  The world it is set in is lovely and the puzzles are fun with just the right amount of difficulty for me.  The feel of this game was extraordinary.  I hadn't read anything about it before playing and was surprised to learn that it's based on the stages of grief.

review:
Jogo muito Bom ! excelente pra quem gosta do studio ghibli, a arte é simplesmente linda!
um jogo pra quem procura relaxar, pois o mesmo é focado na tranquilidade de puzzles...
senti falta de alguma ação, mas acredito q a proposta do jogo é realmente essa, sem super poderes, sem batalhas, só tranquilidade de uma ilha deserta e puzzles...
OBS: 1 - Não gostei das partes do pássaro, acho q quebrou a tranquilidade do jogo e não agregou na diversão;
2 - acho q  as partes submarinas poderiam ser mais bem exploradas senti falta de profundidade

author: {'steamid': '76561198302877729', 'num_games_owned': 163, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 691, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 691, 'last_played': 1647115754}
review: Ну что же, игра мне понравилась, но оставила немного грустный осадок. Тем кто падок на эмоции лучше хорошенько подготовится, так как это игра (спойлер на ваш страх и риск) [spoiler] на психологической основе про потерю близких, со своим своим виденьем этапов гнева, принятия и всего такого [/spoiler]. Сама игра достаточно проста в прохождении и не требует особых умений, хотя у меня бывали моменты, когда я просто сам не понимал что делать дальше, хоть решение лежало на видном месте. В общем, игра интересная, пройти стоит)

author: {'steamid': '76561198024953383', 'num_games_owned': 362, 'num_reviews': 161, 'playtime_forever': 231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 231, 'last_played': 1580965779}
review:
It's a beautiful game and feels very melancholy and solemn to play. But I just can't recommend it because it's just..boring. There's a lot of wandering around aimlessly not knowing what you're doing. It's a shame because I felt similar to how i felt playing Shadow of the Colossus when playing Rime - but the gameplay just isn't there, unlike SotC.

You might like it if you like pretty visuals and endless samey puzzles, but it wasn't for me

author: {'steamid': '76561198122684426', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 693, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 693, 'last_played': 1646037600}
review:
할인 할 때 산다면 중이나 중상은 가볍게 치는 게임이라 생각합니다
전반적으로 참으로 좋은 게임 중 하나인데...단점을 꼽자면

이 게임 전력질주 란게 존재 하지 않아서 맵 사이즈에 비해 이속이 답답해요
특히 길 찾는 요소가 비중이 커서 그 답답함이 또 극대화 되는 데
이게 도전과제 올클 까지 겹치면 꽤 짜증나는 요소 입니다

거기다 최적화 문제인지 보기와 달리 글카가 혹사 당해서 그래픽 타협이 필요한거도 좀....

딱 이 2가지 문제만 없어도 더 좋은 게임으로 평가 할텐데 아쉽네요
솔직히 저 2가지 문제가 있어서 평가를 달게 만든 거 같아요
정말 다 좋았는데....하아...답답해 뒤질거 같아요...

author: {'steamid': '76561198137657929', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 439, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 439, 'last_played': 1645770504}
review:
Would recommend this game despite the relatively short play-time based on the absolutely gorgeous presentation. Wait for a sale as the running-time is a detractor.
The presentation of the experience is beautiful and near flawless, from visual to sound design everything lines up to completely engage you into the flow of the action. Puzzle design is relatively simple because it is intended to allow you to progress and the act of solving the puzzles is built into the presentation itself.
This brings me to the crux of the "game", while the opening (the parts you mostly see in the screenshots) is breezy and light the actual theme of the game is emotional and themed with sadness. We has a great time playing until we started to realize the ultimate trajectory of the story's narrative, so be warned.
There's much in RiME to discover and collect but due to the nature of the story I don't think we will be replaying it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971078704', 'num_games_owned': 1107, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 701, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 701, 'last_played': 1644985002}
review:
RiME is a puzzle platformer that focuses more on the experience than the difficulty (of both the puzzles and the platforming). If you are reading this review because you saw the screenshots and it looks like the kind of game that you would like then I would definitely recommend it: It's extremely well done for what it is, looks even better in motion, and also has really good sound and music design.

Based purely on game mechanics I would rate it as good but not great (although there are a handful of stand out puzzles). If you aren't interested in the more emotional/artistic aspects of games then there are probably other games that you would enjoy more. Even with that caveat, however, RiME has the feeling of being a labor of love, and it feels like the result of not only a strong initial design vision but also the result of iteration and polish so that everything works together well and the whole feels greater than the sum of its individual parts. I think it is a good example of a game that does exactly what it sets out to do.
(I think it's worth giving a special mention to the use of dynamic music in the game. I was constantly impressed with how the music seamlessly reacted to what I was doing, and not just by cross fading to a music cue but instead by actually having the music cue emerge from the music that was already playing.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198088671224', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 348, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 348, 'last_played': 1645229526}

author: {'steamid': '76561198062409091', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 298, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 298, 'last_played': 1645199121}
review:
Единственный однозначный плюс этой игры для меня - музыка.
Графика балансирует на грани между стильностью и примитивностью, да еще и тормозить умудряется.
Геймплей состоит из бесконечной, бесконечной, бесконечной беготни по ОГРОМНЫМ, мать его, пространствам. По песку, по траве, по пещере, по руинам, по камням, по воде. Бегаешь, бегаешь, бегаешь, бегаешь, бегаешь, бегаешь периодически решая простейшие головоломки под красивую музыку. Меня хватило на 5 часов этой беготни, потом я подгорел и плюнул.
Экшена в игре нет, нет сражений : она очень медитативная и очень на любителя.
Сюжета в игре нет, вернее он есть в гомеопатических количествах и то, если собирать секреты. А для этого надо что? Правильно! Опять, бегать, бегать, бегать, бегать, бегать, бегать!!! Поэтому в гробу я видал этот сюжет, и того, кто придумал так его подавать!
Ух, бомбит-то как!!!
P.S.
Почитал другие отзывы и ОКАЗЫВАЕТСЯ в конце игры есть НЕВЕРОЯТНЫЙ сюжетный твист, который перевернет ваше отношение к жизни! Очень, блин, смешно. Мне, спустя пять часов игры, как было наплевать на всех персонажей, что упоминались в игре, так и осталось. А наплевать мне было потому, что они вообще никак не раскрываются - это тупо пустые болванчики, которым разработчики на всю игру выдали пару эмоций и все.
Ну и возникает вопрос : нафига терпеть эту скучную игру ради концовки, если ее можно просто посмотреть на ютубе и не тратить свое время?
Хотите неожиданную развязку? Brothers : a Tale of Two Sons - в ней и геймплей гораздо разнообразнее и инновационнее, она выглядит лучше, не растянута, и в ней, в отличии от RIME, ЕСТЬ сюжет!
Да чего далеко за другими примерами ходить : предыдущая игра создателей RIME - Deadlight! Шедевр без преувеличения! Как создатели Deathlight умудрились все полимеры проср@ть, я не понимаю!
И да, все еще бомбит!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561197988128526', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 355, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 355, 'last_played': 1645128900}

author: {'steamid': '76561198039812448', 'num_games_owned': 229, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 580, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 580, 'last_played': 1645125090}
review:
Отличный красочный платформер. Шикарная музыка, незатейливая трогательная история. 
Вы играете за юного Довакина, но голосом вы умеете только зажигать огоньки и гонять свиней. Загадки не сложные, но местами хочется больше взаимодействия с миром помимо скриптовых сцен. 
В целом отличная ламповая игра на несколько вечеров с чайком.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040538550', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 107, 'playtime_forever': 463, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 463, 'last_played': 1644507640}
review: Non è che ho tanto da dire, vale la pena arrivare in fondo.. veramente. Pura poesia. Un gioco sì, ma denso denso denso di significato. Complimenti agli sviluppatori, esplorazione e puzzle mai troppo difficili perché è la storia che conta (non sto a dire perché, no spoiler). Super consigliato.

author: {'steamid': '76561197981200540', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 392, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 392, 'last_played': 1644158989}
review:
Es probablemente, a mis 45 años, el juego que más me ha conmovido cuando poco a poco vas descubriendo la historia. Lo jugué junto a mi pequeño de 5 años. Él disfrutó como un enano con los puzzles, los paisajes, los saltos, los descubrimientos... Y yo con la música, la estética maravillosa, el que sea un juego con alma. 

Conforme avanza la historia y vas viendo lo que realmente sucede, la auténtica historia tras el simbolismo, te deja hecho polvo y conmocionado, aunque mi peque no entendiera lo que realmente había sucedido. Será una buena oportunidad para enseñarle ciertos conceptos sobre la vida de una forma hermosa dentro de un par de años.

En fin, no digo más. Es difícil seguir hablando y evitar los spoilers que en este juego más que en la mayoría conviene esquivar. Obra maestra, 10 sobre 10 absoluto.

author: {'steamid': '76561198169201619', 'num_games_owned': 146, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 855, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 855, 'last_played': 1638317952}
review: Игра стартует, как красивая, но обыкновенная аркада. Однако с первого уровня понятно, что это не так: нет никаких врагов, сюжет не похож на аркаду или стандартный квест, постепенно становится очевидно: головоломки и вообще уровни, как и атмосфера последовательно раскрывают какую-то тайну, связанную с главным героем, который длительное время ассоциируется с античным мальчишкой, непонятно как очутившимся на острове загадок. Только в эпилоге картина раскроется, до финального момента догадаться о судьбе главного героя сложно, весь ход напоминает некую фантасмагорию. Некоторую подсказку можно увидеть лишь в том, что к нему постоянно липнут призраки и тени...

author: {'steamid': '76561197970613265', 'num_games_owned': 215, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 363, 'last_played': 1643132168}
review: The plot is somewhat predictable but still solid and the solid puzzle platforming, great music and enjoyable art style make this worth a go.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040199466', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 535, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 535, 'last_played': 1643113166}
review:
В целом понравилось. Хорошая, красивая расслабляющая головоломка приключение.
Единственное что сначала смущало, почему не было нормального вступительного ролика про мальчика, но концовка все объяснила, хотя можно было бы и сделать. И с самого начала нет подсказок никаких, как дейсвовать что делать? Только всплывающие подсказки-кнопки, когда подходишь к предмету. Но мне кажется для атмосферности можно было бы добывать какого-нибудь духа, который потом и стал бы лисой.
В остальном хорошая вещь! Рекомндую!

author: {'steamid': '76561197998217652', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 914, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 411, 'last_played': 1644215509}
review: Terrific puzzle/story game, not too challenging, and the ending is...memorable. I got it on sale, and felt it was worth more than I paid. Make sure to have some good speakers/headphones when you play, the music ties amazingly well into the gameplay/ambience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072700968', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 170, 'playtime_forever': 345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 345, 'last_played': 1643050247}
review: Великолепная история, рассказанная без единого слова. Звенящие мыслеобразы, настроение, задаваемое музыкой, метафоры, проникающие в сознание, постижение на уровне эмпатии, и ужасающее понимание, приходящее только в самом конце. Визуальный шедевр. Сказать хоть слово сверх этого - испортить вам впечатление.

author: {'steamid': '76561198154110948', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1381, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1246, 'last_played': 1708339362}

author: {'steamid': '76561199009564590', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 166, 'last_played': 1642451322}
review: Not sure what the issue is but am running this on a brand new (2021) top spec pc and the graphics are just making it unplayable.  Sadly no pc expert so no idea how to fix it.  When the character turns or looks at things  the view I get is on the other side of the wall.  So I turn around to look at, say a wall, and I see the view on the other side of the wall.  It makes the whole thing totally unplayable.  I read there were issues with this game when it was released and is best played on a console rather than a pc, even a good one.  The graphics settings on the game itself are very basic and don't help.  So for that reason I would not recommend this game on pc unless perhaps you have a really old one and then I guess it might play it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063375080', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 891, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 805, 'last_played': 1642356714}
review:
Heredero de los juegos creados por el Team ICO, pero desarrollado por un equipo español, que desborda sentimientos por todos sus poros.
Muy buen juego, con un grandísimo apartado visual y sonoro.
Solo le recrimino que, al tratarse de un juego en el que prima la exploración y el plataformeo, estos se queden, a mi gusto, cortos.
A pesar de ello, es un juego recomendadísimo.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996677654', 'num_games_owned': 439, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 374, 'last_played': 1641873282}
review:
Rime is like a miniature golf course. Every piece of it has been set up as a challenge for you to overcome. You're not exploring a world, you're going through a sequence of goals; and if you see a bunch of touch obstacles coming up ahead, you know you're going to have to get through it somehow.

In that, Rime isn't exactly my favorite kind of game. I like solving puzzles, sure, but I like the feeling that I happen to be finding a way through a strange land - not that I am finding THE only way through the strange land, the specific path that's been laid out for me. Every ledge in Rime is one you'll have to climb up onto, every item is one you'll have to use somehow, every side path leads either forward or to one of the bonus collectibles you'll find which fill in some of the story. (I'd have preferred this game if I only needed to complete *some* of the goals to proceed, whereas *all* goals completed would unlock an achievement or a bonus item, perhaps.)

And the story's not much to begin with. Kid washes up on an island and immediately starts figuring out how to get past the obstacles that have been set in his way. There's a fox companion, but unlike other games with fox companions (The First Tree, Lost Ember [actually a wolf], Never Alone, Spirit of the North), this one barks like a dog and appears to only have the purpose of showing you which way to go next, as the lavish environments sometimes make that difficult to figure out. Finding the collectibles helps explain what's going on, but I got tired of exploring every nook and cranny, so I was left in the dark. The endgame really brings the story to life and throws in some beautiful music, but I wish that had been part of the game all along.

author: {'steamid': '76561198287018379', 'num_games_owned': 97, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 617, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 617, 'last_played': 1641832612}
review: 解密和关卡推进要花不少时间，很大一部分原因是一些可以互动和攀爬的地方，太不明显了！！！虽然没有任何对白铺垫剧情，好在最后故事有个完整的收尾，解密部分也是比较有趣的，游戏的气质总会让我想起旺达与巨像，通关后会有些小伤感。

author: {'steamid': '76561198071525856', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 565, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 565, 'last_played': 1641353352}
review: I wasn't wowed by this game. Likely because I had just played similar games like Brothers - A Tale of Two Sons, Journey, and Abzu. Aside from Brothers, all of these games suffer from the same lack of plot. Rime isn't bad, it's just after hour two I need some kind of reason as to why I'm solving these puzzles. Get it on sale if you dig puzzle platformers with minimal plot.

author: {'steamid': '76561198208240116', 'num_games_owned': 30, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 639, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 495, 'last_played': 1642860945}
review: Jogo perfeito, os graficos são lindos, a trilha sonora é muito boa. Na parte dos puzzle deu pra ver que eles dedicaram um tempo em cada um deles, são muito bem pensados, criativos e não são cansativos, da uma sensação recompensatória muito grande por resolver eles. A história faz você ficar preso até o final pra saber oque está acontecendo, além da quebra de expectativa do final. Enfim recomendo 100%.

author: {'steamid': '76561199035429121', 'num_games_owned': 65, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 235, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1683631743}
review: 初见rime是四年前看某剑三主播（不务正业）通关，当时深深被音乐和剧情所震撼。后来几次想起过这个游戏，但是不记得主播和游戏名字也就不了了之。或许冥冥之中的天意，临近读大学找到了原来的通关视频，成功在Steam上找到了这款游戏。在游戏里总能想到曾经自己坐在电脑桌前一边烤火一边看主播的画面。现在也是冬天了，那就等回家在暖暖的被窝里通关游戏•ᴗ•

author: {'steamid': '76561198067107893', 'num_games_owned': 212, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 1064, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 410, 'last_played': 1655752164}
review:
Ya know... I'm mad. And I don't really care if it's a metaphor or whatever,,. I was having a good time. I was enjoying myself, getting lost in the ESCAPISM of a nice video game. When things got dark, I was confident that the light would show through again. That hope would exist at the end of the dreary march.

How dare you?

author: {'steamid': '76561198065710582', 'num_games_owned': 194, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 341, 'last_played': 1593108150}
review: RiME is a very nice, lighthearted vibe, with an interesting environment and story telling through said environment. The puzzles aren't anything extreme but they're fun and they often aid to the mystery of the world. Overall, it was a very fun experience, but I'm not sure if the amount of gameplay you get out of it is worth the original full price. If anything though, I would say that if you're looking for something to sit down, relax and play for a couple of hours without dedicating too much time or connection to a larger story, it's worth buying on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044781253', 'num_games_owned': 432, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 385, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 385, 'last_played': 1640848798}
review: 10/10 went through my entire box of tissues would never play it again. No game is allowed to punch me in the feels this way.

author: {'steamid': '76561198449439240', 'num_games_owned': 430, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 431, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 417, 'last_played': 1640695442}
review: 游戏的画风确实很讨喜，音乐更是大师级，怀疑是久石让的真传（音乐真的是一绝），细节很到位，游戏是用场景来描绘故事的，这个故事比较悲伤，但是通过场景和音乐变得如梦如幻，不愧是艺术品。

author: {'steamid': '76561197976122238', 'num_games_owned': 337, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 305, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 305, 'last_played': 1640625398}
review:
RiME, this game is stunningly beautiful, the music is god tier. In my personal opinion, this has the best soundtrack for any video game i've ever played and that's up in the 1000's or 10000's at this point. Buy this game, get it on sale, the length doesnt support the 30$ price tag, but on sale, even if it's 5-10 dollars off, please set aside, 5 ish hours, buy this game, and just enjoy the ride and have fun. The puzzles weren't too challenging, the mechanics work, sometimes a little wonky with climbing but its nothing too serious.

9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198195484943', 'num_games_owned': 218, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1640610812}
review:
[h1]8/10[/h1]

Very chill and intuitive gameplay, 5 hours well spent. If you like The Last Guardian this one is quite similar. Beautiful visuals and atmosphere.

The fox was very annoying at times and the robot chapter felt too much like a copy of The Last Guardian without the emotional connection. I didn't understand the plot until the very end of the game which I won't spoil for you because its worth discovering on your own.

review: made me cry, the good kind

author: {'steamid': '76561198213201365', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 693, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 693, 'last_played': 1640500343}
review: I don't play a lot of games compared to most and so when I do,  I usually pick out a game when it looks to have decent art, a compelling story and challenging, yet not overwhelmingly so, puzzles. I wasn't sure RiME would be for me when I started and I left after playing for two hours. Months later I've come back and I have no idea why and how I did not complete this game in one straight sitting. I LOVE IT.  RiME was absolute worth my time. money, emotional investment and this review. Thank you team from Tequila works, its a beautiful game

author: {'steamid': '76561198090949962', 'num_games_owned': 329, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 483, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 483, 'last_played': 1639588366}
review:
Lato gameplay, puzzle inizialmente piuttosto divertenti, poi un pò ripetitivi ma non esageratamente per quanto mi riguarda. Qualcheduno difficile, quasi tutti abbastanza intuitivi. Alla fine dei conti leggermente troppo lento ma comunque divertente.
La lentezza tra l'altro è parte del filo narrativo che, mentre può essere intuito durante il viaggio, si ricuce in un' opera completa portando a compimento il titolo.
Lato tecnico interessante, un buon aspetto, stile simile a quello delle favole della disney da qualche punto di vista ma generalmente più scuro lato luci e colori. Peccato per l'ottimizzazione non proprio fenomenale.
Decisamente consigliato, dopo qualche ora può capitare di essere un pò annoiati ed essere tentati a lasciarlo incompleto ma suggerisco di finirlo, ne varrà la pena.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039190312', 'num_games_owned': 515, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 82, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1639572028}
review:
Pros:
- Nice soundtrack
- Minimalistic design

Cons:
- Absolutely terrible CAMERA controls, runs at 240 fps but feels like 60 due to the way it handles mouse movements

- Poorly optimized as this game uses more resources than other AAA games
- Boring overall

I personally am not a fan of the shouting feature.

author: {'steamid': '76561198837969085', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 552, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 552, 'last_played': 1639425366}
review:
Un jeu que je conseille absolument si vous aimez l'exploration et le questionnement.

En effet, le joueur est encouragé à chercher, et sa détermination est récompensée par des objets se révélant pour certains être des parcelles d'histoire. 
Les musiques sont magnifiques et se marient à la perfection avec les évènements du jeu. Elles participent ainsi à l'immersion. 
Les graphismes sont simples mais ils n'ont pas besoin d'être plus poussés. Ce style graphique fait parti du charme de RIME. Les différents protagonistes sont attachants et certaines séparations sont assez dur à oublier.
L'histoire quand à elle est poétique et soulève beaucoup de questions. Les mystères sont nombreux à demeurer non élucidés et cela ajoute selon moi une certaine profondeur à cette œuvre. 
Il n'y a aucune parole, seules les images, les créatures et les décors sont là pour permettre au joueur de comprendre l'étendu de ce à quoi il fait face. Et voyant un jeu qui arrive à conter autant, sans un seul mot, est selon moi une preuve que l'on a affaire à une très belle œuvre artistique. 

Pour conclure, aussi bien pour la puissance de son propos que son onirisme, RIME est à mettre au même niveau que GRIS qui m'avait aussi beaucoup touché.

author: {'steamid': '76561198258918707', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 265, 'last_played': 1639343518}
review: Can't recommend this at all. Was hoping for some tricky puzzles and interesting story - but it has neither. The puzzles are all very simple, and most of the game is wandering around looking at fairly average scenery. All the exploration is on rails, and there is no reward for wandering off the beaten track of thinking imaginatively. It's just one poorly optimised step after another, plus it felt as though they totally forgot to write the plot.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030302283', 'num_games_owned': 563, 'num_reviews': 222, 'playtime_forever': 359, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 359, 'last_played': 1638705529}
review:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fregObNcHC8
[h1]Идём с лисою. Мы. Вдвоём.[/h1] 

[i]Скажу, как есть. Игры на тип “иду и лицезрею” - меня всегда не много отторгали, с точки зрения выраженного мнения естевенно! Вот что говорить? Ну крч идёшь, музло давит, история/экспозия все дела - норм ([spoiler]самое смешное подобную телегу можно задвинуть про любую игру схожего жанра[/spoiler]). Вот мне как автору, через текст, как передать неуловимую [strike]мимолётную[/strike] эмоцию? Лучший ли это проект и может ли он посостязаться с Journey (2012) и Inside (2016)?[/i] 

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1542344360 

[h1]Вопрос? Ответ.  

Быть может нужен мне совет?![/h1] 

[list] 

[*]Итак, сей шедевр [u]вышел в 2017г.[/u] и в нем до сих пор нет оптимизации! Графоний тут с неба звёзд не хватает, так чему тут тормозит! При этом в большинство проектов я щя бегаю на высоких - однозначный минус. 

[*][u]Музыка[/u] в таких проектах самая важная штука и она туть - [u]не какая[/u]. Срз может это и субьективно, но после Journey, little nightmares и пр. меня даже на йоту не зацепила.  

[*][u]Гемплейно[/u] - игра стагнирует. [u]Что в начале[/u] игры парниша умел таскать кричать и прыгать [u]что в конце разницы нуль[/u]. При этом авторы не забывают накинуть прикольных ситуаций, сменить декорации, но как-то глобально сменить гемплей они не смогли. [u]OMG[/u]. Я до сих пор с любовью вспоминаю Inside (2016): вот мы просто выживаем и бегаем решаем головоломки, вот научились управлять толпой людей, опа теперь мы русалка, при этом игра постоянно умела удивить будь то визуал или какая-то сложная головомка ([spoiler]про финал я вообще молчу[/spoiler]). Здесь же всё ооочень просто. Загадки +/- всегда простые, сложностей в передвижении я не испытал, КТ ([spoiler]контрольные точки[/spoiler]) очень щадящие, паркур однобокий. 

[/list] 

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=934922497 

[h1]Хотел бы я тебя обнять 

Так нежно крепко... 

Не отпускать![/h1] 

[i][u]Затянутый средничОк[/u] - хз быть может если бы авторы продумали получше загадки было бы норм? Или накинули бы механик по больше я б не так расстроился. А быть может сделали бы игру покороче и музыка заиграла бы новыми волшебными красками? Чёрт его знает. Sry резьба, после Inside, Journey, Little nightmares - я остался [u]холоден к Rime[/u]. А [u]для меня это показательно[/u].[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198845662735', 'num_games_owned': 434, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 323, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 312, 'last_played': 1638690784}
review:
不错。
远超预期。可能是上手过的美术很顶的独立游戏大多都外强中干，导致现在打这类游戏前都会把期望值降到最低。
除了操作手感挺糟糕的，其他似乎没什么不得不说的槽点。就是抗锯齿记得把SSAA（超级采样抗锯齿）关了或者改用其他两项，用SSAA相当于分辨率翻4倍，反正我8G显存是吃不消。

author: {'steamid': '76561199037942555', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 919, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 811, 'last_played': 1640734976}
review:
Les graphismes sont beaux oui, mais l'histoire l'est encore plus.
La difficulté est, je trouve, bien dosée : on peut chercher un moment la solution d'une énigme ou s'y reprendre à deux ou trois fois pour atteindre une plateforme mais rien n'est insurmontable. On se laisse happer par des univers très différents à chaque chapitre, tantôt hostiles, tantôt apaisants. Il y a assez de liberté d'exploration même si on reste guidé du début à la fin et des succès à n'en plus finir !

author: {'steamid': '76561198032510911', 'num_games_owned': 1859, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 971, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 971, 'last_played': 1638347776}
review:
Una maravilla de juego, con un estilo gráfico encantador y una banda sonora muy a tener en cuenta.
Cuenta con una historia muy emotiva y personalmente me gusto mucho, pero hay que tener en cuenta que tiene una narrativa donde no te explican la trama directamente, si no que debes poner mucha atención a la exploración del mapa y a los detalles. Al principio cuesta un poco que el juego enganche, pero dándole la oportunidad descubres lo grandioso que es. Evidentemente es un juego que recomiendo.

author: {'steamid': '76561199030900075', 'num_games_owned': 202, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 159, 'last_played': 1638454417}
review:
追記：子守歌　The Song of the Sea　の歌詞
スペイン語の歌詞がYoutubeにあったので勝手に拾いました

La Canción del Mar（The Song of the Sea)

Viento a viento va, el sueño del mar Gira sin parar
Viento a viento va, durmiendo al sol Un guiño de luz se perdió
Tu cuerpo se hace vientre, estatua transparente
En la arena oscura esperarás 
Viento a viento va, bailando el mar Esta sola voz se quebró
Pájaros de sal, ciegos de llorar 
Vuelven a volar
Viento a viento va, este pequeño 
Temblor que jamás gritó
A la luz, al árbol, a la lluvia
A la voz, al aire, al final
Y así  este viento va, girando
Y así  este viento va, se fue
Y así  este niño va llorando, llorando

書き写しただけなので内容の検証はできません。追記おわり


音楽と綺麗な景色が印象的な３D雰囲気アドベンチャー。
少年を操作し遺跡っぽい建物のギミックを解いて進みます。
言語は一切なし。昼夜があり、満天の星空が出色の出来です。
物語のみなら６～８時間程度。

[b]古いPCでは動かないくらい重いゲームです：[/b]
PCの能力が不安な場合は動作テストをお勧めします。

[b]キーボードとマウスを使用しました：[/b]
操作は移動、叫ぶ、ジャンプ、ローリング、物をつかむ程度。
Eキー長押しで物を投げる、というのを失念していたので途中詰まりましたが仕掛け自体はわかりやすかったです。
ギミックを解いた時、遠方の入口が開いたりするのでちゃんと注目していないと進路が分からなくなります。

暗すぎる場所は実績取得時にゲーム内設定で明るさを上げました。足元どころか遠くまで良く見えます。ゲーム性をかなり損ないますが、視力の悪い人や実績を取りたい人には必須かも。

[b]感想：[/b]
パズルやアクションより綺麗な雰囲気が目的の人にお勧めです。
時間がかかる割に物語は少なめですが、精神の葛藤の長さだったのだと解釈しました。実績を集めると内容が一層はっきりしますが、なくても全く問題ないように作られていると思います。
哀しくて美しい作品でした。

author: {'steamid': '76561198045796441', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 511, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 511, 'last_played': 1638147754}
review:
Every review about RIME is right:  it's visually stunning and has a breathtaking soundtrack, but its ability to stand out is hampered due to some clumsy control issues, repetitive puzzles, and poor graphics optimization.

But you're going to buy it anyway, and you should, because frankly you're not here for mold-shattering puzzle mechanics or The World's Most Optimized Graphics Engine. You're here because you know what you want:  a short but fulfilling game that keeps you occupied, visually impresses, and makes you want to re-play as soon as you finish.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985159146', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 85, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1638152508}
review:
Don't buy this on Steam. It seems like an amazing game from what I could play but their optimization is so bad for PC that even on the lowest settings I can't get it to stop stuttering. Or if you do buy it, play it for a half hour and refund if it stutters on your rig. Get it for console if you can otherwise.

Bad Port/10 and no dev fix.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997580577', 'num_games_owned': 643, 'num_reviews': 219, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1638129766}
review: Игра крайне напоминает The Witness: такая же цветовая гамма и очень похожий визуальный стиль, такое же ненавязчивое обучение и, самое главное - полное отсутствие сюжета. Мне такое не очень по вкусу. Наверное, как и в случае The Witness в своё время, я когда-нибудь вернусь к игре и попробую вникнуть в "происходящее" более основательно, но пока такого желания нет.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085376246', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 1050, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1050, 'last_played': 1544910705}
review: Fantastic emotional exploration-adventure with a few puzzle elements. Don’t expect too much original gameplay from this, it’s again mostly about the journey. It also starts out slow in the first chapter, but after this, continuingly adds and adds more depth and variations. Second chapter needs some thinking to evade a threat, third chapter features some really majestic encounters, the fourth with the sapping black all around (need to see this on an OLED screen) just visually tears you down. But especially in the end chapter this game actually really managed to connect to my feelings and get me emotionally, can’t really explain why, but it truly did. So in hindsight, even if I at first wouldn’t have expected it, a very strong title indeed. Can’t really criticize much, visuals in their minimalism are superb, music is enchanting, lots to collect and explore. Only two downsides I have to mention. For one, the price tag might be a little steep in my opinion, but the game has been on sale and bundles many times at the usual places like Fanatical & Co, so it’s you’re decision what it’s worth to you. And the second thing, I was indeed kind of disappointed that Lindsey Stirling’s main theme ‘Forgotten City’ isn’t featured on the deluxe soundtrack.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030529924', 'num_games_owned': 878, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 1426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 57, 'playtime_at_review': 1363, 'last_played': 1712268419}
review:
This game has a beautiful story full of symbolism, a top-tier soundtrack, and gorgeous visuals. I highly recommend it. 

That said, it does have some performance issues: at max settings, with AA and VSYNC on, I was hitting 30-60 fps on my 1440p 144 Hz monitor with a AMD 5800x + 6800xt build on a fast SSD. I found out that turning AA all the way off, and turning VSYNC off, and just sticking to freesync via AMD software, brought me up to 100-110 fps. 

Btw the game limits you to 60 fps max, but you can get higher fps by following these instructions: 
- Locate Engine.ini under C:\Users\*YourUser*\AppData\Local\SirenGame\Saved\Config\WindowsNoEditor
- Open engine.ini
- add the following 2 lines to the bottom:

[/script/engine.engine]
bSmoothFrameRate=false

-Lastly, right click on engine.ini > properties > check "set as read only"
-Enjoy 60+ fps!

author: {'steamid': '76561198443118727', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 577, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 577, 'last_played': 1636763799}
review: Wow. I just finished this up and in my humble opinion it was a masterpiece of a puzzle game. For a long while I sat on the fence with this game, coming across it in various searches and reading through some of the reviews. It was something I'd wish-listed for several months. Then about a week or so ago I saw a recent review saying it could be argued the game had subtle elements of the game Inside scattered throughout it. This immediately piqued my interest as I personally view Inside as the greatest game ever made. At any rate, I Rime on sale and decided to pick it up. It's just as all the positive reviews have said: excellent puzzles, nothing too incredibly hard, absolutely gorgeous soundtrack, awesome animation and so on. Also thematically brilliant in that it borrows the concept of Elisabeth Kubler Ross's "five stages of grief" to great effect. But the part I perhaps liked the best was the world building throughout and that the developers managed to bring an element of exploration into the game. The world is, at times, very surreal and dark. It's true that there's a bit of an Inside-like vibe, and it also echoes the strangeness of games like "Vane," for instance, although Vane was quite flawed, overall, compared to this. Rime's game mechanics are pretty tight, loading times are good, and the glitches are essentially nonexistent. As I played through this I found myself thinking at various times of so many great games: The Talos Principle, Portal, Inside, Hob, Vane and even Ori in a few spots. I didn't cry at the end but I must confess there was a bit of a lump in my throat. But...when it comes to things like death and the loss of loved ones, we have no choice but to face up to our common fate. Rime handles all of this in a very beautiful, heartfelt and inspiring way. This definitely rates a solid 9 out of 10 in my book. Well done indeed, Tequila Works!!

review: RiME is an excellent adventure game with fun movement, puzzles just the perfect difficulty, and beautiful and varied environments. The overarching story is sad but with good closure to it, and it's one of those that in its final moments makes so much of what came before clear. The highlight of RiME is definitely the movement and exploration, which make for lots of rewarding environmental puzzles. I'd highly recommend playing through this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198097650402', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 411, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 411, 'last_played': 1635305168}
review: If you only judge this game by the complexity of its puzzles, you'll probably agree with the official reviews that it's just okay. The puzzles are creative, but nothing super special or challenging. Where this game stands out is its mystery and grandeur. It's the experience of wandering through these vast, ancient lands with a sweeping, relaxing score playing in the background that is really special. And that is why you should play this game. Don't play for the puzzles, play for the beauty of the experience that it offers, and you will not be disappointed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077161308', 'num_games_owned': 1297, 'num_reviews': 203, 'playtime_forever': 364, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 364, 'last_played': 1634090477}
review:
A masterpiece that deserved/deserves more polish.

RiME has some performance issues for many. I dunno if it's a bad port (or if it is even a port?) or if it is just a matter of finding what works on your components.. But it can be off putting and make this worthwhile game easy to turn away from far too early on. Most of the suggested fixes in the forums are a matter of switching away from default settings (windowed full to full, triple buffering to double, SSAO to another choice, etc etc). Perhaps they shouldn't have been the default? This game is a visual masterpiece in storytelling but by all means should "just work". Especially on powerful systems. I mean, the frame drops I had at first couldn't even be smoothed with G-Sync on. So it's a crying(pun intended) shame it isn't optimized for a wider breadth of builds. 

Beyond performance there are some gameplay hiccups as well. For a game so wonderfully animated and with a player character full of life(pun not intended); The controls can feel lackluster. Especially jumping. You just don't get a smooth feeling while making your character move. Then like many games before it, the movement on ledges is mind numbing at times. Shimmying along a ledge and leaping to the next is an exercise in patience of trying to figure out which way the game wants you to point your thumbstick versus the camera. Also of note, there is an odd design choice with the ledge stuff where there's a needless requirement to be hanging or standing on particular ledges. Seemingly identical gaps in different parts of the game require you to transition to one or the other before you can jump. And well, jumping and ledge work are the bulk of the platforming. Some more polish for a smoother wield of the controls would've led to me being completely lost in the amazing experience that is RiME. I have no doubt I would've played it through in one sitting if the controls were smoother.

I only point out these complaints for one reason though; To say they're well worth getting over. Figure out how to make the game run smooth enough on your machine. Take a break if you're annoyed by controls. But play RiME. The visual storytelling is spectacular. To think of how I felt exploring in the beginning and discovering this new world to the way I was rocked and along for the ride by the end is wild. I love narrative experiences like this in games. I'd definitely hesitate to say that the story isn't predictable as you go along, but I still felt more than I expected to when I got there. It really is a masterpiece that I'm glad I played. And the game is indeed fun to play most of the time as well. Sure there's jumps and ledges but there is also really decent puzzles and tons of exploring on foot. Plenty of hidden collectibles of various types as well. You can get lost in the experience at times and it is amazing. 

I really enjoyed the storytelling experience that was RiME and the unique world it presented. I highly recommend it. It is worth the effort to hurdle any issues you may run into.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053333439', 'num_games_owned': 287, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 371, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 371, 'last_played': 1634053706}

author: {'steamid': '76561198062761195', 'num_games_owned': 347, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 362, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 362, 'last_played': 1632681967}
review:
Это, безусловно, очень авторская игра. 

Но извините, это игра, и в ней помимо истории должен быть ещё и геймплей, а тут он очень ниже среднего. Загадки простые и потому скучные, а оставшиеся 90% времени ты просто бежишь /прыгаешь. Сам мир в целом симпатичный, но какой-то без изюминки чтоли. Управление и камера кривоватые. Ну и к оптимизации вопросы - чему там можно периодически тормозить в фулхд на 2070s вообще непонятно. 

Вобщем, по итогу выглядит это как слабый клон Journey (которой уже 10 лет почти). В несложные адвенчуры я играю с женой по очереди на геймпаде, и это первая игра на моей памяти в которой не в свою очередь я засыпал в прямом смысле слова (!).

author: {'steamid': '76561198334244409', 'num_games_owned': 317, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 715, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 715, 'last_played': 1633045483}
review:
Una historia emotiva para salir de la vorágine de la acción desenfrenada.

Rime no es un juego para cualquiera, aclaremos esto desde el principio. Es un juego que no requiere de habilidad casi en absoluto, sino más bien de conexión con el momento. Todo, desde el diseño de los escenarios, pasando por los efectos visuales, la música y paisaje sonoro y llegando a la historia (que tal vez no sea muy clara mientras se lo juega por primera vez, pero que cobra otro sentido, muy profundo e interrogante, una vez que se atraviesa la escena final y se vuelve a la pantalla de inicio -para esto podría incluir un Spoiler, pero siendo un juego tan breve quien decida probarlo lo va a averiguar muy pronto) exige que conectemos con el momento.

En mi caso por ejemplo, pasé los últimos tres años jugando PUBG y Rocket League. Más de  3 mil horas de juego a puro disparo, sangre, goles y explosión. Juegos muy cabeza de macho que lo mantienen a uno en constante tensión. Hace unos mese empecé a trabajar muchas más horas diarias que antes y necesitaba que el momento de sentarme a jugar fuera un momento tranquilo, para respirar, para bajar un cambio. Rime me aportó un espacio para explorar con tranquilidad y descubrir los secretos a mi propio ritmo. La canción en los labios del chico protagonista transmite la ternura que acompaña todo el diseño, aun en las etapas más oscuras del juego. Todo parece contrastar con el trajín diario de trabajo, estrés y consumo. En Rime hay un juego que no exige apuro, resultados ni maniobras que deban ser ensayadas una y otra vez. Quiero decir, Rime lo recibe a uno con un paisaje estupendo y paletas íntimas, el sonido del mar que despertará en más de uno algún que otro recuerdo, con un montón de cosas que otros juegos no brindan con este tenor, con esta afectividad. Todo lo que se puede sospechar al recorrer los escenarios se confirma cuando al terminar el juego vemos los nombres de los niveles: Rime es una historia de interioridad y ternura, de conexión con los procesos inevitables de la vida, y lo hace a través de una maravillosa historia en la que no median palabras. El lenguaje universal del llanto y la risa.

Quienes hayan jugado otras joyas como ICO o Journey puede que encuentren que ciertos apartados del juego (controles, variedad de mecánicas, complejidad de los puzzles, escalamiento de habilidades, etc...) no sean memorables ni comparables a los de sus antecesores. Después de Prince of Persia y Shadow of the Colossus queda muy poco por hacer en los platformers de escalada y merodeo. Sin embargo, Rime lo hace de manera correcta, y todo en un ambiente cautivante con un trasfondo simbólico más que interesante.

Es un juego que, por su brevedad, no debe abandonarse. Recuerdo algún momento en que, sin entender bien qué estaba pasando, casi lo dejo para jugar a otra cosa. Puede que los cuatro escenarios parezcan inconexos, o que la falta de desarrollo del personaje lo haga parecer monótono por momentos. Curiosamente, todo eso deja de importar sobre el final. Cada figura, cada retrato cobra profundo sentido en el instante final, le parte a uno el pecho y lo hace resignificar cada elemento suelto de la historia que parecía solo decorar.

Si la semana te agobia, pasar la tarde del jueves y viernes con el celular apagado y escuchando el viento pasar puede ser un buen plan para bajar a tierra.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111032039', 'num_games_owned': 450, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 693, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 409, 'last_played': 1645670692}
review:
Mesmo com uma história linda e emocionante não posso recomendar esse jogo, nem apenas de beleza vive um jogo e neste titulo pode ser observado sérios problemas. Alguns destes problemas que vão desde movimento de camera, extremamente grotesco e que tiram toda imersão, erros atras de erros ao girar ou movimentar a camera.

 E para fechar com chave de ouro após o capitulo do passaro gigante o jogo em tela cheia simplesmente fica em tela preta, sendo necessário reiniciar em modo janela, apenas para a porcaria da cutscene funcionar.

Por estas razões não tenho como recomendar o jogo.
Erros graficos ja são chatos pra caramba, pessima performance em alguns momentos pior ainda, mas, tela preta ai ja é demais.
