author: {'steamid': '76561198174279502', 'num_games_owned': 618, 'num_reviews': 164, 'playtime_forever': 610, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 610, 'last_played': 1589567940}
review:
Una gran idea, una ejecución pobre. El juego es precioso, tanto a nivel estético como la banda sonora, y plantea una muy bonita forma de contar una historia emotiva. Sin embargo, tiene escenarios muy vacíos (aunque con cierta cantidad de coleccionables) y un ritmo bastante mejorable.

A nivel de jugabilidad no está mal, algunos puzzles son interesantes y otros son más rutinarios, aunque no destaca por sus mecánicas. No es que sea malo, sino que sencillamente no es bueno. Quizá se apoya demasiado en su apartado artístico para atrapar al jugador y llevarlo hacia el final de la historia, y esto resulta en varios momentos en los que se reduce la inmersión y el título pierde bastante fuelle.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009098875', 'num_games_owned': 938, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 276, 'last_played': 1631997277}
review:
Игра красивая, выглядит потрясающе, звучит просто великолепно, легко погружает в атмосферу сказки...

НО

какой же геймплей занудный, он тянет и тянется, играешь в неё всего час, а чувствуется как все 4.
Главный герой нетороплив, заставить его хотя бы бежать нельзя, поэтому если ты зашёл куда-то куда ещё пока не следовало заходить, то обратно чапать он будет целую вечность.

Ещё кину камень в ачивки. абсолютно неинтуитивные ачивки, выполнить, некоторые нереально без гайдов. Кто бы догадался что нужно в первой главе схватить фрукт и бегать по карте пока за тобой не побегут все виды кабанчиков? Это действие не челленджевое, не развлекает и требует при это слишком больших усилий для игрока.

Берите игру на свой страх и риск.

author: {'steamid': '76561198972579016', 'num_games_owned': 19, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 513, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 513, 'last_played': 1631341534}
review:
最近在玩很热门的原神，又想起来之一两年前玩了一小部分的RiME，才把这个游戏拿起来推通关了，两个游戏制作上看起来有不少相似之处的，回过头玩也没有多少操作和体验上的不适，游戏里面很多地方让我感到十分惊艳。
总体来说RiME是很棒的一款解谜游戏，做得也很成熟，画风让人很喜欢。除了个别地方卡了我几下，整个路线和故事都十分清晰，看剧情一样的做下来了，游玩过程从轻松愉悦，到紧张，到最后的解脱释怀。音乐暂不能夸，配合游戏在故事中间使我一度长时间毛骨悚然（大概这就是制作人追求的效果吧QAQ，夏天给身体降温了），也可能是我不太适应或者不偏好这种，感觉部分bgm会有点阴间。

遗憾的是我还没有完成图鉴的全收集，游戏过程中偏向于推动故事发展了，以后有时间会二刷。另外建议游戏过程中把显示器亮度调到最大。

author: {'steamid': '76561198234230228', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 348, 'playtime_forever': 258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1631282554}
review:
就挺垃圾的，移动手感和视角转换巨差，键鼠像是模拟手柄，手柄还不如键鼠，也不知道是给什么神仙平台优化的。

评论区普遍说解密简单，我倒觉得不太简单老是卡关，但是倒也真挺无聊的。关卡设计给平庸的机制，通过缺少提示引导来增加难度。还有评论说像塞尔达的，可快别碰瓷了。

开放世界，地图大，步子短，依然扯淡。本应是快跑的shift键变成塞尔达的打滚，但是你又没有加快的效果，放在机制里也没用，纯属东施效颦了。

色彩搭配还不错挺令人愉悦，但是优化极差，1070ti 1080p居然tm才30帧，加速之后属实卡成ppt了。

基本上毫无价值，但是我可能还是会通关看看，佛系。

------------------------------------------------------

玩到差不多一半了，还挺充实的，ce加速也不会燥了。美工被程序和设计拖后腿。

还尼玛有bug，玩着玩着不能跳了。检查点回到十年前，淦。明明死了可以原地复活。垃圾。

偶尔会出现锁定视角的场景，一般是攀岩，这时候方向键也变了。你本来是水平左爬，转了视角变成上下键，关键方向还是人物的水平左右方。真的垃圾。

所谓解谜，你看得见的谜题才叫谜题，这些谜题确实不难。看不见的谜题那叫恶意卡关找你妹。


------------------------------------------------------

通关了，真的挺充实。不仅美术设计卓越，bgm也非常恢弘，适配广阔场景。我眼光还是不错的，本作确实有通关价值。

后期谜题基本上都是前面的重复，一个套路玩无数遍。前面之所以觉得难是因为他没有任何引导，甚至你都不知道谜题在哪里。卡关了就看看视频，没啥。

开始我只是觉得配色不错，到了后面场景也挺有艺术感的，空旷但不空虚。场景多样，各具特色。最后的下雨场景直接给我fps卡到个位数（4倍加速），但是他效果确实做出来了。

前面的提过的毛病就不重复了。我一共碰到过3次bug，一次没音乐，一次不能跳，一次在高台边缘下跳卡住不能动。也不算太多吧，每次重启/读档都好了。不过这个游戏吧，借用上个评测，你感觉游戏过程每时每刻都在卡bug，他的物理就是这么烂。

充实也是真充实，有大鸟，有机器人，（这么说好像很难听懂）因为迷题不难所以场景变换比较频繁，视觉上一直都有新鲜感。这种状态维持至少3.5h（walkthrough时间），挺不容易了。

差评不改，还是不推荐玩。
















[spoiler]今天又双叒叕大跌了，这次是真的大跌了。大饼从53000跌到42000，ada直接从3跌破2。本来我有机会在2.7左右跑，没舍得，然后2.6又有机会，又没舍得，最后2.55清仓了。损失2000，比5000少，但是心态完全不一样了。之前的7000基本上是大风刮来的，现在从5000-6000属实是虎口拔牙赢来的，跌到4000也就是纯炒币的本金，还不算xch的钱。况且我也是成长了这么半个多月的，再亏这么多属实不应该。但是这次的跌幅比上次还要高得多，我也算是跑的及时，不像上次基本上底部割肉，而且后来又微操回到了4700左右（半路空了eth和sol回了小半口血，然后现货也涨回去了，最低好像是有3700了），还算进步不小了。

现在我真的开始玩现货了，长期能拿到翻几倍，短期我太菜就只能把赢了的都赔进去。正好这段时间也没什么行情，本来就应该半仓装死。

真的是无仓一身轻，这段时间玩玩游戏学学蜡烛图好好睡觉。等行情回来我再追涨杀跌闭着眼睛挣钱。

啥时候把steam评测当成日记了？还是公开的好羞耻啊...不过反正没人看
[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198169109810', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 281, 'last_played': 1683072051}

author: {'steamid': '76561198141835349', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 386, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 386, 'last_played': 1630894532}
review:
TLDR, highly recommend this game, make sure to explore as much as you can because it actually pays off in the long run and is relevant to the story!

Now for the longer review:
Overall i want to give this game an 8/10
Visuals/music these 2 i would say carry the game for me solid 10/10
Story, i wont go into detail but it does definitely get a bit confusing as you play, but that did add to the enjoyment of it because i had freedom to make assumptions and guesses as to what was happening, and once i got the answers at the end i was very satisfied!
Puzzle wise its a bit lacking, so  6/10 the puzzles themselves are nice, and the concept is very fun BUT there were almost no moments of excitement when a puzzle would get solved, usually when i got stuck on a puzzle and finally would figure it out i would be annoyed not proud/happy.
Final thought, the thing that i loved a lot about the game, is the small detail of character animation. the fact that depending on where you are walking would change the walk cycle animation of the character was pure genius, down hill, in shallow water, in deeper water, up hill, all had unique animations and it was just a joy to watch! 11/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197977657096', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 128, 'last_played': 1630526479}
review: Wieder so ein Spiel, dass weniger vom Gameplay lebt als vielmehr der Atmosphäre. Die Musik ist großartig, die Südsee-Optik sehr angenehm und die Welt beeindruckend genug, um zu fesseln. Dennoch... hab ich nach zwei Stunden keine Lust mehr gehabt. Dafür war mir das ewige Gelatsche zu viel und die Story, so schön sie ist, zu kleinteilig erzählt. Dass die Figuren nicht sprechen ist ja ganz nett, aber reduziert die Geschichte noch mehr. Erst ganz am Ende kapieren wir worum es geht und müssen dafür viel Arbeit leisten, mit nur sehr wenig neuen Gameplay-Elementen hier und da. Wer damit umgehen kann, sehr zu empfehlen, für alle anderen reicht auch YouTube... so hab ich dann die zweite Hälfte genossen und konnte die ganze Kletterei und Schieberei einigermaßen überspringen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198209361243', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 337, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 251, 'last_played': 1630392775}
review:
솔직히 너무 졸려요..
긴장감이 감돌아야하는 데 악당이 너무 착한건지 뭔지 다 봐주면서 게임하는..느낌..?
긴장감이 좀 감돌다가 루즈해집니다.
쓸데없는 길이 너무 많고 수집요소는 포기한지 오래입니다.
집중해서 해보려고해도 달리는 속도도 느리고 길도 많고 길고 하면서 지루한 느낌이 자주 들어서 집중력이 금방 사라지네요
여우는 대체 어디서 켕켕거리는지 알수없음...

그리고 대체 시점은 왜 자꾸 고정되는지 모를 일
나는 다른 시점으로 보고싶은 데 고정되서 불편한 적이 한두번이 아니였고
분명 매달릴려고 그랬는 데 쩜푸하는 판타지스러운 상황 반복

분위기 좋게 해보려고 노력했지만 루-즈한게 매우 극한의 단점
분위기 내려고 맵을 열심히 만들었지만 길이 아닌 곳이 너무 많아서 단점...
애를 절대 죽이지 않겠다는 듯이 점푸해서 분명 안닿는 거리고 안닿아서 떨어져야하는 데 순간이동하더니 챱!하고 벽에 붙음
껄껄

-엔딩 후
진행방식이 지루해서 아까운 게임
노래, 엔딩은 나름 좋았으나 감동을 받는 것이 아니라
게임 진행과정과 이질감이 있는 느낌. 무슨 얘기하는지 모르겠음
70%세일 하면 살까? 말까? 느낌이 있음
50%세일할 때 사면 돈아까울 것 같음
게임 구성에 비해 가격이 매우 비싼편

author: {'steamid': '76561198077663643', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 282, 'last_played': 1630227074}
review:
Absolutely stunning art style and presentation. Audio and music are similarly top notch. Will be listening to this OST for years to come and i often just stopped to enjoy the view.

The game itself is a fairly standard platformer/puzzler that wont blow anyone away in terms of mechanics, but the passable gameplay pairs well with its fairly short length and additional mechanics are added often enough to keep boredom at bay. Combined with the previously mentioned top tier sound/visual work make this a memorable and standout experience. Journey is not a masterpiece of gameplay design, but has become a significant influence in the industry through it's presentation and story telling methods. The same can be said here, though to a lesser extent perhaps. 

Performance was rocky. Played at 4K on a 3070 and had many sections exhibiting stuttering. Shame because a game this old with an assumedly light graphics implementation should not stress a modern system this much.  That said, It was so beautiful at 4K i decided to just grin and bear through the stutters, that's how hard this game leans into its presentation and how well it pays off. 

OH, and if you get it, get the soundtrack bundle, a dollar or two is a steal for this OST. 

"If games are art, I want this on my wall."

review:
感觉可以，谜题并不算难，提示也比较明显，稍微玩过解谜类游戏都可以轻松上手。不过地图后期有些晕，找路费时间，画面明暗搭配也不好眼容易疼。故事不错。一周目可能五小时？
另外：RiME可能指“歌”的意思。有一首著名诗歌就叫《古舟子咏》（The Rime of the Ancient Mariner）讲的也是船、水手、死亡的故事。Rime是Rhyme的古代写法，并非现在的冰霜的含义。

author: {'steamid': '76561198088300877', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 320, 'last_played': 1629607552}
review:
ライトな謎解きパズルアドベンチャー、１周大体５時間ほど。
カメラカットが動的に視線誘導して迷うことはない。
ストーリーはゲーム中、音声や文字などで語られることはなくステージに用意されているオブジェクトやカットシーンを観てプレイヤーの想像に任せる感じ。風ノ旅ビトやABZUなどと一緒。
収集要素があり、コンプリートするとラストシーンの演出に若干の違いがある。ただし一方通行なステージが多いため一周目でコンプリートしようとするのは難しい。クリア後はステージ選択が可能で未収集のものがあれば都度選択して挑むことができる。

author: {'steamid': '76561198859279739', 'num_games_owned': 122, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 706, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 575, 'last_played': 1629370470}
review:
깔끔한 그래픽에 정말 훌륭한 BGM.
적절한 플레이 타임, 대사 하나 없이도 감동과 여운을 주는 최고의 게임입니다.
이것 저것 찾아보지 마시고 정보 없이 그대로 게임을 받아들여보세요.
할인시 가격도 매우 저렴합니다.

단점으로는 게임 플레이에 지장은 없는 프레임 드랍이나 불친절한 진행 방법 정도입니다.
하지만 매커니즘만 조금 알게되면 곧 잘 나아가실 수 있습니다.
9/10 강추!

author: {'steamid': '76561198135865829', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 840, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 840, 'last_played': 1629323378}
review:
Превосходнейшая игра, ААА в мире симуляторов ходьбы. По антуражу - где то такой миядзаковский стим-панк. По динамике - похоже как на приключенческие версии Лары Крофт.
В отличие от других симуляторов ходьбы здесь разноплановые уровни и головоломки, а игра проходится часов за 5-6 не меньше.
О сюжете мы узнаем в самом конце и он очень сильно пафосен и не очень то клеится к ходу событий, в отличие от похожих - типа талоса.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971472890', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 398, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 398, 'last_played': 1628585904}
review: It's pretty and has some moments that are original and fun, but after a while I just stopped wanting to finish it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093902509', 'num_games_owned': 103, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 429, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 429, 'last_played': 1628963946}
review:
An emotional game with a beautifully crafted world, lovely soundtrack and decent puzzles (which could have been a bit more varied though). The main game is on the short side (I completed it in two sittings), however I did not go out of my way to look for collectibles.

Its regular price is way too high for what you get though, and while the journey was great I thought the ending was a little anticlimactic after all the wondering about the world you just traversed. Get it while it is heavily discounted.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031752600', 'num_games_owned': 2484, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 228, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 228, 'last_played': 1629096666}
review:
I just completed the game moments ago, so these are my fresh thoughts. 

This is a very beautiful, thoughtful, meaningful game. It's also extremely derivative of games you know and love. There is nothing special about this game mechanically, and sometimes it's trying too hard to be "cinematic" and it actually negatively impacts the way the game feels to play. That being said, you get the sense that this game is very important to the people who made it, and if you like games like Journey, Shadow of the Colossus, and the Zelda franchise, you will probably find something to enjoy in this game. I give it a strong recommendation, with maybe a caveat that you might want to get it on sale. My initial playthru took less than 4 hours total, and that was with a little optional collectible gathering and a healthy number of fail states. This doesn't mean it's not worth the money necessarily, but you have to decide for yourself what you value. There is some decent replay value in hunting for collectibles and achievements, which seem to all be very doable if that's your thing.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995239792', 'num_games_owned': 1523, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 463, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 463, 'last_played': 1537173968}
review:
I've got some very mixed feelings about this game.

On the one hand it is a beautiful game with some amazing scenery and grand puzzles for you to solve and it combines a sense of whimsy and wonder rather well.

However it isn't what it might appear and there is a very dark twist towards the end that completely blindsided me which I didn't appreciate personally.

You're in for some serious emotions going through this game, but the journey at least will be beautiful.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142333992', 'num_games_owned': 427, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 329, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 329, 'last_played': 1628328104}
review:
可惜這個遊戲沒打中我喜好
一開始就已經摸不清楚在幹甚麼，走了幾圈就忍不住看walkthrough找一下提示
之後還發現錯過了不少東西

前面沒甚麼劇情，也沒有對白，對我來說太無聊了
之後一直玩，玩到要躲大鳥就撐不下去了 (大慨才玩到1/3吧)

但我也是認同畫面是滿精美，風景很好看，地圖也很大設計得很好
操作也不難，只是有些地圖比較暗容易失足
要完成全收集要素的話要很有耐心去探索每個角落

author: {'steamid': '76561198119618866', 'num_games_owned': 309, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1627306783}
review: Türünün başarılı bir örneği olan RIME isimli bu puzzle oyunu, mükemmel manzara görselleriyle aklı kurcalayan müthiş puzzle elementlerini merak uyandırıcı bir hikayeyle sunuyor. Dolayısıyla oynadığım en sıkıcı oyun oldu. Tamamen kişisel ilk cümlesi heycanlandırdıysa alınabilir ama aksiyon eksikliği beni bayılttı.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992237635', 'num_games_owned': 1573, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 635, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 401, 'last_played': 1659302909}
review:
Uno de los juegos más bonitos que se hayan hecho nunca. Es un juego corto de exploración y puzzles, los puzzles aunque sencillos son muy curiosos y plantean situaciones diferentes en casi todos los casos.
Los escenarios son realmente hermosos y muy diferenciados entre los capítulos de los que está compuesto el juego, son escenarios cerrados en su mayor parte con su pequeña parte de exploración para buscar coleccionables.
Gráficamente el juego no es puntero ni pretende serlo pero artísticamente es maravilloso. La música es tremendamente bonita y acompaña a cada momento como debe.
Muy recomendable a los que les gustan los juegos como experiencia más que por la jugabilidad en sí.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052874621', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 485, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 468, 'last_played': 1649835713}
review: A gorgeous visual style and intricate environment design make Rime the closest thing I've seen to "Ico" on PC. Enjoyable puzzles and platforming keep the adventure interesting, but I wish the story had revealed a better mystery. I kept waiting to find out who had built all these beautiful ruins, but then the plot twist rendered all my curiosity meaningless.

review: One of the most boring games I've played in a long time. As others have said, there are other games that pull off this adventure open world puzzlish vibe so so so much better. 90 mins in and not a single reason to stay and play longer, wish I could get a refund.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995708004', 'num_games_owned': 1761, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 282, 'last_played': 1626803977}
review:
雰囲気系の謎解きアドベンチャー。探索や謎解きの要素はあまり深くないが、ゲーム側の誘導が強くほとんど詰まることなく進めるので、ストーリーと雰囲気を味わうアドベンチャー作品としては良好な出来。深く考えて解く要素は少ないため、パズルを求めている方向けというよりリラックスして流れに任せてサクサク進めたい方向け。

白い石材の建物が印象的で、グラフィック表現や壮大な音楽などの雰囲気はとても良く、単純に進めていて楽しい。単純な探索や視点のトリックで物を見立てて解く場面など、謎解きもそれなりに多様。プレイフィールは風ノ旅ビトなどの作品に近いため、そういう作品が好きな方には合うだろう。

難点としては、暗すぎて地形が見えにくい場所が何箇所かあること。フレームレートの問題を感じる場所もあった。とはいえ全体の作りの良さに対してあまり大きな問題には感じなかった。

死を受け入れる過程がテーマになっており、ゲームの最後の最後になってこの物語の意味がわかる構造。複数の章に区切られており、プレイ時間は少し長めで5時間程度。コレクション要素や実績もあるが、あまりそこに気を取られると全体の流れが楽しめなくなるので、おまけ程度と思ったほうがいい。

リラックスするゲームがしたいなと思った時にライブラリにあったこの作品に手を付けたが、まさにうってつけだった。おすすめ。

author: {'steamid': '76561197963849780', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 671, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 324, 'last_played': 1627159184}

author: {'steamid': '76561198123501915', 'num_games_owned': 904, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 864, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 864, 'last_played': 1626690352}
review:
Maravillosa experiencia. 
Visualmente precioso y muy cuidado, puzzles sencillos pero satisfactorios y un diseño de escenarios super inmersivo. En cuanto a historia, no voy a hacer spoilers, pero todo cobra sentido hacia el final, impactandote donde nacen los sentimientos con la fuerza de un Boeing 747. La banda sonora es correcta y refuerza muy bien lo que busca transmitir el juego. Y si te sabe a poco, tienes coleccionables que recoger para apurarle unas pocas horitas mas. Recomendadísimo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025180032', 'num_games_owned': 1264, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 709, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 709, 'last_played': 1626643103}
review:
A pretty okay game. Think Limbo + Journey. Nobody speaks so it's easy to get into no matter what language you speak, no violence perfect for children and it has Spirited Away vibes!
Heavy on puzzles and does tell a story somewhat but mostly through gameplay (again no real voices).
Visually it's a very beautiful game that's nice on the eyes.
7/10 Play once and never come back kinda game but will be remembered even if it's 0.01% of you!

author: {'steamid': '76561198274225838', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 1122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1122, 'last_played': 1626618448}
review:
[h1] И все таки положительный отзыв [/h1]
Почти до самого конца игры я думал, что после прохождения влеплю игре негативный отзыв, ибо весь нехитрый и не слишком оригинальный и разнообразный геймплей в этой игре существует для того, чтоб рассказать историю, большую часть игры непонятную историю, и только с полным прохождением игры (а лучше еще и сбором всех коллекционных предметов или просмотром на ютубе пояснения к игре) все становится на свои места и в сочетании с волшебной музыкой (да, ее отметят все, даже те, кому игра не понравится) создают то самое послевкусие. Горькое послевкусие, но которое дает красивую и трогательную историю, многие к которой не останутся равнодушными.
Итого: без истории игра скучная, не имеющая оригинальных идей в геймплее, загадки практически полностью отсутствуют. Я был слишком хорошего мнения ожидая сложных загадок в игре, в то время как все оказывалось на уровне "заметить окрашенный уступ, за который можно зацепиться" или "ящик, став на который, можно достать до окрашенного уступа". Но только после прохождения игра раскрывается и только поэтому я могу порекомендовать эту игру тем людям, которые готовы потерпеть часов 6-7 прохождения игры ради истории.

author: {'steamid': '76561199004865429', 'num_games_owned': 211, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 341, 'last_played': 1626524954}

author: {'steamid': '76561198849693541', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 714, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 714, 'last_played': 1626451728}

author: {'steamid': '76561198051038642', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 949, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 877, 'last_played': 1635943030}
review:
Великолепное приключение. Я перед этим прошел Aporia и думал, что сделать лучший квест невозможно. Но Rime идет гораздо дальше. Здесь и роскошные пейзажи, и прекрасная музыка, и неспешные приключения, и головоломки, которые, на мой вкус, идеальны - не такие, которые доводят до отчаяния, но и не такие, что решаются без всяких усилий. Длинный сюжет, несколько смен декораций, постоянное ощущение тайны и чуда, непрерывное стремление в неизвестность... В общем, идеальное приключение...
И что же в итоге?
В итоге Вы получаете два "достижения". Первое называется "Безнадега", а второе (и последнее) называется "Так и быть"). 
Судя по отзывам, многих эта концовка, которая заставляет пересмотреть весь пройденный путь, понять скрытый смысл происходящего, привела в восхищение. Другие лили слезы в три ручья. Я же пришел в ярость.
Сюжет игры, приоткрываемый концовкой, допускает разные интерпретации (в том, числе, в Интернете можно найти интерпретацию от автора игры (https://dtf.ru/games/602735-skrytyy-smysl-rime); но в любом случае этот сюжет несет одну мысль: "Делай, что хочешь, но смерть и разлука неизбежны, и лучше смириться с этим, принять это как должное".
Вот с этим-то я не соглашусь никогда. Никогда не соглашусь с тем, что нужно было нагородить такой прекрасный сюжет, пройти такой длинный путь, полный чудес и красоты, чтобы в конце погрузиться в безразличное ничто. 
Игра сделана гениально. Но под ее красивой оберткой скрывается пустота. Ни в коем случае не давайте играть в эту игру детям, если Вас нет рядом и Вы не можете скорректировать их впечатление. Ни в коем случае не играйте в эту игру, если Вы пессимист. Рекомендую эту игру только неисправимым оптимистам, которые пройдут эту игру и, поняв смысл концовки, легко смогут отбросить ее как пустую и не заслуживающую внимания. К счастью, такой взгляд на эту игру возможен. Мы можем принять, что гениальный автор захотел выразить в игре свой пессимистический взгляд на мир; но его игра зажила собственной жизнью и всем своим сюжетом, красотой и целеустремленностью указывает на то, что в своей главной идее автор был неправ.

author: {'steamid': '76561199093465558', 'num_games_owned': 97, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 341, 'last_played': 1626353698}
review:
刚开始的迷茫，我是谁？我在哪里？我在干什么？
到后来一路遇到一只狐狸一路指引
唤醒了巨大的机器一路前行，牺牲自己为我敞开大门
始终有个人在我的前面等着我（直到最后发现原来那是[spoiler]我自己[/spoiler]）
我无法相信这个结果，其实自己早已迷失，最后的相遇也许是最好的结果可惜一切都太晚
你以为我在塔底，其实我早就是从塔顶下来的[spoiler]已死之人[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561197978561480', 'num_games_owned': 497, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 907, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 907, 'last_played': 1626045506}
review:
¿Qué se puede decir de un juego del que ya se ha dicho todo, lo bueno y lo malo? 
Gráficamente es una pasada. Preciso a nivel visual y maravillosos sus escenarios (dicen que puede tener alguna caída en las cinemáticas, y francamente, si eso es lo que más te importa en un videojuego, estamos "apañaos"... ).  La banda sonora es sublime: bien encajada, trasmite emociones donde tiene que hacerlo.... y la canción de cuna: pocas canciones pueden trasmitir "eso" como lo hace esta. 

No soy muy fan de los juegos de puzzles y exploración (se me acaban haciendo pesados) y sin embargo con este no he tenido esa sensación. Los puzzles con la dificultad suficiente para hacerte pensar pero no para frustrarte. Los juegos de luces y sombras... 
Me parece magnifico en todos los aspectos. 

No quiero hablar de la historia, porque el golpe de realidad que te llevas, te hace pensar. Cuando empecé a jugar pensaba "¿Y de qué va el juego?. Pues de un niño dando voces a todo... " Y tras haberlo terminado, sólo puedo recomendarlo. 

Puede que no sea tu tipo de juego, como me pasa a mi, pero dale una oportunidad, te vas a llevar una muy grata sorpresa. Miradme a mi: días después de haberlo terminado (al 100% porque necesitaba más y nunca suelo hacerlo, los logros me da bastante igual) me encuentro escuchando la BSO, leyendo noticias y reseñas (algunas de ellas se nota que apenas han jugado media hora) pese a que hace ya 4 años que se lanzó y escribiendo la mía propia, vaya.. 

Solo me arrepiento de una cosa. De no haber comprado la edición coleccionista cuando tuve ocasión. pero bueno, la vida sigue...

author: {'steamid': '76561197993922877', 'num_games_owned': 645, 'num_reviews': 316, 'playtime_forever': 296, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 296, 'last_played': 1620515365}
review: I have some light problems with the end of the game, though to avoid spoilers I'll just say I think the final moments could have remained subtext while maintaining the material reality of the fairy tale. But it's a gorgeous game. Very imaginative and pretty, a real journey of discovery. If you like this sort of game then dig in.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077531119', 'num_games_owned': 179, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 387, 'last_played': 1626027732}
review:
Jeu très sympathique dans un style entre The Witness et Journey. Les mécaniques sont assez variées entre les cris, les puzzles et les jeux de perspective. L'histoire floue au commencement se dessine au fil du jeu jusqu'à atteindre un final que je ne spoilerai pas. Le jeu a une durée de vie d'entre 4 et 6 heures qui vous marquera comme une bonne expérience.

Le prix de 35 euros est cependant un peu trop élevé à mon goût et risque de vous laisser sur votre faim. Je conseille donc de le prendre en promo pour un prix plus correct.

author: {'steamid': '76561198097635745', 'num_games_owned': 5733, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 2661, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2661, 'last_played': 1625817592}
review:
I loved this game!!
RiME is set in a beautiful island landscape with crumbling ruins and tall towers and unfolds an emotional and bittersweet tale about a young boy's journey of discovery. The game has limited open world environments to explore by walking, running and using some elements of a 3D platformer. RiME's game play involves moving through different locations, by walking, running and often traversing sheer cliffs or walls using movements reminiscent of early Tomb Raider games such as shimmying, vaulting, pushing blocks and jumping- I usually find these actions frustrating, but they were quite easy to perform and the controls are very forgiving. The puzzles were not overly difficult and the solutions were always logical, making for a nice fluid progression through the story. The story is told through music( a very beautiful soundtrack btw), cut-scenes and drawings that are found as you move through the games locations. I needed a second play-through to get all the achievements as some are a bit obscure and can be missed as there are points of no return in some areas, that said I really did enjoy going back to search for missed items and this was simplified by the option to replay chapters once you have finished the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198344888996', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 771, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 771, 'last_played': 1625611295}
review: Lovely artwork and environments, very simple but never dull gameplay, and highly immersive. Puzzles are fairly straight-forward, but there's a huge amount of 'hidden stuff' you can collect and a lot of world to explore. A beautiful game for anyone bored of endless FPS and shooting things.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982244633', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 401, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 401, 'last_played': 1625569155}
review: A very touching story. Surely shouldn't rush it, if you want the full impact.

author: {'steamid': '76561199029627810', 'num_games_owned': 52, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 407, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 407, 'last_played': 1625463309}
review: 非常好的游戏，解密伴剧情一直是我的最爱，解密不难，剧情很触动人心。RiME是个放下的故事，小男孩对自己往生的放下，父亲对孩子死亡的放下。小男孩一直在寻找自己的记忆，小狐狸的消失，球球机器人的牺牲，小男孩丢掉了自己最爱的狐狸玩偶，玩具风车，所有的种种让他回忆起曾经的那场暴风雨夺走了自己的生命。那座小岛没有他想象的那么美好，他依然要面对日落之后的黑暗，只是当第二天太阳洒在小船，他依然会爱着那道光。

author: {'steamid': '76561198050911708', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1625357344}
review:
Una obra de arte: los diseños son increíbles, la banda sonora es preciosa, el diseño de niveles es variado y consigue transmitir lo que quiere transmitir.
Es capaz de contar lo que quiere contar sin decir una sola palabra.
Es maravilloso.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164590194', 'num_games_owned': 368, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 600, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 504, 'last_played': 1651625384}
review: Fui jogar achando que seria apenas um jogo de exploração com alguns puzzles e acabei me surpreendendo com um jogo com uma história sensível, visual simples porém sendo justamente o que se dá um certo charme ao jogo juntamente com o foco nas poucas cores vibrantes, a trilha sonora combinando perfeitamente com cada momento do jogo e assim esse combo pelo qual RiME é formado, passa toda a sensação que o protagonista sente ao jogador. Assim se tornando uma verdadeira obra de arte!

author: {'steamid': '76561198028679594', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 294, 'last_played': 1625254836}
review: An excellent little game. Tells a story without any words. Beautiful world with a matching sound track.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077701412', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1346, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1328, 'last_played': 1681339002}
review: A simple, relaxing exploration game with no combat. Highly polished but with little content outside some collectibles. Narrative also picks up slowly as you go with a surprising conclusion to the story. Pick it up at a sale as it is not very long.

author: {'steamid': '76561198195020071', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 315, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 315, 'last_played': 1625097099}
review:
This game is really great. The graphics are perfect to my tastes, it was a whimsical atmosphere, and fantastic music. However, the end of the story, for me, ruined the entire game in an important way, recontextualising the entire game entirely in the span of about 5 minutes. I would recommend playing this game, but on a discount so you are not disappointed by the end. STOP READING NOW IF YOU DO NOT WANT SPOILERS

***SPOILERS***
The end contextualises the whole game as an illusion representing the 5 stages of grief. Not only is the connection extremely vague, but there are a number of whimsical elements - the fox, the man in the red cloak, the lights and fires responding to the voice, the magical robots - and it's not clear what in the world any of it even means given it was all some arbitrary dream about grief. I can see next to zero connection between the majority of the otherwise wonderful, magical parts of the gameworld to the overall theme, and so it really does make them feel meaningless, when they used to be interesting and mysterious. It is also a remarkably shallow meaning to put behind the story, as it is.

author: {'steamid': '76561198403493508', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 261, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1629329924}

author: {'steamid': '76561198203011332', 'num_games_owned': 156, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 620, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 620, 'last_played': 1566958386}
review: This game was made by the same people who made shadow of the colossus and ico. It has the same playstyle and design , but... its more based on exploration than fighting something . It's an emotionally sad game but very well done .

author: {'steamid': '76561198250189988', 'num_games_owned': 30, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2120, 'last_played': 1677292866}
review:
Este juego me dio mucho en que pensar, ademas, es hermoso, los graficos, las islas, como se desarrolla la historia y el que no tenga dialogos lo hace muy interesante ya que tu te vas dando una idea de lo que significa cada zona o tratas de entender a la historia.

Yo que lo jugue a los 11 años, muy hermoso, creo que esta en mi top de juegos y este, es el unico que me han hecho llorar por 2 horas, incluso llegue a pensar que se podia obtener otro final en el cual el niño sobreviviera.

si estan interesado, este juego es una joya, merese ser jugado tranquilamente, y espero que a Tequila Works les hayan dado un premio por esto

No tengo ningun problema con este juego, es perfecto en todos los sentidos, Visual, Psicologico, ETC.

10/10, HERMOSO, EL MEJOR JUEGO QUE TENGO Y EH TENIDO DESDE QUE CONOZCO LOS VIDEOJUEGOS

author: {'steamid': '76561198054186778', 'num_games_owned': 303, 'num_reviews': 158, 'playtime_forever': 572, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 572, 'last_played': 1623757657}
review:
Don't buy this game at even close to full price, but its a decent game for casual players and "achievement hunters".
In this game, you control a boy who runs like a physically challenged kid, look at him from the side while running, I dare you! His special powers? He yells and sobs at things until something happens. I get what this game tried to do, but it just didn't pull it off. Its a very casual puzzle/exploration game., there isn't any real challenge and its easy to get all achievements. Especially since when its completed for the first time, you'll be able to select chapters and go back for the missing achievements if needed - This feature is one of the best things about the game.
Personally I had trouble looking past the very, uhm.. Special running of the kid, but if you can, I'm sure you'll connect more with the game and the story itself, but there is nothing original about it. The controls, espeically the jump, are very sluggish, but the game doesn't call for tight controls, so this doesn't effect gameplay - Again, if you can look past it.
I will say, the game is beautiful in its own way and the music is really nice, but that's just not enough for me. There are too many awesome games out there, similar style to this one, at a cheaper price point, that does it all way better.

If you want a casual game with super easy achievements, go ahead and buy this when its at a 80-90% discount, but I really do recommened you to keep looking for another game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198240554456', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 444, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 444, 'last_played': 1623724458}
review: Depression

author: {'steamid': '76561198119825523', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1014, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1014, 'last_played': 1623564449}
review:
何かのメルマガからタダで手に入れたゲームです。今期アニメの録画を消化しながら6～7時間でクリアしました。

ゲームの内容はほぼ全部が探索と謎解きからできています。
マップが非常に広大かつ複雑で、そんな中をあちこち彷徨って先に進むための手がかりを探し続けなきゃいけないのはかなり大変です。ただ、世界観がすごいというか景色がなかなか綺麗だし、マップもよく作り込まれてるというところに惹かれたのでなんとか乗り切れました。特に濡れた地面の表現なんかは何度見てもすごいですね。さすがアンリアルエンジンという感じです。逆に、マップに魅力を感じない人にはこのゲームはただの苦行かもしれないです。

あと謎解きがそんなに複雑じゃないのもいいです。2～3回迷ったところはありましたが、どれも初歩的な見落としが原因でした。進み方がわからなくなったら、辺りの床に模様とか、意味ありげな台座とか、壁や崖につかまれる場所がないかとかを探してみるといいです。壁や崖につかまってるときに操作がわからなくなったら、一旦移動キーを押すのをやめ、改めて移動したい方向のキーを押すとうまくいくようです。

で、問題はストーリーなのですが、エンディングを迎えてみると正直言って全く意味がわかりません。一応気になったので実績コンプまでしましたが（ガイドを見れば簡単にクリアできるので良かったです）、結局よくわかりませんでした。収集要素はごくごく断片的に主人公たちの背景などを仄めかしてくれる程度で、終盤で唐突に出てくるおっさんが誰なのかくらいはまあなんとなくわかったような気になります。

まとめると、3Dのアドベンチャーゲームが好きな人には簡単操作かつボリューム満点なんでいいんじゃないでしょうか。
とりあえずパズルゲームやりたいって感じのときには十分なゲームです。

author: {'steamid': '76561197970975120', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 406, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 406, 'last_played': 1582495315}
review:
While the gameplay is only a mix of well known elements in the genre (climbing, jumping, puzzle solving) and the ending may be a bit disappointing, it's definitely been the absolutely wonderful soundtrack that made this game an outstanding experience for me. The art style does also work really well. 
This game has pretty nice and varied puzzles that are just easy enough to not being an obstacle in one's progress through the game. After all you'll want to figure out and understand what's actually going on here.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044197066', 'num_games_owned': 153, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 260, 'last_played': 1623345735}
review: This game has a beautiful atmosphere, a lovely soundtrack, and a very heartfelt story. I'm very happy to have had this experience, and I recommend it to anyone looking for an adventure.

author: {'steamid': '76561198179701990', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1623037442}
review:
途中までプレイしたが断念、バグ・クラッシュが多い。視界管理が適当すぎて不快。
動画を見る限りかなりボリュームはありそうだが私のプレイした範囲内では単調でストーリー性も理解しづらい。
世界観デザインは好きでしたが残念。
厳しいかもしれないがベータ版ではなく製品版でこれならこの価格で買う価値はないと思う。

author: {'steamid': '76561198125123765', 'num_games_owned': 1903, 'num_reviews': 613, 'playtime_forever': 659, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 408, 'last_played': 1623010888}
review:
ГОСПОДИ, Я ПРОСТО ХОТЕЛ ПОИГРАТЬ И РАССЛАБИТЬСЯ. ПОЧЕМУ ИГРА ЗАСТАВЛЯЕТ МЕНЯ РЫДАТЬ КАК С*КА?

Вроде вначале все было хорошо: тили тили трали вали, всякие свинки, лисички и др. А в конце это все пришло к такому п*здецу что я просто в шоке.

Однозначно рекомендую к ознакомлению.

author: {'steamid': '76561198372926237', 'num_games_owned': 295, 'num_reviews': 149, 'playtime_forever': 574, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 574, 'last_played': 1622294478}
review: Great game, get into it for the puzzles, stay for the story. I'll complain about just two things: the performance is awful considering the visual style of the game, there's no reason why this game is so unoptimized and some of the puzzles do require previous knowledge of puzzle platformers, since they are really unclear at times.

author: {'steamid': '76561197976161028', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 331, 'last_played': 1622856481}
review:
Plataforma 3D, puzzles e lágrimas. 
Reviravolta no desenvolver da trama para mim, estava imaginando que era algo no oposto, fui surpreendido pelo final, embora alguns outros trechos já estavam me pegando. Foi um derramar de lágrimas. Recomendo, é uma experiência única.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965295646', 'num_games_owned': 3371, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 313, 'last_played': 1622665327}
review: I enjoyed that game very much! No game-breaking bugs for me, the only caveat is that the controls are sometimes fighting with the camera view. Otherwise it was a great experience. At times, the scenery and setting reminded me of Laputa.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054713896', 'num_games_owned': 1009, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 450, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 450, 'last_played': 1622777164}
review:
Relaxing and visually pleasing adventure that fails to stick the landing on most of its engaging elements. 

Narratively speaking, specially in retrospect, it's about as good as it can get in these kinds of games. Gameplay on the other hand leaves a lot to be desired, specially with its puzzles and traversal. 

Also worth mentioning an awful tendency to cause pretty severe motion sickness, even to people who generally don't experience it elsewhere.

While the final product is definitely not bad, it's also nothing to write home about.

6.1/10

author: {'steamid': '76561199099172729', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1654866015}
review:
Why am  I crying..Why I can not accept..


二刷终于释怀了...突然想到一句话  “每当我仰望星空时，我总会畅想一番。我问自己：我们为什么触摸不到这苍穹上的点点星光？莫非人们可以通过死亡之路去往那一片璀璨繁星？这么说来暮年的安详离世应该是朝着星海的徜徉漫步吧！”------Vincent Van Gogh


[spoiler]在我短短的人生里，我见过的不多...大海，灯塔，都化为我想象的幻影。曾经在梦里出现过的小狐狸和长腿风铃，来到了这个世界。
这是个荒凉孤独的世界，好像只有我一个人，虽然很美，但是不真实...我看到了那座灯塔，我突然想起来我是谁了
我是渔民家的儿子，那个红色衣服的人我慢慢知道他是我的爸爸，但是他为什么不和我相见？
我是他的王子，没错，我在一个个失落的宫殿，所有的线索好像不是线索，往前走，我越来越困惑。比如挂在我床头的纸风车，转啊转，能带来乌云。我凭我的机智战胜了凶恶的大鸟。
长腿也出现了，我把它组装好，赋予它生命，但他一刻也不停留，好像要告诉我一个真相...走啊走，悲伤笼罩了我，我看到了游荡的鬼魂，他们曾经是无言的，和我没什么关系。
突然，我看到了一个白色的鬼魂（white shadow），她的拥抱，好温暖
大水决堤而出，我不知道是泪水还是雨水
原来有这么多长腿，它们是我的卫士吗？它带我走向灯塔，走向我最不愿接受的事实....我的爸爸已经葬身大海..这是一座雨城，我在雨城中迷失了...我到达一个雕像前，最后一个长腿变成了钥匙，我哭着求它别扔下我
但是它看了我一眼，那意思是，让我走进去
虽然很想和你在一起，但是作为朋友，你必须走下去。小狐狸唤醒了我的悲伤，可是它也用尽了最后的力气，别走...
好害怕，在这倾盆大雨之下，到处都是水，没有躲藏的地方，大声喊也听不到了，啊，我变成了曾经见过的鬼魂..但是我的红围巾提醒着我，我还能行动
他们一直挡在那个宫殿前不让我进去，现在可以了，但是里面是背对着的，我和爸爸的痛苦的雕像
没有光...我隐隐约约知道我的任务了，我和小狐狸和长腿一样，我要安慰一个人...那是熟悉的房间，一个人极端痛苦的姿势，变成了石头
别伤心啦！我轻轻在他耳边说，我要走了，送我最后一程吧
再次睁开眼，我看到的是无边的，宁静的星空，好像是灵魂最后的归宿。我唱起了歌，跳了进去。

denial 
他一定是飘到了岛上，那里不缺水，不缺食物，我只要去找一定能找回他.....
anger
别骗自己了，他掉进海里的时候那么害怕，你这个父亲真是该死，他无疑是带着恐惧死去的
bargaining
他到了天国，可以永远不用长大，永远被守护
depression
别做梦了，你永远失去你的儿子了...从今以后你孤零零的，像个鬼魂
acceptance
他一定回来了，我又一次在凳子上深深自责的时候，熟悉的声音对我告别，他变得那么勇敢，温暖地看着我。我知道他住在星星上，那么那红布我还留着吗，那已经不是唯一的纪念，留着徒增伤心，我把它放飞在风中，
在窗前一直注视到黄昏...[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198165304594', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 108, 'playtime_forever': 294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 294, 'last_played': 1622743153}
review: No es un juego para todo el mundo, pero si te gustan las historias conceptuales, el silencio, los puzzles sencillos y la estética gráfico, seguro lo vas a disfrutar por unas 4 o 5 horas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198356692849', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 349, 'last_played': 1622513564}
review:
HANDS DOWN ONE OF MY TOP 10 FAVORITE GAMES OF ALL TIME

I went into this game expecting a fun puzzle game to play since I was bored and didn't have anything better to do. This game absolutely blew my expectations out of the water. 

The story in this game is amazing. It builds up slowly but the end is worth all of it and then some. (I actually cried at the end...)

If you are looking for an amazing game and you enjoy puzzles or if you just want a good story, then I cannot recommend this game enough.

10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198040665600', 'num_games_owned': 1615, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 531, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 531, 'last_played': 1621964538}
review:
After a terrible storm on sea a boy is washed up on the shore of an idyllic looking island. In the background you can see a ruined tower at a cliff. After climbing up a cliff the boy notices in the far distance another tower. One that is gigantic, intact and having a keyhole like shape on the upper floor. The scenery is gorgeous. Everything looks like it is hand painted. It is a pleasant art style, not trying to be photo realistic but rather to convey being in a very artistic hand painted world. Furthermore there is a day and night cycle which nicely wraps the landscape in different tones, where the night is as atmospheric as the day.
Melodic compositions accompany the boy on his journey through this island and the tower. 

Not a single word is said to convey any goals or the story (besides some shouts of the boy). Therefor one could wonder how the game can tell its story and guide the player throughout the journey. Bits of the story are mostly told by mural paintings, secret keyholes (which show a picture regarding the boys past) and a few cutscenes between the chapters. You are never clueless about what it is you have to do next, even though the game is not stringently holding the players hand. The puzzles are not that challenging but more than often you are surprised by how interesting the mechanics are. In general I would say that the gameplay itself is very chill. The boy has the power to interact with certain objects with is voice. He can reignite torches, break specific vases and activate certain statues, all with a shout of his. Besides chapter 2, which brings an element of danger until right before the end of the chapter, you can almost always take your time exploring (chapter 3 had some areas you could not access after leaving them, so there is that as well). And even the element of danger in chapter 2 is rather there to be kind of a puzzle to be solved.
In some instances exploring was very rewarding, for example when you see a place in a distance not being accessible at first but when you examine the surrounding area you could find a way to get there and eventually find more collectables or achievements. I like that design philosophy.

What I really liked about the end is that the developers made it to tell a story and not have a love, peace and harmony ending (so be warned, if that’s what you always have to want!).
It was very touching and after having unlocked the chapter selection, the meaning of the chapters became more apparent in regards to the actual story. I love it.

For those achievement hunters: There is a chapter select after finishing the game, so there is nothing you can really miss. I was peeking in an achievement guide from time to time after the first chapter to make sure I did not miss anything though. Some achievements are indeed hidden, but if you get them on your own, just by exploring the world, you’ll feel awesome. I’d say play the game mostly without a guide (or like me peeking there from time to time) and enjoy the game. Afterwards you can always replay chapters.

To wrap it all up: 
Rime is not on the lengthy side. It took me around 8 and a half hour, with getting almost all achievements and looking in an achievement guide in between. Even though a bit short, I would definitely say Rime is worth its money delivering a unique adventure with a hand painted look, a great musical score and in general a chill game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198418386542', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 1028, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1028, 'last_played': 1622057904}
review:
This game is definitely overpriced. After you have completed the game once, it becomes too annoying to play again because of the cutscenes. They are unstopped, irrational, unsettling, super annoying and you can not skip watching them. 

Aside from that, the game plays with camera, takes away your point of view, and disables controls time to time. It will make you feel dumb and out of control.

If you find this game on sale at around $5 or less, you can try it, but any more than that it is a waste of money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198212769343', 'num_games_owned': 466, 'num_reviews': 119, 'playtime_forever': 460, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1621707289}
review:
Rime an adventure puzzle game. It focuses a lot more in art than anything else, so expect simple game mechanics.

Summary:
+ Good Disney like art style.
+ Easy to control.
+ Very calm game. Good to kill time.
- Too slow, should be faster.
- Puzzle are too easy.
- Short game, with big levels, instead of big game with short levels.
- No real replayability. It sums up to getting all items. It's pointless.

You control a kid that looks like a Mexican ancient roman that solves most of his problems with impressive physical ability and by screaming at objects. You can pretty much climb anything, push big stone statues, grab heavy metal spheres and swim for many seconds underwater. Very impressive but he is a kid so he can't jump very high. For some reason screaming at monkey statues, vases, torches, and so on, activates them. Makes no sense, and all that screaming can get annoying, but you just have to do it.

The main selling point is the art style. It's kind of like a classic Disney style and works well, though it could have more shading. There are different themes in each stage, so there is art variety (e.g., water stage, ruins stage). This does make the game a lot more interesting and essential for these kinds of games. The story was designed to fit the art style, meaning the kid is always happy, smiling and tagging along with friends he finds along the way. Kind of nauseating, but as you'll eventually find out, not all is what it seems. The music is nothing to brag about. It's not bad, not good, sometimes annoying and not memorable at all. This is one area the developer could have invested more.

In my opinion there are some obvious issues with the game. It's a very slow game were you spend most of your time running instead of solving puzzles. It's not as bad as it should be because at least you can enjoy the art style, but it could be a faster game. The puzzles are too basic and sometimes it's hard to understand what you're supposed to do. It should be the opposite, easy to understand, but hard to solve. You do have hints if you're lost, in particular a fox helps. By the way, someone should tell the developers that red foxes don't bark like dogs. Either way these two flaws can be off putting to a lot of people. The game does start boring, but gets better over time. It's also a short game, with big levels. Instead it should be a big game with shorter levels. But I guess the main focus was always art.

So it's a slow game with pretty graphics and basic puzzles. It's good to help sleep for sure, not that that's bad. It's a calm game and doesn't really require much skill. It's a good game if you like art and have patience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198135407109', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 334, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 327, 'last_played': 1625181320}
review:
[quote]
[h1][b]TEST RAPIDE :[/b][/h1]
[i]Mots clés : onirique, explorer, puzzles, plateformes, orchestrées, épuré, apaisante, optimisation [/i]
[/quote]
[quote]On y incarne un enfant qui s'échoué dans un monde [b]onirique[/b]. Le joueur doit alors [b]explorer[/b] ce monde, et y résoudre des [b]puzzles[/b] durant les phases de [b]plateformes[/b]. Rien de très compliqué, c'est un jeu au final assez modeste, avec une courte durée de vie. 

Mais quel plaisir j'ai pris de faire ce jeu ! Les sublimes musiques [b]orchestrées[/b] accompagnent les séquences de jeu parfois avec mélancolie d'autre fois avec gaieté. L'atmosphère du jeu est très [b]apaisante[/b]. Et le style [b]épuré[/b] des graphismes en cell shading renforcent cette impression. La composition des décors du jeu m'ont fait, par moments, décrocher la mâchoire. 

Il est important de noter que la version PC du jeu est malheureusement entaché par une [b]mauvaise optimisation[/b], faites attention à ça si vous devez le prendre.
En tout cas je n'ai pas pu m'arrêter de jouer jusqu'à la conclusion. Au final c'est tout ce qui compte. Du début à la fin j'étais happé et c'est pour moi un sans fautes, bravo Tequila Works.

[h1][b]NOTE : 18/20[/b][/h1]
[/quote]
[quote][h1][b]♥ COUP DE COEUR[/b][/h1][/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198050949868', 'num_games_owned': 397, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 598, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 598, 'last_played': 1619980555}

author: {'steamid': '76561198021121989', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1023, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1619986081}
review:
Leuk spel, besturing is wel even wennen.
Werkt niet altijd even lekker.
Ben beter gewend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086150544', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 848, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 848, 'last_played': 1584548868}

author: {'steamid': '76561197973157611', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 900, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 900, 'last_played': 1618950637}
review:
This is great game supported by an impressive soundtrack and a highly emotional backstory. This is perfect for anyone looking for a not super hard puzzle / exploration game (eg similar to A.E.R.) that won't take month to finish. Tequila Works put again a really impressive game after Deadlight. 

Just as personal note, I originally thought this game would be perfect to move my son from playing Hob to something similar but less violent. It was sort of OK for him until the ending (not spoiling here)... So avoid for your younger gamers.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105921351', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 300, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 300, 'last_played': 1553161444}
review: Super unique and beautiful experience. Puzzles are super accessible and will allow you to progress easily through the game's beautiful story. A very mediterranean experience that will make you feel joy and sadness for an afternoon or two.

author: {'steamid': '76561198330221045', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1053, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1053, 'last_played': 1564751296}

author: {'steamid': '76561198074787550', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 415, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 384, 'last_played': 1618651304}
review:
I should love this. On paper, it's like you're playing an early Miyazaki world. Phenomenal music, good visuals, decent control. But it's just sooooooo slow, tedious, and boring 90% of the time. 

Fantastic ending, which it doesn't earn, in my opinion.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077783657', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 573, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 310, 'last_played': 1707799608}
review: The story is very telling, even without words. It's easy to figure out and the initial journey is very sad, yet heartfelt. I would love if the company made more games like RiME.

author: {'steamid': '76561198139990310', 'num_games_owned': 387, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 432, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 432, 'last_played': 1618373362}
review:
O estilo desse jogo é bem simples porém bonito a história é bonita demais e você se encanta com o personagem , a gameplay é muito boa e os desafios são até fácies. 
Recomendo !

author: {'steamid': '76561198303983641', 'num_games_owned': 62, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1612, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1473, 'last_played': 1646364870}
review: This is a really beautiful puzzle game with a story and message that will touch you. A portion of the message, I felt, is put into the gameplay in a subtle, understated way. It's very enjoyable to watch and see it unfold. The puzzles are fun and challenging in a delightful way and the entire atmosphere changing when you complete a puzzle/area feels really good. The music is gorgeous and a great accompaniment to the goings-on in the game. The game feels and plays as smoothly as it sounds. Please play this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198109701387', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 433, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 211, 'last_played': 1621004780}
review: I like how the game tells its story by not telling anything

author: {'steamid': '76561198201620245', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 608, 'playtime_forever': 587, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 587, 'last_played': 1618053546}
review:
At the end of Chapter 1, I was going to thumb down.

Right from the start, explorers are told to bugger off to another game, as there is no free saving. Devs show who is boss; unless they show who is insecure control-freak of the lazy one slot. Still claim it's open world though.
All right, no exploration then... I'll still give it a chance.

More faux freedom: you have control over the camera... except that devs keep taking it away from you, time and time again. This will be a recurring annoyance until the very end.

Considering that the gameplay is rather dull, and that the art isn't much to look art, I trod along with a growing itch to uninstall. It's not bad, it's simply not engrossing.

Fortunately, chapter 2 comes along and slowly wins me over. There is now a story, an objective, animation on the map. Plus, I like the design of the bird, of the ghosts, of the scenery, of the sea... I'm enjoying my time here.

The next chapter is rather dull again. The following one super-dull under the rain. And the epilogue is one of these railroads that never want to end, a cutscene that keeps begging for your pointless input, as if that would earn it some gravitas.

An average game with one good chapter.

author: {'steamid': '76561197963358821', 'num_games_owned': 1021, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 469, 'last_played': 1545025795}

author: {'steamid': '76561197969156075', 'num_games_owned': 1020, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 1331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1331, 'last_played': 1617787790}

但是優美的畫面配上好聽的音樂
玩得很舒服!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198021800223', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 476, 'playtime_forever': 850, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 501, 'last_played': 1617570986}
review:
I thought this game is gonna be slightly more open exploration adventure game that takes place on mysterious ssland filled with cool puzzles but what I got was basically 
70% dull walking around basic environment, 
25% slow as molasses brain dead climbing 
and 5% ok'ish puzzles.

Heck, even developers compleatly gave up on the last chapter of the game by making you do more of dull walking and boring simple climbing while not solving a single puzzle.

With addition of tons of bugs, crashes, boring predictable story about loss, over focus on terrible placed collectibles 
and garbage ending so absurdly try harding to make you feel sad in the dumbest way possible 
(oh no, a fox that wasn't explained, 
oh no, that robot that wasn't explained, 
oh no, that kid that died long ago),
Rime was a huge disappointment for me.

Thank god this game was at least short which is the best part about Rime.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055327393', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2652, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2044, 'last_played': 1690487129}
review: Allein für die Musik lohnt sich das Spiel. Aber auch die Geschichte und die Grafik sind sehr schön (alle Schlüssellöcher suchen!) dichte, stimmungsvolle Atmosphäre, teilweise wirklich trickreich.

author: {'steamid': '76561198173271669', 'num_games_owned': 172, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1616966016}
review: Fantastic game. I played this with my daughter (4 years old). It was fun for both of us. The message was unexpected, but really touching. The gameplay was creative but not too difficult. Very casual fun experience. I highly recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971369386', 'num_games_owned': 138, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 509, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 506, 'last_played': 1617144016}
review: Amazing story, setting, and music.  Very powerful.

author: {'steamid': '76561198332320777', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 411, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 411, 'last_played': 1617018916}
review: 首先，相当推荐这款游戏。剧情无语言叙事的手法使玩家可以更加专注于内容本身从而加强了玩家的代入感。在美术风格方面，游戏大量采用正负型将玩家视觉中心集中于道路前方，加深了前方内容的神秘性同时具有很强的玩家引导性。 将情绪融入到每个章节，层层递进的向玩家抽丝剥茧剧情。这个游戏的玩法是近些年少见的以声音作为切入点构建游戏机制。因此无论是在题材还是玩法上都具有一定的高度。解谜方面个人认为有两处地方关联性不够强导致玩家不能顺利理解从而推导出正确路线。不过整体来说难度并不算特别高。总的来说，无论是从文学，美学，哲学角度来说，这个游戏都能称之为佳作。

author: {'steamid': '76561197986962077', 'num_games_owned': 894, 'num_reviews': 263, 'playtime_forever': 341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 330, 'last_played': 1626037098}

author: {'steamid': '76561198070509604', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 393, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 393, 'last_played': 1616935205}

author: {'steamid': '76561198110568949', 'num_games_owned': 1016, 'num_reviews': 274, 'playtime_forever': 159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 159, 'last_played': 1616866615}
review:
Un jeu que j'ai vraiment envie d'aimer, mais non, ce n'est pas possible.
La DA magnifique, le rythme lent ont tout pour me plaire. Le mix énigmes/plateforme, le tout pas trop dur, aussi.
Mais.
Mais les mouvements de caméra pénibles, les déplacements patauds du personnage nuisent à l'expérience. Et lorsque une énigme vous bloque, ça devient vite crispant. Trop crispant, surtout arrivé à un moment où je ne savais même plus où il fallait aller (pourquoi le petit renard n'est pas plus utilisé/utilisable ?)
Tant pis, je suis pas venu là pour souffrir, surtout sur un jeu qui est sensé être plutôt calibré simple et agréable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198346044256', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 554, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 554, 'last_played': 1616812509}
review: The game took me a little while to get into, but once I was in it, I was IN it! The music is beautiful, the storytelling is emotional, the end is superb, and I mostly enjoyed the puzzle mechanics. Some puzzles weren't as intuitive as I would have liked and the controls could be a little clunky sometimes, but the game is all around very good! Definitely play if you're into the more abstract, atmospheric, and emotional titles.

author: {'steamid': '76561198339276109', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 576, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 576, 'last_played': 1616712309}

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11208, 'playtime_forever': 356, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 251, 'last_played': 1635525666}
review:
Rime is a console ported 3D puzzle platformer where you control some kid in ancient Greek/Roman type clothes and explore an island with ruins and stuff on it. 

This might work but of course it was developed for consoles, and as we know, consoles make gaming worse for everyone, and Rime is no exception.  The console port is pretty bad here, you can tell the game was designed for console peasant childrens toy gamepads, and KB+M was an afterthought.  For example, "Shift" makes you roll, not run.  Presumably the guys at Tequila Works got their name for a reason, and also, they never saw a PC with a keyboard before.  The sure as hell never played a PC game before, or they wouldn't bind "Shift" to "roll". 

The same console peasant centric design is followed along with completely gamer-hostile camera controls.  The camera is wonky as all hell, and the developers break one of the core rules of game development... [b]NEVER[/b] seize control of the camera from the player.  Except of course, the guys at Tequila Works drunkenly decided players love having the camera yanked off the player.   Well, we don't.  Maybe console peasants like that kind of thing. 

On a technical basis, 4K works, but only in Fullscreen mode.  You can't go that high if you like borderless window, because they either didn't bother testing on PC (a plausible scenario given how bad the controls are), or they just didn't see the sense in making it work properly in 4K because console peasant appliances usually don't go that high.  Also, the graphics are really low poly, again this is because consoles can't render PC tier graphics properly so compromises get made to make the best out of a bad platform.   Told you consoles make gaming worse for everyone.

Anyway, this is basically what might have been an okay game, but it's console ported trash with PC as an afterthought.  Also, it's stupidly overpriced for such a poorly done port.  $40 would get you a game developed for PC, with KB+M working smoothly, proper UHD support, and proper graphics.   This second rate "What's a PeeCee???" console port is not worth a 10th of their greedy asking price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198964806772', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1117, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 662, 'last_played': 1679124981}

author: {'steamid': '76561198035333930', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 282, 'last_played': 1616539483}
review: Great chillout game.  Beautiful art style, and mostly responsive controls.  Environments are so large, that sometimes you might get lost.  I think that's why they have those fires that you can make burn brighter.  Sort of like breadcrumbs or markers to make sure you can get back on track.  Plus you have your fox friend to help guide you most of the time.  Totally recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198359040081', 'num_games_owned': 147, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 365, 'last_played': 1646828194}
review: 以水为镜，我自塔顶，向下追寻，下面是无尽的深渊，令人恐惧，我看到的，是未知和死亡。当黑夜为我反转，星空变换，海风将我的斗篷吹向山巅，日月是我的眸子，河流是我的眼泪，我为何如此的悲伤，像被遗忘的古迹那样沉重的往事，我记不起来，乌云密布，闪电帮我驱逐梦魇，波涛，黑暗，愤怒，我平静了下来，无尽的懊恼是我愈发黑暗的源头，我寻着桎梏与枷链，潜入深渊，冰冷的水侵蚀着我，无法逃脱，我唯一的依赖离开了，去了再也到不了这里的远方，他的牺牲为我换来温暖，光明，一扇扇门被打开，真相扑面而来，我感受到了悲伤，亦感受到了安抚，释怀与解脱，是时候了，我看了看这颠倒的高塔，纵身一跃，扑向海面..........以海为镜，我自塔底，向上追寻，越过谜团的镜像，我看到的，是对称的天堂。           ——RIME

author: {'steamid': '76561198168266419', 'num_games_owned': 83, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 376, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 337, 'last_played': 1617648415}

author: {'steamid': '76561198836861080', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 582, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 188, 'last_played': 1638084003}
review:
I adore this game, I already played it on console but wanted to try to 100% it here. This is a beautiful puzzle game with an even more beautiful story. Even though this game does have controller support, I would NOT recommend playing with controller. I'm not sure if it was something on my end or the games, but I had a horrible experience while playing with a Dualshock controller, the character and camera would constantly move and jitter on it's own making it damn near impossible to move in a straight line, and having a bluetooth controller connected also gave me a lot of frame drops.

TLDR: Game itself is amazing, has controller bugs and would only recommend playing with keyboard.

author: {'steamid': '76561198307027187', 'num_games_owned': 90, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 465, 'last_played': 1615828054}

Eine wundervolle Inszenierung einer spannenden Geschichte die die eine oder andere Ueberaschung bereit  hält!

author: {'steamid': '76561198287149933', 'num_games_owned': 120, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 505, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 505, 'last_played': 1615834185}
review:
好喜欢啊！
解谜虽然简单但是构思很巧，并且非常契合游戏中类似古代文明氛围的场景。
能从中看到一些宫崎骏电影元素，甚至感觉配乐都有采样，不过参考程度都在舒适区，可以当致敬的小彩蛋来看。一开始还担心会不会太过塞尔达，结果完全没有，反倒很有自己独创的风格和叙事，美术也牛批。

author: {'steamid': '76561198866645021', 'num_games_owned': 263, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 530, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 530, 'last_played': 1615452872}

真希望我就是游戏里的男主

author: {'steamid': '76561198207678552', 'num_games_owned': 1699, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1599418551}
review: Me da mucha pena decir esto pero, no lo recomiendo. El juego se ve muy bonito y tiene un encanto especial pero me ha resultado soporífero. Muy aburrido, muy lento, escenarios muy grandes en donde no tienes más que patear y patear sin hacer absolutamente nada más... en fin, viniendo de Tequila, quienes han hecho dos de mis juegos favoritos (Sexy Brutale y Deadlight, ambos con un ritmo increible y con planteamientos muy divertidos) pues la verdad que esperaba muchísimo más de este Rime y se me ha quedado descafeinado; tanto que ni me lo voy a terminar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077596335', 'num_games_owned': 562, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1615573059}
review:
这游戏前半个小时给我的印象并不算好。谜题简单，收集要素过于密集，而且收集了也没啥成就感——无非是把地图跑个遍而已。

但过了这部分后才发现其实场景和谜题都很用心，没有那么多无意义的支路，收集要素也需要细心观察和动脑筋。

总之如果决定要玩这游戏，务必先玩一两个小时再说。

author: {'steamid': '76561198253545466', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 494, 'last_played': 1624791937}

author: {'steamid': '76561198108651571', 'num_games_owned': 301, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 727, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 727, 'last_played': 1615351611}
review: E nítido o carinho que foi colocado nesse projeto. Apesar de encontrar um bug aqui e ali, isso se perde no meio da imensidão de ambientes tão imponentes e fantásticos, que atiçam a curiosidade de qualquer um que joga e se depara com o seu primeiro objeto colecionável. Foi uma experiência que me fez esquecer as horas, me chamou pra dentro da história e com certeza não esquecerei do que vi aqui. Estão de parabéns.

author: {'steamid': '76561198182684947', 'num_games_owned': 3774, 'num_reviews': 315, 'playtime_forever': 333, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1540833356}
review: Before you — a beautiful and harsh world full of mysteries. Meet RiME. Arm yourself with intelligence and determination, as well as the tips of a friendly fox, explore the mysterious island, climb to the top of the tower and uncover its secrets.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088528943', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 342, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 342, 'last_played': 1614622876}
review:
Je suis désolé, mais au vu des avis postés, je me suis senti plutôt floué par ce jeu.
Je m'attendais à un jeu "poétique" (pour ce que ça peut bien signifier...) et émouvant, et au final, l'aspect émouvant, c'est plutôt une révélation sur la fin du jeu en mode "sois ému, si t'es pas ému, c'est que t'es un gros vilain pas bô !". Je pense qu'on peut parler d'émotion forcée.

Globalement, le jeu est beau, son univers est bien réalisé, je n'ai pas de reproche à ce niveau. Les énigmes sont assez basiques, pas franchement intéressantes, mais elles sont bien intégrées à l'univers du jeu.

Techniquement, le jeu souffre de quelques drops de fps (jouant avec une RTX 3070, je n'ai tilté qu'à peu de moments, mais je pense que sur une config moins puissante, notamment sur la fin du jeu, j'aurais pu avoir des mauvaises surprises).

Au final, je trouve le jeu assez lambdas. Des idées pas particulièrement bonnes, ni mauvaises, disons des idées sympas. Un bel univers, des jolis décors. Mais tout ça pour une histoire qui ne mène pas vraiment quelque part.

author: {'steamid': '76561198359844598', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 525, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 525, 'last_played': 1614601570}
review:
画面唯美的同时也很感人，音乐也很契合，就如亲身经历了一场奇幻电影一般。
后两章关于朋友，亲情的最受不了，哭哭。
快结束解锁no hope时心拔凉拔凉的但是又被letting go治愈了。
还挺喜欢这样的游戏更像是一幅有故事的艺术品。
还有隐藏东西太难找啦！！！就没看到几个

author: {'steamid': '76561198126557077', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 511, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 511, 'last_played': 1614535892}
review:
История без слов в стиле Journey или ICO. Ходилка-бродилка с элементами головоломок. К конце нас ждет прекрасная концовка которая подается сквозь слезы. Мне понравилось, прошел в течении 1 выходного дня, теперь жалею что не прошел игру ранее как ее купил еще на релизе - пролежала несколько лет в библиотеке.

Итог: 7 из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060919540', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 564, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 507, 'last_played': 1658859901}
review:
Es sin duda un juego único. Un mundo precioso, una banda sonora increíble. Es cierto que las mecánicas y los puzzles son sencillos y esto a alguien le puede aburrir, pero si te dejas guiar por este enigmático viaje, emocional, te aseguro que será un juego que te dejará huella.

Para mi un juego imprescindible, de los que nunca olvidas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024637608', 'num_games_owned': 1202, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 1050, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 531, 'last_played': 1613942440}
review:
[h1] Кто же ты, красный плащ? [/h1]
Покажите мне того бездушного человека, который не прольет ни одной слезинки на последней главе этой прекрасной игры. Сюжет в этой игре глубочайшим образом заставляет сочувствовать главному герою, проходя его пусть не за него, а вместе с ним, помогая найти все ответы на стоящие перед ним вопросы. Игра "максимально минимализирована" - в ней нет реплик, одни эмоции, подкрепленные отличным душевным саундтреком.

Многое осталось непонятно, например лично для меня - связь основной истории героя и черных духов или же милых двуногих голов. За 8,9 часов(по факту где-то +- 7 часов, с расчетом пауз и нахождением в афк) я прошел основной сюжет без исследований скрытых мест, так что мне еще предстоит прошерстить каждую главу, чтобы найти оставшиеся части коллекционных предметов, после чего надеюсь получить ответы на вышесказанное.

Игру однозначно советую. К концу, имея опыт прохождения подобных сюжетов, понимаешь что к чему, но как и везде есть свое дополнение твоей теории и здесь это не исключение. Эмоции переполняют.

Прошел игру на все 100% достижения за 17 с половиной часов (на самом деле выходит +- 15 часов, остальное погрешность простоев игры)

P.S. Если вы хотите полноценный конец и еще больше слёз в конце, то советую сделать достижение "Сладкие воспоминания" (Соединиться с белой тенью.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198007429338', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1415, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1415, 'last_played': 1613288717}
review: One of the most beautiful games I've ever played. The puzzles are set at just the right level to keep your progress steady. The story, which slowly reveals itself, is sad and wonderful. Play this game if you like beautiful, non-'shooty' puzzle / journey types of games. You won't regret it.

review: довольно короткая и красочная игра с сюжетом который придётся собирать по кусочкам из окружения , если хочешь поиграть подольше можно найти все игрушки диски и ТД ,но её основная прелесть всё таки в красивом атмосферном мире .

author: {'steamid': '76561198260854478', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1256, 'last_played': 1612734477}
review:
RIME ! ce jeu est tout simplement superbe ! 
Les décors, la musique, l'histoire vous embarquent dans une aventure dont on ne ressort pas indemne...
On suit les a aventures d'un jeune garçon à travers des univers aux ambiances diverses, des plus lumineuses et féériques aux plus sombres. 
Les énigmes et puzzles demandent parfois de se triturer un peu les méninges, mais restent accessibles au plus grand nombre.
Le twist de la fin vous révèlera le véritable sens de l'histoire du jeu, que l'on comprend encore mieux en lisant les titres des niveaux une fois le jeu fini une première fois (mais je n'en dirai pas plus... à vous de le découvrir !)
Bref, RIME est un jeu à découvrir absolument !

author: {'steamid': '76561198184908250', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 951, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 951, 'last_played': 1613041620}
review:
Things i like about this game (in no perticular order):
+ Pleasant artstyle and music
+ Nice, but not overly difficult puzzles, very nice difficulty curve.
+ Many well hidden collectables
+ Brilliant story, makes me cry every time.

Things i dislike about this game (in no particular order):
- Movement is slow, works well for cinematics, but makes navigating the first two areas a chore.
- Certain long and slow plattforming segments that could have been cut.

Conclusion:
I can reccomend this game if you like slow, action-free games, or artsy games.
Do try to go into this game blind as the story is easilly spoiled. (its still effective on second playthrough though, imho)

author: {'steamid': '76561198114236256', 'num_games_owned': 156, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 166, 'last_played': 1612876218}
review:
虽然画风和配音都不错，但是完全是个休闲走步模拟器，想玩解谜游戏的还是算了。
PC端移植的很垃圾，键鼠操作很难受，经常有为了截图效果而强制锁定视角的情况，尤其是那种过桥的地方，键盘怎么按都不是直线，左右来回晃。由于在窄路上的锁定视角，爬墙跳跃判定是我见过最垃圾的没有之一，甚至给十年前的刺客信条提鞋都不配。而且视角经常变换会头晕，我玩这个小游戏居然会晕3d。
为什么说是走步模拟器，这个游戏地图虽然没有很大，解谜要素却没有填满整个空间，解谜难度很低，寻路难度max，而且没有加速键，只能当个走步模拟器玩玩，大部分时间都在找路了。再说建模十分粗糙，想散步也没必要玩这个。
玩了3h，通了两章，别说全成就了，已经没有玩下去的欲望了，再玩就是自我折磨。
总结：头晕，解谜没难度，找路很麻烦而且走路慢。作为解谜游戏不及格的分数，可能会适合休闲欣赏看风景的玩家。

author: {'steamid': '76561198069728410', 'num_games_owned': 755, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 605, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 605, 'last_played': 1495927280}
review: Отличнейшая игра с невероятно-трогательной историей и изумительной музыкой. Если и кажется что загадки не сложные - то они и не должны быть сложными, все в этой игре на столько хорошо гармонирует и не отвлекает от сюжета, а точнее погружает в него очень тонко и очень красиво. Одна из самых любимых моих игр в этом жанре

author: {'steamid': '76561198813328802', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 460, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 460, 'last_played': 1612795980}
review:
太多游戏追求急速的快感、如果你深爱此类游戏，请不要尝试rime，有一种动漫类型叫茶番，适合闲暇之时调适心情，rime同样如此，轻缓舒畅的音乐配合舒适的美术风格（本人3D略晕，只能分好几次玩）永远是节假日的一杯清茶，剧情总体优秀、虽然以解密为主但难度较低、除第二篇章外也没有紧张的剧情节奏。
如果你感觉到了难度，那你可能和我一样：1，被繁华或忙碌的都市乡村生活压得喘不过来气，甚至不再仰望更为浩瀚的天空；2，奇思妙想随年龄逐渐远去。

author: {'steamid': '76561198086659962', 'num_games_owned': 602, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 949, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 949, 'last_played': 1612694099}
