author: {'steamid': '76561198046529743', 'num_games_owned': 132, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 1031, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 848, 'last_played': 1598388007}
review:
[b] Rime — это очень красивая и душевная приключенческая игра-головоломка, которую даже после прохождения 2 раза, жалко удалять. В этой игре великолепная атмосфера и музыка, далее по подробнее.
Игровой процесс будет происходить будет на 5 локациях, они же являются аллегорией на пять стадий принятия смерти: ОТРИЦАНИЕ, ГНЕВ, ТОРГ, ДЕПРЕССИЯ, ПРИНЯТИЕ.
Незнаю насколько это спойлер, но как такого сюжета там нет, но всё же спрячу (может для кого-то это будет важно), но расскажу основную завязку сюжета: [spoiler]У отца умирает сын [/spoiler]. Так вот вся локация является олицетворением, его внутренней борьбы с данной утратой[/b]
Эту игру раздавали в Epic games, но скачав её, я захотел её пройти полностью. В ГОГ были скидки, я взял, но там не работали достижения (а так как я в последнее время подсел на ачивмодрочерство), я сделал возврат, и купил уже в стиме.

[h1] Плюсы игры: [/h1]
[b] 1) Визуальный стиль и наполнение игры [/b]
Игра выполнена в мультяшном стиле. Сами же локации просто ВЕЛИКОЛЕПНЫ. Они проработаны и красивы, каждая локация по-своему. Само наполнение в этом сказочном мире разнообразно, кого только не встретишь. «ТЫ» реально как будто находишься в сказке. Мне очень трудно описать эту игру с точки зрения «визуала», это скорее нужно видеть. Мне бы хотелось прикрепить гифку сюда, но ограничение в 8мб, сжимает качество видео так, что даже цветов потом не остаётся :) 
[b] 2) Ничего лишнего [/b]
В этой игре нет ничего лишнего: Ни сюжета, ни разговоров, ни боёв. Нужно просто наслаждаться «сказкой», красотой мира, головоломками и музыкой. Игре удаётся превосходно передать историю не с помощью слов, а с помощью визуальных и звуковых элементов, делая из игры глубокое и эмоциональное путешествие, которое ещё долго будет нельзя забыть.
[b] 3) Умеренная сложность головоломок [/b]
Я люблю такие головоломки, где на решение задачи уходит 1-2 мин, т.е они не лёгкие, но и не сложные. Такие головоломки дают немного подумать, а потом в голову придёт решение. А не так, где 10 мин ходишь «туда сюда», ничего не понимаешь, бомбишь, потом идёшь на ютуб. С этим здесь всё впорядке. В целом разобравшись с механиками игры, задачи будут решаться быстро.
[b] 4) Музыкальное сопровождение [/b]
Что может добавить душевности игре ? Именно музыка, музыка важный элемент, и она всегда влияет на атмосферу в каждой игре.Только за музыку, игре можно поставить 10/10.

[h1] Минусы игры: [/h1]
Минус только один: оптимизация. Всю игру стабильный 80-120 фпс, всё хорошо. Попадаем на 3 локацию, и в игре как будто включается «вертикальная синхронизация» и фпс падает до 30, и периодически дропается и фризит. Такое происходит только на 3 локации, с чем связано не знаю.  

[h1] Итог: [/h1]
Мы получаем красивую, душевную игру с грустной историей, с прекрасной музыкой, головоломками,  где не нужно стрелять, нужно просто расслабиться и получать удовольствие от этого мира. 
Кому подойдёт данный проект ? Вряд ли эта игра подойдёт вам, если вы любитель экшена, вам постоянно хочется стрелять, убивать и т.д. Это просто хорошо сделанная сказка, скорее даже для взрослой аудитории 18+ лет, «шкила» вряд ли заценит, по крайней мере большинство. 
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2207696330
UPD: Редко играм удаётся вызвать, эмоцию "грусти", или чтобы слеза наворачивалась, этой игре удалось.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2209311713

author: {'steamid': '76561198252557046', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 447, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 447, 'last_played': 1598162674}
review:
水没した街を少女が探索する「Submerged」、少年と怪物とで非現実的な街を攻略する「papo & yo」、この両方の雰囲気を併せ持ったゲームだと思います。個人的にはこれらはシリーズだと勝手に考えてます。

いずれのゲームの特徴も、どこの言語にも依存しない世界観という点が挙げられます。主人公はほぼ喋らず、掛け声や嗚咽などのみ。ストーリー上にも文字は存在せず、パーツとして集められるイラストで何が起こったのかを推測する仕掛けになっています。人によってこれらはわかりにくいと思われるかもしれませんし、意味不明な世界観に写るかもしれません。

音楽もこれまた、魂がゆさぶられるような、でも心地よいストリングス。うっかりするとプレイ中に寝てしまいそうでした。

アクション性やパズル性はそこまで高くなく、世界観を堪能することに重きを置かれているように思います。ゆえにゲームとしては面白さを感じにくい設計かもしれません。

昨今のオープンワールドのように、明確な目的先やマークが無いため、一部どこに進んでいいいのか分かりにくいところがあります。それでも不思議と先に進めるのだから、ステージ設計がよくできているのでしょう。

ボリュームはちょっと寄り道してクリアで6時間程度。これはボリュームとしては少ないほうでしょう。

しかしそれでも、私はゲームとして好き、と言いたいです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198043414056', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 295, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 245, 'last_played': 1685934290}
review:
[h1]나쁘진 않지만 크게 추천하기 힘든 힐링게임 [/h1]
3줄 요약있음

[b]게임플레이: 초반과 극후반이 지루하다.[/b]
정보를 잘 안주는편이기에 초반에 그냥 돌아다니고 적당히 기어오르고식이라 지루하다.
힌트를 정확하게 주지 않고 몽환스럽게 시각적으로 표현해준다. 예를들어 바람길이라던가 나비라던가... 대충 보고 지나가버리거나 눈치가 없으면 찾기 힘들다. 물론 힌트도 다 주는건 아니다. 퍼즐힌트는 없는편이고 대충 길찾는 힌트들 위주다.
퍼즐의 난이도는 대부분 직관적으로 단순하지만 쉽지는 않은편. 이해를 단번에 못하면 헤맬 가능성이 있어보인다.
중반부는 이것저것 나름 다양하게 해야해서 재미는 좀 있는편
극후반은 너무 맵이 크고 렉걸려서 지루해짐.

[b]수집요소: 있으나 딱히 모을필요 없음[/b]
일반 엔딩과 약간 차이가 있는 진엔딩(?)에 영향이 있으나 크게 모을필요 없고, 다시 모으려고 회차돌기도 애매함.
딱히 수집욕구를 자극하지 못했고, 회차 돌릴정도로 게임이 크게 매력적이지도 않다.

[b]조작감: 크게 구리진 않지만 답답할 수 있음. [/b]
왠만한 구간에선 괜찮지만, 고지대에서 내려가야할때 난감함. 뛰어내렸을때 너무 높으면 위에서 다시시작되버리고, 매달릴 수 있는곳이면 그냥 안떨어지고 매달리려고 뒤돌아 앉고 매달리려고 한다. 계속 보다보면 좀 답답해짐.
그리고 느릿느릿한 다른 요소들도 덤

[b]사운드: 좋음! 근데 기억에 안남음[/b]
머릿속에 멜로디가 남는 음악은 딱히 없다. 하지만 결코 나쁜것이 아니다. 귀는 즐거웠지만 기억에 안남을뿐, 왠만한 게임들은 이런편이 더 많다.

[b]스토리: (엔딩을 보기 전까진) 이해는 가나 나사빠진듯한 찝찝한 진행[/b]
마치 세계관을 제대로 정리 안해놓고 만들거나, 설명을 제대로 안해주는 판타지 게임을 하는 느낌이 내내 든다. 뭔가 빠진듯한 이해로 진행을 하게 된다. 하지만 엔딩을 보고나면 약간의 스턴을 먹지만 이해가 가는편

[b]그래픽: 예쁜 거렁뱅이[/b]
확실히 그래픽은 예쁘다. 하지만 예쁜거에 신경을 너무 많이 썼는지 최적화가 정말 끔찍하다. 옵션을 낮추면 되겠지만, 다른 게임 돌릴때의 옵션보다 낮은 옵션으로 돌려야 쾌적하다고 생각하면 된다.






[h1]3줄요약[/h1]
1. 할만한데 이것저것 나사빠짐
2. 게임플레이 초반이랑 극후반 지루함
3. 그래픽 예쁜데 렉걸림

0. 세일하면 사라



잘 만든게임은 맞으나 여러모로 아쉬운점이 너무나도 큰 게임.
크게 세일하면 사서 한번쯤 해보는것도 좋지만, 크게는 추천 못하겠는 작품


4시간만에 엔딩보고 더이상 잡을생각이 없음.

추천할지 말지 고민했는데, 정가 3.2만원이라 걍 비추줌.



수정)
좀 시간지나고 생각해보니 좋은게임은 맞았던것 같음. 그러니까 여운남고 아쉽고 했겠지

비추에서 추천으로 바꿈

그래도 세일때 사야 좋겠다는 생각은 여전함

author: {'steamid': '76561197970952979', 'num_games_owned': 2552, 'num_reviews': 144, 'playtime_forever': 508, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 380, 'last_played': 1597711284}
review:
Absolutely beautiful from start to finish. Feels like a gentle version of Shadows of the Colossus, though without any Colossi. Make of that what you will.  It's the setting, the atmosphere, and the feeling that you're playing with ancient machinations you maybe shouldn't be.

This is one of those rare adventures that just is. You're told nothing, you just dive into the world you find yourself in and learn as you go, the scenery is gorgeous, vast and actively fascinating.  The story is silent, not a coherent word is ever said or written, and yet it really knows how to tug on a few chords in your heart before you know it.

There are some stunning set pieces and some superb animations that really carry a message stronger than words could.

There're no punishing elements to this game, any deaths I experienced (and a single glitch that stuck me in a wall and I had to restart), put me right back where I left off. There can feel like pressure and weight to your actions but failure is gently corrected.

The music is subtle but very mood-influencing!

It's a good modest length, I clocked 7 hours while barely scratching the achievements list


Biggest downside is it REALLY doesn't play well with my monitors and OBS, it took a long time of turning options on and off at random before it could settle. The option to select which monitor it's using is very confused - I had to select different monitors back and forth before it would eventually land on the one I wanted, even though the menus and resolution reported weren't even close!  I recommend turning down Shadow Detail as this seems to wreck performance and it looks great still

author: {'steamid': '76561198098394628', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 381, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 381, 'last_played': 1559728230}
review:
Kolay bulmacaları olan, güzel manzaralar ve derin hikaye içeren bir oyun. Başta sıkıcı gelebiliyor ve bazı ufak noktaları göremeyince insan pes etme noktasına geliyor ancak kesinlikle oyunun sonunu görmeye değer.
Oyun bittikten sonra kazandığınız başarımlara bakarak oyunun cidden anlamlı bir hikayesi olduğunu anlayacaksınız. Hikayeyi 100% anladığımı söyleyemeyeceğim, araştırdım ancak yine de ortam ve karakterlerin bağlantısı tam oturmuyor. Anlayan olursa ekleyip anlatsın ancak anlaşıldığı kadarıyla bile güzel bir oyun :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198066475718', 'num_games_owned': 235, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 364, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 364, 'last_played': 1587386999}
review:
Excellent jeu et magnifique ! Ce jeu est d'une beauté sans nom, que ça soit des graphisme en générale, que des environnements ou même de l'histoire. 
Le jeu est très émouvant par moment à nous faire arriver aux larmes avec un attachement aux personnages en si peu d'heures de gameplay. Les retournements de situations et les choix que nous force à prendre le jeu par moments sont très difficiles mais ils sont fait avec une telle maîtrise  que je ne peux que recommandé très fortement le jeu.

Surtout ne vous attarder pas sur ses 10 heures de jeux maximum, elles sont très bien rentabilisée et en valent parfaitement la peine !

author: {'steamid': '76561198324644463', 'num_games_owned': 83, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 550, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 550, 'last_played': 1596884622}
review:
已通关，没有全成就。

[b]配乐、画风等艺术方面：5星[/b]
这真的没得说，就是我的电脑带不太起来，要不能把画质开高点极致享受；不止是游戏中的画面，就连壁画都很好看也很有寓意，还有凑近发光的细节。

[b]关卡地图设计：4星[/b]
通关挺简单的，提示还挺明显的，但是要想顺带尽可能绕路拿成就，还是很有难度的，会有点迷路；每关的场景用心体会都能发现蕴含的情感和与剧情联系的地方。

[b]剧情：4星[/b]
童话般的开场，意想不到的结局，有一点高开低走，但也十分感人。

[b]细节彩蛋设计：5星[/b]
不操作人物时的小动作；在不同的场景下，点击左键，小男孩有时候是哼歌，有时候是害怕、哭泣等等反应，真的很绝；没记错的话我在第一关还踩碎了几个鸟蛋……
甚至通关之后回头去看每个关卡的名称，都和真剧情对应得上。

然而最打动我的不是以上任何一点，而是菜单。
按enter选中被称为 accept 。
剧情的关键词，一开始就一直出现着。
太绝了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198372999525', 'num_games_owned': 131, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 396, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 396, 'last_played': 1596870136}
review:
游戏细节满分，剧情也很不错，玩法简洁也不影响体验，一个好游戏
游戏难度较低，动作设计和流畅度都不错，全篇游戏没有文字，游戏进程的指引也很直观，不会出现让人因迷路而卡关之类的问题。要素不少，在流程中也没有感觉到重复性很高，当然整个流程也不太长。
至于问题其实也有一些，动作的反馈做得不太好，我用键盘有时要点好几下才有反馈，导致游戏的操作流畅不好，有一些关卡会受到影响，但感觉游戏也为此减轻了难度，去掉了一些精细的操作，所以也还好。
然后就是视角了，作为一个3D游戏，在前面几个关卡很多狭小房间中转换视角都会穿模，还有与上帝视角的切换，对于键鼠操作适配得不好，总是以一种很微妙的方向行动，很影响游戏体验，导致我在游戏初期一度弃坑，但第二章以后建筑物变得开阔，这种情况就不会出现了。
总的来说瑕不掩瑜，还是个非常好的游戏，我最后还是要吹一下这个游戏的细节，非常惊艳。

author: {'steamid': '76561198215197979', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 497, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 451, 'last_played': 1596835996}

author: {'steamid': '76561197986496984', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 198, 'playtime_forever': 920, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 920, 'last_played': 1596314245}
review:
[i]„Tajuplný ostrov.“[/i]

Je po bouři, probouzí se v potrhaných šatech na písečné pláži, malý trosečník na neznámém ostrově. Moře je klidné, jemný vánek ho hladí po tváři, jako kdyby se nic zlého nikdy nestalo. Vzduchem se ozývá radostný křik racků, po travnatých stráních pobíhají malá prasátka, mezi stromy se mihne ryšavá oháňka... A přeci je na zdejším poklidu cosi zneklidňujícího. Mohutné stavby z bílého kamene se majestátně tyčí k obloze, ale všechny jen zejí prázdnotou a tiše chátrají. Cožpak na tomhle místě již nikdo nežije? Vydává se tak směrem k nejvyšší věži, aby odhalil její skrytá tajemství...

Tuto hru, vytvořilo španělské studio Tequila Works, stojící také za tituly jako [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/211400/Deadlight/]Deadlight[/url] nebo [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/582560/The_Invisible_Hours/]The Invisible Hours[/url]. V roli malého chlapce, vás čeká dobrodružný průzkum opuštěného ostrova, při kterém budete řešit různé prostorové hádanky. Ty jsou skvěle navržené, takže pokaždé vyžadují krátké zamyšlení, ale nikdy nepřinášejí pocit bezradnosti či frustrace. Zábavný je i samotný průchod každou lokací, spočívající v překonávání různorodých překážek, zejména pomocí šplhu a skákání. Ale dojde i na potápění. Pamětníci staré [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/224960/Tomb_Raider_I/]Lary Croft[/url], tak budou přeneseni zpět do radostného mládí.

Vynikající je také melancholická atmosféra celé hry, šikovně pracující s motivem ztráty a osamocení. Ta je navíc umocněna nádherným hudebním doprovodem, stejně jako často využívanou symbolikou. Zamrzí snad jen nevyužitý potenciál, dřímající ve vašem liščím společníkovi, který zde plní pouze funkci roztomilé nápovědy. Pochvalu si naopak zaslouží promyšlená stavba úrovní, nabízející mnoho skrytých odboček a tajných zákoutí, lákajících ke zvídavému průzkumu. Za zmínku stojí také okouzlující střídaní dne a noci, při kterém se místy až tají dech.

Pokud si tedy chcete zahrát krásnou hru, stojící především na průzkumu a prostorových hádankách, pak máte mé doporučení.

[i][url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/6861342-Bionick/]Další recenze na mé kurátorské stránce[/url][/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198284448701', 'num_games_owned': 65, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 401, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 401, 'last_played': 1596203328}

author: {'steamid': '76561198020928212', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 413, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 413, 'last_played': 1596232263}
review:
Visuals - For the most part, this game does a great job of setting these grand backdrops without melting your GPU. I feel like the developer hit the perfect balance of keeping things visually appealing without compromising on performance. You're not going to be wowed by super complex textures or water physics, but game stays beautiful from beginning to end and runs great. What really stood out was how the gameplay elements (climable ledges, interactive objects, etc) fit in seamlessly with the surrounds; enough to make it seem like everything was supposed to be there but not so much that you weren't sitting around scratching your head wondering what to do or where to go

Story (NO SPOILERS) - I've seen a lot of developers try and capture the emotional tones of games like Journey and Abzu and completely wiff. Thankfully, TW knocked this one out of the park. Telling a story without dialogue or written words isn't new, but it's tricky. The overall theme only becomes apparent to the AFTER you beat the game but what blew me away was how well each section of the game complemented each other. There's optional collectibles that flesh out the narrative a bit as well. I missed most of them on my first playthrough but the game's length (~7 hours) and post-completion chapter select mean I'll probably try once or twice to find more.

Gameplay - The puzzles in RiME aren't difficult, but I don't think they're meant to be. The puzzles are there to give context to the narrative, and while they're not challenging they are pretty clever and satisfying to solve. There's some mild platforming in the form of some Nathan Drake esque ledge climbing but again, it's there to enhance the feeling of exploration. Overall movement and climbing was satisfying and it reminded me somewhat of a more responsive version of a Team Ico game (Shadow of the Colossus). I did appreciate how nice the camera movement felt. I can't count how many times I've played a game that tried to be "cinematic" and just resulted in me wrestling for control of the camera 90% of the time.

Overall 8.5/10 would recommend

author: {'steamid': '76561198035033104', 'num_games_owned': 481, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 352, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 352, 'last_played': 1596130789}

author: {'steamid': '76561198185977079', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 683, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 683, 'last_played': 1595899435}
review:
I really enjoyed this game! I see some reviews online where people are judging the game against what they want it to be and it leaves them disappointed. The real question is, what is RiME TRYING to be, and does it accomplish what it sets out to do? To me, the answer is a resounding "yes" to that final question.

Graphically it is gorgeous. I have a mid-range PC and it ran silky smooth on high settings. I believe the performance issues they were having earlier on have been ironed out. I really love the art style in this game. The music/score is also top notch... really beautiful stuff that fits the game nicely. I also really liked the story. I've seen some complaints about the story not being explained or complex... but that's the point. The game is a journey of discovery where you have to piece it together. And when you finally do figure out what is going on, yes, it is a "simple" story, but it is powerful. A game doesn't need a dozen characters or voice acting to tell an effective story.

As for the puzzles, yes, they are not especially challenging, but they aren't trying to be. I enjoyed working my way through them and exploring the beautiful environments. I recently finished The Witness and it was one of my favorites, so I am not opposed to some good puzzling, but RiME is not trying to be a hard puzzle game. I did find some of the platforming a bit repetitive and the controls were not perfect, but they were more than sufficient.

So take RiME for what it is, a beautiful journey of discovery with some fun but not overly difficult challenges along the way. For an indy game, I think it is a triumph.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003943149', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 352, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 131, 'last_played': 1595669243}
review:
I loved this game in the first one hour. Stunning, mysterious, lets you explore a big world with the wind in your face. It felt great.

Then I continued playing and realised the "puzzles" are still as simple as they were in the beginning, the exploration is actually just a linear path which you are not rewarded for, and the big world isn't really utilised except for some nice views.

It stopped being compelling and became a chore to just walk down these silly pointless caverns and staircases while shouting at the lights for no reason. One of the biggest shifts in game enjoyments I've had. I certainly don't recommend it.

And the full price tag is obnoxious. Only try this on a steep sale, and don't base it off the first 20 minutes.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961142450', 'num_games_owned': 1736, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 627, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 513, 'last_played': 1595383130}
review:
This game is a gem.  It's perfect for both experienced and novice gamers alike.  For the experienced, it is a beautiful and relatively stress free action-platformer with plenty of environmental puzzles in the vein of Zelda and Assassin's Creed.  For the novices, it is a great way to understand modern game mechanics in an environment that doesn't punish failure.  

I played this game with my fiancee who up until a year ago had never really played a video game.  With a bit of ongoing assistance she was able to truly begin to feel comfortable with a controller in her hand.  The ability to manipulate a character and camera in 3D space with an unfamiliar control scheme is a lot for newbies.  This game does an excellent job of holding their hand, while also still making the gamer feel smart.

I fully recommend this game for couples looking for a game they can play together.  I also recommend it to anybody that wants to enjoy a laid back 8 hour experience that will leave them feeling positive.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020789907', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 139, 'playtime_forever': 969, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 969, 'last_played': 1594788023}
review:
RiME is a good game that can be interpreted in many different ways depending on how you gather information from the world in the game. There are puzzles and platforming to do for the most part of the game but those are clearly not the focus of the game, they are well-made but not incredible. The best part about RiME is about how you put together a story easily if you can perceive what's happening to the character and the world that you traverse. 

I think that the fun at least for me was trying to understand the big picture and if you are not in it for that it might leave you disappointed. The quality of the game is overall good I didn't get stuck and finding out where to go next was easy. It's not a game that is so abstract that it basically feels like there isn't a story but more about giving you signs and leaving the interpretation up to you. The ending of the game is pretty gut wrenching and while my interpretation of the story was totally different at first once you understand what was going on during the whole game it hits pretty hard. 

I think it's a game worth playing if what I described is something you'd enjoy, the price tag is in the higher end of the spectrum for a game in this category I won't discuss it, it's kind of the point of reading reviews anyways right?

author: {'steamid': '76561198153794483', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 579, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 579, 'last_played': 1595255286}
review:
一周目通关
· 艺术品
· 画风的童话感真的很棒
· 音乐超美，个人开始注意到这部就是因为我女神Lindsey拉了ED的Forgotten City from RiME
· 初玩不知道为啥狂晕3D，半个小时直接干翻，后面适应了居然还可以
· 操作上基本没有什么为难人的地方，但对路痴真不怎么友好（尤其森林那一关
· 关于剧情，我个人的理解是[spoiler]死后世界，从不知道发生了什么到接受自己已经死亡的旅程（伪装成小王子历险记真的很过分呜呜呜结局反转我心头一哽）。[/spoiler]
· 感觉特别震撼的两个点：①[spoiler]第一关在塔上转动金球可以控制日升月落；[/spoiler]②[spoiler]结尾处小王子跃向塔底的无垠星空；[/spoiler]
· 感觉很有意思的几个点：①[spoiler]狐狸、卫士等等的原形都是房间里的玩具或饰品；[/spoiler]②[spoiler]收集海螺可以吹摇篮曲；[/spoiler]③[spoiler]新造好的卫士一开始不怎么会走路；[/spoiler]

review: Ho comprato questo gioco in sconto a pochi euro, e una volta finito mi sono sentito in colpa per non averlo pagato di più. Se vi piacciono i puzzle/platform di esplorazione con tantissimi collezionabili, compratelo a occhi chiusi. Se vi piacciono le storie toccanti e le atmosfere evocative, idem. Menzione d'onore per la grafica, disegni e colori sono fantastici, e alcuni personaggi sembrano usciti da un film di Miyazaki. L'ultimo livello con la pioggia è a dir poco affascinante.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001211770', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 1220, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1220, 'last_played': 1595237690}

author: {'steamid': '76561198024663779', 'num_games_owned': 403, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 324, 'last_played': 1595194894}
review:
Rime is a great adventure game with platforming and puzzles.  You're  a boy who finds himself washed up on the shore of a beach. You make your way inland and find a fox along the way. The fox guides you where to go as you work your way throughout the game. The game is around six hours long if you don't search every nook and cranny for collectibles. The platforming and puzzles are pretty easy so just about anybody can complete the game, but they're still challenging enough to keep you engaged throughout the game. 

The art, the music, and atmosphere that they create goes perfectly with the story the developers are trying to tell. The way this game is presented made it easy to be immersed in it. Some people may not be impressed with the art style of this game but I think it will age well as time goes on. The game is quite cinematic and every scene is directed well.Rime is about dealing with loss in life and the music is used to highlight that. 

I would recommend this game to anybody looking for a game that doesn't require a lot of time or effort to get through. Gameplay is simple enough to keep you from getting stuck and engaging enough to keep you interested.  I found it a bit relaxing and a very enjoyable experience. 

Overall:9/10

Presentation: 10/10
Visuals: 8/10
Music: 10/10
Gameplay:8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198394654387', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 334, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 321, 'last_played': 1595162260}
review:
할인행사 하는날 엉겁결에 하나 구매했습니다. 기본적으로 가이드라인 제시가 없어서 게임플레이 하면서 조금 답답하거나 화가날 수도 있습니다... 하지만 주변을 머리속을 비우고 잘 생각하면 퍼즐의 실마리가 잡힙니다.. 꼭 잡힙니다.. 

중반까지는 스토리에 대한 내용이 왜 이런전개인지 전혀 알지 못하지만, 후반으로 갈 수록 주인공이 처한 일들에 대한 이야기가
점차.. 드러나게됩니다. 

Azue 같이 스토리 거진 없는 게임보다는 스토리가 좀 있고, 나름 즐길만 했습니다.

총 플레이는 대략 7~8시간 정도면 평범하게 클리어가능 할 것 같습니다.

수집하는 특수 수집물품들에 대한 것은 너무너무 찾기가 어렵네요..

이정도면 하루 보낼만 하다에 추천하나 줍니다

author: {'steamid': '76561197991315919', 'num_games_owned': 1913, 'num_reviews': 117, 'playtime_forever': 438, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 438, 'last_played': 1595006091}
review:
Rime is a game where you are going to face a lot of beauties and a lot of clever story tellings and a lot of emotions.
This game is like Papo Yo a rather short story puzzle game.
Telling a story through the form of a world with many puzzles that when solved allow for the progress that gives you a bit more of the story.
Again like Papo Yo the story is told visually and not through words and with that you have a lot of different symbolism in place and the whole story does not unfold until the very end showing what was really happening.
The game is beautiful to look at, the style is pleasing, the sounds and music evoke all kinds of emotions and the story heart rending.
Give it a try if you can, I probably would not have picked it up if I knew what the game's story is about but I am glad that I went in blind.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003306082', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 588, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 309, 'last_played': 1595050057}
review:
I have mixed feelings about this game.

The first two of four (the fifth level is a glorified cutscene) levels are amazing.  Beautiful, platforming, puzzles, lots of secrecy and mystery through exploration.  The third level is the "Water Temple" x 3.  It's confusing, and it doesn't know what it wants to be throughout the entire level.  Is it a maze?  Oh, the maze part is done.  Is it an avoid the evil creatures?  Oh, the evil creatures part is done.  Is it lead the drone through the ancient puzzle areas?  Yes.

The final level lacks any of the beauty of the other levels.  it rains the entire time and the level is all stone black.

The game also has a story.  It's not necessary at all, and for me it's what makes the game mixed for me.  If they threw the story out the window and gave me the same first two levels but five different times, then the story just wouldn't matter.  But they have a story and thus fit mechanics into said story:

[spoiler] You play a son who died during a storm at sea who is searching for his father.  Each of the five levels emulate the five stages of grief.  So while the first two levels emulate denial and aggression, which fit really well into the game, the third and fourth levels emulate bargaining and depression.  I guess I felt those during the levels?  But it was so poorly done at the third and fourth levels that the end did not pay off.  The fifth level is "Acceptance", which means you simply press W a few times to walk through a hall and let a scarf go.[/spoiler]

Overall, I spent about 5 hours in the first two levels, having fun.  The third level I spent 3 hours in, confused out of my damn mind, and the fourth and fifth level speeding through clocking a whole 1 hour about.

No payoff and I steel fill a bit empty.

Still, I'd recommend buying it.  It was fun while it lasted and makes me long for games like the Legend of Zelda and such.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004566061', 'num_games_owned': 1371, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 993, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 740, 'last_played': 1594786371}
review: Like Limbo, Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons, or Journey, Rime is a peak in visual storytelling. The locations are beautiful and full of detail, with each chapter being very visually distinct. There were a lot of interesting puzzle mechanics introduced over the course of the game; the puzzles themsevles were on the easier side but served the pacing of the story well. As a fan of the genre, I really enjoyed the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198324913971', 'num_games_owned': 123, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 442, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 442, 'last_played': 1594552126}
review:
[h1]买了不亏，玩完血赚[/h1]
如果你是对画风好、解谜、剧情向、好评原声的独立游戏感兴趣的玩家，[h1]买它就完了[/h1]

画风：“随便截一张图就是壁纸”系列，酷似塞尔达一样清新、纯净、明亮、鲜艳的画风，美得像童话一样的海岛、森林遗迹、沙漠城镇等等，逛街玩家一本满足

解谜：对玩家的引导到位，谜题整体较为简单，运用声音、视觉错位等元素的解谜过程有趣，但整篇玩下来略显单一

剧情：倒叙一样的剧情展开，在小男孩的奇异冒险中穿插闪回的记忆片段，一步步揭开故事的真相，反转结局非常令人震撼




以下内容属于个人感想，涉及严重剧透：
[spoiler] 通篇游戏时长大约在10小时以内，游戏封面中的灯塔以及酷似钥匙孔的形状贯穿了整个故事各章节，不仅作为故事线的线索，对最终结局也起到了相当大的铺垫作用。在游玩过程中玩家的目标就是在探索灯塔通往的各个世界中解谜或者按照壁画的“预言”行动从而推动剧情发展，在这个过程中找回自己的记忆、结识了很多伙伴，比如第一章就一直指引着你前进方向的小狐狸和后面登场的“卫士”等等。从开始小男孩被海水冲上海岸，到屡次出现在探索过程中的被暴风摧毁的小船，游戏途中收集的玩具形象，这些暗示使得最后的剧情是出乎意料的，但也是情理之中的，从第一章小男孩遇到的红衣神秘人，冥冥之中隐藏着真相的灯塔（禁闭岛既视感），中间的沙漠章节大鸟的袭击以及壁画的预言让很多玩家以为小男孩是一个王子而其他的亡灵应该是待拯救的臣民这样的童话故事，而随着记忆的逐步解锁，男孩身上的红色披风与红衣男有着千丝万缕的联系，而亡者国度中，小男孩的朋友们为了他能找到真相，相继牺牲自己换来男孩前进的道路，这里点名表扬亡者国度的雨夜气氛烘托，以及男孩变得和亡灵一样全身黑，这个时候剧情已然逼近高潮，跟禁闭岛里男主端着枪准备冲进神秘的灯塔一样，真的就捏了一把汗心都提到嗓子眼那种。后面所有的亡灵都向深渊里跳去，这里的深渊正是反转的灯塔，从灯塔底部向无限的星空跳去[/spoiler]
[spoiler]有说“死去的人会变成星星”，众多亡灵像解放一般纷纷跳入，男孩最终跳入，这时玩家已经隐约感到男孩一路上遇到亡灵的原因，正如从亡者的国度的灯塔中跳下去进入轮回，这一段剧情的高潮，从BGM的烘托，雨夜的气氛，凝视的深渊，而他人都像解脱一样跳进去的那种震撼场景，令人印象深刻。[/spoiler]
[spoiler]最终回到真正的现实世界，海边、海鸥叫、风声、夕阳透过木窗，这里仍像童话一样美，但真相却沉重得让人喘不过气，这位生活在海边灯塔旁小屋的老父亲，在与历尽千辛万苦回到人间的男孩短暂相拥后，面对夕阳，这位老人，选择了让这片红色的披风随风而去，正如最后的成就“Letting go” [/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198027805196', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 282, 'last_played': 1594514044}
review:
This, more than any other game I have played, is an overwhelming testament to the fact that any game in any genre can and will be made to be about sad dads. I'm sick of games about sad dads. 

Pretty, atmospheric, overwrought, and its pitifully short length inflated by slow movement and somehow aimless railroading. Whatever type of game you're after, this almost certainly isn't it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008056283', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 541, 'last_played': 1594502219}

author: {'steamid': '76561198218537591', 'num_games_owned': 76, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1568, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1077, 'last_played': 1594535516}
review:
何度か分かりやすいポリゴン嵌り?バグに引っかかって、「最後のチェックポイントからやり直す」で回避してきましたが、とうとう進行不能バグに陥ってしまいました。　セーブが自動セーブしかないので手前からやり直すことも出来ず、既に6時間程プレイしているモノを最初からやり直す気力もありません……。
　そもそも、メインルートから外れたところに収集要素があるのに、任意のセーブ機能がないのはどうなのか……ポイントで良いから何ヶ所かセーブしたかったですね。
　移動と共に勝手に動く視点も、逆にプレイアビリティを下げてますし、丁寧に作られているのが分かるだけに色々惜しい作品です。
　ゲームを楽しませようとするより、パズルを解かせようとする意識が強過ぎるんですね。

author: {'steamid': '76561197973852799', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 158, 'last_played': 1594464316}
review: A beautiful, uplifting game, right up to the tower part in pitch black. Not enough visual or auditory clues. Losing rack of the objective, running around and randomly dying, killed all my motivation.  Had to walk away. Shame, loved it up to that point.

author: {'steamid': '76561198360760635', 'num_games_owned': 143, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 651, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 228, 'last_played': 1596858682}
review:
通关了，我的评价还是没有变，不推荐。
画面和音乐可以打90分。动画做的也很好。
但是谜题简直有毒，提示少方向不明确，一卡关就心情暴躁，解谜类型也少，有点无聊。
从游戏长度和画面来说，游戏做的很良心了，打折入很实惠，但是一个游戏的核心玩法不吸引人，真的没办法推荐它。

author: {'steamid': '76561198079456686', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 764, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 764, 'last_played': 1594419668}

author: {'steamid': '76561198063817153', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 133, 'last_played': 1594397344}
review:
RiME es una obra bellísima, muy bien orquestada y original, a pesar de que hay otros juegos en los que se inspira. El punto fuerte de RiME es su sentimentalismo (envuelto en el misterio de su historia), sin olvidar sus gráficos preciosistas y su tremenda banda sonora.

Los puzles no son complicados, pues el juego no pretende ser un gran desafío ni atascar a los jugadores demasiado tiempo, sino que está pensado para que el que lo juegue vaya disfrutando sin frustraciones, con un ritmo dinámico y enlazando poco a poco pedacitos de la historia en los elementos que va encontrando en el mapa o las secuencias de vídeo (los extras no son imprescindibles para pasar el juego, sin embargo aportan información importante para entender la historia). En resumen se trata de un juego corto (unas 10 horas si no nos detenemos mucho a explorar todo o hasta 30 o mas si queremos completar todo). La Historia es el gran misterio que hay que desvelar. El único "pero" es el de sus problemas de rendimiento (FPS o caída de frames/cuadros), solucionado ya casi por completo con parches. Sin embargo, si has jugado juegos antiguos con muchos elementos en pantalla, las ralentizaciones entonces (Nes 8 bits, etc) eran mucho peores y no nos privaban de jugar magníficos juegos. En mi experiencia personal no me afectaba ya que ocurría de vez en cuando, y con menos frecuencia a partir del segundo capitulo (lo he jugado completo en Nintendo Switch antes del parche que lo mejora muchísimo). Es un diminuto gran juego, que pasará a ser una obra maestra con el paso del tiempo, aunque para mí ya lo es. INOLVIDABLE. Lo estoy jugando de nuevo en PC ahora que lo acabo de comprar en edición física (DvD). Editado: "Hace bien poco que lo volvi a terminar en su version de Xbox One, la mejor de todas, graficos al maximo y suavidad en fps, inolvidable, jugado en una Series S".

author: {'steamid': '76561198841154287', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 584, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 584, 'last_played': 1594346078}

author: {'steamid': '76561198376618844', 'num_games_owned': 60, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 313, 'last_played': 1594299709}
review: On the lines of games like Journey or ABZU, this is a very sweet title, with a strong atmosphere and gameplay. I encountered a couple of bugs, but nothing that a "Load from last checkpoint" couldn't fix. The story is not obvious, but collecting secrets helps understanding it, and it's a pretty strong one. Love the musical score, absolutely amazing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198358805829', 'num_games_owned': 39, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2269, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1488, 'last_played': 1627942528}
review:
RiME é um jogo simplesmente incrível!
Você acorda perdido em uma ilha mágica onde precisa explorar os cenários e resolver alguns puzzles ao longo da história para entender seus mistérios.
Trilha sonora fantástica o que torna a experiência de jogo muito tranquila e relaxante, sem falar na qualidade gráfica que também é excelente.
A cada capítulo concluído é revelado um flashback sobre o que aconteceu, o que desperta cada vez mais vontade de jogar para descobrir o seu desfecho.
RiME tem um final sensacional, que para mim, foi inesperado e muito emocionante!
Vale muito a pena, tenho certeza que não irá arrepender-se!
Recomendo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198003407797', 'num_games_owned': 348, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 490, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 490, 'last_played': 1594144234}
review: I wish we had more games like this. Something with actual meaning, not just mindless violence. This game was such an enjoyable journey to take and the ending is among the best I have seen. The standouts for me were the art direction and the music, but everything else about this is great too. Sale or no sale, get this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048487578', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 100, 'playtime_forever': 1008, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1008, 'last_played': 1510385816}

author: {'steamid': '76561198797143205', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1429, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1416, 'last_played': 1594792194}
review:
To be honest, This game can get very boring. However if you love puzzles , I'd highly  recommend  purchasing it.  The visuals are excellent and the overall story is great. I also LOVED the  design of the protagonist.  Something seems lacking though.  You interact with the world using your voice and carrying things. When that's not the case, you're just climbing. Given the ultimate twist to the entire game, I feel like it could have been a lot more adventurous. The overall themes have  various interpretations that  would have allowed  for many potential enemies and allies. While what we got was ok, I feel  it was a little uninspired.  I started to want to do more than jump from ledge to ledge and scream "Hah!"  Or carry glowing orbs around.  If you need  a little guidance even in a sandbox setting, you're fresh out of luck.   It's entirely possible to a puzzle wrong and have to start a stage over to remedy that. You're going to have to find  a good online guide.  The closest thing this game has to that is a little fox that barks at you and even so, you'll need to solve a puzzle to get him.  I purchased this game while it was on sale. I recommend doing that.

It isn;t worth thirty dollars. A game worth that amount  would have not only created a beautiful world but   would also have given me an adventure to have in it. I feel cheated. Like I got to travel to paradise  but was trapped in a linear bubble with aggravating puzzles.  I also don't know enough about the characters to feel  much of anything for them. I understand that being abstract is necessary for the reveal but  some character details would have helped tremendously.

author: {'steamid': '76561198180958430', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 269, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 269, 'last_played': 1594083599}
review: es una hermosura de juego altamente recomendado y con ese final ufffff, de verdad comprenlo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009743689', 'num_games_owned': 487, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 288, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 288, 'last_played': 1594003372}
review:
I followed the advice of the first review I saw that said to not read anything about this game before I played it, I knew absolutely nothing about it except that it was similar to other puzzle platformers I enjoyed. I regret nothing. 

Don't watch any gameplay, don't look at the community hub, don't even let the trailer play. This game is most beautiful when you can discover it piece by piece on your own. The only advice I will give is that while I normally ignore object collection side quests, this game makes it worth going out of your way for. Try and explore as much as you can.

I hope you enjoy the journey as much as I did.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119801692', 'num_games_owned': 232, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 335, 'last_played': 1593995866}

author: {'steamid': '76561198027990230', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 440, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 440, 'last_played': 1593899578}
review:
Amazing art direction, music and atmosphere. The gameplay is pure plataforming with mostly easy and some harder puzzles here and there, but that's not this game's focus. There is a really story told visually throughout the game and you may experience some strong feels towards the end.

It's a short game, lasting somewhere between 7-10h, depending if you are just following the story or going after the extras and achievments (and the extras do add some nice lore to the story). It's usualy a little too expensive for the length of the game, but it's a great purchase in summer/winter sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074509572', 'num_games_owned': 1240, 'num_reviews': 154, 'playtime_forever': 255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 255, 'last_played': 1593855264}
review: 单调乏味的解密加上糟糕的操控，某些时候固定机位的视角操作就是恶心人。良好的音乐和美术并不能掩盖游戏内容的单薄。剧情最后的反转并不能给人有任何共鸣和深思。如果主角能走快点你甚至可以两小时内通关退款。

author: {'steamid': '76561198956057538', 'num_games_owned': 62, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 766, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 504, 'last_played': 1613722650}
review:
这是一段关于小男孩的奇幻冒险历程，亦是一段父子相寻的感人故事，极致简单的玩法，极致温暖动人的音乐，极致唯美的画面，伴随着剧情的推动，我的心亦被紧紧的牵动，纵然艰难险阻，我亦一往无前。
游戏缺点：游戏前后历时8小时通关，整体游戏体验十分游戏，但客官来讲，仍存在几分不足：
①. 人物移动略显僵硬迟缓，无法疾跑，个人感觉是可以接受，对于习惯了快节奏突突突的玩家来说，可能会有点不太习惯，只能说见仁见智，对影响不大；
②. 游戏中的互动键经常反馈迟缓，或者跟物体进行互动的时候，对角色位置 方向要求太严苛，体验略差；
③. 人物跳跃时，由于视角问题，后跳和斜跳时，方向按键和跳跃方向偶尔不匹配，导致跳跃偶尔失败；
④. 游戏最高画质下，跳帧卡顿明显，优化差强人意。
最后总结一句，除去上述几点瑕疵，游戏整体非常优秀，满分10分的话，我愿给9分。假如有一天，RIME翻拍成电影的话，我一定第一个买票，去电影院声援，RIME NB，RIME，永远的神~

author: {'steamid': '76561198042256617', 'num_games_owned': 689, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 322, 'last_played': 1593813368}
review: It's fine. The music is great and the environments look good. The puzzles, platforming, and minor exploration elements are inoffensive but forgettable. A lot of reviewers have praised the story but I found it shallow and predictable. Pick up the OST instead.

review: Şiddetle tavsiye ettiğim bir oyun. Rime platform bulmaca türünde bir oyun. Oyunu Epic Games deneyim ettim,  ama daha önce adını bile duymadığım bir oyun. Steam tekrar bitirmeye karar verdim,  hemde firmaya çok küçükte olsa bir katkımız olsun. 10 tl'den çok daha fazlasını hak eden bir yapım.

review:
Rime is a beautiful game.

It took me seven hours to beat Rime. This is mostly a game of interesting but not very difficult puzzles - there are a few action sequences, and some secrets you can find, but the main thing is the experience, not the challenge. If that sounds like something you'll enjoy you should play Rime.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004976067', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 489, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 20, 'playtime_at_review': 469, 'last_played': 1711822985}
review:
It pains me to give this game a negative review.  It is, after all, a gorgeous game, and I must admit, I was captivated by it almost the entire way through.  But there are two things I really didn't like about this game.

The first was that most of the puzzles weren't interesting, once you are introduced to their mechanics.  Basically, the game will introduce a puzzle mechanic, and the first puzzle might be somewhat confusing, but after that, almost all puzzles are straightforward variations of it.  Some aren't even puzzles so much as busy work, especially climbing sequences.

I could excuse this defect because the game has really gorgeous aesthetics to it, and the protagonists, despite the lack of words, have endearing qualities to them.

The thing that really annoyed me about this game is the following.  About 3/4ths of the way through the game, I mentioned to my wife, "I really hope that [hackneyed plot twist] isn't true."

And waddya know?  It turned out to be true!

And that was so disappointing, not just because it has been done to death, but because it does not serve to tie any of the other game's elements together.  Frankly, the game would have done better to leave you in the dark to form your own hypotheses.  Instead, it clumsily attempts to hit you over the head with its "big reveal," but misses by a mile.

What follows is my opinion, which slightly gives this away, and so I will shroud most of it in a spoiler:

I think this game suffers from what a lot of media suffers from these days: the need to be deep by over-explaining things.  Professor X can't just have gone bald, because Male-Pattern Baldness is a thing.  He has to have lost his boyish mop of hair after being strapped into a machine of death.  Han Solo can't just be named Han Solo, because it's just a name.  No, he has to acquire it, because he "goes it, alone." (and, for some reason, people in a galaxy far, far, away are aware of Spanish).  In this case, [spoiler]you can't just have a child truly journey through a mysterious island with ancient technology, and unconventional topology.  No, it has to turn out to be "like a deep metaphor for loss, and grief, man."  Give me a break.  If you're going to do that, at least do it well.  Have the Fox, the scary bird thing, and the ancient walking robots be symbolic of this.[/spoiler]  Instead, we get what amounts to a hairy dog story in video game form, and that really does the rest of the  game a disservice.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965768605', 'num_games_owned': 172, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 318, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 318, 'last_played': 1593566269}

author: {'steamid': '76561198013146396', 'num_games_owned': 1655, 'num_reviews': 2129, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1622838944}
review:
Не рекомендую.

Всё здесь вторично и неоригинально. За 20 минут игры встретил визуальный стиль и загадки с привкусом "The Witness", и всё это - при самом обычном платформинге. Причём не особо интересном.

Интернет вещает, что сюда приходят за СЮЖЕТОМ, ибо КОНЦОВКА ПЕРЕВЕРНЁТ ВЕСЬ СМЫСЛ - так его весь можно чуть ли не одним предложением описать. [spoiler]"Silent Hill: Shattered Memories" с такой же идеей и твистом справилась в разы круче.[/spoiler]

Так ещё и камера ужасная. Контроль качества - это не сюда, милости просим крутить угол обзора сквозь стены, чтобы модельки начали пропадать. И для этого даже не надо какие-то специфические ситуации обыгрывать - такие фаллаутские TCL тут встречаются и на обычном пути.

Нет ни одной причины похвалить. Либо плохо само по себе, либо есть игра, где то же самое сделали в разы лучше. В любом аспекте.

author: {'steamid': '76561198289734401', 'num_games_owned': 393, 'num_reviews': 255, 'playtime_forever': 963, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 480, 'last_played': 1624019536}
review:
[h1] Красиво и грустно или 5 Cтолбов скорби[/h1]
[h1] Полки[/h1]
[code] [b] Графика - Приятная и красивая мультяшная графика. Дизайн локаций сделан шикарно, ярко и разнообразно. Красивые острова, руины, подводные пространства и тёмные пещеры, все они сделаны выше похвалы. Музыкальное сопровождение сделано отлично и атмосферно. [/b] [/code]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2146823691
[code] [b] Сюжет - История повествует о том как парниша после кораблекрушения попадает на остров и предстоит раскрыть загадки этого места, в чём ему поможет лис. Начинается довольно теплым тоном, а заканчивается на грустной ноте. Реплик в игре никаких нету, сюжет подается через окружение и действие. И к тому он оставляет после прохождения вопросы, на которые найди ответ сам. [/b] [/code]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2146740243
[code] [b] Геймплей - Это приключенческий платформер с элементами головоломок. Головоломки простые, но при этом интересные, а некоторые вовсе могут заставить попотеть. Также по локациям разбросаны всевозможные секреты, которые любопытно искать.[/b] [/code]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2146824239
[h1] Вердикт:[/h1]
Шикарный платформер с душевным сюжетом со своеобразной подачей, простым но интересным геймплеем с головомками и приятным мультяшным визуалом на 8 часов.
[h1] Оценка 10 из 10[/h1]

[h1] P.S.[/h1]
Вступайте в группу и подписывайтесь на куратора NB Pictures и следите за обзорами первыми.
https://store.steampowered.com/curator/33555256/

author: {'steamid': '76561198015887960', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 753, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 753, 'last_played': 1593511942}
review:
I need a permission slip for this feels trip. 

Beautiful artwork and amazing soundtrack. I normally turn music off in games, but doing that here would be a terrible mistake. While it's a short game, it's definitely worth taking your time to enjoy the world.

Game plays somewhat like Uncharted or Tomb Raider without the combat, so basically exploration/climbing and puzzles. The story is also very tied to the presentation of the levels and there are quite a few metaphors once you figure out what's going on. Definitely a worthwhile experience. Just be prepared to feel things.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983290992', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 630, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1594169444}
review:
Okay... let's go easy now. "Rime" is not the game you may think it is at first. If you're expecting a casual, relaxing walking simulator, "Rime" is not quite that. Because in order for a game to be that, it wouldn't ask so much from its players as "Rime" does. Most of its puzzles are fair enough, but some others can be really brain-wrecking and time consuming. So this is the first thing to learn about this game: it's not so casual as it looks. It will take you some time; my first run in it took me close to six hours.

The game is very much a semi-open world, with these large areas. There's very little to indicate you where to go, since the game goes for minimalism, but it surely could use a way to at least point players where to go next, like in "BioShock: Infinite", "Alien: Isolation" and even "Mirror's Edge". For "Rime", there's this fox that barks at you, pointing you where to go in bigger areas. And sometimes, there'll be lights coming from the ground into the sky like beacons. Those are helpful, but a bit cumbersome; a mini-map could have aided much.

As a puzzle game, it has its fair share of classic key fetching, and sometimes you'll need to carry small objects to complete your goals. You'll also be dragging larger blocks around like in a "Tomb Raider" game. One little problem with the game is that it can have some annoying backtracking, as once you activate something, you're required to walk your way back into where you've been before. It's not something that happens often, but it's a noticeable issue nonetheless.

The game is heavy on puzzles, but one big thing about "Rime" is the platforming. There's a lot of jumping and climbing to do in this game, and controls are fluid and reliable - except however when you need to drop down from some higher ground, as landing from certain altitudes will stun your character for a bit. There's also a lot of swimming in this game, but underwater environments can get very big and very disorienting, while you can only hold your breath for so long.

This brings me to something important: you can actually die in this game. Falling from large heights and drowning are the ways the environment can kill you. As for enemies, you'll come across the "shades": sinister creatures in dark hoods who are harmless at first, but become dangerous later on. In a level, you'll also see this giant bird that can poach you if you stay in the open for too long. The good news however is that once you die, you immediately pick up from close nearby, meaning that you don't lose anything at all. The deaths in this game will be more of a nuisance than a heavy frustration.

The visuals are splendid, and many compared them to "Breath of the Wild": it doesn't go for ultra-realism, but instead for painting-like graphics that are exuberant and evocative. It even feels like those short animated films you see in YouTube. The thing however - and I don't think this is something all players experienced or will experience - is that my PC would get really hot while playing this game, to the point I could personally feel it. And this scared the hell out of me, more than any of the enemies or visuals in this game. I toned the graphics down, but even then my PC would still heat up like a fireplace. It's weird that happens for a game in which the visuals don't even look that demanding.

There are plenty of collectables in this game - so much in fact that to call this game a collectaton wouldn't be so far off. Some of these collectables are easy to find, but others are very well hidden, representing massive detours from the main path. After you beat the game, you can access the levels individually at the main menu to pick up what you missed. There's also a lot of achievements, so this game will keep completionists busy for a time. You can even unlock new clothes for your character, but they're just cosmetic; it would have been nice if different clothes would bring certain benefits.

Speaking of your character, this is when I address the story, and I left it for last for a reason. I won't spoil anything, but I'll just say that the main idea of this game was treated clumsily. It tries to tell a story in a symbolic fashion, but at some flashbacks, the game kind of lies to us in order not to reveal itself so soon. And the game is so minimalist with its storytelling (not a word is uttered throughout the whole game) that some players might not even get it after concluding it. The story itself is quite noble and surprisingly profound, but I wish its themes were treated better.

"Rime" is a flawed gem of a game. It is much more than its visuals alone, and you should definitely buy it if you're a fan of puzzles, platformers and collectatons. It assimilates all that is familiar to us in its own unique way.

author: {'steamid': '76561198863382126', 'num_games_owned': 288, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 441, 'last_played': 1566714237}
review:
同类型最佳神作，没有之一的。每一章不同的主题，每一个精彩的解密设置，前面模糊的暗示，到后面剧情的反转，让人一下子明白过来，也能体会到小男孩的心境和成长，给人一种深深的震撼。无论是美妙诗意的风景，还是动人的配乐，偏带奇幻的色彩，一路守护的伙伴，给人一种说不出来的感动。虽然只有短短几个小时，但是却会给人很大的触动，建议一定要玩完，玩到后面才能真正体会到游戏的美妙之处.
让我打分我会打9分，1分不足就是在游戏优化上，有时会出现穿模，同时不知道是不是默认亮度设置有问题，有的关卡太黑了看不见，遇到同样问题的要记得调亮度，但是瑕不掩瑜，确实是一款好作品，价格也不贵。

author: {'steamid': '76561198271621062', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 611, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 611, 'last_played': 1593183659}
review:
Like Limbo or Inside - without the scares.

If you have like games like Limbo and Inside, you will most certainly love this one. The only stage which left me depressed was Depression itself... you are in a dark, rainy, lugubrious night and you will have to make your way through to shining beacons while navigating through a ghoul filled labyrinth. (The ghouls do not kill you or harm you).

If you are used to playing such games, this will take no longer than 6-7 hours. If you are a casual gamer like me and like to enjoy the scenery and have some screen grabs of really fantastic scenery, this will take a little more time.

The puzzles are a lot of fun too! There are times where you need to run about, but that just makes it a little more exciting.

Definitely worth a dekko!

author: {'steamid': '76561198411692430', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 404, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 404, 'last_played': 1581510317}
review:
我也很想玩下去，但是真的玩不下去orz
但断断续续玩了该有一年了，数次打开力图通关不出10分钟必放弃。
说一下原因
画面掉帧，人物移动很慢，导致游戏进程很慢，有时候玩着玩着就不知道自己在干什么了
存档很迷（也有可能是我打开时间相隔太长）不敢贸然关游戏，怕丢档还要重新打，打开游戏也会茫然不知道自己在哪里
线索不太明确，日常不知道往哪儿走，很耗时间，容易卡关，某些时候会固定视角让玩家做一些无谓（？）的略难操作，着实没必要
最近好像更新了个收集系统？个人觉得对很早就开始玩的玩家不很友好，真的没精力再跑一遍
以及这个游戏到后期给我一种莫名的恐慌感，san值狂掉，伴有强烈到有生理不适如心悸等（并不是晕3D）。开始还想硬着头皮打完，到最后连攻略都不想查了。不知道是不是我个人原因，翻了一遍评测好像也没人和我有一样的症状，但我绣湖能玩很high却对此蜜汁接受无能TT，希望认真看完宣传片之后再决定要不要购买...
或许10年之后会再打开游玩吧

author: {'steamid': '76561198795848175', 'num_games_owned': 21, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1546208490}

author: {'steamid': '76561197969817202', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 542, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 542, 'last_played': 1592956430}
review:
Pocos juegos he visto tan elegantes como este. Te mete en la historia con una música de ensueño. Super cuidado todo al más mínimo detalle, no en grafismo, que también, sino en emoción. 
En tema de jugabilidad prima la exploración y los puzzles que he visto algunos alucinantes, y casi como juegos de mágia.
Debía encumbrarse en la historia de los videojuegos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198188578901', 'num_games_owned': 2526, 'num_reviews': 956, 'playtime_forever': 276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1609541854}
review:
Canlı, rengarenk ve sanatsal grafiklerinin ardında ne bulunursa bulunsun güzel olacak bir oyun olduğunu düşünmüştüm ama maalesef ciddi eksiklikler var. Özellikle parkur ve tırmanışların bolca olduğu bir oyunda mekanikler biraz daha iyi olmalı. Koşmaktan, zıplamaktan, yüzmekten zevk alabilmeliydik. Bunun dışında, hikaye olarak içinin biraz daha doldurulabileceği kanısındayım. Sembolizm - sürrealizm ön planda olup hikayesinin bunların ardında şekillendiğini söylemek mantıklı olabilir ama diyalogların olmadığı bir oyunda, başta bir şekilde oyuncuyu içine çekebilmek lazımdır.
Oyun başta sarmayacaktır. Devamını getirebilenler için iyi bir hikayeye tanık olma imkanı bulunabilir. Ben ortada kalıyorum, olumsuz diyorum ama tamamen kötü bir oyun asla diyemem. Genel oyuncu kitlesi olmasa da sanatsal grafikli, dinlendirici keşif oyunları sevenlerin hoşuna gidecektir.

author: {'steamid': '76561198314193820', 'num_games_owned': 2118, 'num_reviews': 155, 'playtime_forever': 835, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 337, 'last_played': 1687544069}
review:
[h1]So only after upgrading from my previous RX 580 (8GB) GPU to my current RTX 3060 (12GB) GPU was I able to play this game...[/h1]

And as interesting as the game was, needing a "battlestation" to run it is [b]COMPLETELY[/b] unacceptable.

[b]7/10[/b] - A rather compelling take centered on the five stages of grief. But again, the requirements/optimization are unsatisfactory to say the least.



[h1]ORIGINAL 2020 REVIEW:[/h1]

[b]The "System Requirements" section is a joke, as is the optimization...[/b]

I own a machine consisting of a Ryzen 5 3600X processor paired with an RX 580 (8GB) GPU, 16GB of DDR4-3000 RAM and an SSD on which I installed it [i](tried it on an HDD as well)[/i], so not only does my rig meet the "Recommended Requirements", but it has also surpassed them, only to get 50 choppy frames in 1080p with every graphical setting turned off.

Now the game itself looks really fun, nice, relaxing and whatnot, but I cannot recommend it because 3 years later, my experience with it [i](before I finally gave up and uninstalled it)[/i] consisted of benchmarking, mixing settings, switching screen mode and VSync, googling the issue and trying other potential fixes, to no positive end result though...

"Resolution Scale" is the only setting that gave me [i](along with everything else turned off and set to "Low")[/i] 60 frames without the game being choppy and stuttering constantly, but I was not about to play it downscaled from a simple 1080p resolution considering the machine I own...

So yeah...since I could not enjoy it until the end [i]([b]or at all for that matter.[/b]..spending almost 4 out of 5 hours benchmarking, mixing settings, googling fixes and whatnot)[/i], this is my verdict:

[h1]While it looks like an at least [b]7/10[/b] game, it plays and is optimized for a [b]3/10[/b] score at best...

You have been warned.[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561197975354919', 'num_games_owned': 221, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1629117090}
review:
It's like Abzû + Journey + First Harry Potter games' puzzles. 

The athmosphere is great and the art is stunning. The gameplay might come a bit boring at some point. You basically just run around the map or Parkour. I was wishing for a zelda-like game at first, so that might haze my judgement. It's a fun little game still and if yu like exploring games this is a real treat. It's like a visual mini novel.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028404542', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 506, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 506, 'last_played': 1592612310}

author: {'steamid': '76561198962138951', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 671, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 536, 'last_played': 1625920741}
review:
Génial mais court.

J'ai adoré RiME, tout au long de l'histoire on est captivé par :
- La musique qui est magnifique à mon avis.
- L'histoire evidemment. ( si vous vous êtes fait spoilé la trame principale, le jeu sera gaché :, ( )
- Des question qui reste sans réponse jusqu'à la fin de l'histoire.
- L'attachement au/aux ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) personnage(s).

Je conseille vraiment ce jeu à toutes le personne qui on aimé The Last Guardian ou d'autres titre du genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057666388', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 827, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 439, 'last_played': 1700237536}

author: {'steamid': '76561198100929997', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 690, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 690, 'last_played': 1592555688}
review:
A charming platformer game with treasures to collect, story to experience and beautiful environments to explore. If that sounds like your cup of tea, give this game a try.
Personal experience:
I think the idea for the game’s twist was born before a single asset was made. The game knows it is telling a dramatic story, but for new players it comes off as just weird or pretentious. In the first hour when the music swells with emotion, I have no idea why. It’s pretty, sure. But so what? Why should I care? This is what has been going through my mind as I played the game.
It borrows heavily from Journey, Ico, Shadow of the Colossus, Tomb Raider. It desperately wants to be just as deep, but comes off as juvenile. I don’t regret playing this game. It’s beautiful, it’s well done. I wish it was just a bit more well executed as a whole.

author: {'steamid': '76561199060293845', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 603, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 596, 'last_played': 1592589265}
review:
Me ha gustado mucho y me ha sabido a poco...querría que hubiera durado más. Quizá para muchos los puzzles sean fáciles, pero para mi están bien, creo que lo importante de este juego es la ambientación y la historia. Repetiré e intentaré conseguir todos los logros...pero cuando me recupere un poco de las sensaciones que me ha dejado.
Lo recomendaría a quien quiera pasar un rato entretenido descubriendo una bonita historia y disfrutando de los paisajes, sin atascarse en puzzles imposibles.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040775277', 'num_games_owned': 295, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1592239214}
review: Don't read or watch anything about this game. Just go in blind and enjoy it. Mechanically imperfect but it more than makes up for that in every other aspect.

author: {'steamid': '76561198321091876', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 493, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 493, 'last_played': 1592256449}
review:
Wasn't sure about this game at first. But it was enjoyable. Games I've previously played that were said to be similar are Abzu and The Witness. For the most part, the game is really enjoyable, even relaxing at times, to play through. Would recommend.

Except the first level - I hated the first level. It's long, it's tedious, it has the hardest puzzles (in my opinion), and it that point in the game you really have no reason to care about anything going on. Exploration felt limited (e.g. you can only climb up the rocks in a very specific way, when it feels as though none of them should be off limits), yet at the same time I was often confused where I had to go next. It honestly left me not feeling like I wanted to play anymore after the first chapter. Only reason I did was to get this game out of my backlog completely.

I'm glad I kept playing. The remaining levels were *significantly* more interesting and there was a much better sense of progression within them. The story actually (sorta) amounted to something, and I found the remaining levels more visually pleasing too. Besides the first level, I really enjoyed this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198331398709', 'num_games_owned': 1732, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 626, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 626, 'last_played': 1592245084}

author: {'steamid': '76561198007494637', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 711, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 337, 'last_played': 1644005700}
review: Great atmosphere, a magical adventure filled with fun puzzles and an really unique and subtle way of storytelling, well worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040929465', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1093, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1093, 'last_played': 1587824004}
review: I legitimately hated this game. I hate the feeling of exploration being juxtaposed with the feeling of urgent completion. Like I have to move forward to finish but if I just push forward then I don't get the whole story? And I can only get the whole story by randomly finding hidden objects? That doesn't make me want to play again, I just hate it. Graphics are amazing, puzzles are good, but the layout and the randomness really pulled me out of the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198345076916', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 850, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1592568869}
review: 通关之后重写一次评测，游戏的优点在于画面和音乐，以及最后的剧情情感爆发；缺点在于前三关过于冗长，跑图太远，没法加速，收藏品位置太刁钻。本来还有一个画面亮度过低导致在一些黑暗的地方根本看不见路的问题，但是后来在设置里找到了亮度调节。还有一个很难忍受的地方就是找不到路，路线提示过少，对无论是路痴或者不是路痴的人都极为不友好。没玩完前本来是想给差评的，但是游戏印象在第四关之后突然变好了起来，特别归功于剧情开始爆发和超棒的雨夜的场景渲染效果。所以综合看待可以打6分，一到三关只能打4分，四五关可以打8分，最终还是给个好评吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561198134958103', 'num_games_owned': 558, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1591960331}
review:

세일할때 하는거 추천 32000원 값은 아닌것 같아요.
뛰어난 사운드, 평타 이상치는 그래픽 특히 밤에 보는 별은 정말 이쁘다.

최적화가 안되있음, 의외로 짧은 점프, 달리기가 안됨

걷는거 싫어하거나 여유로운 마음으로 플레이 하는 사람이 아닌 분이라면 비추천

author: {'steamid': '76561198110075184', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 434, 'last_played': 1591696882}
review: Brilliant puzzle/platformer game with gorgeous art style, amazing soundtracks, and simple but effective storytelling. With max settings the game looks absolutely stunning although it suffers from hardware optimization if you really want to experience the game in its fullest.

author: {'steamid': '76561199051189662', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 734, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 654, 'last_played': 1625271416}
review: It's a beautiful litte game, not too hard to master/playthrough. The music and story were my personal highlights. To get the full extent of the game one should try to get all the collectables--doing so might require not to rush through but to take ones time and look around. Enjoy~

author: {'steamid': '76561198320228013', 'num_games_owned': 193, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 197, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 197, 'last_played': 1591591285}
review: 晦涩单调的解密和毫无特色的动作系统与悠扬的背景乐形成的奇妙不平衡感，头晕

author: {'steamid': '76561198138903614', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 844, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 608, 'last_played': 1591626858}
review: RiME no es solo un juego, sino una experiencia. La BSO es de mis Top 5 de las mejores que he escuchado, y la historia es de lo mejor que he podido disfrutar. La jugabilidad está muy bien, con un plataformeo y puzzles simples, pero lo importante es cómo el juego te va contando la historia a través de sus coleccionables y el mismo avance del juego por todos sus niveles. RiME es una compra obligatoria.

author: {'steamid': '76561197984456066', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 679, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 679, 'last_played': 1591324810}
review: I'm giving up on this game after 11 wasted hours.  I don't know where the favorable reviews could be coming from.  According to the Steam achievements, only about half of the people who start the game make it to the "Don't say no" achievement, which you have to pass to continue and is only about an hour into the game.  So, the other half are smarter than I am and give up almost at once.  I have the video down to minimum on every setting and still my frame rate is in the single digits.  Does my computer suck?  Maybe, but Tomb Raider 2013 went just fine at typical settings and that has much richer graphics than this.  The puzzles, when you can find them, are not challenging.  But it's hard to figure out where you're supposed to go to find something worthwhile doing.  The fox may lead you, but now it's just sitting there turning a circle when I sing to it.  Should I go through this door or will it be a waste of another hour?  Forget it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198117054702', 'num_games_owned': 680, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 410, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 410, 'last_played': 1591220306}
review:
Puisqu'il n'y a pas de 3e option, je ne recommande pas RIME. Il me laisse un avis très mitigé. Je n'ai pas été aussi émerveillé que les autres apparemment... Peut-être que je ne correspond pas au bon public...

Clairement, le jeu a été soigné. L'histoire, les graphismes, la bande son... je n'ai pas de reproches à faire à de ce côté là. Alors d'où vient cet avis très mitigé ? Trois points : le gameplay, la linéarité et la durée de vie.

Concernant le gameplay, je n'ai pas noté de bugs (à la manette), mais je l'ai trouvé très rigide. Je me dis que c'est voulu, pour rendre les déplacements plus réalistes (on n'est pas dans un Crash/Spyro/...), mais c'est peut-être un peu trop ? J'ai eu l'impression que le personnage avait du mal à avancer, à sauter, etc. Même dans un point'n'click, quand le perso marche, il avance à peu près aussi vite qu'ici alors que notre perso est censé courir...

Concernant la linéarité, le jeu n'offre aucune réflexion, aucune action, rien. On avance, point. Il y a soi-disant un aspect exploration, mais il m'a semblé mal exploité. On débarque sur une plage après une cinématique qui ne nous indique ni pourquoi ni comment ni notre but. Ok, explorons... On fait trois pas, on comprend qu'il y a des choses à activer. On les active, on avance un peu et ça recommence. Il n'y a pas grand chose à explorer, il suffit d'avancer. Par ailleurs, lors de certains passages, vous ne pourrez plus faire demi-tour (porte qui se ferme, bloc trop haut pour repartir dans l'autre sens...). Mince, vous n'aviez pas pris le temps d'explorer l'autre passage avant : tant pis.
Certes, il y a des objets à collectionner/trouver. Ici, je n'appelle pas ça de l'exploration, mais de la durée de vie artificielle. D'ailleurs, j'ai rarement vu un jeu où les pourcentages des succès sont si faibles sur des objets à collecter (autour de 3-4%...). Et pourtant, un point positif, le jeu propose une option pour redémarrer un chapitre ! Par contre, impossible de passer les cinématiques dans ce mode... Il ne faut pas se mentir, le jeu a beau être soigné, il ne donne pas envie de le refaire.

Concernant la durée de vie, comptez 6h pour finir le jeu (sans débloquer tous les succès, mais sans se presser aussi). Pour 35€, je trouve que ça fait cher l'heure de jeu. Surtout que le plaisir de jouer n'est pas au rendez-vous. Le jeu est beau, mais ça ne suffit pas à en faire un bon jeu. Personnellement, je me suis plutôt ennuyé. Heureusement, je l'ai acheté en promo...

Au final, je ne recommande pas RIME (à défaut d'une autre option), mais peut-être que vous correspondrez au public visé. Si pour vous, la passivité et la contemplation prime sur le reste, vous apprécierez sans doute RIME. Sinon... j'en suis moins sûr. A petit prix, vous pouvez toujours tenter pour vous faire votre propre avis.

review:
Wonderful allegory of 'Rime of the ancient mariner' from poet S.T. Coleridge.
Play it without any culpability! it's an emotional roller coaster, hidden through your gameplay and only revealed to you at the endgame. Only 5h of playtime, but it will change you forever.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045592217', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 458, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 458, 'last_played': 1590791724}
review:
The art direction is stunning.
As is the music.
And even the very last scene suddenly touched me pretty profoundly.

Yet the game as a whole is lacking in two very important aspects:

The story is - besides the aforementioned last scene - non-existent.
I didn't know anything about the character, the world or the motivations - anything at all.
That's why, throughout the whole experience, I couldn't get myself to CARE about anything
in the game world. Nothing had any meaning to me.

The gameplay drives this point home even more, because it's soooooo slow and unfocused.
HOW MUCH I wished for a key to get the character to really RUN for once, as well as a MAP FEATURE
to finally get hold of where in the game world I was, where I already had been, and where I would have to go.
This goes down to some - really unexpected - details that frustrated the hell out of me:
Every miniscule edge you stumble upon your character has to climb. And he does so. VERY. SLOWLY.
Yes, I'm not even kidding - it drove me mad, that CLIMBING, one of the major movement mechanics of
the game, wasn't even fun - it was repetitive, sluggish and therefore overall frustratingly boring to watch.

So if you like colorful, artsy games, and walking simulations in particular, for all means - give this
game a go, one can tell it's a passion project.
But I really can't recommend this game to a broader audience for full price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198154207446', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 1265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 437, 'last_played': 1630595493}
review:
[spoiler] I see the "Spiritual Adventure" thing coming, but damn, things turn dark real quick in the end. (Well, not that dark) [/spoiler]
Overall this is a relaxing game... Actually, be careful in Stage 2, jump scares, other than that, not much problem.
If you miss the bonus stuff in your first play-through, don't worry, you have a "Stage Select" option when you finish the game.

Also, I wanna talk about something,
This is not at all a boring experience (someone at the review said it was), 
I don't know why people keep expecting every game to be easy,
(People who said crash bandicoot is "Dark-Souls", I'm talking about you)
and when a game IS easy for relax and chill, they say it's too boring and want it to be "more interesting". 
Not every game is for everyone, if you don't like it, get a refund and move on.

author: {'steamid': '76561198152612238', 'num_games_owned': 2058, 'num_reviews': 656, 'playtime_forever': 601, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 390, 'last_played': 1597592326}
review:
音乐不错，画面现在看有点不行了，结合在一起烘托的氛围也还可以。这操作就有点晃人，像是早期的古墓丽影，经常视角被强制变换，玩久了有点晕。其实这种步行模拟器就别搞那么多收集要素，地图也没有，还要到处跑找收集品，你或者把这些东西放在必经之路上也好啊。解谜我觉得还可以，难度适中吧。最后，话说狐狸真的会狗叫吗？
-------------------
通关了，最后才能看懂一些剧情，所以这到底是谁的精神世界呢，其实感觉剧情的表达还是不那么明显。

author: {'steamid': '76561198019572573', 'num_games_owned': 398, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 387, 'last_played': 1590089351}
review:
Well crafted game. Music, level design, art style, everything clicks well. Presentation is excellent and the puzzles are not too difficult, with some situations where it's easy to get stuck.

Negatives are not many. Camera can get wonky in few tight spaces. The game feels more demanding on the hardware than it should be based on its visuals. And the story, although solid, is a cliche by now, a kid alone in a strange world, death, loss, grief, yadda yadda... It gets the job of playing with your emotions done adequately, but I wish the developer had the guts to try a different approach. Still, well worth playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002514676', 'num_games_owned': 1040, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 671, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 671, 'last_played': 1590087667}
review:
Definitely worth playing. Nice story, some fun puzzles, lovely artwork. Controls on PC are good, except in some places where the camera automatically takes a certain angle and it can't be changed with the mouse as usually can be done. Makes some jumps a bit harder, but I assume it's better that way when using a controller.
I thoroughly enjoyed the 10h I put into it. First playthrough lasted about 6-7 hours. Second playthrough to look for the missed achievements was quite a bit easier, but still fun to do :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198003403466', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 383, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 379, 'last_played': 1589635301}
review:
Ощущения от игры: Медитация, релаксация, глубокий смысл, эмоции.
Геймплей: атмосфера 60%, несложные головоломки 30%, паркур 10%.
Отличная графика и музыкальное сопровождение!
Очень интересно преподносится сюжет. Неожиданный финал истории.
За 5 часов решил все загадки и узнал сюжет. Если заняться поиском всех секретов, игру можно растянуть часов на 10-12. Найденные секреты дополняют сюжет.

Берегите своих друзей и родных.Чаще общайтесь с людьми, которые вам дороги!
