author: {'steamid': '76561198014579403', 'num_games_owned': 2336, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 701, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 701, 'last_played': 1589232270}
review:
Absolutely beautiful.

Art & soundtrack are stunning. The way the world is put together is very engrossing too.

Game play focuses primarily on exploration with a few puzzles. At times this game almost feels like a walking simulator, almost.

Puzzles are closer to Zelda than say Portal or Talos Principle.

The overall package though is simply beautiful.

5 - 6 hrs in length

author: {'steamid': '76561198146635403', 'num_games_owned': 346, 'num_reviews': 282, 'playtime_forever': 275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 275, 'last_played': 1589201502}
review:
Remember in My Eyes. (게임 제목의 뜻)

플레이 시간 : 4.6시간
가성비 : 낮음. (게임은 준수하지만 가격이 너무 비싸다)
몰입도 : 보통
난이도 : 다소 낮음.

눈은 꽤 즐거웠으나 마음까지 울리지는 못했다. 소소한 단점이 꽤 많았던 게임.

[b]화려한 그래픽과 빈약한 서사전달력[/b]
이 게임을 사는 대부분의 사람들은 아무래도 밝은 분위기의 힐링겜처럼 생긴 그래픽을 보고 구매를 했을 것이다. 물론 그래픽적인 측면에서는 그다지 트집 잡을 것이 없다. 다만, 초반에는 밝은 힐링겜의 분위기를 가지고 가다가 중후반 정도에는 어둡고 우울한 분위기로 변모한다. 끝까지 밝은 분위기를 기대한 사람들에게는 조금 실망스러운 점이 되겠다. 그래도 게임을 하면서 웅장한 유적들을 보며 눈은 꽤 즐거웠다. 인정한다.
다만, 스토리의 측면에서는 그렇지 못하다는 점. 챕터들이 이어지는 것은 맞다. 그렇지만 이해가 되진 않는다. "아이스크림을 손에 쥐고 있다. 아이스크림이 녹았다." 이 문장은 이어진다. 개연성은 충분하다. 그러나 아무 감정도 없다. 재미도 없다. 뒷 문장을 "눈물이 흘러 아이스크림을 녹였다."라고만 바꿔도 문장은 색달라진다. 왜 슬픈지에 대한 의문이 들어 스토리에 대한 몰입도가 달라진다.  이런 스토리에 대한 단서가 게임 플레이에서 녹아나오지 않는다. 그저 벽화 정도만 단서로 주더니 엔딩에서 하고 싶은 말을 다 해버린다. "소년이 있다. [spoiler]그리고 소년은 죽었다.[/spoiler]" 그저 이 두 문장만 있을 뿐이다. 엔딩을 보고나서도 게임 내에서 이해가 안되는 부분이 많았다. 서사전달력은 아주 빈약했다.

[b]인디게임 = 구린 조작감[/b]
유명한 게임사의 게임을 하면서 조작감이 나쁘다고 생각된 적은 많지 않았다. 그러나 인디게임들을 하면 조작감은 참 문제가 된다. 물론 조작감이란 것이 게이머마다 주관적이지만. 이 게임은 맵이 좀 넓다. 웅장하고 광할한 분위기를 내기 위해서 그런 것이겠지만 문제는 이동속도가 느리다는 것. 먼 곳을 가는데 느릿느릿 조깅을 하니 조작감이 답답할 수밖에. 쉬프트가 평지에서는 '구르기'인데 실제로는 퍼즐을 풀 때 아무 쓸모가 없다. 차라리 달리는 버튼이었어야지. 게임 태그에 '릴렉싱'이 있는데 그다지 릴렉스하지 못하다. (애초에 스팀태그가 완전히 믿을 것은 못 된다) 릴렉싱이란 것은 게이머가 원할 때 해야하는 것이지 이런 식으로 강제해서는 안 된다. 

[b]자유롭다가도 강제되는 고정 시점[/b]
이 게임은 기본적으로는 3인칭 시점이지만 보통의 3인칭들이 그렇듯 캐릭터의 뒤쪽에 고정되어 있지 않다. 캐릭터의 뒤통수만이 아니라 앞이나 옆도 볼 수 있게 회전한다. 캐릭터를 아래서 위로 올려다보면 웅장함이 돋보여서 그래픽을 더욱 즐길 수 있기도 하다. (아쉽게도 왜인지 바로 위쪽 하늘은 볼 수가 없다) 다만, 퍼즐을 풀다보면 시점이 강제로 고정되는 경우가 생긴다. 주로 벽타기 퍼즐일 때가 많은데 이런 경우에 오히려 퍼즐이 잘 안보여 불편한 경우가 좀 생긴다. 그리고 방향키가 캐릭터의 방향에 따라서 움직이는 것이 아니라 화면 시점에 따라서 움직이기 때문에 조금 헷갈리는 경우가 생긴다. 시점의 문제는 그리 큰 문제는 아니지만 개인적으로는 단점의 하나로 여겼다.

깊은 맛의 게임을 하고 싶다면 추천하지 않는다. 다만, 그저 눈요기 정도로 생각하고 퍼즐 게임을 하고 싶다는 사람에게는 충분히 할만하다. 그래픽의 분위기도 좋으며 퍼즐도 쉬워 간단하게 할만하다. 밝기가 어둡다는 평이 좀 있는데 게임 내에서 밝기를 조절하면 되므로 문제가 되진 않는다. (밝기 최대로 땡겨서 했더니 문제 없었다) 게임을 다 플레이하고 Extras의 gallery에 들어가니 아트워크들이 있었다. 개인적으로 게임보다 이 아트워크의 분위기가 훨씬 매력적이었다. 본 게임의 추레한 스토리에 비해서 아트워크들이 불러일으키는 상상력이 훨씬 전율을 줬다.

https://blog.naver.com/wlgusaud2000/221957912215

author: {'steamid': '76561197971278329', 'num_games_owned': 2661, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 879, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 879, 'last_played': 1589203215}
review: Une grosse surprise, et très bonne. J'ai attendu avant d'y jouer et je ne regrette pas, cette aventure est émouvante, le level design très bien fait. On début on croit que l'on va juste parcourir une île... Mais il y a beaucoup plus! Les personnages sont attachant et l'histoire très bien menée, la réalisation est très propre et tourne bien sur une machine moyenne je pense. Je recommande ce jeu sans hésitation.

author: {'steamid': '76561198144752902', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 843, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 843, 'last_played': 1589135275}
review: Despite many flaws, Rime is a platformer worth playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198268575047', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 176, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1589069128}
review: Holy cow, this was amazing. Might be my favorite game in the style of Journey. It has just a bit more interaction (like puzzles and platforming) and characterization (ie: your character has facial expressions) than similar games that put it over the top for me. The animation and music are [i]astounding[/i]. I was continually impressed by them throughout the course of the experience. The story is a bit more straightforward than it is in similar games and leaves less to interpretation, which I could see some people disliking, but I think it really works here. Highly recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060043863', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 624, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 624, 'last_played': 1589034903}
review:
Игра - произведение искусства. Без преувеличения. Сочетание простой, но впечатляющей эмоциональной графики и динамически меняющейся музыки создаёт яркие впечатления. А финал сюжета заставил меня, не склонного в общем-то к сантиментам, расплакаться.... Уже несколько часов я не могу выбросить эту историю из головы, снова и снова переживаю за судьбу персонажей игры и думаю о собственной жизни и  судьбе. 
Очень сильная работа. Авторам - респект и благодарность!
10 из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561197970664089', 'num_games_owned': 538, 'num_reviews': 219, 'playtime_forever': 1268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1246, 'last_played': 1588910844}
review:
It's beautiful, but the world feels empty.  There's not much to it other than some basic puzzles.

The problem is, if it were just a beautiful walking simulator, I could get into it.  But it's also a platforming puzzle game, and sometimes you just get stuck in a confusing puzzle.  That takes your enjoyment out of exploring and walking around in the beautiful environment.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067127325', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 690, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 690, 'last_played': 1588850086}
review: Una autentica obra de arte visual y musical... Ojala los chicos de Tekila-Works sigan desarrollando juegos con tanto cariño como le han puesto a este. Si tuviera que puntuar le daría un 10 en todo, historia, graficos, música, jugabilidad, etc... pero no, hay una cosa que en ocasiones me hacia sentir incomodo, y es por su rendimiento, una pena que en algunos momentos de juego la caída de frames se haga insufrible, incluso en un equipo de gama alta con una 1080ti se siente el shuttering con bastante frecuencia, lástima porque seria una autentica gozada jugar este juego al 60 fps estables, aún asi recomiendo darle una oportunidad si o si a quien no lo haya jugado.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996602543', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 455, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1616101630}
review:
Myślałem, że po zagraniu w The Witness nic już lepszego w świecie gier logicznych się nie stanie, toteż po zakupie RiME na przecenie nie byłem zbytnio do tej gry pozytywnie nastawiony. Och, jakbym chciał częściej być tak zaskakiwanym!

Gra uwodzi nieskomplikowaną, nieco bajkową grafiką i ogólną tajemniczością. Gracz wcielając się w rolę głównego bohatera ma na początku wrażenie, że gra jest skierowana raczej do tej młodszej części społeczności, jednak wraz z rozwojem wydarzeń, wrażenie to szybko znika. Fabuła nie jest tutaj najważniejsza, bo jak się okazuje w finale, historia głównego bohatera jest już zapisana. Jego podróż przez bajkowy świat nie ma większego sensu, choć można doszukiwać się znaczeń i "drugiego dna" niemal w każdym momencie gry.

Nie jestem szczególnie wrażliwy, jednak po raz pierwszy po ukończeniu gry logicznej czułem się wzruszony. Historia - mimo tego, co napisałem wyżej - jest poruszająca. Poza emocjami gra oferuje dość sporo wyzwań logicznych, nie są one jednak jakoś specjalnie trudne i raczej rozgrywka skupia się na zręcznościowym aspekcie grania. Zwykle chodzi o to by zdążyć przed upływem czasu (np. zamykające się drzwi, skorzystanie z platformy dostępnej tylko przez kilka sekund od aktywacji), ale czasami trzeba troszkę pomyśleć. Nie uważam jednak grę za specjalnie trudną. Gracz otrzymuje bardzo subtelne wskazówki, które spokojnie wystarczają, by rozgryźć wszystkie niuanse głównego wątku. Miłośnicy znajdziek, sekretów i innych tego typu "wyzwań" również znajdą coś dla siebie. Mamy tutaj kilka kategorii przedmiotów do odnalezienia, bez których grę również można ukończyć. 

Muzyka bardzo ładnie wpisuje się w całość rozgrywki i buduje nastrój. Jeżeli mam się przyczepić do czegoś konkretnego to przyczepię się do dźwięków wydawanych przez kompana głównego bohatera: liska, który pełni rolę przewodnika przez sporą część gry. Urokliwe zwierzę szybko traci atrybuty miłego zwierzaka, kiedy zniecierpliwione wydaje z siebie szczeknięcia (mające zapewne naprowadzić gracza na swoją pozycję), które - wydawane zdecydowanie za często - szybko irytuje i zabiera grającemu frajdę eksploracji zakamarków całkiem dopracowanego, szczegółowego świata.

Grę przeszedłem, ale - jak to się mówi - nie na 100%. Na pewno do niej wrócę, bo jest tego warta. Może zakończenie nie będzie już tym samym zaskoczeniem, ale czasami to nie cel podróży jest najważniejszy, ale droga do niego.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035903127', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 270, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 270, 'last_played': 1588691480}

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198972942977', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1586536034}
review: Opera d'arte a tutto tondo. L'esperienza videoludica proposta dal team Tequila Works si prefigge l'obiettivo dell'esplorazione di un'isola incontaminata e dai tratti quasi fiabeschi. Al gameplay piuttosto snello - salto, capriola, scalata di porzioni di rocce, interazione con qualche elemento ambientale - si affianca una gestione narrativa che fa dei misteri e il non-detto la cifra stilistica dell'intera opera. Una storia semplice che non colpisce tanto per il soggetto o l'intreccio, quanto per l'approccio poetico e la forza immaginifica degli ambienti che ci accompagnano durante l'esplorazione. Consigliato senza se e senza ma; unico limite è l'oggettiva brevità (6-7 ore) che potrebbe far desistere all'acquisto a prezzo pieno.

author: {'steamid': '76561198215518564', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 594, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 547, 'last_played': 1588381467}
review: Super pretty game and fun puzzles

author: {'steamid': '76561198072850414', 'num_games_owned': 128, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 759, 'last_played': 1603943402}
review:
RiME is an extraordinarily well-made and beautiful game, in every respect. The soundtrack fits the story progression perfectly. The polished graphics and mechanics match the atmosphere exactly. The character development progresses elegantly and meaningfully and contributes the bigger picture. Other developers can learn from the folks at Tequila Works.

Do yourselves a favor and avoid spoilers. You will get so much more out of this game's narrative if you experience it authentically.

The story arch gives subtle hints of what's really going on throughout, but the ending hits hard and by surprise. It conveys a feeling too deep for words. Amazing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198166709705', 'num_games_owned': 69, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 348, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 348, 'last_played': 1588321930}
review: 解密要素太简单了，跑路路程不短，但是没有奔跑，加速好像是按住前进键，转向就会切换成走路，手柄非常难按出奔跑，而且手柄在桥梁那居然无论如何都会被大鸟追上，必须用键盘才能过，试了几次才发现。场景和音乐非常不错。都说剧情不错，但是通过之后给我感觉就是：就这？

author: {'steamid': '76561197996244658', 'num_games_owned': 480, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 830, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 830, 'last_played': 1582469221}

The history is confuse and the mechanics are not fluid, but I enjoyed every moment playing this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983397248', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 879, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 879, 'last_played': 1587850774}
review:
Je suis bien embêté par cette évaluation négative que je donne aujourd'hui à RiME, après l'avoir terminé, car ce jeu m'a vraiment ému. Il est bel et bien destiné à un panel de joueurs sensibles à la poésie et à la direction artistique, et j'en fais complètement partie.
Seulement voilà, passé ces notions très réussies, que reste t'il à RiME ? Aucune action, très peu de réflexion... en résumé : aucun challenge. Reste le côté exploration, qu'on pourrait toujours apprécier à condition d'y trouver des compétences utiles au gameplay, mais ce n'est pas le cas : explorer la carte dans les moindres recoins ne sert qu'à collectionner des goodies qu'on débloque une fois l'histoire terminée.
En revanche, l'histoire est vraiment très réussie, ravissante, émouvante, dans un univers qu'on sait être un purgatoire, et on reste pourtant très surpris par la fin (au fond, aucun jeu vidéo ne nous avait pris comme ça par les sentiments).
Mais au moment de l'évaluation, je réponds juste à cette question, essentielle pour moi dans un jeu : est-ce que je me suis vraiment amusé ? Non pas vraiment, je me suis même parfois bien ennuyé. Dommage, car RiME est passé de quelque chose : avec plus d'action et de réflexion (comme Riven en son temps), RiME aurait été un vrai chef d'oeuvre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072249293', 'num_games_owned': 218, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 356, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 356, 'last_played': 1588160925}

author: {'steamid': '76561197997173807', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 485, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 485, 'last_played': 1587921829}
review: Great game...throughout the game I thought I was working towards one goal but the ending completely upended that in a good way. Story invoked emotions and the game has great atmosphere. Some reviews say the puzzles are "weak" or "simple" but that is subjective and were fine to me. Length was just right and overall, left a stronger impression on me than many other games. Definitely worth giving it a try!

author: {'steamid': '76561198073536304', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 454, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 454, 'last_played': 1587005157}
review:
Este juego lo jugue sin grandes expectativa, con un inicio lento, sin que expliquen nada  , en donde en la primera hora diria yo el objetivo era muy simple y sin recompensa, pero cuando pasas de esa primera impresion y logras abrir la primera puerta "importante" es cuando RIME revela lo que realmente es y se vuelve un juego con una inspiracion diria yo cercana a ICO en varias cosas (aunque mejor), el juego al final se vuelve una experiencia exquisita, buenos puzzles, buena jugabilidad, la historia es muy simple y no la descubres hasta el final, durante el juego todo es interpretativo, no hay dialogos ni textos solo gritos y melodias, hasta que llegas al final y descubres cual era el proposito de tu viaje, sin duda es un juego que va de menos a mas, tal vez me hubiese gustado que mostrara su escencia mas rapido al principio, porque me da la impresion que muchos jugadores lo habran dejado por que el gamer actual necesita el placer inmediato, pero para el que se tome el tiempo el juego lo recompensa absolutamente. un muy buen juego, absolutamente recomendado.

Mi Nota Indie: 8.5 / 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198065248009', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 475, 'last_played': 1587912570}
review:
Un bellísimo juego con una historia conmovedora. He disfrutado mucho, admirando los paisajes y el diseño de los mapas. También consiguiendo los coleccionables, los cuales no tienen mucha dificultad. Sólo hace falta buen ojo. 

A veces, en algunas "escenas" hay una cámara fija que puede molestar a algunos, pero esto es una opinión personal. Al igual que no puedas retroceder pasados ciertos puntos del juego. 

En definitiva, 10/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997354095', 'num_games_owned': 874, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 676, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 676, 'last_played': 1587858788}
review:
Oof, the feels.

The game reminds me of Gris: beautiful visuals, amazing soundtrack and [spoiler]going through the five stages of grief each per chapter[/spoiler]. 

The [spoiler]ending and realization we are going through the five stages of grief[/spoiler] changed the experience for me. Made me appreciate a lot of things I didn't notice originally.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054637995', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 580, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 580, 'last_played': 1587572416}
review:
Having recently bought a controller, I wanted to try a game which I could sit back, relax and enjoy and boy did Rime deliver that. I bought this game very cheap and a while ago. Having played AER, I liked the similarity of the graphics and gameplay of the two. 
Rime portrays you as a young boy who has been washed ashore a scenic island with main feature being a lighthouse like building. The game has a few puzzles (nothing too hard) but its mainly a walking simulator with very scenic visuals and an amazing soundtrack. There were a few frustrations when trying to jump on ledges but overall I thoroughly enjoyed the game. The ending was a bit sad but it doesn't change my view of this game. I thoroughly enjoyed the short game journey of the boy.

On price factor alone at the current listed price of 30 quid, I would not necessarily recommend it as the game is fairly short between 5-8 hours of gameplay but if you can get it cheap then its definitely worth time and effort.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151739374', 'num_games_owned': 492, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 675, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 675, 'last_played': 1587571538}
review:
Rime is a decent enough puzzle game. Great graphics, puzzles are not too hard or too easy. 
The music is probably the best part of it. However, it does have some really annoying flaws. It has no "Collectible" mode. Even though you can select stages when you finish it once, you still have to redo the level from scratch to access the collectibles. And there are a lot of them, and they're usually out of the way, so it's unlikely you'll get a lot of them just playing through the game. 
You can't skip cinematics (and some of them are just irritating). 
The controls can be a bit finicky (for example, if you are moving along a ledge, sometimes instead of left you need to press up, even though a second ago you were pressing left - because the camera changed a little).
In the end I replayed it for the collectibles not because I wanted to, but because I'm a bit OCD. I could just as well not replayed it again - it doesn't have high replay value.
If you pick it up on sale, that would be ideal.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036709237', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 870, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 870, 'last_played': 1587558546}

author: {'steamid': '76561198073202936', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 751, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 751, 'last_played': 1560690328}
review:
Que dire de RIME si ce n'est magnifique. Le gameplay est fluide et agréable, les énigmes très sympathiques, mais son point fort reste l'histoire. 
Pas besoin de mot, bien au contraire pour ressentir les émotions de ce jeu, tant par la musique que par les  graphismes, la poésie de ce jeu est incroyable. 
Pour moi RIME reste un jeu à émotions qu'il faut découvrir par soit même.
Je pleure rarement sur un support de fiction mais celui ci aura eu le mérite de me touché en plein coeur.

review: Rime is a good game. You should play it. I would say that the highlight of the experience is the first part. Once the story gets itself going the game gets more linear and levels are less explorative. I enjoyed the whole game, but really the first part is the strongest. 9./10 for the first part, 7/10 overall.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970837919', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 311, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1587240533}
review: It's all jumping and puzzles which gets both frustrating and old very quickly. I managed about 1.5 hours before I got bored and gave up. Up until that point there is no story in the game, just pointless find-the-key-open-the-door routine. The world is pretty and the art is fairly unique but it is all empty, there is no sense of adventure and there is no reason for anything, you don't care for the character either. Once I quit the game I have no desire to go back.  The game also has some major performance issues: I was getting 30-40 FPS on a 2080Ti.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066046254', 'num_games_owned': 1166, 'num_reviews': 92, 'playtime_forever': 586, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 586, 'last_played': 1587121661}
review:
+Красиво, даже весьма.
+Неплохой саундтрек, хоть и не запоминается.
-+Сюжет присутствует в отличие от того же GRIS, но на деле прост и раскрывается к самому концу.
-Игра не понимает к какому жанру примкнуть. Для головоломки-платформера слишком проста. Для медитативного-симулятора ходьбы-лазанья слишком сильно отвлекает  постоянными вопросами куда идти и что от меня хотят. Почему-то только на первом и четвертом уровне догадались сделать подсветку нужных мест в виде столбов света. 
-Персонажи никак не раскрываются, поэтому и не вызывают никаких эмоций. Лис всю игру просто бегает и тявкает указывая путь, и я похоже должен пустить слезу, когда он исчезает. С чего бы? 
В общем из четырех уровней в игре(пятый по сути 5-минутный коридор) удовольствие получил только от первого и четвертого, второй и третий только наводили скуку или бесили. Был бы нейтральный отзыв оставил бы его, а так скорее не рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198410843174', 'num_games_owned': 289, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 774, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 774, 'last_played': 1586684078}
review: RiME es un juego que si te gustan los escenarios naturales y una buena banda sonora, vas  a disfrutar. En el apartado de la historia llega a ser algo confusa pero al final algo predecible, aún así es un gran juego lleno de puzzles divertidos y que en general te asegura horas de entretenimiento.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032361358', 'num_games_owned': 1006, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 433, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 426, 'last_played': 1623957963}

author: {'steamid': '76561199034170163', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 497, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 497, 'last_played': 1586961110}
review:
Rime más que un juego es una experiencia. Un viaje que invita a observar, a maravillarse y a disfrutar los "silencios" (metafóricamente hablando claro, porque su banda sonora es preciosa).
Tequila Works  ha puesto un gran empeño en crear unos puzzles ingeniosos, un mundo preciosista y en crear una historia con ausencia de palabras. 
Enhorabuena!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198025229918', 'num_games_owned': 252, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 861, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 638, 'last_played': 1587337082}
review:
I decided to play this because it had a fox in it, and while the fox is a very minor part I am very glad I had the experience. To me this is very much like Ico, but with environments similar to The Witness. The platforming is not very difficult, but allows you to explore the cool environments in interesting ways. There are also a ton of hidden collectibles, most of which I don't know how you'd find without a guide, but provide more ways to interact with the cool environments. The soundtrack is also very good, going from subtle ambient to swelling orchestral. The credits song is particularly good.

It took me about 10 hours to complete, but that would be shorter if you did not try to get all the extras like I did.  I recommend you give it a try if you have the time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039766073', 'num_games_owned': 1272, 'num_reviews': 220, 'playtime_forever': 288, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 288, 'last_played': 1557662773}
review:
Das Spiel macht viel richtig. Es sieht fantastisch aus, die Umgebungen in denen man sich wiederfindet sind abwechslungsreich. Die Musik und generelle Amtosphäre sind sehr gut. Was gibt es also zu bemängeln?
Also für mich ist die Story nicht immer nachvollziehbar gewesen. Auch finde ich es schade, dass hier ein Teil der Story in Collectibles "versteckt" ist. Dann habe ich das Spiel eher als "Walking Simulator" erfahren, als Jump and Run oder Puzzle Spiel. Da man hier oft länger unterwegs ist muss man die Geduld und den Willen sich auf die Amtosphäre einzulassen mitbringen. Es gibt zwar auch einzelne Action-Sequenzen, aber das macht das Spiel nicht aus.

Das Spiel ist für mich mit 4,8h ausreichend lang und brauch auch nicht länger sein. Die Story hinterlässt einen bleibenden Eindruck. Ich kann das Spiel den Leuten empfehlen die sich entspannen und zudem eine Welt entdecken wollen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035155120', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 322, 'last_played': 1586789450}
review:
-Gameplay très simple, avec quelques énigmes très bien faites et agréables à résoudre. Peu de frustration.
-Histoire simple et métaphorique, à savourer une fois terminée, tous les morceaux se recollant à la fin.
-Graphismes sobres et épurés. Très beau.
-Ambiance sonore peu présente, mais appui beaucoup et très bien les événements et les décors.
-Jeu court, mais peu être rallonger si on cherche tout les petits éléments optionnels

review: Ну чтож! Лучше поздно чем никогда, добрались руки до этой игры! Удивительное, красивое, и очень чувственное путешествие! author: {'steamid': '76561198075834041', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 801, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 801, 'last_played': 1586643180}
review:
[h1]Сказка ли? [/h1]
[u]    Потрясающее приключение на живописном ярком острове с достаточной разнообразной фауной, загадочными развалинами и толикой таинственности[/u]. Богатое на детали путешествие радует как графикой, её стилем и качеством, так и проработкой мира до мелочей. Главный герой очень корректно реагирует на окружение, например, мне очень понравилась  естественность  движения персонажа в моментах, когда воды ему чуть ниже колена. Он всё ещё может бежать, но делать это начинает прыжкообразно с высоким подъёмом ноги. Наверняка немало людей поймут, о чём речь, если пытались бегать на подобном мелководье. В таких местах становится тяжело и медленно бежать  привычным образом и наиболее оптимальный «бег» становится именно таким. Нигде больше я не видел, чтоб авторы учитывали этот момент движения персонажа, а тут не поленились и сделали! И вот такого внимания к деталям в игре хватает.
    Игра без единого слова лишь визуальными средствами постепенно рассказывает историю, периодически разбавляя повествование простенькими головоломками. Разве что сам герой пользуется своим голосом, дабы активировать некоторые игровые объекты. Создателям очень хорошо удаётся побудить игрока сопереживать происходящему. Вас ждёт богатая гамма эмоций! В ходе путешествия не выйдет заблудиться или надолго застрять с решением какой-либо задачки, тут всё наглядно и понятно, а лис постоянно направляет героя. Тут так же понятно куда можно забраться, а уж если можно, то обязательно стоит! Вообще местное повествование похоже на несколько расширенный вариант визуальной новеллы: вроде исследуешь  локации, ищешь предметы и тайные места, но тебя постоянно направляют, и поверьте, в контексте данной игры это очень органично!
    Помимо прочего, я просто обязан отметить музыкальное сопровождение. Музыка подобрана отлично и всегда помогает создать нужное настроение и атмосферу в каждый момент сего произведения! А финальную композицию хочется услышать вновь!
    В конце я должен отметить единственную спорную вещь: управление меняется в зависимости от направления игровой камеры, а не от направления взгляда героя. Например, если герой плывёт и камеру сместить на вид спереди, но чтоб дальше плыть вперёд, то есть теперь в направлении камеры, нужно нажимать обратную кнопку. И, казалось бы, всё лаконично и правильно, но при подъёме по уступам камера фиксируется сбоку, но мир то трёхмерность не теряет! Из-за положения камеры порой кнопки движения резко меняются. Если при зажатии кнопки протагонист двигается в одном направлении, то после прохождения угла может резко поползти в обратном. В принципе, мелочь, но озвучить должно.
[b]Итог: 
Это совершенно определённо игра для всей семьи. Каждый тут найдёт что-то для себя. Детям наверняка понравится визуальный стиль. А взрослые точно проникнутся историей.
Рекомендую насладиться этой игрой, 7 часов пролетят быстро и вряд ли кого-либо оставят равнодушным! [/b]

P.s. для тех кто не боится спойлеров или для тех, кто с игрой уже ознакомился тут несколько расширенное [u]мнение[/u]:
[spoiler]     На самом деле остров - это своего рода лимб, метафора произошедших событий. Этот мирок создало сознание отца героя после трагедии, пропустив через призму подсознания родной остров и игрушки сына. Маяк острова - явный прообраз монументальной башни лимба со всеми сопутствующими строениями. Ветряные мельницы являются помесью маяка и игрушки-вертушки. Кораблик привнёс множество обломков по всему острову. Остальные игрушки стали частью живого наполнения острова, и это не только фауна! Сюда же относится эфемерный спутник - лисёнок, птица пустыни с резным белоснежным клювом и двуногие исполины.
   Повествование чётко поделено на пять этапов принятия смерти  мальчика, становясь всё более мрачными по ходу истории. Честно сказать, до самого конца создаётся стойкое впечатление именно лимба, посмертного мира, созданного шокированным сознанием ребёнка. Но нет, детали мира намекают именно о горе родителя. На постаментах отсутствует именно фигура мальчика, а весь мир как будто создан и ждал именно его. История из замочных скважин повествует о нелёгкой судьбе отца, который души не чаял в ребёнке и всячески о нём заботился. Множество деревянных игрушек тоже явно сделаны им для любимого чада, оттого их образы очень живо находят отражение в этом мире. Потеря жены спустя несколько лет после появления малыша была тяжким ударом, который оставил камень грусти в душе. И вот новое горе, шторм в открытом море нарушил планы рыбалки и воды поглотили ребёнка. После длительной депрессии, отец всё же принимает происходящее и готов жить дальше. [/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561197981386407', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 812, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 549, 'last_played': 1606268289}
review:
Wow!

I've just finished Rime. What a memorable ride.

More than a game Rime is a beautiful experience beyond words. It feels like an interactive poem with the sweetest lullaby playing in the background.

There's a subtle but deep storytelling going on all at all times but you'll have to pay close attention to every minute detail. Everything will make sense when the story is revealed at the very last moment.

Visually gorgeous, music breathtaking, emotionally... well you'll have to play it and let your heart be the judge.

(My most sincere congratulations to Tequila Works crew. Enhorabuena y gracias!)

author: {'steamid': '76561198407633701', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 339, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 339, 'last_played': 1586611071}
review:
“소년이 나아가기에 우리는 놓아준다.”

이야기는 해변에 떠밀려온 한 소년으로부터 시작한다.
소년은 여우를 따라 탑의 꼭대기로 나아가고, 주인공보다 항상 앞서 있는 ‘의문의 남자’와도 가까워진다. 퍼즐 스테이지가 변화할수록 소년은 이별을 겪고, 마침내 그 또한 밤하늘로 날아가면서 작품은 마무리된다.

무언의 울림이란 이런 것일까.
말 한 마디 없었음에도 작품에 정말 깊이 집중할 수 있었고, 덕분에 제작진이 전하는 메시지가 더 뜻깊게 다가왔다. 기본적으로 작품은 소년의 상황에 따라 변화하는 노래와 아름다운 그래픽을 선사하며, 힐링이라는 요소를 발산하고 있다. 또한 한 단계씩 진전하며 맛보는 약간의 컷신들과 수집 요소들은 플레이에 소소한 재미를 준다. 무엇보다도 퍼즐과 어드벤처라는 장르를 잘 조합시켜 차분함과 역동성을 동시에 뽑아낸 점이 인상깊었다.

특정 부분이 뛰어나다기보다는, 전체적으로 준수한 게임이었다고 생각한다. 이 점에서 약간의 아쉬움도 남지만, 잔잔히 지속되는 울림을 주기에는 충분했지 않나 싶다.
나아가 본 작품은 크리에이티브 디렉터가 익사할뻔했던 경험을 바탕으로 창작되었다고 한다. 덕분에 플레이어들은 죽음에 대한 감정에 공감하며 누군가는 사라진 이를 기억하고 있다는 사실을 상기하게 되었다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198158227805', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 747, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 747, 'last_played': 1586474145}
review:
I had a great time on this game!

The narration, the atmosphere, the graphic style are excellent.
The music was good but lacked personality, it was nothing extraordinary but I would have liked more remarkable music in the game.

There are a lot of collectibles, some of which help to understand the story which is good.
But some trophies are unachievable without going to see the solution on the internet which is a shame, but does not spoil the pleasure of finishing the game 100% either.
I finished the story in 7:30 am, and spend 5 more hours to finish it completely.

If you like independent games, with good puzzles, a good story and pretty music then I recommend this game

author: {'steamid': '76561198060357978', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 559, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 555, 'last_played': 1703355212}
review: RiME is a truly beautiful game, atmospheric and rich, there's so much detail, i adore the music and the mystery, the wild feeling of freedom and tranquility that guides you so gently into one of the deepest and most moving stories i've ever experienced. I don't want to spoil it for anyone but its both uplifting and deeply moving. Please make more amazing games like this...

author: {'steamid': '76561198371209461', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 543, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 543, 'last_played': 1586125428}
review:
Мне наверное везет на красивые и печальные игры, потому что эта не первая игра, над которой я реву белугой. Отзыв пишу по горячим следам со слезами на глазах.

Она красивая. Невероятно красивая графика, невероятно красивая музыка (чем-то напоминает Навсикаю из Долины ветров, невероятно красивая и легкая), сама история - потрясающая. До самого конца ты абсолютно даже не догадываешься о том, что происходит. Бегаешь за своим другом лисом, решаешь вполне сложные и в то же время легкие головоломки. Если у вас есть страх высоты - отличный способ его побороть :) /я лично изрядно нанервничалась пока прыгала на отвесных скалах, а с учетом того, что прыгал ребенок - сами понимаете/ Конечно в игре есть дополнительные собиралки - история мальчика, игрушки и что-то еще. Я не собрала ничего практически, не до этого было. Сама игра шла легко, она затянула меня так, что хотелось пройти ее снова. Но после конца игры я об этом еще раз 100 подумаю надо ли мне это.

Касательно самой истории. Не верьте трейлеру и описанию. Вот вообще. Это все описывает лишь процентов 20 от всей игры. В самом начале вы даже не знаете, что вас ждет дальше. Для особо эмоциональных, типа меня, совет - запаситесь успокоительным или салфетками. Серьезно. 

Итак, мои рекомендации - играть. Наслаждаться и играть. Хотя бы до тех пор пока это возможно. Потом можно играть и страдать... Пожалуй на этом все, пойду хлебну валерьянки.

author: {'steamid': '76561198183263631', 'num_games_owned': 865, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 337, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 337, 'last_played': 1586108068}
review:
[h1]RiME[/h1]

Yalnızlığı tanımlamak ne kadar doğru bilmiyorum. Söze dökmek, okuduklarında kendini bulmak herkesin içinde yaşayacağı bir deneyim. Hiçbir zaman sona ermeyecek bir yalnızlığı ise kelimeye yansıtmak en zoru olsa gerek çünkü yaşamadan öğrenilemeyecek derecede ağır ve içinizde yaşamak zorunda kalacağınız karanlık bir taraf oluşturuyor.
 
Kırmızı, yırtık bir pelerin ne kadar anlamlı olabilirse, o kadar anlamlı olmuş. Tequila Works ve QLOC’ın ellerine sağlık! Sonsuz bir özlemin başlangıcını anlatan ve her şeyi yavaşça anlayan çocuksu bir ruhla çizilmiş bir hikaye, RiME. Orijinal bir öykü olmasının yanı sıra onlarca duyguya dokunan içinizde bir yerlerde size kendini hissettirmeyi başaran harika bir çalışma olarak karşımızda. Hepimizin yalnızlığına bir parça müzik, anı, resim, manzara... ortak olmuyor mu? RiME da bunlardan birisin olabilir sizin için!

Grafiklerden ve oynanıştan kısaca bahsetmek istiyorum. Yine beni kendine çeken her oyunda olduğu gibi her detaya dikkat etmeye çalışarak oynadım. RiME, Unreal Engine tabanlı bir oyun ve harika bir grafik kalitesine sahip. Bu kısımda grafiklerin ve oluşturulan manzaraların ne kadar iyi olduğunu anlamak için SS’lerimden bazılarına göz atabilirsiniz. Sahile vuran kırmızı pelerinli bir çocuğu oynamaya başladığımız bu puzzle-solving tarzı oyunda, bulmaca ve sırlar sizi sıkmayacak seviyede ayarlanmış ve en önemlisi tekrar tekrar çözmek zorunda kalacağınız döngüden kendini kurtarmış bir şekilde dizayn edilmiş. Oynanışı bu denli kolaylaştıran ve görselleri ile gözümü gönlümü doyuran RiME gibi bir bir önceki yapıtın adı Hellblade: Senua’s Sacrifice idi. Bunu buraya not ediyorum. Bulmacaları çözerken sıkılmıyor oluşunuz hikayeyi geri planda kalmaktan alıkoyuyor. RiME’ın en güçlü yanlarından biri de bu!

Sinematikler! Hikayenin ne olduğunu anlamanız için yeterli sayıda ve doğru kesitleri kullanarak oluşturulmuş. Bu kısımda senaryoyu oynanıştan ayırmadan ilerlemenizi sağlayan öğelerden biri olarak karşımıza çıkıyor ve yeterli sayıda olduğunun altını çizmek istiyorum. 

RiME’ın puzzle dünyası gördüğüm en harika ve en başarılı puzzle dünyası değil ama arka arkaya gelen puzzle’ların birbirini tekrar etmeyişi ve büyük resme bakmamızı sağlayacak yapısı taktiri hak ediyor kesinlikle. 

Kontrolleri çok basit bir oyun. Ben Xbox One Controller ile oynadım ama klavyeden de çok ama çok rahat oynanabilecek kalibrede tasarlanmış. 

Ve tabiki müzikler, tıpkı Witcher 3: Wild Hunt ya da Hellblade:Senua's Sacrifice'de olduğu gibi güzel manzara ve müziği bulunca ihya oluyorum desem yeridir. RiME için de aynısı geçerli! Beni gülümseten bir tesadüfü anlatayım kısaca. Yıllardır müzikle ilgilenen ve oyun müziklerini ayrı dinleyen araştıran biri olarak, oyunu bitirir bitirmez soundtrackleri baştan dinlemek için spotify, youtube araştırmaya başladım. Karşıma çıkan sonuç: David Garcia Diaz. İsim olarak yabancı gelmiş olabilir ama Hellblade: Senua’s Sacrifice’ın soundtracklerini çalışan kişi kendisi. 2017’de RiME’ı yaptıktan sonra 2018’de Hellblade için repertuar çalışması hazırlamış ve şunu söylemek gerekir: Bu oyuna can veren, nefes almasını sağlayan melodiler çalışmış. İlgilisi için soundtracklerin bulunduğu çalma listesini buraya bırakıyorum: https://open.spotify.com/album/4Vmv5JMd2k5ZweNMUugzqo?si=gkYKoGlkRlG2EOM4alBhsQ

Peki oyunun hiç mi kötü tarafı yok? Tabiki var, bazı puzzle’lar (benim için sadece 1 tanesi) rahatsızlık verecek seviyede değil ama hadi çözeyim devamını göreyim raddesinde uzundu. Bunun dışında oyundaki collectible item dediğimiz toplanan öğelerin oyuna katksını oyun sonunda anlıyorsunuz. Oynanışa bir artısı yok. Bunu oyunun yarısına gelmeden fark ettim ve hikayeyi çok sevdiğim için her şeyi toplayayım hissiyatına çok düşmedim. Mapleri biraz daha içli dışlı oynarsanız, her şeyi bulmak mümkün! Bir de benim için tek “cons” yorumu oyunun başında RiME’ı tanıtan ilk oynanış hamlelerinin oyunu anlatmak için yeterli olmaması. Biraz daha açık olmak gerekirse,  Papo&Yo, A Story About My Uncle vs. gibi oyunların hikaye tabanlı puzzle-solving indie’ler olduğunu biliyorum, RiME'ın da bu tarz bir oyun olduğunu biliyordum ama her oyunun kendi fiziği ve oyun ritmi mevcut bu kısımda RiME diğer güzel özelliklerinin gölgesinde bıraktığı oyuna alışma süreci yaşatıyor oyuncuya. Benim açımdan bu önemli bir detay olduğu için bahsetmek istedim. 

Sonuç olarak, özlem, yalnızlık, sevgi ve daha bir çok hissiyatı 5-7 saatlik bir oynanışın içine sığdırmış, benim gibi tek oturuşta bitirebileceğiniz bir yapıda size sunmuş olan bu hikayenin bir parçası olmalısınız. Kırmızı bir pelerin ne kadar anlamlı olabilir? Bir çocuk kör bir umutla bilinmezliğin içinde ne kadar mutlu olabilir? Deniz ve martının sesi 5-7 saat arayla nasıl farklı hissettirebilir? İnsana derin bir nefes çektirip, gözlerini yaşartan bir sona maruz bırakan bu oyunu oynamanızı tavsiye ederim!

Keyifli oyun zamanları diliyorum!

Puan: 9.4 / 10

author: {'steamid': '76561197986618829', 'num_games_owned': 2977, 'num_reviews': 191, 'playtime_forever': 1238, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1238, 'last_played': 1586064966}
review:
Estamos ante un juego indie con una estética atractiva que probablemente sea lo que nos anime a probarlo, el desarrollo se hace bastante ameno en escenarios grandes y coloridos con unos puzzles sencillos, todo ello mezclado con bastantes plataformas, animaciones de personajes muy conseguidas y una banda sonora de primer nivel.

Aunque sus enormes escenarios llenos de detalles invitan a la exploración no obtendremos recompensa alguna con ello (solo coleccionables) ya que siempre hay un solo objetivo y varios caminos libres de enemigos u obstáculos importantes, el resto es atrezo. La historia aunque sencilla será un misterio justo hasta el final y la ausencia total de diálogos no ayuda en ese aspecto. La verdad es que deja sensación de no aprovechar todos sus recursos y ser demasiado pretencioso.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004212614', 'num_games_owned': 771, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 511, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 509, 'last_played': 1631146592}
review:
Okay, The Game can be a mess if you don't give it a try. 
But do it.
I still can't believe THE FUCKING ENDING!!! JEEZAZ
I'm crying.

Super Cinematic, Super simple (too simple that make us easteregg players doubt of it?) , Amazing puzzles and songs.
Just did a 2 hour non stop. I thought it ended , I got surprised and later, after the rain.......

Amazing!
Ps. You really needed us to do the "letting go" ? that was just cruel, GOSH Super emotional right now.
Amazing story.

author: {'steamid': '76561199011458608', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 277, 'last_played': 1589562891}
review:
Profondo, poetico, rilassante, bellissimo. Avrò perso ore solo ad ammirare il cielo stellato o i dettagli delle svariate mappe totalmente differenti fra loro ad ogni capitolo. Vi è una storia molto triste e profonda di sottofondo, una malinconia palpabile unita a momenti di dolcezza, questo gioco nella sua semplicità ha molto da offrire in esplorazione ed enigmi per avanzare.
Mi ha sinceramente commosso, è un esperienza che consiglio.

author: {'steamid': '76561197976452525', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 490, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 490, 'last_played': 1566347739}
review:
Maybe there aren't more games like this because nobody knows what to call them. 

They're not really platformers, even though you spend a lot of time climbing and jumping.  There are environmental puzzles to an extent, but they don't feel like full-on puzzle games either.  And you're actually doing something, so they're definitely not walking simulators.  

We like to put names on things, and these games kind of defy categorization.  Each one is its own unique self-contained experience.  For that reason they might just be tough to make, too.  

Is this true?  Explain yourselves, developers!

This particular one lands somewhere between NaissanceE and Ico, which is a pretty good place to be.  It's not as pure and abstract as NaissanceE, nor as grounded in narrative structure as Ico.  

Like Ico, you play as a little kid who's not the slightest bit afraid of heights; but for all of the acrobatics, what they're really focused on here is creating a certain mood.  To do this they rely heavily on one of the most difficult and underappreciated skills in storytelling: knowing when to shut up. 

You wake up on a beach, alone.  A less confident game would immediately start dumping text onto you--maybe a flowery poem or a cryptic quote or something--to tell you how to act and feel; or even worse, they'd give you a chattering companion to follow you around like a nervous salesman trying to close the deal.
  
Not here, mercifully.  Just you, the wind, the waves, the rustling grass, the seagulls, some low-key music and the sun rising and setting as you head out to explore this strange new island on your own.  It's a totally different sort of immersion.  The game simply creates a space and invites the player to reach out and fill it.  Without saying a word they make you want to investigate every last corner; but not in a hurry.  This style slows you down to a point where you feel really present in this place.

They do speak to you along the way, but it's a visual sort of language, subtle little signposts of meaning that offer both guidance and new questions.  The little "i" up there in the title, for instance, is like that because it's supposed to look like a keyhole, a theme that shows up throughout the white tower that serves as the game's physical and figurative axis.  Other elements like the fox and the red cape appear to draw your eye and pull you gently down the game's path; and the road changes a lot as you go. 

At the beginning things seem perfectly tranquil.  Time and time again I found myself stopping just to listen and watch, looking out over some magnificent ocean vista.  Seriously, this first part is just absolutely gorgeous. At one point you interact with a puzzle that causes the whole sky to wheel around you, and I actually said out loud, "wow!" 
 
Arrive at the next section, though, and and the tranquility gives way to a frenetic, hunted tension.  Each new level brings with it a similar shift in tone.  By the time you get to the rain section, the atmosphere of crushing sorrow is so thick you practically choke on it. 
 
If you're more perceptive than I am, it might dawn on you at some point that there's a coherent purpose to what they're doing here; but rest assured they explain everything in the end and it makes perfect sense.

So while you might be thinking that this whole thing sounds awfully "artsy," they're not being pretentious about it at all.  It comes across as very sincere and heartfelt, like the authors had a genuine vision they wanted to convey.  They really are trying to show you something, not obscure it behind a cloud of oh-so-cleverness like some games do.

Of course, it'll surprise no one that the story is ultimately geared to make you feel bad.  That's pretty much par for the course with these things, huh? 
 
I wonder if that lingering bittersweet aftertaste is part of why this game doesn't seem to get talked about as much as, say, Ico.  Although Ico also had a more overtly personal story, too, with the girl and all that, whereas this one is more allegorical; so maybe Ico is a little easier to connect with in that sense.  Plus, nothing here quite matches that drawbridge scene, which was one of the most brilliant examples of visual storytelling you'll ever see in a game. 
 
Still, it's a worthy addition to the whatever-you-call-it genre.

And hey, developers take note: they managed to build this entire game of mystery and wonder without including a single sewer level.  Was that so hard?



You can find more indie game reviews at [url=https://oddlittlegames.com] oddlittlegames.com [/url] or visit my [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/34514756/] curator page. [/url]  Thanks, and enjoy!

author: {'steamid': '76561198035043575', 'num_games_owned': 746, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 421, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 406, 'last_played': 1587921614}
review:
Die Beschreibung der Thematik des Spiels ist sehr gut umgesetzt. Und die Geschichte sowie die Musik gefiehl mir. Die verschiedenen Level waren wunderschön und man konnte schön durchlaufen entweder wo man hinwollte oder man wurde geführt, im großen und ganzen konnte man sich auch nicht verlaufen.
Das einzige was mich störte war, dass man mit dem X-Box-Controller das Spiel nicht spielen kann. Sobald man nach vorne oder zurück lief hat gleichzeitig die Kameraansicht sich mit bewegt. Ich weis nicht wie es bei den anderen Controllern ist aber mit diesem, war es schrecklich, weshalb ich dann auch auf Tastatur umgestiegen bin. Das negative bei der Tastatur ist, dass ich das Spiel nicht vom Sofa aus geniessen konnte (obwohl eben volle Controllerunterstützung bei Steam erwähnt ist).
Nichts desto trotz war es eine sehr schöne Geschichte und ein gutes Entdeckerspiel.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016487044', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 586, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 586, 'last_played': 1584863573}
review:
Sehr schönes Spiel, allerdings solltet ihr weder Sprachausgabe noch Texte, außer den Interface Texten, erwarten, denn das Spiel kommt komplett ohne sie aus, dennoch ist die Story schön erzählt. Ein wenig erinnert es dadurch an Journey oder Abzu und ich würde es auch grob in die gleiche Kategorie stecken, es ist von der Spieldauer nur länger und hat eine etwas tiefere Story. Wer gerne erkundet kommt in dem Spiel auch auf seine Kosten, da es reichlich Dinge zu finden gibt, was den Wiederspielwert etwas erhöht.

Nur die Steuerung mit dem Gamepad fand ich nicht 100% gelungen, vor allem wenn man an einem Absatz hängt und nach hinten springen soll, ist es extrem kniffelig den richtigen Punkt für den Analog Stick zu finden, damit er nach hinten zeigt und nicht nach links/rechts klettert. Das finde ich in anderen Spielern mit ähnlicher Klettermechanik besser gelöst.

Aber das ist schon meckern auf hohem Niveau, kann das Spiel nur empfehlen.

review: This game is actually really entertaining. I didnt expect much from it when i first bought it, but Rime surprised me.Its challenging , however not too hard to make a player want to rage quit. It has a great story even though not much of it is revealed till the end. The player acquires a few companions and its really easy to get connected to these characters. Towards the end it gets really emotional and intense. I recommend buying it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198836042704', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 825, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1619231661}
review: ¿Conoces a Fumito Ueda y sus juegos? Pues esto es lo mismo, pero salvando las diferencias. Es puro arte, puro simbolismo, puzzles ingeniosos y un enigma por resolver.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995689218', 'num_games_owned': 759, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 276, 'last_played': 1585078138}
review: Rime é um jogo de plataforma 3D que preza muito pela contação de histórias na construção de suas fases. Sem nenhum diálogo e apenas com elementos visuais, o jogo conta uma história universal e interessante. Belamente construído pelo estúdio Tequila Works, este jogo é competentíssimo tanto visualmente (em seus gráficos cartunescos) como sonoramente (com sua trilha sonora orquestrada). Vale a pena conferir para quem gosta de plataforma e histórias narrativas, onde o jogador tem um tempo para apreciar um universo ricamente construído dentro de um jogo que é palpável o esmero que o time teve ao construí-lo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198867106769', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 786, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 784, 'last_played': 1672583127}

review:
So I had fun with this game. I made a friend with a fox, so I called him foxy :D
Towards the end of the game, someone was cutting onions. Like, a lot. And what to do with those onions? I made sambal petai. Kidding, I'm a cry baby. This game got me so depressed for few days and when I think about this game, I cry some more. Thank you dev for making me miserable with the plot. I love this game so much! <3

author: {'steamid': '76561198045573086', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 452, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 452, 'last_played': 1584971421}
review:
Rime é pura beleza e sensibilidade. Uma obra prima!  

Há muito tempo um jogo não me emocionava desta forma. O visual e a trilha sonora são incrivelmente competentes, mexendo com seus sentimentos e criando uma atmosfera de pura empatia.

Congratulaciones a la empresa Tequila Works!

author: {'steamid': '76561198048632839', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 207, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 207, 'last_played': 1584909237}
review:
Una simpatica avventura madrilena da pollice grigio. Rime ha dalla sua un'indubbio fascino visivo, grazie allo stile architettonico delle rovine, ai colori vivi e ad alcuni effetti visivi, ma è carente sul fronte ludico e di ottimizzazione dell'Unreal engine, che a meno di non avere una scheda recente, anche a impostazioni minime non darà mai una totale sensazione di fluidità e la cosa appare parecchio ingiustificata.

Inizialmente, l'impressione rimane comunque molto positiva nel nostro girovagare per la zona iniziale, tra spiaggia, sottopassaggi e alture, purtroppo, quello che Rime esaurisce in breve tempo è il ritmo. Il gioco mostra una certa linearità, nascosta malamente dietro alcuni collezionabili poco utili, un paio di zone di scarsa visibilità/riparo da attraversare e in generale a rompicapi di basso livello, che altro non fanno se non rallentare "l'esperienza". Il gioco infatti avrebbe velleità narrative, benché la storia sia abbastanza modesta e prevedibile, vorrebbe imitare alcuni noti e sopravvalutati titoli dell'era Ps2/Ps3, e al pari di alcuni di essi non riesce a tenere vivo l'interesse, per via di una struttura incerta sul quanto essere gioco e quanto essere racconto. 

Le meccaniche sono poche, piuttosto familiari e stantie. Ci potremo arrampicare su alcune sporgenze in stile Assassin's Creed, senza neanche lontanamente avere la stessa divertente quantità di appigli e libertà di scelta, potremo spostare alcuni piccoli blocchi alla Zelda, ruotare alcuni posti di osservazione per sbloccare delle porte, giochicchiare raramente con un globo per cambiare l'orario e, quando consentito, usare un gorgheggio in stile Sirenetta Disney, per interagire con un paio di statue, globi ed oggetti, anche quando un colpo di bastone sarebbe altrettanto efficace... se ci venisse permesso. Un elemento, quello del canto, quantomeno più personale e presente degli altri, e che meritava per questo più coraggio e fantasia nella sua implementazione.

Forse, per quanto banale, qualche nemico in più sarebbe stato utile. Gli sporadici intermezzi risulteranno piacevoli e l'esagerato cielo stellato del veloce ciclo giorno/notte è uno spettacolo da vedere, ma il tutto viene penalizzato dal poco interesse ad andare avanti. Rime non è un gioco brutto, ma non del tutto riuscito nei suoi obiettivi. Il fatto che al tempo venisse anche solo ipotizzato che potesse concorrere con Breath of the Wild, appare più che mai comico. 

Detto questo, un voto negativo è probabilmente troppo severo, penso che Rime sia un onesto indie da 6,5, tuttavia, trovo pure che la media sia veramente ingannevole verso i giocatori.

Para mí está en la línea de Journey o ABZÛ.

author: {'steamid': '76561198110593446', 'num_games_owned': 178, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 709, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 709, 'last_played': 1584751389}
review:
First chapters: 10/10
Last two chapters: -10/10 (mind the MINUS)
Ending: imagine any word on the planet that Steam would replace with those lovely hearts and think it now

Atmosphere and graphics are lovely.
You love being miserable and unhappy or are just immune to feelz in games? - Recommended, you'll be fine!
You wanna play a game that brightens your mood? - Stop playing after like 3 chapters.
You're depressed as F and can't handle sadness? - Buy another game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198165436537', 'num_games_owned': 249, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 412, 'last_played': 1584631625}
review:
I would not recommend this game...but I would not not recommend this game. It exists. Like so many other walking simulators. I finished it only because of how short the game was. Any longer and it would have gone on the steam shelf to collect dust. Again this is not a bad game...it's just not an interesting one

Pros:
- beautiful art
- very nice soundtrack

Cons:
- it's a walking simulator (pro if you like walking and jumping)
- not much game play. they include things that seem like puzzles until you find out that they aren't
- the story or lack thereof. they want you to feel [spoiler] sad when characters die [/spoiler] but with no character development and a sudden jolt of perspective it felt more like a "see how tricky we are" instead of a "see how good at story telling we are"


This game is easy (but boring) for those hunting achievements and a chore for any casual players. My advice, save your money for something actually worth $30.

author: {'steamid': '76561198155645516', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 264, 'last_played': 1584577928}
review:
¿Merece la pena?

Respuesta corta: Sí, pero rebajado. 

Respuesta larga:

Compré el juego sin conocer el estudio y sin haber escuchado de él en ningún sitio. Me llamó la atención estéticamente y como estaba rebajado y tenía unos euros en la cartera lo pillé por probarlo. 

El juego no supone ningún reto, es muy sencillito, pero la verdad es que la ambientación y la música es espectacular. A pesar de ser muy fácil, es muy divertido de jugar, ya que lo que pretende no es darte un reto sino mostrarte cosas y eso lo hace genial. Bebe mucho del team ICO este juego y se nota, pero en plan bien. 

El juego es muy cortito, 4 horas y pico me ha durado a mi, pero han sido unas 4 horas en las que no me he podido despegar del mando, cosa que no me ocurría desde hacía mucho tiempo. Son 4 horas que valen oro, pero aun así me parece un precio excesivo 35 euros por 4 horas de juego. Pilladlo de oferta. 

Me sorprendió mucho el final cuando vi los créditos y vi que estaba hecho por españoles, me alegra mucho que un equipo español demuestre que puede hacer cosas a la altura del panorama. Eso sí, la próxima vez por favor, curraos más la publicidad porque algo así no puede pasar tan inadvertido. Un saludo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198272386102', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 345, 'last_played': 1584492951}
review: Rime é uma experiência que nos remete para um universo estilizado e belo. A sua aparente simplicidade esconde uma profundidade que se vai revelando no decorrer da aventura. Ao percorrer o mundo misterioso de Rime a acção decorrer sempre de forma fluída e dinâmica. Os controlos são responsivos, simples e intuitivos. Os puzzles são engenhoso e bem enquadrados. A banda sonora que acompanha os eventos e os momentos dramáticos do jogo é fenomenal. Visualmente a direcção artística é simplesmente soberba. Recomendo vivamente!

review: Платформер-головоломка с простыми загадками, медленным и медитативным геймплеем .Приятная стилистика,которая плавно переходит от красочного мира в некий кошмар(мне понравился последний уровень больше всего , лучшая  атмосфера во всей игре).Музыка со своей задачей справляется,но сама по себе не особо(было приятнее врубить треки из своего плейлиста). author: {'steamid': '76561198253492927', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 177, 'playtime_forever': 644, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 644, 'last_played': 1583877855}
review: RiME est un petit jeu d’aventure, avec une pointe d’exploration et un zeste de puzzle. L’ambiance du jeu est très bonne, renforcée par de beaux graphismes ainsi que par une belle bande son. La jouabilité, à la manette, est plutôt bonne, avec des contrôles simples et intuitifs ; il est également possible de jouer au clavier et à la souris. Concernant le scénario, si celui-ci semble plutôt minimaliste et abstrait au début, il se révèle plus profond au fil de l’aventure, avec une fin émouvante et qui permet de saisir l’ensemble du message véhiculé par le jeu. Si le côté exploration, nécessaire pour obtenir tous les succès, est assez présent dans les différents chapitres, qui sont chacun de petits mondes semi-ouverts, j’ai regretté le manque de difficulté des phases de puzzle/plates-formes, qui sont pour le coup vraiment trop simples. Concernant la durée de vie, il faut compter environ sept heures pour terminer l’histoire, et quelques heures supplémentaires pour obtenir tous les succès si vous en avez oublié. Heureusement, une fois le jeu terminé, il sera possible de choisir le chapitre afin de gagner un peu de temps. Pour terminer, je trouve que le jeu est un peu cher au prix normal (35€), donc je recommande de le prendre en promotion.

author: {'steamid': '76561198179660865', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 853, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 853, 'last_played': 1584116217}

author: {'steamid': '76561198318359628', 'num_games_owned': 231, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1722, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1722, 'last_played': 1584013392}
review:
Premetto che è la mia prima recensione, esse si divideranno in 3 parti: breve spiegazione della trama (no spoiler) e di che cosa emozionalmente mi ha lasciato, aspetti negativi e positivi, conclusione e consigli.

Rime è un puzzle-platform che va a toccare nei suoi 5 capitoli le varie fasi del lutto, ti ritroverai nei panni di questo ragazzo che naufraga su un'isola, ti sentirai disorientato, perché nessuno ti dice cosa fare, non ti aspetti questo, come quando perdi una persona a te cara.
Soggettivamente ho trovato RIME dal punto di vista emotivo un gioco che ha saputo farmi piangere anche dopo la quarta volta che ho giocato il finale.

Aspetti positivi:
-Musica: la colonna sonora è eccezionale, azzeccata in ogni suo minimo particolare sia tecnicamente che nella scelta del posizionamento nel gameplay, essendo un produttore probabilmente campionerò qualcosa per farci una traccia;
-Grafica: la grafica è molto semplice ma è proprio questa la sua forza, pulita, senza troppe pretese;
-Gameplay: all'inizio si rimane un po' spaesati, perché non c'è nessun UHD nello schermo, niente che ti da consigli o ti dica esattamente cosa tu debba fare, ma dopo qualche minuto di gioco si inizia a comprendere il tutto. Mi ha colpito molto la varietà degli enigmi che fino alla fine sono riusciti sempre a trovare qualcosa di nuovo per non annoiare il giocatore. Il platform è semplice, non è di quelli che devi stare 30 minuti ad arrabbiarti, trovo che nel contesto del gioco ci stia bene.
-Dialoghi e narrativa: nel gioco NON ci sono dialoghi, ed è proprio questo il bello, rime penso che non possa definirsi come un gioco ma un'opera d'arte, in quanto opera d'arte deve lasciare spazio all'interpretazione di chi la vede dall'esterno, il silenzio vale più di mille parole e gli sviluppatori hanno saputo giocare molto bene questa loro chiave.
-Esplorazione: In quanto ad esplorazione è veramente vasto sopratutto per quanto riguarda strade secondarie per prendere il collezzionabile di turno.
-Emotività: Come ho detto prima dal punto di vista emotivo è molto forte, perché finché non arrivi alla fine (tranne qualche flashback tra un capitolo e l'altro) ti rimane sempre questo alone di mistero che non capisci bene che cosa sia successo di preciso e l'impatto finale è un qualcosa che ti fa venire i brividi.

Aspetti negativi:
-Ottimizzazione: Iniziamo con il più grande dei problemi, l'ottimizzazione su PC è veramente di bassa qualità, Unreal engine sfruttato malissimo sotto questo punto di vista, anche con schede video di fascia alta difficilmente tocchi i 60 fps e a volte si hanno cali veramente drastici (sopratutto nel capitolo 2). Una mia cara amica lo ha giocato su xbox e ha detto che lì è tutto ok, probabilmente è un gioco che è stato ideato per console e trasportarlo su computer ha rivelato dei problemi;
-Caricamenti: Anche questi risultano essere abbastanza lenti, non troppo, ma rispetto alla media di altri giochi anche molto più complessi ci si aspetta di più. L'animazione che si vede appena si apre il gioco dura un sacco di tempo e solo dopo 25 ore di gioco ho capito che la si poteva comodamente skippare con SPACE (non sempre però funziona);
-Achievement: a volte mi è capitato che mi si buggassero un paio di achievement e quindi di dover ricaricare l'ultimo checkpoint per rifarlo;
-Luce e luminosità: ci sono dei trigger della luce che sono gestiti male, ti ritrovi da un passo all'altro a un ambiente con una determinata color correction a una totalmente diversa, personalmente mi ha dato un po' di fastidio. La luce in certi punti è veramente ridotta al minimo e si vede poco e niente, in certe fasi di gioco consiglio di aumentarla un po' dalle impostazioni grafiche;
-Collisioni: In certi punti il gioco pecca nel realismo delle collisioni, a volte fai salti di pochi cm e ti aggrappi a non so quale sporgenza lontana di metri e altre volte accade il contrario. Nel capitolo 4 in certi punti la pioggia trapassa dei tetti coperti, sempre nel medesimo capitolo ti cadono macerie addosso ma il nostro protagonista le trapassa come se niente fosse, avrei gradito almeno una animazione del personaggio che si ripara ad esempio;
-Rigiocabilità: Sinceramente mi sono un po' annoiato nelle mie ultime ore per platinarlo, non è di sicuro un gioco che tu possa rigiocare più di 2 volte, quindi se lo volete finire consiglio di farlo tutto in 2 tentativi.

Tiriamo le conclusioni:

RIME è un gioco che consiglio con tutto il cuore, sopratutto se avete appena perso una persona a cui eravate molto legati.
Gli aspetti negativi che ho citato prima sono infimi rispetto a quello che emozionalmente ti lascia a mio parere, un gioco che chiunque dovrebbe giocare e dovrebbe avere nella propria libreria.
Il gioco dura dalle 5 alle 6 ore.
Un po' altino il prezzo, consiglio di prenderlo in sconto, io ho fatto un affarone prendendolo a 2 euro e qualcosa.

Consigli:
Io per gusto personale l'ho platino senza l'uso di tutorial, ma cercando online su youtube ne ho trovato uno molto valido, il canale si chiama: PS4Trophies, parla un inglese molto comprensibile, ma se proprio lo volete in italiano vi consiglio la guida di "Il Vault di Jess", il suo video dura 4 ore ma spiega tutto nel dettaglio ed è una ragazza molto simpatica.

Per chi voglia scambiare pareri ed opinioni o approfondire la mia persona nel mio profilo ci sono diversi contatti.

author: {'steamid': '76561198343926905', 'num_games_owned': 151, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 426, 'last_played': 1584005338}

author: {'steamid': '76561198081804585', 'num_games_owned': 817, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 439, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 439, 'last_played': 1583771064}
review: This is a very beautiful game with a very nice artstyle and story. The audio is very fitting for the game and helps transporting the story. The puzzles are not very hard but nice. The game autosaves and the checkpoints are very fair.I had a bit of trouble at the beginning to get used to the controls but that's a very minor issue and probably a personal one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198162381766', 'num_games_owned': 629, 'num_reviews': 547, 'playtime_forever': 650, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 650, 'last_played': 1583928254}
review:
in questo gioco impersonate un ragazzo che si trova naufrago in un'isola deserta. Il vostro compito sarà quello di esplorare l'isola e seguire la vostra amica volpe che vi indicherà la strada giusta. Il gioco è composto da un'unica strada principale cosparsa da varie stradine più o meno nascoste che portano quasi sempre ai collezionabili, al max in un vicolo cieco. L'inizio del gioco sarà un pò traumatico visto che non ci sono indicazioni su dove andare o cosa fare, finchè non troverete la volpe che vi aiuterà a prendere la strada giusta. Per non parlare dei vari enigmi ambientali che bisognerà risolvere per proseguire nel gioco. Le musiche sono buone con alcune d'atmosfera, anche graficamente è carino, peccato per alcuni rari cali di frame fortunatamente durano pochi secondi, ma ci sono. ^^; La storia la capirete solo nella sequenza finale, o se prendete tutti i collezionabili al primo colpo. La longevità è buona se come me fate la seconda run per prendere i collezionabili che avete mancato la prima volta, altrimenti vi durerà al max 5-6 ore non di più. Personalmente lo consiglio ma solo scontato, visto il prezzo e la durata del gioco stesso. ^_^

Avviso: Se lo giocate in finestra e uscite dal gioco. Steam non lo riesce a chiudere finchè non uscite da Steam forzando la chiusura del gioco. ^^;

author: {'steamid': '76561198308099499', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 849, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 482, 'last_played': 1585953125}
review: Une très belle expérience de jeu, avec des décors fabuleux, un univers magique, dépaysant. Des énigmes bien dosées, de belles surprises. A noter aussi une dimension émotionnelle et psychologique avec des passages très sombres qui pourraient ne pas convenir à tout le monde. On finit le jeu avec une mélange de mélancolie, de soulagement et une envie de repartir dans cette aventure pour la découvrir sous un autre angle.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041887851', 'num_games_owned': 311, 'num_reviews': 169, 'playtime_forever': 298, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 298, 'last_played': 1583917707}
review:
RiME est un jeu comtemplatif, comportant du gameplay de plateforme et quelques énigmes. L'ambiance est bien servie par la musique, et la beauté des paysages. Le style graphique en Cell shading rappelle un peu un Zelda Wind Waker, avec plus de détails. Au cours du jeu, aucun dialogue, aucun texte. Vous allez déambuler dans le monde, en suivant parfois les indications lumineuses, et deviner par vous même ce qu'il faut faire. Pas de panique, c'est intuitif et naturel. Le jeu dépeins au travers des différents mondes qu'on parcourt les différentes étapes du deuil, c'est plein de sous entendus, d'images poétiques et de représentations de sentiments. Petit bémol point de vue technique : j'ai eu du mal a garder des fps constants dans certaines zones. Rien de dramatique.
C'est une très bonne oeuvre, jolie et prenante.

author: {'steamid': '76561198160974404', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 393, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 393, 'last_played': 1583566681}
review: This game is a beautiful masterpiece of emotional imagery with exploration and puzzle-solving. The way the devs portrayed the journey of this game, throughout the game, has left such an impression on me. Like I already had my 'allergies' flare up at the end of the playthrough but I can't help but just remember my time spent within the game and putting the story together with the paintings on the walls, the overall conflict and pacing of each level alongside my viewers and it's just an amazing game. Please. If you have not played this game yet, you are missing out on a gorgeous and sincere journey. Whatever game these devs push out next, I am excited for just because of this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198274878356', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 563, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 448, 'last_played': 1585159924}
review: What an incredibly beautiful game! This is a true hidden gem. Pure and simple. It's like ABZU meets Mysterious Cities of Gold. A gentle journey through a colourful island full of wonder and puzzles that aren't too taxing. It's a perfect type of game if you're looking to relax. If it's on offer and it looks like your kind of thing, go for it!

author: {'steamid': '76561198092052349', 'num_games_owned': 1273, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 427, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 424, 'last_played': 1584827820}
review:
RiME est un jeu absolument merveilleux et...mystérieux !
Lorsqu'on commence la partie, on ne sait pas qui nous sommes et où on est. On se met réellement à la place du personnage : que faisons-nous ici ? Que s'est-il passé ? On part alors à la découverte d'une île qui renferme bien des secrets...

En tout cas, je n'ai rien à redire sur RiME !  Il combine un gameplay simple et efficace, un environnement bien construit et une musique fabuleuse ! Le jeu est à la fois reposant et véritablement poignant. Tout cela prend une tout autre proportion lorsqu'on arrive à la fin et que le jeu répond à toutes les questions qu'on se posait au début. Un véritable moment d'émotion.

J'avoue même que sur la fin, j'ai failli lâcher une petite larme...

author: {'steamid': '76561198086486844', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 331, 'last_played': 1583678103}
review: Très beau et touchant. Visuellement et musicalement magique. Une ambiance très douce et apaisante. Il n'y a pas vraiment de défi ou de difficultés ici car ce n'est clairement pas le but visé. Les énigmes sont simples ce qui le rend accessible et évite des situations de blocages qui auraient pu être frustrantes. Une aventure dont l'essence se concentre dans le final qui permet au joueur de comprendre la raison de tout ça (même si pour ma part j'ai eu une idée juste assez vite). Ici il s'agit d'être surtout spectateur de l'histoire de ce petit héros et de l'accompagner [spoiler]dans son dernier voyage[/spoiler]. Un beau jeu comme je les aime tant, ceux qui vous rendent tout chose après les avoir faits et vous laisse un vrai souvenir : Ori, Life is strange (le premier), The Witcher 3...qui ont une vraie histoire et un peu de magie derrière tous ces pixels. Je tire vraiment mon chapeau aux créateurs qui ont osé. Je ne m'attendais pas à ça en l'achetant (en promo). Je pensais que c'était une banale aventure comme tant d'autres alors qu'on est bien au-delà [spoiler]sans mauvais jeu de mots[/spoiler].

author: {'steamid': '76561198185055734', 'num_games_owned': 1593, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 369, 'last_played': 1583230495}
review:
[h1] RiME Review ([i]spoiler free[/i]) [/h1]

Puzzle platform 3D indie, senza troppi dettagli dedicati a menu, interfaccia o altro. Dalla complessità crescente, RiME pian piano intavola anche una trama particolare tramite statue, animali, disegni sulle mura degli edifici e brevi cutscenes. Quasi ogni angolo di ogni mappa è esplorabile e ciò permette al giocatore di passare il tempo a risolvere anche enigmi secondari e di ragionare sul percorso seguito prima di passare per la strada principale. 

La difficoltà non è alta, ma serve comunque ragionarci un po' per capire cosa fare. La colonna sonora e la grafica rendono il tutto ancora più bello, fino all'ultimo momento in cui si capirà esattamente il senso della storia (facendo cadere anche qualche lacrimuccia). Completabile in 5-6 ore nei suoi 4 capitoli, non penso valga comunque il prezzo pieno di 34,99€. 10€ sarebbe un prezzo ragionevole, per premiare anche gli sviluppatori. Lo si trova anche a meno.

[b] Voto finale 7,8/10 [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198049082084', 'num_games_owned': 368, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 747, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 740, 'last_played': 1583357283}
review:
И ни один не понял игру правильно. ни в одном обзоре про это ни слова. Суть игры не в том, что это всё изображает якобы отец. Неа, суть игры в том, что на том свете люди также переживают. Это как где-то было написано, мол, оплакивать людей нехорошо, они на том свете все мокрые ходят. Игру я рекомендую брать по скидке. Концовка навзрыд и за это плюс. Также отмечу что некоторые локации похожи на локации из скайрима. Там есть местный аналог каирна душ и двемерских пещер. 

Но я крайне недоволен затянутостью игры, игра затянута безумно, я  вторую и третью локации проходил стиснув зубы. Говорят, что легкие головоломки и играть от этого неинтересно.  Лично для меня головоломки были такими трудными, что, посмотря их решение в интернете, я офигевал от того, что я каким-тто образом должен был сам допереть до этого. Да, получается, что сюжет классный, главный герой и окружающие его персонажи красивые, но как-то оно играется ооочень долго, и ты ждешь, когда же оно закончится. Но под конец игра оживает. любителям железа скажу что моя рыкса жрала 170 ватт при пониженной частоте в 1508 мгц. Игра очень прожорливая, несмотря на незамысловатую графику. Но игра правда красивая. Обзор писался на свежую голову после прохождения, от того и сумбурный. Ловите от ящера сердечко, если прочли до конца <3

author: {'steamid': '76561197985232409', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 301, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 301, 'last_played': 1582492105}
review:
This is probably the most visually and aurally beautiful game I've played. If you want to spend 5 hours or so hitting the screenshot key and saying "wow" audibly, then at least consider this. 

It's also an amazingly intuitive game. I an only assume that the designers did a ridiculous amount of playtesting to make every element of the game immediately clear. There was literally only one time in the entire game when I spent any time wandering around with no clear goal. This is despite it being a game with no tutorial, no dialogue, and with puzzles that feature teleportation and other elements that make that even more difficult.

That out of the way, this is a puzzle game. The puzzles are a mix of figuring how to get from one place to another by climbing and jumping, or making use of devices and objects in the world to do something. The best comparison I can think of is something like Tomb Raider or Enslaved: Odyssey to the West without the combat.

The plot is great, if you don't mind allusive mythopoetic nonsense. If you demand a plot be a group of opposed people trying to accomplish divergent goals or some such thing, then you'll be disappointed. There is no dialogue in the game, and, while it does come together at the end, it mostly consists of people doing allusive and enigmatic stuff in a world with its own logic. 

Overall, I think it was a fantastic experience.
