author: {'steamid': '76561198100944531', 'num_games_owned': 709, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 324, 'last_played': 1509594103}
review:
When RiME was first announced it went way under my radar. However when I won a giveaway for this game I decided to give it a try, and boy was I happy I did. I personally love these types of games, and RiME definitely filled a hole in me that I didn't even know I had. RiME is not for everyone, but for the niche audience it is for, you are in for one ride, and it is one hell of a ride.
[i]Note: the game does suffer from some minor optimization issues, but is more than playable[/i] 
[h1]GRAPHICS[/h1] 
RiME's artstyle and visuals are the best I have every seen. Every frame is awe-inspiring, with crisp textures and an amazing artstyle that is reminiscent of Abzu or The Witness. I found myself stopping and admiring the environment every minute or so, it's that good. Animations look amazing and feel extremely smooth. RiME also focuses on letting the player take a high ground and observe the entire area that they just explored and that only adds to how beautiful this game already is. 
SCORE 10/10 
[h1]GAMEPLAY[/h1] 
RiME is a game mostly about exploration and puzzle solving. Puzzles are fairly easy and don't require too much thought to be put into them, but they are enjoyable and have some great concepts behind them. Puzzles feel like they are built into the environment, which makes them feel natural. Exploration is enjoyable, mostly due to the fact on how amazing the graphics are. However, most of the game is a walking simulator which might be a problem for some people, but not for others. RiME is also a fairly short game, only being 5-6 hours long, which wasn't that big of a problem for me since it's obvious to see how much the developers tried to put in into those 5-6 hours.  
SCORE 8/10 
[h1]AUDIO[/h1] 
The musical score in RiME is fantastic. The music is incredibly relaxing and matches the tone of the game perfectly. I'm not a big fan of classical music, but RiME's soundtrack obviously has so many emotions thrown into it that it's hard not to appreciate it. I'm not really a music guy so there's not much else I can say other than the music really is amazing. 
SCORE 9/10 
[h1]STORY[/h1] 
After playing through the game and reflecting on the story I am truly amazed. There is no real lore about what is going on around you, but the characters and the deeper meaning behind the story are extremely well made. There is no dialogue, just the environment and a few cutscenes. That only makes the story more interesting and makes you want to find out about the world around you. The only gripe that I have with the story is that it is way too cryptic. It's ok to have your story just be the environment and few cutscenes and to make you think about the story, but there is a real lack of explanation for a lot of things, at least a point in the right direction would go a long way to helping everyone understand the story. 
SCORE 8/10
[h1]SUMMARY[/h1] 
RiME is one of the most beautiful exploration game that I have ever played, with great music and an interesting story. However, the story is a bit cryptic and it's a bit short. Apart from that though, I would say RiME is one of the coolest games I've played in 2017.
[i]OVERALL SCORE 8.75 [u]GREAT[/u]
+Amazing artstyle 
+Great music 
+Nice exploration 
+Great story 
~Game is a bit short
~The game is mostly a walking simulator 
-Story is unnecessarily cryptic 
[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198394191336', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 382, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 298, 'last_played': 1504689035}

author: {'steamid': '76561198427167390', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 906, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 873, 'last_played': 1516334044}
review:
如果你是剧情党，你喜欢看电影和追剧，游戏代入感强；
如果你喜欢奇幻风格，画面感强的游戏；
如果你喜欢玩场景探索类的游戏；
那么你一定要来玩这部游戏，它不会让你失望。

非常喜欢这款游戏。游戏最大亮点就是美妙的画面与背景音乐，再加上它们与剧情的结合非常紧密，让人流连回味。游戏中还有很多小细节，比如在不同场景按喊叫键，小孩会作出很多不同的反应。

但是我还是想提出一些重要建议，希望你们可以采纳：

1：游戏优化确实比较差，毕竟这是游戏不是电影，游戏性才是最主要的！所以强烈建议改进，否则非常影响游戏体验。
2：游戏解谜过于简单。 希望能够提高难度，（尤其是第二，三章）否则很多玩家会感到无聊乏味。
3：希望增加一些收集品的奖励，比如额外剧情或关卡，让玩家不是为了做任务才去收集。毕竟这是休闲类的游戏，如果剧情关卡方面没有新奇的地方，很多人会没有耐心重新玩。

本人属于非常感性的剧情党，又喜欢旅游，所以很喜欢这款游戏。个人给予9/10的评分。 但是，更多的还是理性玩家，所以适当的改进还是非常有必要的，否则会流失很多本该喜欢它的玩家。
希望你们多加改进，越做越好！！

author: {'steamid': '76561197979867148', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 529, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 529, 'last_played': 1509928033}
review:
What the others said, overprized for 5-6 hours, at $15 ($10 on sale) I might have recommended it. More "walking through giant rooms" - which is a beautifull experience! - but a lot of running around and searching for clues than actual puzzle. Well, maybe for children aged 10-12 because it's so easy, but then, the end is not really for children... Maybe for casual gamers who just need some time out in a lovely environment.

I feel like the psychology lesson is a bit too much in your face, like Whispered World (hated the end). Papo & Yo was more fun (the end felt okay), and it gets nowhere near the sadness and beauty of "To the Moon".

author: {'steamid': '76561198084266823', 'num_games_owned': 51, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1497963752}
review:
Misterio, belleza, amistad y encanto serian los primeros adjetivos que le pondria a este juego de Tequila Works, el recorido se hizo largo tras su primera presentacion en la Gamescom de Sony, paso por altos y bajos incluso con el riesgo de no salir nunca, suerte la nuestra la historia acaba bien y al fin pudimos difrutar del juego. Siempre soy partidario de apoyar todo lo que sea local, de proximidad y siendo el estudio español sentí la necesidad de apoyarlo econicamente y probarlo. Todo lo que voy a comentar esta basado en mi opinion personal con echos del juego que a mi parecer son objetivos. 

Positivo
Lo primiero e indiscutible es su apartado artistico el cual podriamos describir como colorido, bello e misterioso. Lugares externos que recuerdan al mediterraneo y lugares internos de civilizaciones perdidas. 

Esta pintura en movimiento no podia ser acompañada con tal epica banda sonora que en mas de una ocasion te remueve por dento, sublime de lo mejor del juego y me atrevo a decir a la altura de otros juegos similares. 

Estos dos puntos anteriores para mi son lo indiscutuble del juego a partir de aqui son cosas que para muchos seran diferentes:

La historia es buena, no esperes nada epico ni tampoco algo nulo, la histria se cuenta a traves del mundo , su banda sonora y las pocas cinematicas que se encuentran. Durante la aventura puedes incluso deducir una historia que al final resulta ser otra, en muchos tramos te emociona. 

A resumidas cuentas si te gustan los juegos tipo Journey o Abzu no lo dudes compralo. Con un pero...

El juego se basa en los puzles y si esperas algun reto de ello este no es tu juego ya que personalmente la mayoria de ellos son relativamente fáciles, bajo mi punto de vista no es algo malo ya que creo que el tipo de historia no le encaja unos puzles demasiado complicados pero debes tener eso en cuenta

Tecnologicamente hablando tube algunos problemas de frame rate y creo que podria estar mas bien optimizado.

Personalmente el juego me ha llegado, me ha emocionado y asombrado a partes iguales, si buscas una experiencia unica no debes perdertelo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007740462', 'num_games_owned': 216, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 440, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 440, 'last_played': 1509631612}
review:
The game is very pretty and athmospheric, but is lacking in many ways:

- Very short for the pricetag, ~5h of playtime. Can spend some more time finding unlockables and bonus objectives, but those are not very rewarding or tell any additional story.
- Pathing and puzzles are too obvious and leave no room for problem solving - everything that is interactable is clearly marked out for you already
- Game forcibly changes camera angle when climbing, sometimes in a very inconvenient way for mouse&keyboard

Overall, it is not awful, but wouldn't recommend

author: {'steamid': '76561198048466164', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 945, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 945, 'last_played': 1509526544}
review:
非常優秀的小品遊戲。
悠揚的音樂，充滿情境的畫面，探索奇幻的小島，讓人可以很用悠閒的心情去玩。
解謎都不難，比較難的是找到隱密的物品，相對解謎更注重探索。
如果想要來一個奇妙的旅行，這場少年的奇幻冒險絕對不會失望。
全力推薦!

review: Bra hittills, även om pusslen inledningsvis är triviala. Grafiken är dock fantastisk och påminner om Firewatch och i viss mån The Witness. Vackert och minnesvärt, får mig gång på gång att stanna upp och bara titta. Stämningsfull musik.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974974308', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 301, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 226, 'last_played': 1512950014}
review:
I wanted to like this because of how visually poetic it is.

But it makes me dizzy to play it for more than 30 or 40 mins at a time, which kinda ruins immersion.
It's weird because I can play fast-paced Overwatch just fine.

I have a suspicion that Unreal Engine's input lag is just horrendous, or this particular camera implementation doesn't account for people like me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040674621', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 767, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 767, 'last_played': 1509810100}
review:
Hello,
Entre le son et les paysages, l'ambiance est tout simplement captivante, les enigmes sont compliquées mais pas indépassables, il suffit juste de comprendre la logique qui est à l'oeuvre. Les déplacements du personnage sont relativement aisés, sauf le coté SuperMario qui m'agace dans ce genre de jeu, mais c'est juste personnel, Malheureusement j'ai rencontré quelques bugs, n'en déplaise à Solarius, Bref, mis à part ce détail, je recommande ce jeu, belle leçon de vie...
Bon jeu !

author: {'steamid': '76561198275927405', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 382, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 370, 'last_played': 1591513484}
review:
[quote=奴隸騎士希爾薇]叽咪叽咪评测师招募中，免费领KEY[url=https://jq.qq.com/?_wv=1027&k=5fHaxv2] 点击加入叽咪评测团	[/url]
欢迎关注[url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/GimmGimm#curation] 叽咪叽咪鉴赏家	[/url] 
图文评测：[url=http://www.gimmgimm.com/article/info?id=11753]rime——一份静谧的无言旋律[/url]
[/quote]
Rime是一款动作冒险解谜游戏，由西班牙制作团队Tequila Works开发。这款被称为向ICO致敬的游戏，在第一眼看来，其美丽如吉卜力的画风，静谧的音乐着实吸引了一大批玩家。此前本作由索尼投资并作为ps独占作品推出，但是开发团队收回了游戏版权并在全平台推出，如此的雄心壮志，加上游戏美丽的外表，却难以掩盖游戏本质的不足。

游戏的故事在一位倒在沙滩上的皮肤黝黑的男孩身上开始，醒来后，完全陌生的小岛，白如象牙的高塔和石块，绿意盎然的风景衬托下，美丽无比，这就是小岛的面貌。玩家要做的就是操控小男孩去探索，发现小岛的秘密。作品一开始没有给出任何的背景，也没有任何台词，所有的剧情发生都靠角色的互动来阐述，随着剧情的推进，这些谜团慢慢地在回忆慢慢拼凑起来，最后在一波反转后水落石出。剧情叙述总的来说非常不错，在男孩和小狐狸相遇，到在飞行的怪物爪下逃生，再到剧终同伴的付出奉献，这些点总能抓住玩家的心，使游戏本身不落俗套。

游戏本身并不是很复杂，作为一个解密类游戏，没有塞尔达那样的战斗系统和养成系统，玩家只需要在建筑的突出位进行攀爬，或者利用呼喊、视角错位、光线来触发机关，这些解谜起初都很有意思，但是到了游戏后期，游戏解谜仍然还是围绕着这些元素，缺乏一定的解谜深度，比起它的前辈，《风之旅人》、《ICO》甚至手机平台的《纪念碑谷》，解谜成分上是差了一截。同时在解谜难度上，还是那种很容易就能解出的难度，玩家基本不会卡关，在旅游观光看剧情的层面上，这样做也不是不可以，但是作为一款解谜游戏，少了令玩家解谜成功产生的成就感、巧妙感，当然也不会有二周目的游玩。

游戏地图比较开放，场景做得都很不错，但是那么大的地图，互动还是零星地散落在游戏各个角落里，玩家虽然可以攀爬、游泳，但是地图还是很空洞，有很多完全无用的巷道，大部分玩家的时间都浪费在赶路上，好在主线关卡的地图设计还不错，利用率很高，往往在开启机关后原本的路会发生变化。同样游戏还有很多收集要素，不过这些收集要素对于剧情的推进没有任何帮助，完全不痛不痒，要不是那些成就摆在那，玩家非常容易缺乏收集的动力。

游戏的画风十分清新，令人神往，这一点是毋庸置疑的，在制作组强大的美术功底下，那个充满惬意风景的海上小岛呈现在我们面前，建筑风格又有点希腊古建筑的风格，而地下建筑则有埃及建筑的风格，得益于虚幻4引擎强大的表现能力，这些风景加上漂亮的光影，还真是让玩家流连忘返。

游戏BGM十分迎合游戏的风景，有时玩家可能察觉不到它的存在，但是在解开机关后音乐悠扬地响起也是十分拨人心弦。没有激昂顿挫的激情，没有印象深刻的旋律，仅仅靠细致入微的音符牵动玩家的耳朵，或许这就是制作组强大的表现力的体现。

Rime仅仅只有6个小时的游玩时长，没有复杂的系统，不需要玩家耗费太多的脑力和时间，只需找一个安静的下午，推完这款游戏，或许可以像读到一本沁人心脾的小书一样，带来的感悟也许超过了游戏本身的价值。

优点：
+清新的画风
+不错的BGM
+剧情叙述方式很好

缺点：
-解谜过于简易
-地图空洞，收集无聊

总结：适合休闲玩家，但不建议原价购买

author: {'steamid': '76561198290897430', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1929, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 480, 'last_played': 1629351258}

author: {'steamid': '76561198047996189', 'num_games_owned': 197, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1509627865}

author: {'steamid': '76561198207837927', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 833, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 833, 'last_played': 1507771102}
review:
going into RiME, i expected to love it. everything hinted at something that i would enjoy - a mysterious island, a cryptic story to uncover, and a challenging or at least perplexing puzzle game.

unfortunately, the game failed to deliver on all of those parts.

i had major issues with this game, but i'm still recommending it for a couple reasons. one, the final sequence of the game's story almost made the game worth my money - without any spoilers, it was emotional, heartwrenching, and wondrous. it was the perfection that i had anticipated from the game beforehand. and two - even with these major flaws, i still ended up enjoying RiME and what it had to offer, an beautiful artwork and art style that it presented so wonderfully.

one of the main problems i had with RiME was the lack of what it promised to offer. story clips were only found at around 5 points within the 8-hour game and never lasted more than a minute or so, and were often disappointing and had so little emotional impact. most seemed like they were sped up and went by so fast that the watcher had little time to wonder and realize what was going on. even the final sequences, which i loved, were so short and felt like they could definitely be much longer and magnify that impression of emotions on the player.

but that's not to mention that the story didn't have its good parts either. i enjoyed the plot and how the events of the story were implied and ultimately left to the player to figure out. the final sequences almost had me in tears, and it was nice to see a story that was definitive but also left some details up to the player to decide on what had happened.

another problem i had were the puzzles. for a puzzle-game that even developed its own interesting mechanics and puzzle devices, the puzzles themselves never really developed beyond go-get-that-block or pull-this. they clearly were thought to be second-hand to the story, which was disappointing because the story didn’t really live up to its expectations. increasing the puzzle difficulty a little more i feel would interest the players a little more, and especially make the game more interesting in its slower areas.

then there are the collectibles. these are interesting and fun to find in your first playthrough, but the sheer amount of them (about 30-50 i would hazard) made me annoyed as i went through the 8-hour game again to find them, and my reward was often nothing more than a worthless sentence in the final moments, a brief song clip, a playable costume, or even simply an image on the menu screen. there needed to be a better reward system in place besides some simple achievement that made these worthwhile to the player.

a final problem i had were some faulty mechanics and frame rate issues. the art and shadow quality is automatically set to high, which stifled the frame rate even with a fairly good computer (i'm no expert on computer specs). i had to lower both to medium quality which was ultimately weird as when playing i didn't seem to find any major difference between the medium and high quality. and with the mechanics, there were about three major problems, and all of them had to do with ledges. RiME, for some reason, has a "boundary" on edges of cliffs and such where the character wobbles around like he's about to fall off a cliff whenever he's on a ledge, which was helpful in some cases where i would rather not fall off, and not helpful in others where i was purposefully trying to jump down. and the fact that the player controls the camera on some ledges made the controls very weird depending on the camera angle – almost like the forward button meant left or vice versa, and somehow when the camera control was fixed it was also annoying, as i either couldn't see where i was supposed to go or i missed that lack of freedom with the camera. and that's not even mentioning the problems i had RiME's death animation. pretty much the only way to die is to get your soul sucked out by vicious passive-aggressive dementors or to jump off a cliff. the soul-sucking is fine, i guess. but when you jump off a cliff, within a millisecond the game realizes that you're gonna die and the screen goes black and you respawn. there's nothing interesting about the animation. for example, what if, when you fell off a cliff, you could watch the boy fall right until he was about to hit the ground and then the black screen? this gives the player more emotional connection with the character and a better reason to not try and jump off cliffs.

but that's not to say i didn't love RiME. again, without any spoilers, i loved the final moments of the game, and i really enjoyed the atmosphere, artwork, and even the story at times. i'm not so certain that it's worth its full price of $30, (maybe at $20 or $15 is a better price) but i enjoyed my time with RiME overall, and i'm certain that if you're into these types of games that you will, too.

author: {'steamid': '76561198314879023', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 1227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1073, 'last_played': 1589105089}
review:
刚一周目通关
一开始被这个游戏的画风吸引，真的太美，每一眼都那么让人惊艳。
音乐也是，每一次响起都恰到好处，氛围营造得太棒了。
主角动作的细节超可爱，撞到墙壁啊还有从太高的地方跳下来然后会摔倒的动作非常棒（这种时候好怕主角摔坏了忍不住感到抱歉hhh
剧情的话，看到其他评测说【背向真理】，这四个字的概括足矣。在看完结局再去看每一关的标题时，恍然大悟。
以及好容易错过收集要素啊！！每次意识到自己错过了之后都感觉错过了一个亿！！（急得脱发

author: {'steamid': '76561198277643549', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 673, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1594975867}
review: 童话故事般的开始，却是一个悲痛的结局，最终父子二人的释怀让人很有触动，开始轻松愉快游戏氛围一直到最后的压抑，小男孩一次次的解谜了解自己的身世，最终得知事情原委甘愿化作一颗星辰，让人玩到最后觉得心里很不是滋味，游戏的每一帧画面都是精美的壁纸，对我来说这种风格还是很喜欢的，游戏氛围很好，不足的就是有时候会卡贞帧，总之好评不解释

author: {'steamid': '76561198058852804', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 829, 'playtime_forever': 784, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 760, 'last_played': 1696859500}
review:
Хорошая во многих отношения простенькая адвенчурка.
Есть только один минус. Хуевая оптимизация. 18 кадров на 980ti, это надо было постараться. Причем ничего такого графически сложного тут нет. Игра выглядит хорошо за счет работы художников, а не какого-то супер навороченого графена. Ну и музыка тут очень не дурна.

Конечно берите.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032892475', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 842, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 842, 'last_played': 1508600202}
review:
This is one of those games you absolutely don't play for its mechanics and general gameplay. This game is an interesting experience that you will enjoy for its visuals and amazing Soundtrack, as well as its story. I finished it in five hours without collecting anything and then went back and replayed the levels to find the collectibles. You can see how much time I have put just into finding them and re-interpreting the story (which is kind of simbolic).

Overall I loved it and would recommend if you're into this sort of game. Bit expensive though, would wait for a sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198139384583', 'num_games_owned': 70, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 751, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 393, 'last_played': 1607076852}

author: {'steamid': '76561198193211899', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 339, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 339, 'last_played': 1503971432}
review:
Tengo sentimientos encontrados con este juego . 
-partiré por lo malo . es corto . algunas veces el juego se volvia realmente lento con tanta geometria y lo mas extraño era que el menu ponia lento todo el juego .
- ahora lo medio (ni bueno ni malo) no tienes una barra de hp por lo que "no puedes morir" pero hay enemigos que te chupan el alma y eso cuenta como morir o si caes a un abismo vuelves . especialmente para gente que quiere relajarse y no andar sufriendo por que el personaje se esta por morir. 
-ahora lo bueno . es triste y melancolico pero rompe el esquema de hacer escenarios tristes y melancolicos , transmiten otra cosa ...esperanza ,su diseño de niveles es bastante bueno .los colores bien cuidados y con cierto guiños a wind waker (sobre todo esa torre sospechozamente parecida a la torre de los dioses del juego antes mencionado y si bien los niveles son pasilleros te dejan la libertad de ir a buscar otras cosas conforme avanzas. la musica es hermosa .la historia se cuenta sin palabras asi que conforme lo vez puedes hacerte una idea de que esta pasando .
-comprenlo solo si esta en oferta eso si

author: {'steamid': '76561198067073758', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 479, 'last_played': 1631476071}
review:
The Pros and Cons are listed under the video review link!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nErrNv30EVs

Pros:

+Gorgeous Graphics
+Amazing Music
+Good size world
+similar to Journey and ICO in some respects.
+6 hours of content (add 2-3 MORE hours if your going for 100%)
+the game actually makes for a more interesting second playthrough.

Cons

-Gameplay while changes throughout the game, is not deep enough, did get a little tired of the game by the end.
-lack of character upgrades like faster running hurts this game slightly, considering all the exporing you'll be doing if you plan to go for a 100%


Conclusion: 

all in all, i would say the game is worth its asking price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044637516', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 345, 'last_played': 1508787792}
review:
Ce jeu est une petite perle vidéoludique.

Bien qu'on puisse le voir comme un jeu aventure/énigmes, il s'agit surtout d'un jeu qui vous reposera.

Il n'offre pas de grande difficulté, mais il offre beaucoup de poésie: entre musiques sublimes, décors grandiose et graph unique.

Seul défaut : sa durée de vie . Le jeu a un goùt de trop peu, on aimerai en voir plus.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048194711', 'num_games_owned': 2062, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 282, 'last_played': 1508723512}
review:
Líbí se vám hra ABZU? Tak to teprve zkuste tuto úžasnou hru RiME, která je stylem velmi podobná právě zminovanému ABZU. Ale tady mi hra přijde mnohem více dotaženější a graficky zase úplně trošku na jiném levelu.

Příjemná a uklidňující hra s úžasným hudebním doprovodem a zajímavým "SCI-FI" příběhem, který vás rozhodně nadchne a nepustí od hry, dokud nezjistíte co je za tím zač a co se stane když uděláte určité kroky ve hře.

Jediné co mě v této hře trošku zklamalo je konec hry, který jsem očekával trošku jiný a více epický, ale rozhodně neurazí a do konceptu této hry se asi hodí.

Hra má zhruba asi 4 hodiny hrací dobu, když budete zkoumat všudepřítomné místnůstky a prostory, zabere vám to ještě více času. Já se spíše zajímal o hlavní děj této hry. Hra není vůbec náročná, jak jsem psal na začátku jedná se spíše o relaxační hru - doporučuji zahrát po těžkém dni v práci (tak jako já), a rozhodně se od hry neodtrhnete :)

Hru vřele doporučuji, za ty peníze určitě stojí. Hru jsem každopádně dostal zdarma.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010824387', 'num_games_owned': 721, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 248, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 248, 'last_played': 1508841778}
review: The Witness, but infinitely less pretentious.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971537739', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 598, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 598, 'last_played': 1508666874}
review:
RiME is a beautifully crafted atmospheric exploration game.  However, don’t let the product’s screenshots and trailer cinematic fool you… because when you finish it, the narrative will leave you heartbroken, and very possibly a bad aftertaste; YMMV.

Also, there seems to be some serious optimization issues with the game’s highest graphics settings that causes severe framerate drops.  I played on 2nd highest setting due to that, since the minor drop of sharpness didn’t bother me.

Despite all that, I still recommend this game, especially if it’s on a discount.  Maybe because it being wordless, atmospheric, touring of dreamy and exotic landscape really being my cup of tea.  When you are prepared for the revealed truth of this gorgeous journey being less of a happy ending, sail onto RiME, and let your emotion be the current, from a veiled denial to the final acceptance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122939353', 'num_games_owned': 613, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 292, 'last_played': 1508576265}
review:
Ho avuto la fortuna di ricevere questo gioco gratuitamente, altrimenti chissà tra quanto l’avrei comprato.
È davvero un gioco stupendo: il comparto audio/visivo è qualcosa di sublime, la storia si capisce a poco a poco ma il finale è qualcosa di davvero commovente…
Il gioco in sé è abbastanza lineare: vai avanti, risolvi l’enigma, esplora un poco la zona e ripeti, ma a me la cosa non è dispiaciuta per niente, anzi, alla fine ti trascina in maniera molto piacevole nell’atmosfera.
Consiglio davvero a tutti di giocarlo, sono pochi i giochi che fanno provare certe emozioni.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989113198', 'num_games_owned': 446, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1508353848}
review:
Даже не думал, что когда-то поиграю в эту игру, но Nvidia порадовали, дали ключик через Geforce Experiense.
Я эту игру не ждал, не хотел в нее играть, так как изначально визуально она мне показалась схожей с играми от SCE Japan studios (Ico, Shadow of the Colossus), а мне они очень не нравтся своим вялым геймплеем и не совсем дружелюбным управлением.
Но вот сегодня я получил эту игру. Играть я только начал, потратил на нее буквально час, но уже могу скзаать, что игра мне нравится. Я считаю, что у нее есть что-то общее с недавно вышедшей LoZ: Breath of the wild. И это не только визуальный дизайн. Помимо него тут имеются довольно интересные головоломки, также основанные на физике, великолепная музыка и звуковые эффекты и наполненная живностью природа. 
Я обязательно пройду эту игру до конца, а также советую ее всем любителям головоломок и расслабляющего завораживющего геймплея.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073288587', 'num_games_owned': 622, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 330, 'last_played': 1508166403}
review: Fantastic game. Beautiful visual. Great music. Logic-based puzzle gameplay that's more fun than difficult. A real exploration experience and a triumph in level design. Simplistic but heavy-hitting storyline. Amazing.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993587145', 'num_games_owned': 478, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1072, 'last_played': 1523968207}
review:
Właśnie ukończyłem RIME. Mam trochę podobne emocje jak po ukończeniu INSIDE. Fantastyczna koncepcja gry z punktu widzenia psychologa. Mogę polecić RIME osobom uważającym gry za dziedzinę sztuki (piękna grafika i muzyka) i szukającym wzruszeń. Co ciekawe, deweloper RIME to ta sama ekipa, która stoi za DEADLIGHT.

Nie chcę spoilować, ale napiszę tylko, że po ukończeniu tej gry mam ochotę przytulić moją córeczkę :)))

author: {'steamid': '76561198079602187', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 379, 'last_played': 1508188485}
review:
Une belle fable poétique, mais nous laissant radicalement sur notre faim.

Si Rime est séduisant par ses très beaux graphismes et son level design attrayant qui tend vers le mystérieux et invite à la découverte, ses puzzle-games minimalistes, ses problèmes de caméra qui peuvent être très agaçants et sa trop faible durée de vie coupent net dans le joli paysage. 
C'est un jeu qu'on prend grand plaisir à parcourir, mais ne vous attendez pas à un chef d'oeuvre. Rime n'est pas un must du genre. 

L'intrigue aurait gagnée à être développée, la fin du jeu donne l'impression d'avoir été lamentablement bâclée, on a l'impression de nous avoir coupé l'herbe sous le pied.  

Dommage car il avait pourtant de bons éléments pour être un bon jeu, comme ses environements très réussis. 

Rime n'est malheureusement pas à la hauteur de ses ambitions.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083454801', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 445, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 405, 'last_played': 1508187589}
review:
Rime es una obra maestra.  Visualmente, es precioso. Su banda sonora es espectacular. Su jugabilidad y animaciones, lejos de ser perfectos, son el medio perfecto para contar la historia.

Pero sin duda alguna, y como padre que soy, lo mas importante del juego es lo que transmite. El camino que se recorre y el mensaje que se traslada al jugador, es sin duda lo que hace de este juego tan especial.

Gracias Tequila, por habernos ofrecido esta joya, y sobre todo, porque me habeis ayudado a recordar las cosas importantes de la vida.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991940743', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 919, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 812, 'last_played': 1508099716}

author: {'steamid': '76561198005634226', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 467, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 467, 'last_played': 1507817851}
review:
Un grand jeu.

Loin d'un simple walking simulator, ce jeu se présente comme un jeu d'exploration dans de grands niveaux recellant nombre de choses cachées. L'univers est dépicté en utilisant un style graphique absolument phénoménal et la narration est amenée assez subtilement, il est ainsi possible de déduire le sens des différents niveaux en payant attention. L'histoire est d'ailleurs porté par des personnages muets auxquels on se surprend à réellement s'attacher.

Le gameplay accuse quelques écueils dûs au genre: certaines plateformes qui devraient être accessible ne le sont pas et certains angles de caméras sont problématiques, mais rien de foncièrement raté en soit, le gameplay reste solide pour ce qu'il a à offrir.

Bref, je vous incite fortement à vous le procurer pour vous rendre compte par vous-même et pour entendre l'histoire qui vous est contée dans ce titre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198206745960', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 439, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 439, 'last_played': 1507724737}
review:
通关纪念！


画面 8.5/10
景色真棒啊..印象最深的就是孤岛白塔,还有第四章的大雨滂沱,可惜配置带不动全特效

音乐 10/10
BGM随着剧情的发展层层递进,非常唯美 非常沉浸

我刚玩的时候感觉是个幸福的故事
staff表结束了我还是思考着着结局一脸懵逼
直到我看到每个章节的名字
Denial-Anger-Bargaining-Depression-Acceptance
突然发现这几个词描述了人们面对死亡的五个阶段，
我才明白这个游戏想要表达的内涵

author: {'steamid': '76561198046311355', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 111, 'playtime_forever': 683, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 484, 'last_played': 1694040028}
review:
I'm at a loss why Steam responds to certain games with absolutely overwhelming support, and then lets other games like Fossil Echo or Papo and Yo just sit there. Seems like the arthouse crowd is sometimes too lazy to buy anything on this platform, and some people have absurd expectations with budget titles, which is a shame because games like this deserve better sales. 

Rime is an amazing experience. It's as simple as that. I played this on PS4, and all I can say is the graphics are even better here, and the FPS is a solid 60 on my 1070/2600K setup with 1080p. Anything more and you might run into some troubles without better hardware.

It's totally acceptable that this game wears its inspiration on its sleeves, and yet who cares when it all comes together this well? Miyazaki films, Joaquín Sorolla paintings, and the games Journey and Ico come to mind. This world is so profoundly lovely and attractive that I can basically overlook almost any flaws with the game.

The gameplay experience is actually soothing and fun to me, and I enjoy a very wide variety of games and difficulties across genres. No, you aren't going to be challenged like some SMB platformer or a PUBG gun game. It's not meant to be that way. It wouldn't even work that way. This is a relaxing puzzle game that swings toward the easier side, but it makes up for it with a decent amount of collectibles, and the game never overstays its welcome.

The graphics and world here are like some amalgamation of a Miyazaki film, Wind Waker, and ABZU/Ico. Honestly, I wasn't sure I was going to be impressed by their world, as there is limited interaction, but it is actually a breathtaking accomplishment. I am injecting SMAA at 1080p and the image quality is fantastic. While not overly detailed the bloomy resonance of the island recalls games like Ico and Shadow of the Colossus in tone to the point you really got to congratulate the team of 18 people in Spain that made this over the years. It was a struggle, but what a diamond that struggle birthed. There is just something wonderful about running around a deserted place that has no equivalency in the modern world.

I cannot help but love this thing. It's too charming to hate, too pretty to leave behind, and overall the experience is something that the whole family can enjoy. You would think there would be a bigger audience for such an indie, but with time more and more people will find this gem as it releases on all the platforms.

Anyone looking for a beautiful world spanning day and night that wants to solve a few puzzles and gaze at some gorgeous visuals is in for a treat here. Some of the collectibles are hidden fairly well and will take some logical thinking to collect. It's all very peaceful and heartwarming. Highly recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051782095', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 811, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 531, 'last_played': 1552853869}
review:
Sei Enu, bimbo di 8 anni spiaggiato su un'isola fertile ma priva di altra presenza umana. Tuttavia non sei un naufrago alla "Robinson Crusoe": questo non è un gioco di sopravvivenza in senso stretto, ma in senso lato. Infatti dovrai sopravvivere agli enigmi insidiosi e alle altre presenze che allignano l'isola, mentre scoprirai, tramite frammenti e flashback, chi tu sia e cosa tu faccia qui.

Puzzle abbastanza semplici, grafica cartoonesca e colonna sonora dolce non traggano in inganno: l'apparenza cela una realtà profonda come l'oceano. 
Non sarà molto longevo, ma la presenza di numerosi collezionabili vi porterà ad assaporarlo più di una volta.

review: Assim o jogo e bem lindo e tem uma jogabilidade bem interessante e historia mais ainda mas em desempenho e otimizacao deixa a desejar bastante pq em um i7 7700 e uma GTX 1080 rodar a 30 fps e meio bugado n ?! mass o jogo e bem legal ate onde joguei mas tem mt a se ver ainda , achei diferente dos demais

author: {'steamid': '76561198147567052', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 243, 'playtime_forever': 349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 349, 'last_played': 1507327095}
review:
Rime conta a história de um garoto ao sofrer um acidente com sua embarcação em meio a uma tempestade. O game faz isso através de uma jogabilidade puramente intuitiva e sem qualquer diálogo ou orientação. A história é bastante profunda nos conceitos sobre a negação, a raiva, a negociação, a depressão e a aceitação.

Os puzzles são simples mas ao mesmo tempo conseguem cativar o jogador a continuar o seu caminho na busca da verdade.

Os gráficos são cartunescos de uma arte belíssima. A sonoridade é relaxante e reflexiva.

Para quem gosta de uma história imersiva, uma jogabilidade simples mas prazerosa, Rime é o jogo da vez.

author: {'steamid': '76561198408975608', 'num_games_owned': 54, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 422, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 251, 'last_played': 1514384349}

author: {'steamid': '76561197970364091', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 247, 'playtime_forever': 340, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 340, 'last_played': 1507236323}
review:
5/10

Agotador el intento desesperado por sacarte la lagrimita. Incluso la música, que es sublime, llega a ser cansina de abusivo que es el uso emotivo que intentan darle. Juro que deseaba en algunos momentos que parara. Algo así como el tic tac de la banda sonora de Dunkerke pero aplicado a la emotividad.

Lo siento, porque es un producto patrio, pero no he conectado con la narrativa (o ausencia de ella). La impresión final que he tenido es la de alguien intentando imitar a Fumito Ueda sin tener muy claro qué hace que sus juegos dejen huella más allá de lo obvio.

author: {'steamid': '76561198370166896', 'num_games_owned': 445, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 614, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 268, 'last_played': 1577179297}
review: 以水为镜，我自塔顶，向下追寻，下面是无尽的深渊，令人恐惧，我看到的，是未知和死亡。当黑夜为我反转，星空变换，海风将我的斗篷吹向山巅，日月是我的眸子，河流是我的眼泪，我为何如此的悲伤，像被遗忘的古迹那样沉重的往事，我记不起来，乌云密布，闪电帮我驱逐梦魇，波涛，黑暗，愤怒，我平静了下来，无尽的懊恼是我愈发黑暗的源头，我寻着桎梏与枷链，潜入深渊，冰冷的水侵蚀着我，无法逃脱，我唯一的依赖离开了，去了再也到不了这里的远方，他的牺牲为我换来温暖，光明，一扇扇门被打开，真相扑面而来，我感受到了悲伤，亦感受到了安抚，释怀与解脱，是时候了，我看了看这颠倒的高塔，纵身一跃，扑向海面..........以海为镜，我自塔底，向上追寻，越过谜团的镜像，我看到的，是对称的天堂。           ——RIME

author: {'steamid': '76561198040672086', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 11180, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11076, 'last_played': 1524100959}

author: {'steamid': '76561197970653174', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 238, 'playtime_forever': 393, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 393, 'last_played': 1507057198}
review:
This... is a seriously good experience.

On the superficial end of things, it has excellent music and level design.  It's not tough, but it doesn't need to be.

On the harder-to-implement end of things, such as character development and storytelling, is where it _truly_ shines.

Don't go into this expecting "Teh Bestest Game in All The Univerrrrse!" - nothing can live up to that.

Instead, expect to be wandering around, confused, for the 1st level, and then the game will slowly come together in your mind.

Oh, and one tip: Aiming your cursor in the air and holding 'E' will throw whatever you're carrying a little ways - okay, the one puzzle that relied on that just sucked because the game doesn't tutor you on the mechanic.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066959401', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 319, 'last_played': 1506261738}
review:
RiME, interamente creato con il nuovo Unreal Engine 4, è un indie game della casa Tequila Works. Il gioco si presenta subito con una grafica alla Zelda: Breath of the Wild mista con The Witness. La storia, come nella maggior parte dei giochi di questo tipo, è una storia strappalacrime che però non risulta sia vista e rivista. Il comparto grafico e la colonna sonora sono eccellenti. Ottimi anche gli enigmi con i giochi luce/ombra. Il gioco richiede circa 7/8 ore per essere completato al 100% con tutti i collezionabili e i vari achievements, la storia di per se dura un 5/5,30 ore. Il finale è qualcosa di indimenticabile, lo consiglio a tutti a prezzo pieno.

[b]+ Comparto grafico e sonoro eccellente, ottimi paesaggi con rispettive soundtracks coinvolgenti
+ Enigmi creativi con i giochi luce/ombra
+ Storia ben elaborata, il gioco già dall'inizio mette molta curiosità facendovi venire voglia di completarlo al piu' presto
+ Longevità discreta per un gioco di questo tipo, diciamo che supera di poco la durata media di un gioco indie

- Alcuni enigmi risultano troppo facili[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198016646963', 'num_games_owned': 514, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 510, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 510, 'last_played': 1506757537}
review:
De vuelta una vez más por el universo Steam y tras finalizar los Assassins Brotherhood y Revelations, y también el Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands y el Farcry Primal; le tocó el turno a este fabuloso y espectacular juego: RIME. Duodécimo juego terminado de este 2017 y sólo se pueden decir cosas positivas sobre él. Una banda sonora espectacular, unos gráficos sobresalientes (el efecto de la lluvia es una pasada), una historia sencillamente genial (no voy a poner más calificativos para no destriparla)... En fin, un juego del estilo del Tomb Raider de toda la vida pero sin armas ni necesidad de matar a nadie, con unos puzles fáciles de interpretar.

El único pero que le pongo es el tiempo en terminar la historia que se me ha hecho muy corto (8 horas y media), aunque también hay que decir que no me he puesto a sacar logros y secretos con lo que diría que serían unas 8 horas más.

Resumiendo, nota final 9 sobre 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198291442061', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 816, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 791, 'last_played': 1506930253}

author: {'steamid': '76561198140204288', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 373, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 373, 'last_played': 1506315460}
review:
RIME is a slow burn even for a game of this brevity, which may come across as an undesirable trait however it is very intentional. The story is told without any dialogue whatsoever, leaving atmosphere and emotional suggestion with most of the heavy lifting. The design will feel almost random as you piece together the hints within, a form of ordered chaos if you will. I found it difficult to feel invested in the game until the latter levels where the entire vision begins to come together and you understand and appreciate the how and why. While you may begin to figure out the general concept about halfway there are certain details that do not truly hit home until the game is finished.

That being said the game sometimes felt like a chore to play, with the reward and satisfaction being reserved for the final scenes, but I am glad I carried on. If you play the game and feel uninspired to finish I urge you to push through, it is worth the effort and may just prompt a second playthrough. While nothing in the game is particularly difficult the brilliant story telling through the game world is a lost art in interactive entertainment in recent years, an art that Tequila Works has shown can still be powerful and effective.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041696103', 'num_games_owned': 65, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 292, 'last_played': 1689876907}
review:
This game is more like art than a game. It's very simple to play, no real challenges and very easy to complete. But even so, I loved it. This game takes you on an adventure and the story that unfolds is just heartbreaking and pure. The story unfolds during the playthrough, and in the end had me in tears. Through sound and visual effects the games takes you on an emotional journey that you will remember for a long time.
It lets you explore a world filled with magnificent views and fitting music. As I said earlier, there is no real challenges and it can easily be cleared, even finding all the secrets aren't too hard. But at the same time I don't find it too rewarding to find them all. I will definetly play through it again, but I doubt I'll go look for every secret hidden within.
This game is a great piece of art, and I suggest anyone who likes a mysterious heartaching story, to play this through to the end.

TLDR; Loved the visual, sound and story. Gameplay itself is a bit tedious and not very rewarding, but you wanna play this for the highly emotional story.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065921278', 'num_games_owned': 449, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 853, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 615, 'last_played': 1621930250}
review:
Skończyłem i jak najbardziej polecam. Chyba w 2013 dane było nam zobaczyć świetny trailer „Wind Wakera” na Ps4. Póżniej były plotki o skasowaniu projektu, w końcu o porzuceniu przez Sony i utracie ekskluzywności i wiele osób wieszczyło że to będzie słaby tytuł i pseudo Zelda dla ubogich :link: .

 Cóż mogę napisać, te 8h szybko zleciało i choć tego nie robię ( brak czasu) to zagram jeszcze raz aby znaleźć wszystkie znajdźki ( szczególnie chodzi mi o „dziurki od klucza”). Rime to piękna, minimalistyczna ( brak praktycznie dialogów) i smutna opowieść. Kurczę, moja 6 letnia córeczka strasznie chciała abym grał w tę grę „o lisku”( ten pomaga nam w podróży)  i musiałem sporo się natłumaczyć aby mi się dziecko nie rozpłakało :uff: . Jeśli chodzi o grafikę, to ta urzeka od początku, świetne widoki, oświetlenie i kolorystyka jak z Wind Wakera, dodatkowo muzyka która wg mnie jest chyba najmocniejszym elementem gry. Gierka może jest trochę za łatwa, jeśli zdarzy nam się zginąć to praktycznie teleportuje nas o parę chwil wcześniej. Cóż walki prawie nie ma w ogóle, trzeba uciekać przed przeciwnikami, gierka stawia na eksplorację i naprawdę fajne zagadki. Największym jej mankamentem jest optymalizacja, gra nie wygląda na wymagająca lecz utrzymanie stałych 60 k/s na naprawdę mocnym pc jest raczej niemożliwe i dość szybko ustawiłem na „betonowe” 30 k/s które bardziej mi odpowiadało. Jeśli miałbym ocenić Rime to daję mocne 8,5/10. Polecam, warto zagrać w tę grę dla płaczków :banderas:

author: {'steamid': '76561198267320342', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 543, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 543, 'last_played': 1506000165}
review:
Das Spiel ist einfach schön. Tolle Soundtracks! Athmosphärisch alle mal. Es ist leicht alles herauszufinden, aber nicht leicht alle versteckten Sachen zu entdecken. 1 weiteres Mal durch spielen ist auf jedenfall drin. 
Die Geschichte ist traurig v.v aber toll umgesetzt. 
Makel ist, das man nicht lange brauch durch zuspielen zwischen 6-8 Std nur für die Story! Das ist schade.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991829620', 'num_games_owned': 1470, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 365, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 365, 'last_played': 1505946656}
review:
Both massively overpriced and overhyped. 
You start as a boy who stranded on an island and trying to figure out what this game is about. You get the feel "well i guess i have to explore this island". But then the first revelation there is nothing or at least not much to really explore. That island really feels like a level that tricks you into thinking it is an island. And seriously why is this game running to piss poor, i have a 1080ti and R7 1700x and this game runs with 40fps on max details on 1440p, the looks of this game and size of levels don't justify this performance. Then you start to enjoy the art style but the feeling that the developer were just lazy. You can make a minimalist artstyle but then you have to make up for it so it doesn't feel cheap and empty and yes this game feels cheep and lazy. 
A big problem what comes in hands with it is the massive hand holding, it is impossible to miss the goal because first you have a fox that leads you to every spot they can't mark white and second because well they made every edge of importance white. This little detail should have used on almost every edge, not just on spots where the game wants you to go and would improve the graphical quality of the game.
I am pretty aware that many games are dumbed down compared to games that were released in the 80s and 90s but this game shouldn't have that massive amount of hand holding and lack of stakes. You are playing a boy who is on an adventure...but there are no stakes not sense of real adventure. Where is the adventure when the game holds your hand and says "you go there, then there and then there oh and by the way you can't really fail". I would hate that as a child, it's like going to the playground with your parents and never leave their side. It doesn't make any sense in the context of this game. And don't come with "well that big bird can snatch you" at me, you totally know that it was so easy to avoid that from happening. The puzzles-if you want to call them that- are way too easy and obvious because of the handholding. So you don't get any feel of accomplishment. You are basically just running to spots where the games leads you to, then walk to different spots where the game leads you to to collect keys to open gates and doors from previous spots. Yep no thinking or figuring out involved, just running from spot to spot, no puzzles in this game folks.
Nothing to say about the story, very surface level and not very interesting or engaging. But they still figured out to ruin this experience. The last scene of the game is a big "DO YOU GET, THIS OBJECT REPRESENTS THIS AND THAT OBJECT THIS, DO YOU GET IT?" which really made me angry. The game was over with the scene on the boat, everything what comes after ruins any attempt, since the actual scenes with story are so scarce. 
Last point i have 6.1h on the clock but real play time is about ~4h. I bought it on the sale but it still overpaid for the play time this game offers. This game isn't worth 34,99€, 10€ at best. It doesn't have the content, depth or quality to justify the asked price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056400838', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 502, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 502, 'last_played': 1505946159}
review:
Красивая игра с неплохим загадочным сюжетом и приятной музыкой. Загадки и паззлы несложные и легко решаются.
На больших открытых пространствах фреймрейт падает вплоть до пары десятков фпс, и так было при релизе с денуво, так и сейчас, когда защиту убрали. На некоторых уровнях и в закрытых локациях (а их меньшинство) это не так заметно. К счастью игра не динамична, и высокая производительность не требуется.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082062749', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1062, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1062, 'last_played': 1507144244}
review: Aunque los puzzles se quedan un poquillo flojos, hay los coleccionables y las cosas ocultas que son complicadas de encontrar. Esteticamente es un juego muy bello y la historia es preciosa. Si os gustan los juegos en los que visualmente te cuentan una historia con parte de ella oculta, os lo recomiendo 100%.

review: 一开始觉得是个小清新的冒险解谜游戏，越玩心里越沉重，当最终场景到来时，心情已经跌落到了谷底。

author: {'steamid': '76561198359653520', 'num_games_owned': 39, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1085, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 823, 'last_played': 1515926570}
review:
画风优美，游戏中每一帧都可以截图当壁纸，各种解谜过程极具脑洞，BGM总是能在关键的时候渲染氛围
相比于inside的黑暗压抑，更偏爱Rime的光明与治愈向，虽然结局。。不过极其推荐！

author: {'steamid': '76561198289725695', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1897, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1626, 'last_played': 1648315598}
review:
El juego es hermoso pero un poco corto, en mi caso tarde 5,7hrs en terminarlo, la rejugabilidad está en los coleccionables (algunos MUY escondidos) y en los logros (solo saque 9 al terminarlo la 1ra vez) , después de más de 26hrs dando vueltas y terminando el juego varias veces me rendí y busque una guía para encontrar lo que me faltaba, eran solo 3 cosas: el fragmento del 5to emblema en el nivel 3, la Sombra Blanca en el nivel 4 y el logro más confuso (al menos para mí) “Paciencia”, después de eso me divertí bastante encontrando todos los coleccionables y logros. En cuanto a la historia se me hizo algo confusa por el final, todo el tiempo me estuve preguntando ¿Que es esta isla? ¿Quiénes construyeron todo? y ¿Que les paso? para que al final... bueeee, no puedo decir nada por tenas de spoiler, pero es muy emotiva y más con ese final que siempre me dieron ganas de llorar cuando lo vi todas y cada una de las veces. Los puzles no son muy difíciles y me gusto esa mecánica de ver por un "altar" para que pasara algo. El juego no es perfecto, el problema más grande sigue siendo la optimización incluso después de que le sacaran el DRM, a partir de "Medio" le costaba ir a 30fps y tengo una PC que puede correr Fallout 4 entre 50 a 60fps, creo que se equivocaron de motor, a primera vista parece el mismo de Slime Rancher pero con mejores texturas, podrían a ver usado otro pero bueee se ve hermoso de todas formas y más con la banda sonora que tiene, además del rendimiento podrían poner la opción de guardar cuando uno quiere y poder saltar las cinemáticas (solo un detalle menor).
Me gustaría ver una expansión basada en "ustedes ya saben quién" con la misma cantidad de niveles o más y con puzles un poco más difíciles.

author: {'steamid': '76561198304499801', 'num_games_owned': 195, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 816, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 816, 'last_played': 1505435572}
review: I’ve never played a game without words that has moved me as deeply as RiME.

author: {'steamid': '76561198401841774', 'num_games_owned': 20, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 601, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 591, 'last_played': 1602387681}
review:
这是一款我必须写长评的优秀作品，事实上，我也是通过阅读了其他玩家的长评才决定购买的这个游戏（但不幸的是不小心被剧透了）。如果我用心地写下真实感受能够让更多懂得重视游戏内涵、懂得以艺术的眼光去发现、欣赏和享受《RiME》所带来的极致魅力的话，我会为我今天写了评语这个行为而感到欣慰。

在购买这款游戏前我去做了一系列的搜索。这款小成本游戏的开发商是一个西班牙的工作室，而且许多游戏网站和媒体对《RiME》的评价是非常两级的。也就是爱的人很爱，不爱的人无感。造成这样褒贬不一的评分的原因除了是由不同玩家和测评人个的人喜好、审美、兴趣不同以外，这款游戏自身命途多舛的背景也带来了一定影响。《RiME》最早是被微软看上，后来又辗转去了索尼。早在13年的时候就宣布要在PS4上发行而且连精美的预告片都做出来了，但不知为什么索尼撤资合同流产。外界很早就对《RiME》投来了怀疑的目光，但最终这个几乎不可能实现的游戏还是在去年登上了各大平台。光是这样的背景，就足够让好奇心重的我报着一睹为快的心思点开了Steam上的游戏预告。点开的那一刻我并没有特别被游戏封面、或是探险、解密这一类的标签所吸引，再加上我个人不是特别喜欢偏向Q版小清新画风的作品，一开始还真有些不以为意。真正让我萌发一定要购买这个游戏的欲望的原因，就是Steam上那两个短短的宣传动画。精美的图像和流畅的画风，搭配上动人悦耳的旋律，让我不自觉的就深深被吸引住了。我看到有评测过的朋友形容这个作品是一个"不容错过的、值得收藏的艺术品"，对于此我不能赞同更多！尤其是在我查过了这个游戏的制作背景后，并得知第二个宣传动画的背景小提琴曲竟是小提琴女神Lindsey Stirling演奏的后，我强烈建议喜欢纯音乐的朋友们仅仅是为了支持音乐作品也应该购买和支持这个作品以及开发商。在此再次感谢制作人的用心，让我得以享受这个视听盛宴！不过也有技术流的玩家提出这个游戏由于成本较低，在画面的光影还是流动性什么的（我不懂的专业术语）并不算最出色，还是停留在几年前的水平，这一点上我可能是认同的。因为在游戏中，某些角度上看会觉得画面好像是透明度不够还是什么的，水流似乎没有那种波光粼粼的感觉。但是并不会影响游戏体验，反倒是让常玩大型3D游戏的我认为这是一种别样的画风而已。

接下来是关于游戏内容的，有些朋友讨论说觉得游戏内容比较单一，谜题不够复杂，剧情稍显单薄，还有情节的起伏和节奏把握比较奇怪等等，对于这些言论的个别点我持不同看法。在谜题难度方面我基本可以认同，作为独立游戏谜题不算复杂，我这种比较笨的玩家也能够慢慢摸索出来玩法，跟着网友分享的攻略走就更明了了。接下来是有人说游戏内容单一的这点，我恰恰相反，认为这个游戏可以称之为非常饱满。除了从游戏长度，和整个冒险的过程要探索过的地方来评判外，就是因为《RiME》这个游戏把一个简单的命题“亲情”发挥的非常细致，可谓酣畅淋漓，使得单一命题的游戏给人以十分深刻的印象。所以内容上我认为已经是极致了。再往更深了理解，这个游戏除了“亲情”以外，还包含了“自我救赎”“自我认知”等非常人性和深刻的考量。游戏中还包含大量线索、标志等等，甚至连章节名称、成就标题方面，都非常成功地运用了象征的手法，向玩家阐明这个故事的主旨和内涵。那么剧情方面，结合我刚刚所说的，我认为剧情也是，从游戏长度设计和游戏主旨去看走向的话，已经算是比较长和丰满的了，伏笔也埋得充分。如果非要在内容上挑剔的话，我会说这个游戏是一个需要在玩的过程中思考其本质的东西，而正是因为离真相本身并不遥远，所以才会更希望和玩家产生思想上的共鸣而非只是走完故事流程。我觉得部分玩家感叹剧情简单，大概只是因为个人审美的不同、游戏需求的不同，抑或只是过于理性吧：D

综上所述，我会推荐这个游戏给心思细腻、善于感悟、爱好艺术的玩家，这绝对是你这几年都不想错过的一部作品！我个人给予这个游戏满分10/10的评价，希望你也能够喜欢并早日购买这部优秀的作品！感谢读完。

author: {'steamid': '76561198061636089', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 514, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 283, 'last_played': 1505170702}
review: геймплей около 8 часов (можно быстрее). красивая графика, много головоломок которые проходятся интуитивно с первого раза. на протяжении игры присутствует ощущение даже не одиночества, а холодной сосущей пустоты. сюжет сюреалистичный - типичный японский сюжетец завернытый в европейскую анимацию с жалостью к себе и потерей близких

author: {'steamid': '76561198029837806', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 536, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 536, 'last_played': 1505279134}
review:
Nice and beautiful game I enjoyed all the way through.

PROS :
- beautiful art design
- slow pace
- relaxing to play

CONS :
- No real purpose in the puzzles
- no real puzzles either


Overall Rime is a enjoyable and relaxing experience. 
I wish there was more clear goal to the game, instead of just progressing clueless through the levels.
Or at least have real puzzles to solve to make the game more interesting.
But I still loved the game, and it also all make sense at the end, so I recommend it, maybe wait for a sale :)

review:
Game like these are emotional rollercoasters and I crave them, tho I also find hem hard to play at times. I usually compare these types of games to enjoying a good book, a slow burn. 

If you know these types of games interest you, then I recommend this game. If you're a twitching, FPS monkey on Adderall, then maybe look elsewhere.

author: {'steamid': '76561198415553087', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 872, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 872, 'last_played': 1505011876}

author: {'steamid': '76561198028959851', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 174, 'playtime_forever': 353, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 353, 'last_played': 1504927828}
review:
Obra maestra de Tequila Works. 
Sublime aventura de corte muy sentimental, con un trasfondo que se va desvelando según te acercas al final.
La historia del juego es bastante corta, tiene partes de plataformeo y otras de puzzles, estos últimos bastante sencillos. Perfectamente se puede terminar en unas 6 horas u 8 aproximadamente, dependiendo de lo habilidoso que seas. 
Aun así, la historia te va atrapando y una vez metido de lleno no puedes parar hasta el final.
No puedo más que recomendarlo, es la mejor obra de Tequila Works hasta el momento, bien optimizado y con un final que hará que se te escape alguna lagrimita.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055186620', 'num_games_owned': 411, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 289, 'last_played': 1504897458}
review:
Jeu à faire au moins une fois. Les graphismes sont magnifiques et les musiques sont justes sublimes.
Il m'a aussi fortement fait penser aux Merveilleuses cités d'or.

Je ne peux que le recommander et ce n'est pas les quelques baisses de framerate ici et là qui gachent le plaisir

author: {'steamid': '76561198167929170', 'num_games_owned': 209, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 881, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 881, 'last_played': 1504980262}
review: Великолепная игра-путешествие с очень трогательной концовкой. Замечательная музыка, очень соответствующая атмосфере. (Собственно, и на игру-то я обратил внимание после клипа Линдси Стирлинг, её композиция Forgotten City звучит в финальных титрах). Из минусов, пожалуй, только странное поведение камеры в отдельных локациях, но с этим можно смириться, ну и отсутствие Linux-версии.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989304140', 'num_games_owned': 782, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 552, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 552, 'last_played': 1503342238}
review: Spectacular graphics and a moving storyline more than make up for what are often quite pedestrian puzzles.  Anyone with experience of platform puzzlers won't find this particularly challenging - but I wholeheartedly recommend it. You will not regret playing all the way through.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012640010', 'num_games_owned': 1138, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 367, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 367, 'last_played': 1504803915}
review:
Najwieksza niespodzianka 2017!!!
Ta niezbyt skomplikowana logiczno-zrecznosciowa platformowka moze sie pochwalic robiaca niesamowite wrazenie oprawa. Slicznej grafice korzystajacej z cel-shadingu towarzyszy przepiekna sciezka dzwiekowa, w ktorej prym wioda wiolonczele, fortepian i skrzypce. Dzieki tej estetyce i szczatkowej, ale posiadajacej odpowiedni ciezar emocjonalny narracji fabularnej RiME nasuwa silne skojarzenia zarowno z wydana w 2012 roku na Playstation 3 gra Journey jak i z filmami animowanymi Studia Ghibli typu Nausicaä z Doliny Wiatru, Laputa – podniebny zamek czy Ksiezniczka Mononoke. Sama rozgrywka jest niespieszna, zdecydowana wiekszosc zagadek srodowiskowych nie stanowi duzego wyzwania dla szarych komorek, a jedyna trudnosc moga stanowic nieliczne fragmenty, w ktorych projekt poziomu nie prowadzi nas za reke i sami musimy wpasc na to, w ktora strone nalezy isc. 

RiME to trzecia, po bardzo fajnym Deadlight i pelnym czarnego humoru The Sexy Brutale, gra studia Tequila Works. Po raz trzeci Hiszpanom udalo sie stworzyc klimatyczna produkcje, ktora choc nie nalezy do kategorii najbardziej kasowych tytulow AAA z poteznym budzetem, to jest naprawde warta uwagi. Dzieki temu tworcy gry trafiaja na moja krotka liste najbardziej cenionych developerow i z niecierpliwoscia bede oczekiwac ich kolejnej produkcji. A ze przy RiME bawilem sie bardzo dobrze i jego nieziemska estetyka na dlugo zapadnie mi w pamiec, to z czystym sumieniem polecam ten tytul kazdemu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013741629', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 489, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 489, 'last_played': 1504788065}
review: From watching the trailers I had the mistaken impression that RiME was some kind of open-world, puzzle-exploration game. Well, I quickly learned that RiME is more akin to Ico, and at one point even Half-Life 2 popped into my mind... It's a linear adventure game with light puzzle-platforming. The puzzles occasionally increase in complexity but never to anything major. I'd call it a "guided adventure". I wouldn't call it a walking simulator although the game is reminiscent of Abzu like other reviewers have said. After an opening hour of confusion (about what kind of game RiME actually was), I grew to enjoy the game, especially the third level. It's questionable whether there is enough "meat on the bone", gameplay wise, to justify the price, but at the same time the length of the game feels pretty much perfect and it's not a game that would benefit from being longer I think.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000138626', 'num_games_owned': 385, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 637, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 637, 'last_played': 1504316235}
review: This is visual storytelling at it's finest. Few games have wowed me more from start to finish than RiME. The color palette, structure designs, symbolic imagery, landscape, weather, puzzle mechanics, even small behavioral actions--everything plays a role in RiME's beautifully woven narrative. People who enjoy exploration, puzzlers, and a more casual pace will love this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198393817448', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1597, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1458, 'last_played': 1527323420}
review:
Ho appena finito il gioco.
Devo dire che sono rimasto molto soddisfatto:
- sia la grafica sia la colonna sonora sono di alta qualità, con ambientazioni che vale la pena osservare a "360°" ed un accompagnamento musicale che crea la giusta atmosfera;
- la trama è molto ben strutturata e "ben raccontata".
Di contro, gli enigmi sono abbastanza semplici (non si può avere tutto...).
Non aspettatevi combattimenti; non ce ne sono.
Il gioco si basa sull'esplorazione e la risoluzione di enigmi per poter avanzare. L'esplorazione dell'ambiente circostante è anche un punto chiave per il completamento degli extra (facoltativo) e la possibilità di visualizzare il finale completo (che vale la pena vedere).
La trama è molto godibile, anche in assenza di dialoghi (ebbene sì, non ci sono...). Il gioco, infatti, può essere definito un racconto introspettivo che, man mano che si avanza con la storia tra i vari capitoli,  ha come punto di forza la capacità di trasmettere emozioni al giocatore facendo un sapiente uso di immagini e suoni.
Il finale resta uno dei più commeventi che abbia visto in un videogioco.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072794763', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 914, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 900, 'last_played': 1505069158}
review: Una preciosidad de juego. Una isla en la que da gusto perderse, una banda sonora increible y una historia que emociona sin palabras. Lo único malo su duración, se hace muy corto (a penas 8 horas en mi caso) pero como me apetecía quedarme un poco más en la isla he vuelto a empezar para recoger los coleccionables, ya que solo encontré unos pocos en la primera vuelta. Muy recomendable buscarlos, descubres zonas y secretos del juego que no verías de otra manera, eso sí recomiendo también mirar alguna guía porque hay algunos bastante escondidos. Genial trabajo de Tequila Works, no los conocía pero seguramente me anime a probar algún otro juego.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015848527', 'num_games_owned': 352, 'num_reviews': 97, 'playtime_forever': 1048, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 887, 'last_played': 1528564237}
review:
Rime, what to say about it. I enjoyed it, despite some small issues I had with it. It had an interesting narrative which had a bittersweet feel to it throughout. Art style is brilliant, and it caused me to constantly hit that F12 button throughout as there were so many wonderful shots. Music fit the feel of the game perfectly, and its impact on mood should not be overlooked. Game is relatively short, but I don't have a problem with this, as it tells the story it needs to in the time it takes up. I'm sure when I return to the game to try to get a 100% completion (with colectible stuff hidden everywhere) it'll add a bit more to the played time, but a standard play through will take less than 10 hours. Just something to consider if you think long play time to be a deciding factor.

Really the only issue with it is that sometimes the controls feel a little clumsy, especially in regards to camera movement. Why can't I adjust zoom manually?

Overall an enjoyable game, though I'd recommend waiting for a sale. I get all my games on sale though, so eh.

EDIT: OK so I did a 100% walkthrough and I enjoyed it more the second time through than the first time. Getting the locked ending is something worth trying to achieve at the very least. Maybe it was just the mood I was in, but the ending hit me harder the second time around, and was incredibly touching.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086181890', 'num_games_owned': 332, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 666, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 666, 'last_played': 1504465271}
review:
更新一下评测，我把“维特鲁威的灵魂”奖投给了这款游戏。
=======
6小时剧情通关，4小时按着攻略收集全成就。这部作品的成就设计很合理，由彩蛋和全收集组成的，彩蛋让人很惊喜，收集要素像神秘海域那样，是设计在岔路上，不会拖慢游戏进度，但是偶然发现的时候又有柳暗花明又一村的感觉。
风景和BGM是这作的两大亮点，起初买这个游戏的人，大部分都是被LOGO图那片蓝得醉人的海吸引了吧。
为了看风景，UI设计精简到不能再精简，但是提示又恰到好处，游戏会在你长久的浮在水面上时冒出一个潜水按键的提示。
解谜和关卡设计，难度恰到好处，第三章守护者的地图制作可见功夫之深，许多场景都是楼上楼下连过道都充分利用，之前过不去的地方，有了守护者帮忙就能过去，无形中还加深了玩家和AI之间的感情。
字幕？台词？汉化？不需要的。这样“灵魂交流”的游戏，全篇没有任何台词，有的只有男孩的呐喊，从坚定到虚弱，再到坚定。[strike]那些在任何非中文游戏下都刷“We need Chinese”的朋友可以散了，就让他们错过这部佳作吧[/strike]。当然如果你不看汉字连调画面设置都困难的话，还是去找个汉化包吧。游戏存在些许优化问题，最高设置（抗锯齿FXAA以上）画面掉帧明显，我1070显卡也只能跑20多帧，但开低一些不影响画面观感，帧数能瞬间回到100多，建议进游戏后检查下是否默认最高画质。
剧透反黑
[spoiler]由于没有台词，游戏流程中没有说明的剧情可以在收集品“钥匙孔”中得到补完，每个钥匙孔是一幅画，画记录着这个悲伤的家庭从男孩降生以来的故事。透过锁孔看到的是真相，也说明男孩所处的世界反而是幻象。第三章结束时过场CG骗了我，让我以为是男孩失去了父亲，然而第四章我才知道，当时坠海身亡的是那个男孩。[/spoiler]
[spoiler]钥匙孔讲了这个家庭的故事：在男孩诞生，幸福的日子没过多久，这个家的母亲患病去世了，父亲悲痛欲绝，男孩也在迷茫和痛苦之中，选择了以海相伴，发泄他的悲伤。在一次风暴中，父亲和男孩的船剧烈摇晃着，男孩失足摔入了海中，父亲没有拉住……落水的男孩灵魂无处可依，在幻象世界里游荡寻找着方向。所以他的目的地总是灯塔，那是他生前住的小房间，每天从窗子望去，都能看到那座灯塔。陪伴他旅途，让他不再孤独的是他的玩具小狐狸，化成了可爱的生灵。为他指引方向的，则是那身着一袭红披风的父亲。低着头的黑影，是孤独哭泣的亡魂，是人们无处消散的积怨、遗憾、忿恨和悲伤。那一抹静静等待着男孩到来的白色影子，是妈妈。（收集了全部的白色影子后，在尾声章节，能看到一家人相隔着时空，在此刻紧紧抱在了一起）[/spoiler]
[spoiler]赚够了大家的喜爱和眼泪的，圆头圆脑又有着细长双脚的守护者，才是整个游戏设定里最神奇的一环。它们的形象取自男孩窗前的风铃，但是他们有思想，充满好奇心，同情心，甘愿奉献自己。谁都不知道，死后的世界会是什么样的呢？如果有这些精灵相伴，或许就没那么孤独。这或许是真实的幻象，又或许是生者对亡者的祝愿。男孩在经历了这些孤独和生死与共后，一次次痛失挚友而变得成熟，灵魂也得到了安息。这坎坷的旅途，又何尝不是地面上的父亲在痛失所爱后的心路。[/spoiler]
[spoiler]尾声章节很短，其成就名为“放手”。当儿子迷途的灵魂回到了家，当父亲再次打开儿子的房间，那一刻仿佛全世界的色彩又回到了这个小天地，他抚摸着那些木制玩具，然后下定决心，让那一片衣角随着他的悲伤、男孩的灵魂安息，留下的只有这个家曾经的那些美好记忆。逝者已逝，生者当如斯。[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198066673553', 'num_games_owned': 560, 'num_reviews': 235, 'playtime_forever': 344, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 344, 'last_played': 1504535959}
review: Rime doesn't introduce new quality in the business of interactive storytelling but borrows good things from the best. You'll find echoes of The Last Guardian, Ico or Zelda, then you'll appreciate tons of passion, and in the end you will probably become very fond of this game and remember it for a long time. Sit back, relax and enjoy :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198125392208', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 141, 'playtime_forever': 467, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 467, 'last_played': 1504381318}
review:
Bardzo dziwna to gra - niby dla dzieci, ale porusza tematy bardzo poważne. Urzekło mnie w niej przede wszystkim ujęcie tematu [spoiler]śmierci i radzenia sobie z nią: całość jest podzielona na pięć rozdziałów, z których każdy koresponduje z pięcioma etapami pokonywania rozpaczy (zaprzeczenie, gniew, targowanie się, depresja, akceptacja). W każdym z nich kierujemy krokami chłopca, który musi przezwyciężyć stratę.[/spoiler] Zakończenie jest naprawdę mocne i absolutnie się go nie spodziewałam.

Zagadki nie są specjalnie trudne, wymagają przede wszystki dobrego rozglądania się po otoczeniu - otoczeniu, które jest niezwykle rozległe i trudniejszą sprawą są tutaj wszelkiego typu znajdźki. Są to jednak rzeczy dla kolekcjonerów i nie psuje to spokojnego, relaksującego klimatu gry. Grafika jest ładne, kolorowa i odpręża, acz cieniowanie jest momentami... dziwne (widzę inspirację "Podróżą"), a do tego nie wiem, czym można wytłumaczyć spadki FPS-ów. Muzyka jest bardzo łagodna, ale pięknie wpasowuje się w klimat, no a jedną piosenkę napisała niesamowita Lindsey Stirling.

"RIME" pozostawia małą dziurę w sercu. Myślę, że kiedyś jeszcze do niej wrócę.

author: {'steamid': '76561198193663443', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 845, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 661, 'last_played': 1558755165}
review:
[h1] 一款仅凭音乐就能征服你的探索解谜游戏，也是一款惊艳但不够让玩家惊喜的探索解谜游戏[/h1]
我不是一个感性的人，但我确实被游戏的剧情和煽情的音乐感动到了，尽管整个游戏连一句对白都没有，尽管游戏的部分解谜也已经有些过时了，但我想，这个游戏中人物真正的对白和灵魂，也许全都在自己的心里.


[b]此游戏有三大泪点：[/b]

1、被小男孩千辛万苦救活的大脑袋机器人们，随着不断接近最后的真相，他们为打开一扇又一扇大门时把自己化为了钥匙，你以为，这就是他们的使命，但当那个小男孩亲手造就的机器人，在最后一扇门前停下，你才发觉这一路陪你走来，已经只剩下它最后一个机器人。
小男孩此时明白过来，它也要化为开门的钥匙。
“不！我不要你去！我不再追寻真相了！你不要离开我！”
大雨中，男孩用尽全身力气抱住机器人的腿，试图拦下朝着钥匙孔前进的机器人。
一路上，你们曾互相帮助对方，它已经成为你不能失去的伙伴，它虽然不会说话，但它用一次又一次的行动告诉你，它懂你。
你曾以为你们能一起走到最后，但当面对抉择时，它却要选择牺牲自己，为你打开真相的大门。
它也许并不想离开你，可它知道，只有它的牺牲，才能换回你的自我。
“不——！”小男孩眼睁睁看着机器人嵌入钥匙孔，化为一道金光，为你打开大门，而它却永远地被分离成两半，代表它“生命”的那道蓝光，永远的黯淡了下去。
男孩的泪水汹涌而出，雨还在下，但伙伴已经不在了。
小狐狸懂事的轻轻走过来，钻入你的怀里，用自己的毛发，擦干你的泪水，用自己的体温，温暖你那颗受伤的心灵。
“为什么~这是为什么~”男孩搂着小狐狸哭得更凶了。
“孩子，别哭，你还有我，只有你继续前进，才不会辜负它的牺牲。”
[h1] 真相总是伴随着代价[/h1]

2、当小狐狸陪着小男孩在大雨中集齐所有的雕像，每当收集到一座小雕像时，小狐狸就会充满悲伤的趴在雕像前哀鸣，就像在做一个告别，一个万般不舍的告别。
“小狐狸，你怎么了。。。。。”
小狐狸没有说话，只是看着男孩，眼中竟也泛起涟漪，不知是泪水还是雨水。
就在即将打开通往真相的最后道路时，小男孩发现一道道金光从自己身后飞来，化作万紫千红汇入最后的雕像，为它注入开启道路的力量。
“这些金光从哪来的？”小男孩疑惑的转身，却发现身后的小狐狸已经虚弱的趴在了地上——它在用自己的生命为雕像注入力量。
“不！快停下！”男孩一把抱住小狐狸，刚刚放下没多久的泪水再度决堤而出，他已经不能再失去伙伴了。
从一开始男孩流落在这个岛上时，小狐狸是他结识的第一个伙伴，当他为前进道路而感到迷惑时，小狐狸便总是冲到前方为男孩指引方向，当男孩成功搞定困难时，小狐狸又围着男孩跳来跳去，庆祝他的成功，他们一起哭过，笑过，他们一起累过，走过。
但一直，小狐狸都没有离开过。
男孩现在终于明白，小狐狸之前为什么在雕像前悲鸣——它在对男孩做最后的道别。
“只有我的生命，才能打开这最后的雕像，别怕，别哭，勇敢的走下去，我会一直在你心里”
小狐狸在男孩怀中露出最后一个笑容，便化为了片片光芒，汇入那个最后的雕像。
“你为什么不早点告诉我！不————————————！”男孩绝望的看着怀中小狐狸消逝，他失去了最后一位伙伴。
[h1]一旦你决定寻找真相，就只能与孤独为伴。[/h1]
前进吧，孩子，你还有路要走，你最后的道路。

3、男孩终于来到最后的地方，现在他失去了伙伴，失去了所有，终于看清了那个真相，那个残酷的真相：自己已经死去，这一路走来，不过是找回自我，找回记忆。
他终于明白当初在自己脑海中一闪而过的碎片代表着什么，那个在船上被风浪裹入大海中的，不是那个红衣男人，那就是曾经活着的自己。
男孩筋疲力尽的看向周围，看着周围一个个灵魂纵身跳入那个深渊。
“跳下去吧，只有跳下去，你才能开启生命的又一个轮回”
“是。。。。吗？”男孩眼睛迷离起来，他蹒跚着走向那个深渊。
[h1] 当知道一切真相时，一切却显得那么苍白无力。[/h1]
男孩跳下深渊，周围的一切越来越模糊......
————————
画面一转，一个小屋中，男孩的父亲手握一把钥匙，一把儿子生前房间的钥匙。
“我已经在大海上寻找你了很久很久，我多希望你能有一天笑着回到我的身边，可是。。。。。可是。。。。”
男孩的父亲梗咽了。
父亲擦干眼泪，他已经失去了他的爱人，现在，他却又不得不再接受失去儿子的事实。
他站起来，走向儿子的房间，用那把钥匙，打开了房间的门。
“最后看一眼儿子房间也好。。。。。哪怕是最后一眼。。。”
房间里一切如故，就像孩子还在一样，墙上的风车还在旋转，床上的狐狸玩偶仍然乖巧的趴在枕边，只是，它们却再也等不回自己的主人。
此时窗外的阳光洒了进来，给这个凄凉的家庭带来了一丝温暖，父亲走向窗边，思念又让他的泪水又不住的流下来。
“父亲。。。”一个熟悉的声音在身后响起。
父亲震惊的转过头，看到一个无比熟悉的身影。
“我的孩子！”父亲激动的冲过去，一把抱住儿子，生怕再失去他。
“父亲，我是回来和你道别的，我要去陪妈妈了，她在那边很孤独。”可是儿子却轻轻回应着父亲的怀抱。
“我的儿子长大了。。。。。”父亲笑着，也哭着。
“再见了，爸爸，下辈子，我还做您的儿子。”一道光芒包裹住了儿子，父亲想要留下那道光芒，却发现最后自己手上不过留下了一块红色的残布。
那是儿子跌入海中被他抓住的残布
泪水再度流下，他知道，逝去的人，不会再回来。
父亲忍住悲伤，把那块布条轻轻放手，窗外的风儿也轻轻的接过布条，带着它飞向天边，飞向遥远的彼岸。
[h1] 如果没有办法回头，	那就让一切随风而去吧[/h1]


[h1]后记：
我们都有自己曾经无比牵挂的人，当你面对失去的亲情、友情、又或者爱情，一切都显得那么苍白，那么徒劳。
我们无法让时光倒流，但我们可以永远铭记，只要你没有选择丢掉，不管是好，是坏，那些世界上最宝贵的东西，就会一直在你的心里。[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198022312102', 'num_games_owned': 5431, 'num_reviews': 335, 'playtime_forever': 646, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 646, 'last_played': 1504306746}
review:
Rime is a heart breaking story about a boy who is stranded on an island. It's hard to sum it up better without spoiling anything. 
 I fully recommend RiME for anyone who likes adventure and story driven games without any narration, the music was beautiful and the visuals were fantastic (there's also a very good plot twist in late game).

 I'd give RiME a solid 8/10, the main reason for not being a 9 or 10 is because there's some heavy performance issues when set on Ultra settings (playing on a 1070 and a 4790k and the fps would be lower than 40fps), setting it to High will fix that issue.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054739532', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 412, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 267, 'last_played': 1504534461}
review: This is a very enjoyable little puzzel game, great art, fun, and pretty relaxing. I've had no problem with performance issues and I don't consider my PC to be particularly high end--I'm running it on a stock (new, middle of the road) laptop. My only complaint about the game itself is that sometimes the camera sacrifices controllability for a good view. I would also say to buy it on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008145228', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 142, 'last_played': 1504718524}
review:
Colpisce subito al cuore.
Un titolo che sembra colpire molto emotivamente,l'ambientazione e' qualcosa di spettacolare  e sicuramente le musiche orchestrate portano a vivere una piccola poesia.
Gli enigmi attualmente non sono complessi e l'esplorazione e' quella che prevale nelle meccaniche di gioco.
Non esito a consigliarlo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004778857', 'num_games_owned': 402, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 809, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 418, 'last_played': 1595625026}
review:
Never have I played a more beautiful game that makes you solve puzzles, and most of the time the answer is easier than you'd think.

First 5 minutes: I have no idea what I'm doing
First hour: Okay ... I think I'm getting a hang of it
Five hours: I don't want this to end

So many intelligent puzzles and for the little story I saw (apparently I need to go back and be more thorough so I can get all the collectibles) I really don't think I'll forget this game anytime soon.

author: {'steamid': '76561198340723732', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 358, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 358, 'last_played': 1503899820}
review:
虽然解密不难，大部分卡关是由于自己眼瞎，但优秀的配乐，梦境一般的场景足以让其成为一款十分优秀的作品。
没有中文完全不影响，剧情党一定不要错过，在玩的过程中多注意雕塑和壁画，剧情的一部分由他们补完。

author: {'steamid': '76561198347266584', 'num_games_owned': 84, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 611, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 611, 'last_played': 1503896393}
review:
3D画面酔いしない人なら楽しめるかもしれないです。ただicoやトリコを期待してるとちょっとがっかりします。(※序盤の感想です)
カメラ感度を下げても10分遊んで酔って1時間休憩することになってしまい、マップは一見広いんですが狭いところをこまごまと探さなければならないところが多く、またカメラワークもつらい。三半規管を切り取って捨てたい。

author: {'steamid': '76561198320460742', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1810, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1358, 'last_played': 1511398964}
review: RiME is a really magical game that's like a mix between journey, the witness, and zelda. It's a little more linear than I was expecting, and the puzzles aren't all that hard, but it gives me that feeling of wonder that not many games nowadays can give (that is, until the deus ex machina plot twist at the end. smh) Regardless, it's still a really great game that you should definitely play.

O jogo é bom de mais , a trilha sonora do jogo te emociona de mais , uma história fantástica é muito misteriosa , cheio de puzzle e muito o que desvendar , por mais jogos assim pra PC.
Jogo 10/10!

author: {'steamid': '76561198011939684', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1485, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1171, 'last_played': 1503854774}
review: Juego preciosita con una banda sonora espectacular. Me ha gustado mucho aunque la última fase es sustancialmente más corta que las demás y el final, bueno, me hubiese gustado algo diferente, pero para gustos... Es una mezcla de tomb raider y zelda pero sin armas ni matar a ningún bicho.
