author: {'steamid': '76561198198867841', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 462, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 462, 'last_played': 1503825116}
review: oha, gerade fertig gespielt. die auflösung der story hat echt reingehauen, aber so ergibt das ganze natürlich einen sinn. grafik, music, gameplay alles hervorragend. die rätsel sind nicht allzu schwer, aber wunderbar einfallsreich. kam hin und wieder ein bisschen zelda-feeling auf. 7,7 stunden spielzeit ist auch ok denke ich (mir kam es deutlich länger vor). ich würde 85% geben, wären es 2 sunden mehr spielzeit wären es 100%...

author: {'steamid': '76561198142062405', 'num_games_owned': 201, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 651, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 639, 'last_played': 1503662923}
review:
没有对白，没有文字。只有壁画和陶笛，引路的小狐狸和呆萌的机械狗，只有婉转动听的音乐和各具寓意的关卡。
在大部分时间对剧情都只有模糊理解的一周目体验中，除了叹服于本作美轮美奂，充满惊喜的舞台画面，你也依然可以通过游戏里那些最质朴的动作中得到感动，你会体会到在最后一堵大门前，小男孩为什么会想拦住最后一个将自身化作钥匙的机械狗；你会体会到当小狐狸破碎成花瓣时，小男孩为什么会哭。而这，正是我认为本作最传神的地方。同ICO，journey这些游戏相似，本作的大部分交互表现在肢体动作和舞台氛围上的传达，玩家全凭自己的本能行动，没有谁告诉你你应该做什么，也没有旁白为你总结你刚结束的这个章节发生了什么，游戏与玩家的交互几乎到最后都依然只漂浮于情感的层面，在拔除了的台词的条件下，依靠精致的音效和背景音乐的煽动，留给玩家深入心灵的体验。
纵然一周目的体验过程中令我感到了很多别的游戏的影子，但依然可以肯定本作美术风格上的独树一帜，谜题的难度是真的低到几乎没有难度，就连隐藏的位置甚至可以说有点老套，但却做到了对氛围的完美契合与推动，行云流水的过关体验和集中，有节奏的氛围烘托，游戏的整体风格全程令人赏心悦目。
当然游戏依然存在一些问题以及可以做的更好的地方，比如这个渣优化。
这个游戏是在我前阵子罹患突聋时游玩并完成一周目的，那段没有丝毫康复迹象，抱着成为残疾人的觉悟的日子里，是本作给了我心灵上的宁静，还在康复期的时候，我就大着胆子每天给自己15分钟戴着耳机来感受这款游戏，所以纵然自己其实没什么见识，写不了什么真正有价值的评测，但还是觉得我应该写点什么，至少表达出我喜欢这款游戏，感谢它在那段日子给予我的陪伴，Muchas gracias.

author: {'steamid': '76561198245514108', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 369, 'last_played': 1503818956}
review: 画面音乐很棒，解密难度偏低，剧情挺感人，总体来说相当不错

author: {'steamid': '76561197960462483', 'num_games_owned': 10581, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 441, 'last_played': 1503808211}
review:
This is not perhaps the most challenging puzzle/exploration game out there - there's perhaps a few puzzles that required me to double check all that I could do and missed a climbable platform, but otherwise the solutions seem pretty simple. That said, the puzzle elements are introduced in a good "platform learning" manner with no writtent text and only minimal on-screen prompts so that you can recognize how certain things will behavior to quickly figure out how to solve the puzzles. There are some nice ideas used in the puzzle designs, particularly with the play of light and shadows, that could make for a more fulfilling game. There are a number of collectables to find with additional exploration and/or level navigation to give this replay value.  The core game took me about 6 hours to complete, and I felt that's about the right value for the price.

What does make this game excel is the relatively simple story. It might be straight forward when you start, but the game uses a number of sublte tricks that lead to a great end-game twist. It is an emotional-driven story and the suprise at the end caught me off guard.  The music and setting all plays perfectly to that tone.

I've seen other reviews that complain of performance issues. I didn't encounter any save for two unreproducable crash-to-desktops early on (this was mid-August 2017) and the rest worked smoothly. It is a bit graphically taxing so low-end computers might have problems, but I don't think it suffers the performance issues that appeared to be a problem when this first launched.

author: {'steamid': '76561198297611640', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 3309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2571, 'last_played': 1638019411}
review:
RiME 更像是一场电影，一部艺术品。  场景，画面，音乐都十分棒，配上不错的剧情发展，很让人心驰神往！

这游戏我玩了至少五周目。 优点就不多说了，场景体验感真的很棒，画面与BGM结合真的很像在旅游，不知不觉待在一个地方久久不愿走远。 每一个场景和剧情的结合也十分紧密，玩一场下来等于感受了人生的离合悲欢，引人深思。  在寻找隐藏物品时也犹如发现新大陆一般，每一个隐藏地点都是一次惊喜。  （所以真的不理解那些只喜欢赶路和一股脑找隐藏的人，只顾着登上山顶却忽略沿途美景，到头来又说这游戏无趣，很无语。）

但是它也有一些公认的缺点： 优化比较差，解谜也过于简单，比较影响游戏体验。所以还是应该加以改进，毕竟游戏的体验感才是第一位的！

总结：

+艺术性强（画面+BGM）
+剧情构思巧妙，令人回味
+场景效果宏大震撼
+感染力强

-优化问题，掉帧严重
-解密过于简单，尤其是2，3章
-收集品意义不大，降低可玩性

客观评分：7.5/10
主观评分：9/10

总之个人非常喜欢它，还是要给好评，但也希望多加改进！不要让它被瑕疵淹没。

author: {'steamid': '76561198366960544', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 419, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 419, 'last_played': 1500175608}

author: {'steamid': '76561198002758394', 'num_games_owned': 270, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 645, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 645, 'last_played': 1511612059}
review:
No quiero extenderme demasiado... Este juego vale cada céntimo que piden por él. Es un juego que transmite, un juego de los que escasean. 

Es precioso en gráficos, precioso en dibujado, precioso en música, precioso en guión y muy reflexivo y fácil de empatizar con él. Una representación perfecta de la psicología humana en el contexto en el que el juego te coloca, no puedo ni quiero hacer spoilers, pero creo que cualquiera que lo haya terminado lo sabrá y entenderá perfectamente.

Cómpralo, para que Tequila nos siga sorprendiendo.
Cómpralo, para que este sector en España continúe creciendo.
Cómpralo, para que sigamos teniendo obras tan personales y emocionales como esta.
Cómpralo, para que la magia de los videojuegos no termine jamás.

Pero sobre todo, cómpralo para disfrutarlo como un niño y emocionarte como un adulto.

¿Recomiendas este juego? [b]Sin dudarlo ni un segundo[/b], aunque sé que por desgracia, es un juego apto únicamente para el sector al que le gustan experiencias más pausadas pero que transmiten emociones.

Brillante. De verdad. Vale cada céntimo.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993339281', 'num_games_owned': 357, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1503076861}
review:
Думал доиграю как нибудь, но вот спустя неделю после 1го запуска снова наткнулся у себя на эту игру и понял - запускать я её не хочу.
А почему, а потому: "Всё это было в симпсонах". Это выражение я употребляю для вещей, которые уже были, но зачем то, кто-то снова пытается их впихнуть в свет, выдав их за новинку.

Итак, для сравнения Вам выдам игру Prince of Persia: Warrior Within.
Графика: не лучше не хуже, чем в Prince of Persia: Warrior Within. Но вся проблема, что для сравнения я вам дал игру 2004 года.
Звук: Музыкальное сопровождение в Prince of Persia: Warrior Within шикарно, в RiME - посредственно.
Геймплей: RiME - попрыгал, открыл, нашёл, встал, подвинул (за 3 часа игры так и не нашёл места, где мог бы пригодится кувырок). Prince of Persia: Warrior Within - всё выше сказанное + прокачка, битвы с мобами (не самые простые и разнообразные), комбинации приёмов с разными оружиями, комнаты испытаний.
Сюжет:  RiME - 3 часа игры, какие то непонятные обрывки сюжета. Prince of Persia: Warrior Within - невозможно оторваться.
Итак: игра 2004 года превосходит во всём игру 2017 года. 

Если бы я советовал покупать эту игру, то написал бы примерно так: "Хотите покричать на неодущевлённые предметы? Эта игра для вас!".
Больше я в ней ничего необычного и более интересного не нашёл.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072571052', 'num_games_owned': 181, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1550301626}

author: {'steamid': '76561198045934390', 'num_games_owned': 59, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 564, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 545, 'last_played': 1607617536}
review:
It has no dialogue, but a lot to tell!

I finished the game after around 9 Hours and its my game of the year 2017!

Why?

- the graphic looks amazing
- the artdesign is in some way similiar overall, but then very different from location to location
- the puzzles are all very intuitiv and not too hard, or way too easy, so the fuid of playing is not quite fast
- exploration is hell of fun, as every location is huge and has a lot to offer in many ways
- the interactions are ot much, but somehow you find out very soon what you can do
- they way the game teach you how to do stuff is very intuitiv, you don't even recognize it (not text)
- there is also no HUD, no lifebar, just pure gamepla and graphic, which is very refreshing
- no talents, no exp to gain and no crafting, it sounds like a downside, but this is one of the parts why i looked forward toplay this game, it has no ballast
- the soundtrack is really well made, it suits perfectly the gameplay and also feeld rewarding when you find secretcs and progress in the game
- the emotional part is incredible, when you find your partner for your journey, when you met new creatures and if you part ways

I played 8-9 Hours and thought originaly i was going to finish the game in below 5 Hours, but i was so wrong, but i explored a lot while i didn't even found everything, only 1/2 of all secrets. 

The ending was expected from middle to finish, but i got the wrong person, so at the end it was a bit of a shocker and i was truly sad when i saw the final ending.

Tequila Works, iam so happy i played your game, it was in many ways one of the best experience i had.

If you like games like

- Abzu
- Journey
- Bound
- NaissanceE
- Ico
- Shadow of the Collosus

..you may like this game a lot, as it is in some ways similiar (pure gameplay, good soundtrack, fantastic and very special artdesign, intuitiv, not HUD) but still different enough to gain some new experience. 

Again, thank you very much for the great experience!

author: {'steamid': '76561198042582734', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 391, 'last_played': 1542321750}
review:
SPOILER ALERT

So this game is totally about the five stages of grief. 

Obviously each area is one stage. The first beach area is Denial

The second area is Anger because that bird is pissed and wants to eat you

The third area is barganing because you have to work with the robots 

The fourth area is obviously depression

and the last cutscene is acceptance.

I know it's all pretty obvious! But this game is a perfect painting next to majora's mask about the five stages of grief.

author: {'steamid': '76561198354487609', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 801, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1508832235}
review: I walked into this game thinking it would be a fun, casual playing game, pick up and play every now and then. I was wrong. This is a solid game that was well worth what I paid for it. review: This game has very beautiful artwork and a great soundtrack. The designers did a great job. Proof that video games can also be very artistic. My GTX 1070 did great with the settings on ultra. author: {'steamid': '76561198260711783', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 513, 'last_played': 1568270317}
review: 17小时半收集通关。我是被画质3D吸引过来的。小男孩非常的萌。游戏过程中出现三次卡边界BUG但是不太影响。很多地方设计的都很好，比如动作细节还有谜题探索，不是很难，但是很考验空间想象和运用能力。不得不说大机器人和小狐狸真的特别可爱，可惜最后都牺牲了。剧情很虐心。很多细节也是最后通关了然后恍然大悟，不得不说作者真的很厉害。除了一丢丢bug和部分视角别扭以及最后很虐的结局，技术和环境我都很满意，音乐也很棒。关卡方面不得不说BOSS战让我玩的心惊胆跳，有几个视角上的差别很考验微操，手残党试了很多次才过。最让我感到难过就是后半截我亲眼看着我花了一整章救活的大家伙血祭大门，就连最后一直陪着我的小狐狸也不放过，编剧大大您的刀片请查收！！希望和绝望一直伴随，最后还是希望爸爸能安心的活下去。总的来说给8分吧，扣掉视角bug一分，还有虐心剧情一分。

author: {'steamid': '76561198131276266', 'num_games_owned': 561, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 335, 'last_played': 1503071680}
review:
一千个人心里有一千个哈姆雷特，游戏这个东西亲身体验一下比看什么测评和评论都强
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
rime的美术风格还不错，大面积使用低纯度的颜色让画面看起来非常清新和舒适。有一些journey的影子。
游戏的地图设计也比较出色，某些关卡会重复使用一个区域但却不会单调。
但是谜题的设计总的来说并不让人满意，多数简单且经不起推敲，让人眼前一亮的谜题非常少。重复也很多，经常有解决一个谜题要跑很远的情况，比较单调，很麻烦，比如潜水那一段真的是有一点折磨，而谜题却非常无聊，稍微有地点玩不下去。
剧情来说较为平庸，不再剧透，大家自己体会。
游戏的优化有待提升，较为频繁地掉帧还是比较影响游戏体验的。
音乐方面就我来说还是比较欣赏的，代入感不错。
游戏的流程不是很长，在不刻意追求全收集及的情况下一个晚上就可以走完。还是建议一口气玩完，完整的体验还是会让人感受更深一点。虽然体验体验也不是很好。
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
总的来说是一部比较一般的作品，玩完以后也没有什么感动，不差但也不好的作品，6.5分。

author: {'steamid': '76561198021456262', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 335, 'last_played': 1503402724}
review: Спасибо за игру чуваки из ТЕКИЛА. Не слов.Одни эмоции! 10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198205506771', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 516, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 516, 'last_played': 1503385888}
review:
[b]游戏性[/b]：画面优秀，配色舒服，音乐十分有代入感，玩法就是普通的解谜，难度不大。偶尔画面视角突然切换玩起来有点别扭，会突然掉帧，不过瑕不掩瑜，是个难得的佳作。

个人认为游戏出色在代入感上。故事主角小男孩虽然不会说话，但却会根据剧情场景发出带有各种情绪的声音，这让人很容易和自己的情绪产生共鸣，将自己代入小男孩的角色里。印象中比较深刻的有小男孩踏入黑暗中，虽然恐惧得瑟瑟发抖，但是通过歌声可以照亮脚下的路。让我想起自己小时候害怕黑暗的时候，就和自己假想中的黑暗中的生物说话，交朋友，小声哼歌，就没有那么害怕了。其实所有孩子的心路历程应该都很类似，作者通过对孩子心理状态贴切的描画，让我们找回了心中那个充满童真的自己。

[b]剧情部分（含剧透）： [/b][spoiler] 作者通过一个巧妙的叙事方式来讲述这个悲伤的故事。这种叙事方式极易将我们带入角色：一个被海浪冲上岸的无助少年漫步在一个无人的充满神奇力量的岛屿，从最初的好奇兴奋（Don’t say no），恐惧愤怒(Unbearable)，努力尝试(Ask for miracle)，绝望悲伤(No hope)，到最后，得到记忆，知道自己无法回到现实与父亲重聚，接受自己已经死掉了的事实决定去往生的平静(Letting go)。就像是自己经历了一遍这所有的一切，我的心境也随着故事的发展起起伏伏。当画面最终回到小男孩生活过的房间，看到和这片岛屿上的一切有关的事物：狐狸抱枕，野猪玩具，天花板上的星星，门上的标识，窗户外的风景……一路走来的一切都在眼前浮现。最后，父亲回头看到了小男孩的影子，在最后的团聚中，小男孩带着不舍随风飘散。
值得注意的是【放手】这个动作。其实在游戏中很多次都有重点描写：父亲抓着小男孩最后留下的一片衣角，缓缓放手；站在悬崖边犹豫了很久最终跳下往生的小男孩，还有无法挽留的牺牲自己的机器人。包括故事的最后一个章节成就的名字【Letting go】也是这样，作者想让玩家去做出放手这个动作，让玩家自己体会放手背后无法言说的情感。让我想到之前玩【A bird story】的时候，最后要按下方向键将手上的鸟儿放飞，这个设计其实很犯规，让玩家来作出这个最艰难的动作，就好像做出决定的是我们自己一样，这背后的情感也自然附加到了我们身上，让我们真的能够感同身受。[/spoiler]
不过我想，这正是游戏作为第九艺术，其他艺术无法取代的独特魅力。它真正让我们成为主角去触摸作者所创造出的世界，感知其中的情感。	
字数有限就不多说啦，谢谢你们带来这么好的作品。
Thank you for creating this game!

author: {'steamid': '76561197970513433', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 262, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1709000303}
review:
This is an absolutely beautiful experience. One large seamless, lovely world, full of moments of wonder. The puzzles, while not yet terribly difficult, are well-constructed, and the level-design has a great sense of flow. I'm rarely frustrated by puzzles or traversing the landscape, and there's very little backtracking.

Despite having a pretty similar control scheme to a 3D Legend of Zelda title, they've refined the controls to better fit a game filled with puzzles, but no enemies. While I'm a huge fan of Zelda games, Link seemingly has little regard for self-preservation, and likes to hurl himself off of every available ledge, whether I tell him to or not. Our nameless hero in Rime, on the other hand, notices ledges, and stops himself.

The music should be remarked upon as well. A mix of traditional and modern elements, with some beautiful cello work. It's wonderfully atmospheric, and makes you feel as if you're playing through a studio Ghibli film.

As for complaints, I have very, very few. Originally when I played, the camera was super buggy indoors, and would clip through walls, obscuring your view of the level and character. This has been fixed. It was also poorly optimized, and did not run well on my machine despite it exceeding the system requirements significantly. This too seems to have been fixed. There was, at one point, some sort of invasive DRM software. This was removed early on. The devs seem to be really responsive, and very much willing to fix issues in order to make the game a better experience for players.

This game is one of the best I've played in a long time. It's a beautiful, lonely, immersive experience. I've not finished it, playing it only a little bit at a time, so that I can make it last. This should be played by more people.

author: {'steamid': '76561197976326496', 'num_games_owned': 2527, 'num_reviews': 257, 'playtime_forever': 759, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 759, 'last_played': 1503191229}
review:
初回クリア時のVer.は1.0.4。初周クリアに要した時間は約6時間。全実績解除までは約12時間半。

[h1]Pros:[/h1][list]
[*]扇情的なオーケストラスコア
[*]色彩のバランスとコントラストが映えるアートデザイン
[*]言語に依存しない体験
[*]表情豊かなアニメーション
[*]進行を阻害しないパズル[/list]

[h1]Cons:[/h1][list]
[*]デモスキップできない
[*]セーブファイルが1つしかない
[*]ステージセレクトで冒頭からしか再開できない
[*]閉所でのリアルタイムカメラ[/list]

[h1]とにかく最後までプレイしてみて欲しい[/h1]

　RiMEは三人称視点による3Dプラットフォーマーのパズルアドベンチャー。調べるとリリースまで相当紆余曲折があった模様。当初はMicrosoftの独占タイトルEchoes of Sirenとして開発されており、リジェクトされたのち、今度はSonyからPS4の独占タイトルとして発表。初めて公の場に姿を現したのは2013年のGamescomで、その後開発元のTequila Worksが著作権を買い戻してマルチプラットフォームとしてリリースに至った経緯がある。少なくともプロジェクト自体は2012年以前より稼働していたと見るのが適切ではないかと思われる。

　激しい嵐に見舞われたのち、柔らかな波打ち際に打ち上げられた少年が目を覚ますとそこは白い塔がそびえ立つ絶海の孤島だった。最初にプレイヤーに与えられる情報はこの程度の最小限なもので、何をすべきかどこを目指すべきなのか全くもって分からない。フィールドもそれなりに広く迷いそうに見える。ただ最後まで不思議と迷うことは無かった。一見広く見えるフィールドも、海から範囲外へ出ようとすると水母がいて押し戻されるように、移動できる範囲は存外狭く作られている。次に進む一歩を見失いかけたときに、石畳の道や岩壁の汚れきず、夜間に聳え立つ光の柱など、自然と移動しなければならない場所へと導く、露骨に主張しない巧みな視線誘導が感じられた。
　この感性はチュートリアルに対しても通ずるものがある。進行を中断する通過儀礼めいたチュートリアルはなく、初めて行う操作の折に操作方法を示すアイコンがすっと表示され、気になるオブジェクトにそっと光が添えられる。体験を阻害しないための配慮と美意識には感心した。

　美意識といえばビジュアルについて言及せずにはいられない。ゲームを開始して真っ先に感じたのは、ただただ吸い込まれるような空と海の青が美しいということ。トゥーン調のシェーディングと光沢が抑えられたマットな色彩は過度にリアルな印象を与えず、絵本の中のような不思議な世界観を構築するのに機能している。彩度が抑えられているゆえにジョルジョ・デ・キリコを思わせる白の塔がより一層映えて見えるし、昼夜のサイクルによってガラリと印象を変える表情の豊かさや、ライティングとそれによって生じる陰影が絵本のような平坦な絵柄に濃淡の深みを与えているといった影響を確認することができた。端的に言えば色の配置とコントラストによる魅せ方が上手であり、美しい。

　少年のアクションも実に洗練されている。基本的な操作としては走る・ジャンプ・転がる・叫ぶの4つしかなく、あとは地形との接触とパズル用オブジェクトへの干渉しかない。これらはコントローラーのアサインでいえばLスティック(Rスティックはカメラ操作であるがアクションの話なので割愛)と4つのボタンに集約され、肩にあるトリガーは使用しない。使用するボタン数を抑え、機能を集約したことでプレイヤーに強いる習熟コストを最低限のものにしている。殴ったり武器を振るう直接的な戦闘要素は存在せず、主軸である謎解きと探索に集中させる意図が操作体系からも読み取れる。
　アニメーションの遷移も滑らかで、移動操作だけでも少年は実によく演技するし、見ていて楽しい。ただパズルプラットフォーマーというジャンルの特性上、進行をスキップできるようなショートカットには細心の注意が払われているため、掴めない地形は絶対に掴めない。ちょっとした階段状の段差を横から登ろうとした際に横からよじ登ってくれればと期待したものの、お間抜けな垂直ジャンプが出て興が冷めることが何回かあった。あまり気にし過ぎることではないのかもしれないが、アニメーション遷移判定の細部が気になる人はいるかもしれない。

　パズルには賛否両論あると思う。なぜならそれほど難しくなく、大体は周辺をウロウロすることで完結することが多いからだ。より複雑なパズルを求める人にはこれは看過できない問題に見えるだろう。これは本作が進行に応じて後戻りできない作りであることに起因しているところも大きいが、意図してそう作られた背景があると見ている。パズル専用ゲームならまだしも本作はデモを含むシナリオ演出があり、それが動機となってプレイヤーをより没入させるための試練と報酬の構図がある。より力強くシナリオを押し進めるのであれば、一ヶ所に著しく長い時間拘束するのはテンポを損なう。だからちょっと頭を捻って少し考えたら解ける案配が最適解なのだと思う。実際ユーザーが参加できるコンテンツ作成型のゲームでは、そのコンテンツが極悪に難しいステージで溢れかえるのはよく見かける光景である、と言えばわかってもらえるだろうか。

　報酬としてイベントデモなどのシナリオ演出を挙げた。アンビエントなBGMが流れる中、パズルを解くとリアルタイムで不意にオーケストラのスコアがフェードインしてくる。ただパズルを解いただけで、行く先に思いを馳せるようなストリングスが響き、心の中が一気にざわめき立つ。この音に乗じ、美しいエフェクトを帯びた演出が始まる。抑えられた色彩ゆえにブルームの効いたエフェクトが一際目を惹くのは先述の通り。少し残念なのはリアルタイムで制御するゆえにデモスキップが見送られた点だろうか。ただそれでも本作のサウンドは掛け値なく美しいし、プレイヤーの背中を押してくれる力は強い。

　リトライのしやすさにも幾つか言及すべき点がある。アクションでありつつもゲームオーバーは存在せず、たとえ高所から落下したとしても最後に立っていた地形からすぐに復帰してゲームを再開できる。また進行に応じて要所要所でオートセーブが走り、巻き戻りが最低限に抑えられているのも特徴だ。収集要素は取得するごとに個別にセーブが入るため、取った時点で記録される。再開時は進行に応じたセクションの冒頭からとなるが、取ったアイテムは既に持った状態となっておりフィールドからは消えている。つまり普通に進める分にプレイヤーはいつでもやめたいときにやめられるように配慮されている。
　ただ問題としてセーブファイルが1つしかないことが挙げられる。これがオートセーブであること、後戻りできない作りであること、探索による収集要素が大量にあること、との相性が悪い。取り逃した収集要素を再度探しに行くことができないのだ。ゲームをクリアしたらステージセレクト(チャプタージャンプ)も用意されているのだが、1つのチャプターが長く冒頭からしかリプレイできない。コンティニューとしてゲームの再開時に適用されるセクションが、チャプタージャンプでは参照されないのは収集家を悩ませる種となっている。

　最後となったが、シナリオとプロットについて語る。本作ではUIこそローカライズされているものの、作中で一切意味の通じる言葉を喋らない。何もわからない状態で孤島に投げ出され、知らず知らずのうちに塔の頂上へ導かれるように進んでいく。その旅路の途中でお供となり得る者もいれど、決して話す言葉を持たない。そういう様子をプレイヤーが見ることで少年は今きっとこういう気持ちに違いないと感情や感性で少年との一体感、結束を強めていく。明確な示唆を持たないゆえに、プレイヤーの数だけこうかもしれないというストーリーを作り出していることに成功している。最終的に一定の示唆は与えられるが、それは是非最後までプレイして確認して欲しい。私は少し複雑な気持ちになったが、それでもこのシナリオが好きだ。


　何かを評する際にその指標として似たようなものを取り上げることはよくあることだ。ただ既視感に阻害されて自身の感性を放棄することはしたくない。既存の枠にとらわれることなく最後までプレイして感じてみて欲しい。私は本作を金字塔を打ち立てた偉大な先人達に負けず劣らずプレイすべき価値があると評する。近年は表現技術も向上し、時折胸をえぐるような体験をもたらすゲームに出くわすことが増えてきた。本作もそうしたゲームの一つで、だから私はゲームをプレイすることをやめられないのだ。

author: {'steamid': '76561198132972566', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 628, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 628, 'last_played': 1503313644}
review:
很感人的故事，游戏设计非常的精致，角色动作和场景非常搭，很不容易出戏。

难得的是38寸带鱼屏在全屏下也能完美运行，很多游戏如质量效应仙女座都是两黑边。

有质量有内涵！

author: {'steamid': '76561198208117113', 'num_games_owned': 56, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 370, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 351, 'last_played': 1503299493}
review:
打分：4/5 值得购买

+ 非常悦耳的配乐

+ 赏心悦目的画面

+ 有趣的解密

+ 不需语言的代入感

+ 致郁的故事==

- PC优化很一般

原本是打算等Switch版出了再入的，不过最近刚好吃鸡卖包回血了不少，又刚好入了新的手柄，就入手了Steam版来玩。

开游戏就喜欢上了本作画面和配乐，称得上艺术品。常常玩游戏的过程中就忍不住狂按F12截图，最喜欢操作主角仰头看星空。

作为一个解密游戏，本作的解密难度其实并不高，整个游戏我只看了一两次攻略就可以自己摸索着全部搞定。虽然并不硬核，本作利用光影、声音来解密的设计依旧值得解密游戏爱好者一试。

剧情上本作完全不需要汉化。去下了3DM的汉化补丁，其实也就只有菜单需要汉化而已。剧情并不复杂，主要在最后一章揭示了剧情，感人而致郁。[spoiler] 主角之外需要的两个角色小狐狸和机器人都在帮助主角之后而逝去。两者逝去的画面玩的时候挺伤感的。[/spoiler]

很大的一点不足是PC端的优化很一般，会有掉帧或卡顿，这点很蛋疼。

整个游戏我花了7个小时就通关了（没有全收集），流程并不长。总之是值得一玩的游戏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198037832288', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 309, 'last_played': 1503285806}
review:
RiME is a story
A story about being lost
A story about new experiences
A story about new companions
A story about seeing the world in new ways
A story about familiar faces
A story about bleak horizons
A story about courage
A story about fear
A story about overcoming obstacles
A story about remembering
A story about taking life away
A story about giving new life
A story about making new friends
A story about teamwork
A story about losing loved ones
A story about self sacrifice
A story about losing everyone you care about
A story about losing yourself
A story about despair
A story about seeing the truth
A story about accepting what is
A story about remembering what was
A story about never forgetting
A story about letting go

RiME is not just a story
RiME is amazing work of art

author: {'steamid': '76561197974314237', 'num_games_owned': 1249, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 530, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 530, 'last_played': 1509053838}
review:
Only 2 hours in the game, but from the first time I saw screenshots for this game I knew I would like it. So far it is even better than I thought.
Looks stunning, lots to explore and really gripping, you want to continue exploring further and further.
Controls are nice, not too difficult to proceed but challenging enough.

Only downside is some performance issues, although that does not really spoil the fun it is noticable sometimes.

Overall highy recommended.

After finishing the game I can only recommend it more, great original story.

author: {'steamid': '76561198263450178', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 323, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 323, 'last_played': 1503245715}
review:
Could've been potentially a very good game if the developers actually [u]finished[/u] it.

Developers present this game as a game where you have to solve difficult puzzles however, all puzzles are very straightforward and the game turns into a boring walking simulator where you hopelessly walk from one puzzle to another and think when it's going to finish. The story which is also supposed to be here is almost non-existent. It feels like developers said - "You go and find story yourself, we just provide you with cutscenes occasionally".

While you progress through your [b]'adventure'[/b] you also face a horrible camera. Its movements are confusing and even though they suppose to help the gameplay, they ruin it. Texture bugs don't help to improve game experience either. Your character can get stuck in textures and the only way to deal with it is to restart. Sometimes he just doesn't hold on to the edge where he should [spoiler]( the game is so easy developers even painted the edges you can climb, but bugs disagree with them),[/spoiler] so you have to spend extra time. Also when you are underwater sometimes you can see black textures.

Adding to what I said earlier about 'adventure' the game is extremely linear and you barely have a choice. It's like developers said to you that you can buy the game but you can only watch them play. There's absolutely no freedom. It's very sad that developers had a decent idea but didn't manage to produce anything good. Anyway, you shouldn't buy this game, [u][b]it's an unfinished project.[/b][/u]

author: {'steamid': '76561198271246801', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 453, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1504274399}
review: 探索解谜类的，画风和动作让我想到塞尔达，可是音乐真的很有代入感，简直完美的契合每一帧画面，故事是有些感人的，只是这样的水彩画风需要辣么高的配置么，推荐指数五颗星。

author: {'steamid': '76561197971250236', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 698, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 240, 'last_played': 1505046799}
review: 3 horas de jogo em um roteiro fantástico e gráficos maravilhosos, jogabilidade ótima e muitos puzzles até o momento fáceis de resolver, um game de enxer os olhos e muito cativante que levam um sobrevivente a um naufrágio descobrir os enigmas da ilhas onde foi parar. super recomendado, game fantástico para todas as idades!

author: {'steamid': '76561197973134525', 'num_games_owned': 6153, 'num_reviews': 834, 'playtime_forever': 525, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 525, 'last_played': 1503234361}
review:
me ha enamorado, si me dijeran que detras esta miyazaki me lo creeria. Con cada paso, con cada salto que me hacia avanzar y escuchar esas canciones me iba enamorando mas y mas. "En boca cerrada no entran moscas" pues a mi me han entrado todas.

Lo unico que empaña a este maravilloso juego y que tambien afecta a muchos grandes titulos es la cabezoneria de los desarrolladores de marcar las zonas trepables, sino hay marca el 99% olvidate de que es el camino.

Lo mejor, el atuendo de ¿vitiligio?

author: {'steamid': '76561198277504441', 'num_games_owned': 1041, 'num_reviews': 299, 'playtime_forever': 265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 265, 'last_played': 1503228253}
review: A great game. It's hard to explain what is special about it. Don't trust people who says it's a clone of Journey & Abzu etc. It takes a lot from those games, but it's still a unique and worth playing experience. You'll get the feeling of playing one of your favorite games from your childhood. Very simple but satisfying platforms and puzzles. The level design is well done because it feels like you can explore an open world but in truth it's a linear experience. The world is not just an island, it got a lot of surprises and variety.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113109558', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 548, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 452, 'last_played': 1504111648}
review: 故事簡單卻很有味道。美術風格細膩，場景有《天空之城》的風格。遊戲時間約七小時，沒有打打殺殺，適合休閒型玩家

author: {'steamid': '76561198101103255', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 405, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 405, 'last_played': 1503201453}
review: 一部艺术品游戏，再一次展示了第九类艺术所能达到的高度。满分的配乐，出色的谜题让人身心十分愉悦。通过过场动画和收集来了解剧情手法十分流畅。你如果是看上这款游戏的画面那就入手吧，一定会带给你一段出色的心灵之旅。以下最好隐藏，不过看了也没什么。[spoiler] 生与往生天人之隔，小男孩在自己最爱的小狐狸的指引下探寻着自己从哪来，要到哪里去。开始我以为他是这个梦幻国度的王子，后来我笑了，在这个年纪每个孩子不都是心中国度的王子吗？孩子多次想靠近那红衣男子，可是那男子何尝不是想紧紧拥住男孩？好奇、开心、疑惑、惊愕、害怕、最后到释然往生。有人说这部分安排的实在太过仓促，但我以为不然。有的人已经死了，只是他还不知道。他有太多的大好时光有大把的梦想去追寻。只是在突然发现自己所处的事实下默默地接受让人不禁泪下。可是奇迹，可是奇迹，就这么众望所归地轻描淡写地出现了。可能也不算奇迹，但是小男孩与父亲心灵上的重逢和他们对事实的接受为整个故事画上了最好的句号。	[/spoiler] 我喜欢这个故事，但我不会再打开这个游戏了。因为故事美的我心碎。

author: {'steamid': '76561197992213323', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 464, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 361, 'last_played': 1664576590}
review: Amazing!

author: {'steamid': '76561197993212289', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 327, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 327, 'last_played': 1503219999}
review: 讨论剧情已经有很多人做过了，但是我得指出，这个游戏的美术真的没有图里和玩家吹的那么好……从第二关开始就大部分是单调的黑漆漆的房间，比起Journey ABZU The Witness这些风格类似的作品来说差的太多，完全不养眼……

author: {'steamid': '76561198082217146', 'num_games_owned': 141, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1509570663}
review:
The debate has often been made as to wether or not video games are to be defined as a form of art. RiME, better than any other, illustrates the beauty, wonder, and raw emotion that games can communicate. So as to not ruin the plot, and stellar ending of the game, I will end my quick, vague review with this: RiME will take you on a journey, tell you a story, and is capable of reducing you to tears. 

I can not reccomend this game enough, and applaud all who had a hand in crafting this masterpiece.

author: {'steamid': '76561198357371067', 'num_games_owned': 161, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 525, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 147, 'last_played': 1526221293}
review:

不过帧数有问题,玩了一会感觉晕;还有有些地方锁视角,不喜欢.
等我通关了再更新评测.

author: {'steamid': '76561198150066509', 'num_games_owned': 413, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 3785, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1671822590}
review: 以水为镜，我自塔顶，向下追寻，下面是无尽的深渊，令人恐惧，我看到的，是未知和死亡。当黑夜为我反转，星空变换，海风将我的斗篷吹向山巅，日月是我的眸子，河流是我的眼泪，我为何如此的悲伤，像被遗忘的古迹那样沉重的往事，我记不起来，乌云密布，闪电帮我驱逐梦魇，波涛，黑暗，愤怒，我平静了下来，无尽的懊恼是我愈发黑暗的源头，我寻着桎梏与枷链，潜入深渊，冰冷的水侵蚀着我，无法逃脱，我唯一的依赖离开了，去了再也回不到这里的远方，他的牺牲为我换来温暖，光明，一扇扇门被打开，真相扑面而来，我感受到了悲伤，亦感受到了安抚，释怀与解脱，是时候了，我看了看这颠倒的高塔，纵身一跃，扑向海面..........以海为镜，我自塔底，向上追寻，越过谜团的镜像，我看到的，是对称的天堂。           ——茶壶の日常评测~

author: {'steamid': '76561198116217266', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 461, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 426, 'last_played': 1504998790}

author: {'steamid': '76561198120412771', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 276, 'last_played': 1503181008}
review:
Un jeu certes court mais tout bonnement magnifique, une perle vidéoludique. Une B.O magnifique. Une histoire bouleversante. De tous les jeux auxquels j'ai pu jouer, il est celui qui m'a fait le plus vibrer. Une véritable poésie.

10/10 sans hésiter.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965361589', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 259, 'playtime_forever': 432, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 432, 'last_played': 1503176812}
review:
This is only just a "no", rather than "yes".

The game looks very good at all times.
Doesn't quite run great with the higher settings.

The journey and puzzles are pleasing enough, but never feel challenging enough to bring much satisfaction.

The story... it didn't resonate with me. Changed direction very quickly near the end which left it feeling more confusing than fullfilling.

I mananged to find most of what was hidden along the way, but after finishing just short of 8 hours I didn't feel a desire to go through and find what I'd missed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198107385672', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 142, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1502516516}

author: {'steamid': '76561198122110851', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 381, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 381, 'last_played': 1503153896}
review:
Queridos amigos de Tequila Works: Quiero que sepáis que si algún día os conozco en persona, os voy a besar en los morros. Gracias por hacer de los videojuegos un arte capaz de hacerte llorar.

Análisis, en muy resumidas cuentas:
Una historia breve, cuya belleza de los escenarios y los secretos por encontrar harán que disfrutes durante más horas. La narración de la historia es visual, haciéndote sumergir en los significados que van transmitiéndote en la historia. La banda sonora que acompaña tu viaje es es-pec-ta-cu-lar. Y al final, si tienes corazón, lloras al darte cuenta de lo que has estado haciendo todo este tiempo.

No digo nada más, salvo que lo juegues.

author: {'steamid': '76561198146710618', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 594, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 594, 'last_played': 1503147646}
review:
This is my first time ever writing a review for a game, its not something I would normally do.

But when I completed the game I felt compelled to review it. I know some people gave this game negative reviews mainly because they expected it to be something else.

But for me it was one of the most beautiful and emotional games I have played. The soundtrack in the game is incredibly beautiful, I found myself just getting lost in the music at times. And the visuals are just as incredible. 
 
The game play itself is not that overly difficult or challenging, but I don't think it that type of game anyway. I think the game is more relaxing and even meditative at times, I truly was in awe of the music and visuals at times.

Overall the story is quite profound and also a little sad. Something about the whole game just spoke to me, I honestly think it had some of the most beautiful music I have ever heard in game. 

I would highly recommend people give this game a chance. And ignore the negative reviews from some people. I think the game when combining the visuals, the beautiful soundtrack and the moving story comes together to form a master piece.

Id give this game a solid 8.5 out 10 it was well and truly worth the time and money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044753814', 'num_games_owned': 951, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 337, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 337, 'last_played': 1503139773}
review: Наверное одна из атмосфернейших игр, музыкальное сопровождение 10/10, Рисовка мира 9/10, а так же полное погружение в мир неизведанного.Всем советую игра впечатлила!

author: {'steamid': '76561197992059881', 'num_games_owned': 743, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 740, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 740, 'last_played': 1503197302}
review:
I enjoyed RiME. The music was perhaps my favorite aspect. I loved how smoothly the score adapted to the situation. The clean graphical style and shadows stand out as well. RiME reminded me most of Journey on PlayStation but with ledge climbing elements borrowed from Tomb Raider.

Now for cons: RiME was short. I played through and found half the collectables in about 7 hours. Movement didn't feel quite right. Animations were drawn out and disconnected, and interacting with objects required careful positioning. Journey had much better movement and a more engrossing story.

I'd recommend RiME to a friend if it dropped to $20 again. I'll also watch for future games from this Spanish developer. ¡Con gusto!

author: {'steamid': '76561198280699925', 'num_games_owned': 80, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 940, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 434, 'last_played': 1517903311}
review: 如果你错过了风之旅人，错过了最后的守护者。那你绝对不想再错过Rime也许这就是游戏被称为第九艺术的原因。对我个人而言，一直很喜欢这种动画渲染风的游戏，所以当我看见这画面以及那BGM时顿时相见恨晚。放心剁手，血赚不亏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198171509114', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 574, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 504, 'last_played': 1511623647}
review:
1회차 엔딩보고 왔습니다 이제 2회차 하러갈건데 그 전에 잠시 쓰러왔어요.

딱히 대사라던지 자막이 없어서 메뉴선택지(Setting, Resume 이런거요!)만 읽으실 수 있다면 그냥 진행하셔도 전혀 문제 없습니다! 플레이 중엔 언어관련으로 아무것도 안나와요!

처음에 난이도 어렵다는(난해하다는) 후기를 보고 살까말까 고민하다가 트레일러의 그래픽과 사운드 믿고 질렀는데, 저 세상에 이렇게 친절한 퍼즐게임 처음입니다.
고민하다보면 반드시 해답이 있고요 힌트도 많습니다. 아무래도 스토리에 중점이 있어서 그런듯합니다.
굳이 조언드리자면 [이유없는 힌트는 없다.]정도 드리고 싶네요!

친절한 난이도의(쉽다는 뜻은 아닙니다. 적절하다고 생각됩니다)퍼즐,
플레이 내내 눈이 호강하는 그래픽,
여운과 감동을 남기는 스토리, 
그리고 편안하고 아름다운 음악.
3 조화로 n시간동안 시간가는줄 모르고 어제 밤새 했네요..오늘부턴 도전과제합니다.

볼륨이 큰 여타 게임에 비교하면 플레이타임이 짧다고 여겨질 수도 있겠습니다만, 저는 값어치를 했다는 생각이 더 크게 듭니다. 
나는 게임에 할 게 많아야 해! 오픈월드 원한다! 하시는 분에게는 비추일 수도 있겠네요.
하지만 그래픽과 사운드와 스토리가 (정말로) 열일합니다. 이쪽 좋아하시는 분들께 강추..

개인적으로 (당연하다면 당연하지만)게임패드쪽이 조작감이 좋습니다 아무래도 키보드는 대각선 이동이 힘든데 이 게임 걸을 때마다 카메라시점이 자동으로 움직이거든요! 천천히 진행하시면 아무 상관 없습니다만 키보드로 쭉~~~~~ !빠르게! 이동하려고 생각하시면 바뀌는 시점 탓에 아주 약~~간 답답하실수도! (그래서 전 재빠르게 패드로 갈아탔습니다)
그래도 조작감 나쁜 편은 아닙니다. 카메라 강제이동만 빼면 매우 친절해요! A에서 B로 뛰어야할 때 <가능한 지역>이라면 99%성공합니다!(1% = 실수로 너무 일찍 혹은 늦게 잘못 뜀)
제가! A~B점프로 nn번 트라이 해야하는 게임을 하다와서 그런지! 이렇게 편할수가! 없어요! 좋은 게임입니다.
최적화랑 렉이야기가 있어서 약간 걱정했는데 전 렉도 거의 없었어요.(닥소3, 위쳐3, 압주의 최저사양이 그럭저럭 돌아가는 컴입니다) 사운드가 한 두번 지직거렸나? 전혀 문제될 정도는 아니었습니다. 편안한 플레이였어요.

쓸만큼 쓴거 같네요! 다시 겜하러 가야지. 선택에 도움이 되었길 바라며 즐거운 게임사는 시간되십시어..!
+과연 도전과제 올클리어가 가능한가 하는 의문이 드는 요즘입니다ㅠ 스팀어워드 때문에 다시 와봤네요.. 여전히 좋은 게임입니다ㅠ 모두 라임하세요 ㅜ

author: {'steamid': '76561198180247498', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 427, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 345, 'last_played': 1521254152}
review: RIME provides intricate gameplay, accompanied by stunning visuals and music that brings you into a deep and meaningful world that stuns all the way to the end. The puzzles are fairly simple and repetitive, but I feel that the constant suspense makes up for this deficiency. Many critics say that this is a shallow game, but I found that through careful analysis and the connection of major plot points, RIME makes for a deep and thoughtful game that can be extremely enjoyable when you begin to piece together the details.

author: {'steamid': '76561198236681814', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 635, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 268, 'last_played': 1643490529}

author: {'steamid': '76561197992117581', 'num_games_owned': 99, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 475, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 466, 'last_played': 1614268746}
review: Прекрасная игра! На такое не жалко ни денег ни времени, она того стоит! Я в восторге, люблю подобные игры, рекомендую! Побольше бы таких!

author: {'steamid': '76561197971202050', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 210, 'playtime_forever': 1289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 408, 'last_played': 1561058736}
review:
I give it an 9/10
What an awesome puzzle/platformer/adventure game.
No bugs, beautifull graphics, very good music.
I did all puzzles without peaking at guides, so this game is not myst difficulty.
Insanely nice story, but I warn you, I cried at the end.
There are achievements ingame, things to discover and to collect.
I would say this makes it playable more than once.
Please try it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100793235', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 1080, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 378, 'last_played': 1597388802}
review:
purchased the game. installed the game. played the game. unlocked achievements and everything. did not manage to finish the game. got to the secton after windmill area. 

then the game became corrupted. better said....my file from the cloud became corrupted.
after getting through windmill section. the game has frozen during the loading screen every single time.
i validated my game using steam validator.
i uninstalled then reinstalled the game. i even turned steam could sync off.
i then installed it onto my older other computer that is by a different pc manudacturer...still same result.
something happened regarding my save states from the steam cloud which somehow is corrupting my game files.
since the freezing during the load screens is happening on two different pc that have completel different components.
so it is not a hardware compatibility issue.
i was really enoying and loving the game but i must sadly give it two way big thumbs down. its a broken game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198381606506', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1519, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 834, 'last_played': 1504354295}
review:
RiME очень необычная игра. Прекраснейшая музыка. Яркие краски. Необычный сюжет. Проникаешься игрой на все 100%. 
После прохождения осталась буря неоднозначных эмоций, но чего точно не осталось, так это вопросов. Без слов, без супер спецэффектов, без слишком сложных завихреней разработчики сумели рассказать логично выстроенную историю. Да, не лёгкая истроия, как кажется на первый взгляд. Она заставляет задуматься о многом.
Не могу найти слов, чтобы ещё что-нибудь рассказать о RiME. Просто впадаю в словесный ступор... Чобы понять меня, пройдите игру)
Мне остается только поблагодарить разработчиков и композитра за прекрасное творение:)

author: {'steamid': '76561198414359908', 'num_games_owned': 57, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 688, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 295, 'last_played': 1551980765}
review: 作为一个刚下载Steam的新人，好像并不是很适合在这里指点些什么，但是作为新人的入坑之作实在是太让人失望了。画面特效全部降成最低都不能稳定30FPS，更别说上60了，玩了一个下午有点小晕，吃完饭差点呕出来。前两天看着好评与打折之后看了下游戏，感觉挺吸引人的，现在看来很让人失望。不是超高配置的玩家还是不推荐了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198314075328', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 565, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 540, 'last_played': 1504604120}
review:
刚通关就来评论了。
这款游戏绝对值他的价格（虽然我是打折的时候买的）
很美的一款游戏，画面很喜欢，音乐也很赞！游戏解密元素比较容易（像我这种智商不足的卡关也是常有……）
收集元素一路上留意着应该也好找（但是我没找齐）
结局有两个我只打出了儿子的还有一个我打不动了祝你们打出来吧；P

author: {'steamid': '76561198082765773', 'num_games_owned': 172, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 635, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 635, 'last_played': 1503063689}
review:
AVIS GENERAL : 

Rime, c'est une histoire poétique mêlant imaginaire enfantin et psychologie humaine. Une merveilleuse aventure aux allures de conte. Un subtil mélange de références : les mystérieuses cités d'or, Atlantide, Zelda et plus largement les civilisations mayas et égyptiennes. 

Comme d'autres jeux avant lui (notamment Abzû), le récit sera délivré au travers du décor, d'éléments parfois VRAIMENT bien cachés. Nul dialogue : tout est dans l'observation.

Les musiques, quant à elles, vous envoûteront dès les premières notes pour vous plonger dans de somptueux niveaux.

Et cette fin... un plotwist qui vaut clairement le détour ! Je ne peux pas tellement en dire plus, de peur de vous gâcher l'expérience. Mais en tout cas, Rime est réellement une belle occasion de voyager en un ailleurs somptueux et riche en émotions. 

GAMEPLAY

Côté gameplay, ne vous attendez pas à des énigmes alambiquées. Elles invoqueront bien souvent le temps, l'ombre et la lumière, ainsi qu'une logique de placements d'objets. Peut-être un ou deux puzzles plus ardus qu'à l'accoutumée... mais rien de bien sorcier en somme.

La principale difficulté réside dans la recherche des fragments, trous de serrure, habits, etc. Mais ne vous en faites pas, si vous loupez certains d'entre eux, vous aurez la possibilité de rejouer les différents chapitres en fin de partie. Ce qui est plutôt pratique au vu de certains chemins devenant par la suite inaccessibles... de quoi vous faire recommencer encore et encore ! De même, des succès s'activeront après certaines interactions pas forcément évidentes. Donc vraiment, soyez attentif à votre environnement, ouvrez l'oeil ; ce dernier recèle quantité de chemins cachés et d'actions dissimulées. 

POINTS NOIRS 

Un souci d'optimisation graphique qui peut vous occasionner quelques lags. Pour une bonne config comme la mienne, je n'ai pas pu profiter de l'ultra, ce qui est assez dommage car la différence est assez nette. Ce sera très certainement mon seul gros point noir. 

Pour ce qui est de la durée de vie, elle me semble satisfaisante. Plus longue et cela aurait pu devenir bien vite redondant. Par contre, si vous rushez, vous pouvez facilement diviser votre temps de jeu par 2. Et ça, peut-être que ça en gênera quelques uns. 

Enfin, pour chipoter, certains chemins sont vraiment compliqués à discerner. Notamment celui menant à la fin alternative (enfin, je dis "fin alternative" mais ce n'est en vérité qu'un seul élément qui apparaîtra lors de la scène finale, vous donnant droit à un succès). 


- Note : 17/20 -

Je pense en avoir fini avec ce petit avis. En espérant vous avoir éclairé sur le jeu. Si votre porte-monnaie vous le permet, foncez, c'est un petit bijou.

author: {'steamid': '76561198388924235', 'num_games_owned': 514, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 393, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 393, 'last_played': 1500918674}
review:
不是说所有的好游戏就会卖的好，Rime就是这种。
开发商最终没有和大法在一起，但绝对不要因为这件事导致你不去体验她。
类吉普力的画风，简单但是感人的故事，不算很难的谜题，悠扬的音乐。
发售的时候游戏优化没有做好，但是开放商很快就改进了这一点，我保证一个5年前买的电脑玩Rime效果全开基本没有问题
所以说，快去试试吧，你会爱上她的

author: {'steamid': '76561198045310710', 'num_games_owned': 55, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 388, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 269, 'last_played': 1621063798}
review: Great. Although it lacks contents, sound tracks and scenaries are so impressive. Worth 40bucks. Quite attractive game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198199830393', 'num_games_owned': 723, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1537754504}
review: 好玩，画风好评，音乐也很唯美。但是我玩久了容易晕。

author: {'steamid': '76561198293604104', 'num_games_owned': 75, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 409, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 409, 'last_played': 1503053767}
review: 当一位老人失去了爱子，从开始的不敢接受现实，到愤恨不已，再到后来的希望向上天妥协，绝望以及最后无奈的接受，游戏的一到五章不仅仅是一位父亲的心路历程，同样也是死去的孩子灵魂突破重重障碍希望与父亲再见一面的执着。最后父子相拥的一瞬是最悲伤也是最美好的结局。

author: {'steamid': '76561197986824644', 'num_games_owned': 2352, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 410, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 410, 'last_played': 1495900394}
review:
RiME es, en resumen, un juego con unos gráficos geniales, una ambientación extraordinaria, y una historia buenísima.
Sin embargo, tiene (o tenía, hace tiempo que lo jugué) algunos problemas técnicos que es posible que impidan jugar a la calidad esperada.
En general, sin embargo, muy recomendado.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011428156', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1503196311}
review:
First thing I will say is the music for this game is worth the 30 dollars alone. No exaggeration. 

I mainly play FPS's and open world/survival type games, and wanted a break from the norm. 

This game is simply beautiful. It is a linear game but tells a great story with no dialogue, and there is always beautiful music and visuals every second of gameplay. The puzzles in the game aren't too difficult, but I have found myself stuck in rooms for 15 minutes trying to figure them out - they are very creative and clever. I noticed that some reviews said this game has little storytelling, but if you pay attention to all the details (i mean ALL of the details) while playing this, you'll find out it has a very compelling story of an island that once thrived with life. And this game tells that story very well without saying a word. It's very hard to find games as well made as this these days with how saturated the market is with endless indie games and open alphas. I highly recommend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012020367', 'num_games_owned': 373, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1359, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1359, 'last_played': 1503009911}
review:
Just finished this amazing game...worth it, especially on sale! Not suitable to play on potato, saw many negative reviews due to performance issues. If you got a decent setup it's pure eye candy and runs smoothly. Gameplay is easy and fluent.

GET IT! GET IT! GET IT!

author: {'steamid': '76561198734392430', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 285, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 285, 'last_played': 1503010474}
review: Even though it may run like a potato on even good systems it is absolutely worth your time. I didn't expect a gripping narrative from a voiceless puzzle/platformer. If you are on the fence about this game you will thank yourself for buying it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198282867159', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 605, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 449, 'last_played': 1507554465}
review: 아....실수로 리뷰를 다 날려버렸네요. 다시 작성해야함에도 굳이 글을 작성합니다. 어드벤처, 힐링게임 류를 좋아하신다면 꼭 플레이해보셨으면 합니다. 분위기는 물론 브금까지 정말 끝내주거든요. 어떤게임인지도 모르고 지름신이라도 온양 무작정 사서 플레이하고 난 지금 저는 유투브에서 본 게임의 플레이 영상 까지 찾아보고 있습니다. 스토리, 분위기, 그래픽 정말 어느 하나 나무랄 곳 없으며 플레이를 하고 나니 눈가가 조금 아려왔습니다. 아 현재는 사이사이 찾지 못했던 오브젝트들을 찾아보고 있습니다. 솔직히 아무리 찾아도 보이지 않는 오브젝트를 마주할 때면 좀 열이 받습니다만. 그저 스토리 위주로 플레이하신다면 후반을 제외하고 정말 즐겁게 플레이하시리라 믿습니다. 후반에는 좀 거 뭐냐 길도 둘러가야하고 맵이 참 넓어져서요 그러나 저는 그것도 꽤나 맘에 들었습니다. 젠장 지금 술이 좀 들어갔기에 횡설수설한 부분 양해 부탁드리고 솔직히 근데 이거 한국어로 작성하는데 볼 사람이 얼마나 있을까? 많이 보긴 하나? 아 암튼 졸라 재밌습니다 하세요 플레이 하세요 개꿀잼 ㄹㅇ ㅇㅇ

author: {'steamid': '76561198027239685', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 375, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 375, 'last_played': 1502996017}
review:
It's a well made game with relaxing gameplay and puzzles, and quite different "levels" with unique atmosphere. Unfortunately the deeper meaning of the story is hard to grasp for me. I read some interpretations which might make sense, but there are too few cues for me. When I finished the game I didn't quite know what to make of it.

Still I recommend this game for the unique experience, just don't expect to understand the hidden meaning of everything you do there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198203035082', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 115, 'playtime_forever': 188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1636120447}

author: {'steamid': '76561198045193112', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 245, 'last_played': 1502987836}

author: {'steamid': '76561198111090543', 'num_games_owned': 116, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 739, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 460, 'last_played': 1553260369}
review:
全年龄版劳拉的儿子（？） 还是重置之前的
镜头也是跟古墓丽影重置之前一样的蛋疼2333 估计是为了故意摆出一个很有电影感的角度
游戏过程非常的惬意 解谜难度也偏中下 玩起来非常舒服 全程也不断的在截图
缺点大概就是优化一般 ultra会大幅度调高V-SYNC导致卡顿 我把V-SYNC调到双重就好多了
。。。玩完了之后这个故事真是日了狗了。。。 OST也是真的很不错 不错到能坚持字幕听完

author: {'steamid': '76561198034199687', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 333, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1502980727}
review:
Kinda over-hyped.

There's not much open-world and only some useless collectables to get. Puzzles are simple and nowhere reach Zelda-quality. 

Nice as an athmospheric walking simulator with easy puzzles but I was expecting some more exploration.

author: {'steamid': '76561198334915350', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 478, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 477, 'last_played': 1505827898}
review:
首先这几乎可以说是一款艺术品的游戏
无论风格、故事 以及对人物本身的细节拓展
其中画风以及音乐尤其吸引人
画面几乎可以说随意戳图已然达到了壁纸的程度
搭配上音乐可以讲
这款游戏虽然游戏性上有所欠缺（对于资深解密玩家）
但即使这样也可以让人非常舒心的玩下去
而完全不会生厌
其次主角的动作之细腻几乎达到了一个不可思议的地步
（是的，绝大部分ARPG也完全达不到如此细腻）
基础所需的动作先不提
撞墙摔倒、挂机挠头、挠屁股
不同高度下落的反应也完全不同
上下坡采用了不一样的跑步姿势甚至涉水也有单独的跑动动作
流畅而且凸显人物特色
可以感觉出对人物刻画上的用心
另外这是一款完全不会因为语言而造成障碍的游戏
(因为压根没有任何文字相关内容.......

author: {'steamid': '76561198164124490', 'num_games_owned': 794, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 7533, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1939, 'last_played': 1670639284}
review: First, let me say that I had a lot of problems running this game in the beginning.  After I repaired my MB, all was good.  After getting the game working, I found this game to be one of my very favorite games.  The puzzles are logical and the goals were easy to monitor.  I am not a big fan of shoot 'em ups, platformers, or gambling games.  What I do like is games that tell a good story and tell a good story it did!  I could not put my controller down for hours, just to find out what the next story part told.  This game has a very gut wrenching ending that leaves the player near tears if the player is very involved in the game and has a heart.  I make this review after deleting my previous negative review because of a faulty mb.  I have just finished playing this game for the third time and I still did not find all the collection items.  Oh well! Starting game four now.  Goodnight everyone.

author: {'steamid': '76561198335401945', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 407, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 407, 'last_played': 1502974892}
review: Achei o jogo extremamente curto. Terminei em poucas horas. Não compensou. É bonitinho mas bem fácil e curto demais.

author: {'steamid': '76561198211786125', 'num_games_owned': 141, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 378, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 378, 'last_played': 1502972359}
review: 游戏虽然摄像头视角很尴尬，但是剧情还是不错的，已经通关了，后面都已经玩到哽咽了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198093726039', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 423, 'playtime_forever': 665, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 588, 'last_played': 1503051989}
review:
그래픽은 좋지 않으나 사양은 탐. 
퍼즐은 있으나 난이도는 없음. 
해야할 것은 많으나 지표는 여우뿐. 
맵은 넓고 콜렉터블은 많으나 지도는 없음.
게임오버는 없으나 힐링은 없음. 페르시아의 왕자 4를 생각하면 편함.
게임성은 인디나 가격은 32,000원.

거기다가 개발자 한 말 보면 멘탈도 두부 멘탈 같음. 열쇠구멍으로 실체화하는 것은 참신했지만 벽타기 파쿠르와 쉬운 퍼즐이 플레이의 전부,

다만 라틴아메리카스러운 분위기와 스토리는 매우 좋았음.가격만 2만원 내외였으면 추천이었겠지만 공략 안 보고도 플레이타임 7시간 정도의 게임에 3만원을 주기는 아깝끼에 비추함.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028244437', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 194, 'playtime_forever': 531, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 531, 'last_played': 1498987194}
review:
RIME a été pour moi une très agréable surprise.

J'avais été un peu échaudé avec les performances plombées par Denuvo (depuis retiré) mais je ne regrette pas mon achat.

Il y a un petit côté Windwaker mâtiné de Mystérieuses cités d'or assez plaisant.

Certes, les énigmes ne nécessitent la plupart du temps pas un niveau élevé d'intelligence et de logique, mais j'ai quand même buté quelquefois sur quelques puzzle, en particulier lorsque le titre se fait un peu moins dirigiste.

Il s'agit avant tout d'une aventure très contemplative, vous l'aurez compris, et non d'un challenge hardcore de plateformes, cette partie du jeu étant très secondaire (avec les fameuses prises et corniches remplies de fientes de mouettes pour être bien repérables).

Je me suis laissé bercer par cette aventure finalement pas si convenue et même émouvante par certains aspects (en particulier à la fin du jeu).

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1NhvjbbwxvQ

author: {'steamid': '76561198012164178', 'num_games_owned': 193, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 530, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 530, 'last_played': 1502956955}
review:
What a fantastic, melancholy story!  I"m not one to talk about spoilers, though.  The animation is top-notch, the game is intriguing, and the incidental music fits the storyline just right.  I'm planning on playing this again and again, especially since I didn't find all of the toys, the keyholes, and such.

   This is one of those immersive games where you miss out on so much if you don't explore your environment.  I give it 5 out of 5 stars.  I hope that the people involved in making this game (I feel funny calling it a game) will make much more in the near future.

   This game is worth EVERY penny!

author: {'steamid': '76561197981494251', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 380, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 380, 'last_played': 1502893344}
review:
Had seen this advertised heavilly on Facebook, and although I actively avoid products that are shoved in my face non-stop, I decided to repent in this case as the game looked stunning, and I dig a good puzzle game. 
£20 (on sale) is about right for this title. I finished it in around 5 hours, although I'll admit I didn't hunt every corner for every secret, I ended with about half. 

My first impressions of the game itself were rather breathtaking. I love this style of graphics design, and the music really shone out as exceptional. I don't normally give too much attention to music in games, as frequently its mainly an annoyance. However much like Little Inferno, the music in RiME drastically added to the game, and it really one of its greatest features. The music brought out emotions (to the point of, I was worried I was going to cry!) that completely immerse you in what is going on. 

The gameplay itself was fun, although not ground breaking, I enjoyed it for the mostpart. Some of the puzzles get quite repetitive in areas although it was not overly noticable whilst playing through, more an afterthought after completing the game. The sidequest of collecting toys, looking through keyholes etc seemed pointless whilst playing. It wasn't until I finished that I regretted not getting all of them.

The real selling point of this game is the story (which is heavilly complimented by the musical score).
As someone who does not generally play single players, and extremely rarely cares about story, I feel RiME shines brightly. 
It doesn't really start coming together until towards the end of the game, which is where you can begin to put all the pieces together, and as there is no dialog in the game, that in itself is difficult to do until you have actually finished. However this adds a wonderful mysticism about the game.
The fox annoyed me most of way through, and I suspect I'm not the only person who told it to 'shut up' on multiple occasions as it was barking at me while I was trying to find another toy. However by the end of the story which I will not ruin, I found it to be such a compelling character, I almost felt more attached to it than the protagonist. 
The mechs are a good example of something which shouldn't have worked, which did spectactularly (if that makes sense?). 
The first mech to come to life in the game, confused me to no end, it didn't make sense in the world I was in (and to be frank... still doesn't?). However it did not take long at all for me to be emotionally attached to the mech I had just saved, and the following level(s) with their company gaved me a lot of satisfaction, and heart-break.

There are negatives about the game however:
-It is very poorly optimised for PC - I had a lot of frame drops (1080gtx) 
-Camera control is sluggish, and in areas, completely frustrating
-Jumping can be just as frustrating (mainly wall-wall jumps)
-I have some continutity issues with the story telling - The 'character' in the red cloak just stops appearing about half way through with no reasoning (unless I missed it) 
-The angry bird - There didn't seem to be an explanation of what it was/represented at the end, which I was acutely dissapointed about (again, unless I somehow missed it)

In summary, I would pay £20 for this again, however would be reluctant to suggest it to a friend for more. 
I had a lot of fun playing, and will play it again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120876076', 'num_games_owned': 335, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1502886375}
review: O Que dizer sobre um jogo lindo como esse? Sua Trilha sonora...Encantadora, apenas a primeira meia hora ja irá te encantar..Você que esta com duvida, não tenha duvida, se vale a pena compra-lo, tanto o seu preço normal quanto o seu preço promocional são igualmente fiéis a um jogo de tamanha qualidade, sem falas apenas interação sem violência, apenas paz..Um jogo desse que te passa a sensação de duvida e de curiosidade sobre o que esta por vir. Recomendo a todos que não deixem de joga-lo, se não quise-lo por agora, adicione a sua lista de favoritos e não se esqueça de compra-lo mais tarde, o game tem algumas quedas de fps, mais isso não é nada por que jogo bom é jogo Rime..independente de suas quedas de fps você ainda irá se apaixonar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009384622', 'num_games_owned': 1506, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 1309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1309, 'last_played': 1502828362}
review:
I have mixed feelings about [I]RiME[/I]. The core of games like this - light on gameplay/puzzles, more focused on presentation - is the general atmosphere and story. Both need to be great for the overall experience to be good, and while I enjoyed [I]RiME[/I] deeply while playing it, after the ending and with some reflection I'm really not sure what to think.

Starting with the good, the art design and music is excellent. Levels are well thought out and designed to seem as if they actually exist. Each stage is self-contained but all aspects of that stage are consistent with the boundaries that we can see - nothing seems to exist in hammerspace as it were. There's tidbits of story that exist as murals and miscellaneous architecture and given the rather esoteric nature of the beginning plot finding these is its own reward. There's also a decent number of collectibles for those that like treasure hunting.

The issue I have with [I]RiME[/I] comes from its ending. My view is somewhat hard to explain without spoilers, but essentially the entirety of the game is a red herring. After the ending the intended symbolism of the levels is explained directly, but even still the details of the levels don't fit with the ending. That's not really too big of a deal in of itself, but I feel that if the details of the levels actually did relate directly to the story the game would have been better for it, and it still would be possible to implement the ending that's already there. When examined independently the ending isn't particularly weak - in fact I think it gives an excellent message and that message is treated with care - there's just wasted potential when there was obviously the opportunity for a more detailed setting and story that could have been told while also keeping the original moral.

I'm still not sure if I would recommend [I]RiME[/I] or not. It's not a game that I have any interest in replaying, but I don't regret the experience either. I suppose that's enough.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011936841', 'num_games_owned': 708, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 748, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 306, 'last_played': 1701892237}
review: Wonderful platform puzzler with a beautiful story that's however very subtle for most of the play time and only clears up towards the end, but then it gets some “Brothers - A tale of two sons” vibes. Play time is good (not too long to drag things out too much, not too short so as to cause buyer's remorse), graphics are beautiful, and so is the music. The world has been beautifully and creatively realized throughout its five chapters/settings. Puzzles are easy and timing is only relevant on occasion,  making the experience rather relaxing. Also, the game does entirely without any speech or text and still manages to get its story across nicely. Collectibles in conjunction with a chapter selection becoming available once you've finished the game lend it some replayability. Highly recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561198051083217', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 633, 'playtime_forever': 397, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 369, 'last_played': 1502648419}
review:
Don´t let yourself deceive by the trailers and the soundtrack.
Or: just watch the trailers and forget about the game.

NEGATIVELY CHARGED:

Clunky game mechanics.
Bad optimization.
Bad camera.
If you look up too high your task bar is showing up.
Walking simulator.
No real story.
Soundtrack doesn´t fit to what is happening. Way to epic for little to nothing.



POSITIVELY CHARGED:

Art style.
Soundtrack....at least if you don´t listen too long to it...
Some puzzles, not too hard. Some are too easy though.


SUMMARIZATION: get it on sale for maximum 5€ - it´s tedious.
